original: Hatthimpītiādīsu pana hatthiādīnaṃ bahūnaṃ ekajjhaṃ kātabbābhāvadassanatthaṃ samuccayattho

original: pi-saddo vutto. Tena “hatthimpi dassetī”tiādīsu dutiye vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo.
analyzed: pi saddaḥ vuttaḥ tena hatthim pi dasseti iti ādīsu dutiye vutta nayena iva atthaḥ gahetabbaḥ

original: Iddhimato attano kumārakākārena paresaṃ dassanaṃ kumārakavaṇṇanimmānaṃ, na ettha

original: kiñci apubbaṃ pathavīādivatthu nipphādīyatīti kasiṇaniyamena payojanābhāvato “pathavīkasiṇādīsu
analyzed: kiñci apubbam pathavī ādi vatthu nipphādīyati iti kasiṇa niyamena payojana abhāvato pathavī kasiṇa ādīsu

original: nīlavaṇṇaṃ vā dassetabbaṃ siyā, pītādīsu aññataravaṇṇaṃ vā. Tathā sati nīlādikasiṇāni

original: taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.

original: 399. Kāyanti attano karajakāyaṃ. Vuttanayenevāti “ayaṃ kāyo susiro hotū”ti parikammaṃ
analyzed: kāyanti attano karaja kāyam vutta nayena iva ati ayam kāyo su siraḥ hotu iti parikammam

analyzed: iti dvādasama pariccheda vaṇṇanā

original: 13. Abhiññāniddesavaṇṇanā
Dibbasotadhātukathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: dibba sota dhātu kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 400. Tatthāti dibbasotadhātuyā niddese. Abhiññāpāḷiyā hi niddesamukhena abhiññānaṃ

analyzed: nibbattana vidhi vidhīyati abhiññā sīsena ittha abhiññāpāḷi vuttā tena āha tatas parāsu

original: kammassa ca uḷāratāya upakkilesavimutti veditabbā. Upakkilesadosarahitaṃ hi kammaṃ

analyzed: pasāda lakkhaṇā sota dhātu

original: Vīriyārambhavaseneva ijjhanato sabbāpi kusalabhāvanā vīriyabhāvanā, padhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatā

original: Ayaṃ dibbasotadhātu. Parikammasamādhicittenāti parikammabhūtāveṇikasamādhicittena,

original: Parikammasamādhi nāma dibbasotadhātuyā upacārāvatthātipi vadanti. Sā pana nānāvajjanavasena

original: Evaṃ āsannasaddaggahaṇānusārena dūradūratarasaddaggahaṇampi samijjhatīti dassetuṃ

original: Tattha saddanimittanti ñāṇuppattihetubhāvato saddo eva saddanimittaṃ, yo vā yathāvutto

original: “saddānaṃ saddanimitta”nti. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “oḷārikānampi sukhumānampi saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ

original: manasi kātabba”nti, taṃ oḷārikasukhumasammatesupi oḷārikasukhumasabbhāvadassanatthaṃ.

original: Tañca sabbaṃ sukhume ñāṇaparicayadassanatthaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saddanimittassa apaccuppannasabhāvattā

original: “saddova saddanimitta”nti ayameva pakkho ñāyāgatoti keci, taṃ na oḷārikasukhumānaṃ

original: Parikammasamādhicittassāti dibbasotadhātuyā uppādanatthaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā

original: Tesu saddesūti ye parikammassa visayadassanatthaṃ bahū saddā vuttā, tesu saddesu.

analyzed: gatam paṭipannanti mahaggatam avasesanti paritta appamāṇam attānam uttaritum samatthehi

original: saha uttarehīti sauttaraṃ. Uttiṇṇanti uttaraṃ, loke apariyāpannabhāvena lokato uttaranti

original: lokuttaraṃ. Tato eva natthi etassa uttaranti anuttaraṃ. Upanijjhānalakkhaṇappattena
analyzed: lokuttaram tatas eva na atthi etassa uttaranti anuttaram upanijjhāna lakkhaṇa ppattena

original: Vikkhambhanavimuttippattaṃ mahaggatacittaṃ. Samucchedavimuttippattaṃ maggacittaṃ.

analyzed: kāmam kānici paccavekkhaṇa citta ādīni nibbāna ārammaṇāni honti nissaraṇa vimutti ppattāni

analyzed: pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇa kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: ca te anu anu bhūtā jātā pavattā tattha uppajjitvā vigatā ava honti iti āha nivutthā iti

original: ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā”ti. Evaṃ sasantatipariyāpannadhammavasena

analyzed: vatvā tam vivaritum gocara nivāsena ati ādi vuttam gocara bhūtā api hi gocara asevanāya

original: ubhayepi te dassetuṃ “attano”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ubhaye api te dassetum attanā iti ādi vuttam

analyzed: nivuttha dhammā te na kevalam viññāṇena viññāṇa mattāḥ atha kho yathā pubbe jāti nāma gotta vaṇṇa liṅga āhāra ādi visesehi

original: paricchedakārikāya paññāya paricchijja gahitā, tathevetaṃ ñāṇaṃ paricchijja gaṇhātīti

analyzed: imassa atthassa dīpana ttham vuttam para viññāṇa viññātā api vā nivuttha iti sambandho

original: Na kevalaṃ attanova viññāṇena, atha kho paresaṃ viññāṇena viññātāpi vāti attho. Idhāpi

original: Tassa ca gahaṇe payojanaṃ vuttanayeneva vattabbaṃ. Te ca kho yasmā abhītāsu eva jātīsu

original: payojanābhāvato. Ñāṇabaladassanatthaṃ panettha vuttaṃ.

original: Taṃ taṃ pākaṭamevāti yathā nāma saradasamaye ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ caturatanike
analyzed: tam tam pākaṭam evā ati yathā nāma sarada samaye ṭhitam ajjhanhika velāyam catur atanike

analyzed: gehe cakkhumataḥ purisassa rūpa gatam su pākaṭam eva hoti iti loka siddham etam siyā pana

original: viya saṅkhipitvāti yathā peyyālapāḷiṃ paṭhantā “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ…pe… pañcamaṃ jhāna”nti

original: ādipariyosānameva gaṇhantā saṅkhipitvā sajjhāyanti, na anupadaṃ, evaṃ anekāpi kappakoṭiyo

original: vacīviññatti. Viggahābhāvato na kassati, kasituṃ chindituṃ na sakkā, na vā kāsati
analyzed: vacī viññatti viggaha abhāvataḥ na kassati kasitum chinditum na sakkā na vā kāsati

original: dibbatīti akāsaṃ, akāsameva ākāsaṃ, tadeva nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena ākāsadhātu. Rūpassāti
analyzed: dibbati iti akāsam akāsam eva ākāsam tat eva nissatta nijjīva ṭṭhena ākāsadhātu rūpassa ati

original: nipphannarūpassa. Lahubhāvo lahutā. Sayaṃ anipphannatāya “rūpassā”ti visesitaṃ. Esa
analyzed: nipphanna rūpassa lahu bhāvaḥ lahu tā sayam a nipphanna tāya rūpassa ati visesitam esa

original: nayo sesesupi. Ayaṃ pana viseso – kammani sādhu kammaññaṃ, tassa bhāvo kammaññatā.
analyzed: nayaḥ sesesu pi ayam pana visesaḥ kammani sādhu kammaññam tassa bhāvaḥ kammañña tā

original: Paṭhamaṃ, upari ca cayo pavatti upacayo. Pubbāparavasena sambandhā tati pavatti santati.
analyzed: paṭhamam upari ca cayaḥ pavatti upacayaḥ pubba apara vasena sambandhā tati pavatti santati

original: Aniccassa vināsino bhāvo aniccatā. Kabalaṃ karīyatīti kabaḷīkāro. Āharatīti āhāro.
analyzed: aniccassa vināsinaḥ bhāvaḥ anicca tā kabalam karīyati iti kabaḷīkāraḥ āharati iti āhāraḥ

original: Evaṃ tāva upādāyarūpaṃ saddatthato veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam tāva upādāyarūpam saddatthataḥ veditabbam

original: Kamato pana sabbesaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ nissayabhāvena mūlabhūtattā paṭhamaṃ bhūtarūpāni
analyzed: kamatas pana sabbesam rūpa dhammānam nissaya bhāvena mūla bhūta ttā paṭhamam bhūtarūpāni

original: uddiṭṭhāni. Itaresu ajjhattikabhāvena attabhāvasamaññāya mūlabhāvato cakkhādīni pañca
analyzed: uddiṭṭhāni itaresu ajjhattika bhāvena atta bhāva samaññāya mūla bhāvato cakkha ādīni pañca

original: ādito uddiṭṭhāni. Tesaṃ visayīnaṃ ime visayāti dassetuṃ rūpādīni cattāri uddiṭṭhāni.
analyzed: āditas uddiṭṭhāni tesam visayīnam ime visayā ti dassetum rūpa ādīni cattāri uddiṭṭhāni

original: Phoṭṭhabbaṃ pana anupādārūpattā, bhūtaggahaṇena gahitattā ca idha na gahitaṃ. Svāyaṃ
analyzed: phoṭṭhabbam pana anupādārūpa ttā bhūta ggahaṇena gahita ttā ca idha na gahitam

original: attabhāvo imehi “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti vā saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ
analyzed: atta bhāvaḥ imehi itthī iti vā purisaḥ iti vā saṅkham gacchati iti dassana ttham tad anantaram

original: itthipurisindriyadvayaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ. “Iminā jīvatī”ti vohāraṃ labbhatīti dassanatthaṃ
analyzed: itthi purisa indriya dvayam uddiṭṭham iminā jīvati iti vohāram labbhati iti dassana attham

original: tato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tassa imaṃ nissāya viññāṇappavattiyaṃ attahitādisiddhīti dassanatthaṃ
analyzed: tatas jīvitindriyam tassa imam nissāya viññāṇa ppavattiyam atta hita ādi siddhi iti dassana ttham

original: hadayavatthu. Tassa imāsaṃ vasena sabbe kāyavacīpayogāti dassanatthaṃ viññattidvayaṃ.
analyzed: hadaya vatthu tassa imāsam vasena sabbe kāya vacī payogā ti dassana ttham viññatti dvayam

original: Imāya rūpakāyassa paricchedo, añjaso cāti dassanatthaṃ ākāsadhātu. Imehissa sukhappavatti,
analyzed: rūpa kāyassa paricchedaḥ añjasas ca ati dassana attham ākāsadhātu sukha ppavatti

original: uppattiādayo cāti dassanatthaṃ lahutādayo. Sabbo cāyaṃ catusantatirūpasantāno iminā
analyzed: uppatti ādayo ca ati dassana attham lahu tā ādayo sabbaḥ ca ayam catu santati rūpa santānaḥ iminā

original: upatthambhīyatīti dassanatthaṃ ante kabaḷīkāro āhāro uddiṭṭhoti veditabbo.
analyzed: upatthambhīyati iti dassana attham ante kabaḷīkāraḥ āhāraḥ uddiṭṭhaḥ ti veditabbo

original: 433. Idāni yathāuddiṭṭhāni upādārūpāni lakkhaṇādito niddisituṃ “tattha rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādalakkhaṇa”ntiādi
analyzed: idāni yathā uddiṭṭhāni upādā rūpāni lakkhaṇa āditaḥ niddisitum tattha rūpa abhighāta araha bhūta ppasāda lakkhaṇa ntiādi

original: āraddhaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu upādārūpesu. Rūpe, rūpassa vā abhighāto rūpābhighāto,
analyzed: āraddham tattha tattha ati tesu upādā rūpesu rūpe rūpassa vā abhighātaḥ rūpa abhighātaḥ

original: taṃ arahatīti rūpābhighātāraho, rūpābhighāto hotu vā mā vā evaṃsabhāvo catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ
analyzed: tam arahati iti rūpa abhighāta ārahaḥ rūpa abhighātaḥ hotu vā mā vā evaṃsabhāvaḥ catunnam bhūtānam

original: pasādo rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādo, evaṃlakkhaṇaṃ cakkhūti attho. Yasmā paccayantarasahito
analyzed: pasādaḥ rūpa abhighāta araha bhūta ppasādaḥ evaṃlakkhaṇam cakkhu iti atthaḥ yasmā paccaya antara sahitaḥ

original: eva cakkhupasādo rūpābhihananavasena pavattati, na kevalo. Tasmā taṃsabhāvatāva pamāṇaṃ,
analyzed: eva cakkhu pasādaḥ rūpa abhihanana vasena pavattati na kevalaḥ tasmā pamāṇam

original: na rūpābhighātoti dassanatthaṃ rūpābhighātārahatā vuttā yathā vipākārahaṃ kusalākusalanti.
analyzed: na rūpa abhighāto ti dassana attham rūpa abhighāta āraha tā vuttā yathā vipāka araham kusala akusalanti

original: Abhighāto ca visayavisayīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ abhimukhībhāvo yogyadesāvaṭṭhānaṃ abhighāto
analyzed: abhighāto ca visaya visayīnam aññam aññam abhimukhībhāvo yogya desa avaṭṭhānam abhighāto

original: viyāti katvā. So rūpe cakkhussa, rūpassa vā cakkhumhi hoti. Tenāha “yaṃ cakkhu anidassanaṃ
analyzed: viyā ti katvā saḥ rūpe cakkhussa rūpassa vā cakkhumhi hoti tena āha yam cakkhu a nidassanam

original: sappaṭighaṃ rūpamhi sanidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi paṭihaññi vā”ti, “yamhi cakkhumhi
analyzed: sa paṭigham rūpamhi sa nidassanamhi sa paṭighamhi paṭihaññi vāti yamhi cakkhumhi

original: anidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ paṭihaññi vā paṭihaññati
analyzed: a nidassanamhi sa paṭighamhi rūpam sa nidassanam sa paṭigham paṭihaññi vā paṭihaññati

original: vā”ti ca ādi. Paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇāyatanattabhāvanibbattakassa kammassa nidānabhūtā
analyzed: vāti ca ādi paripuṇṇa aparipuṇṇa āyatana tta bhāva nibbattakassa kammassa nidāna bhūtā

original: kāmataṇhā, rūpataṇhā ca tadāyatanikabhavapatthanābhāvato daṭṭhukāmatādivohāraṃ arahatīti
analyzed: kāma taṇhā rūpa taṇhā ca tad āyatanika bhava patthanā bhāvataḥ daṭṭhu kāma tā ādi vohāram arahati iti

original: dutiyanayo sabbattha vutto. Tattha daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ etesanti
analyzed: dutiya nayo sabbattha vuttaḥ tattha daṭṭhu kāma tā nidāna kammam samuṭṭhānam etesan ti

original: daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammasamuṭṭhānāni. Evaṃvidhānaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādo daṭṭhukāmatā…pe…
analyzed: daṭṭhu kāma tā nidāna kamma samuṭṭhānāni evaṃvidhānam bhūtānam pasādaḥ daṭṭhu kāma tāpe

original: pasādo, evaṃlakkhaṇaṃ cakkhu. Tassa tassa hi bhavassa mūlakāraṇabhūtā taṇhā tasmiṃ
analyzed: pasādaḥ evaṃlakkhaṇam cakkhu tassa tassa hi bhavassa mūla kāraṇa bhūtā taṇhā tasmin

original: tasmiṃ bhave uppajjanārahāyatanavisayāpi nāma hotīti kāmataṇhādīnaṃ daṭṭhukāmatādivohārārahatā vuttā.
analyzed: tasmin bhave uppajjana araha āyatana visayā api nāma hoti iti kāma taṇhā ādīnam daṭṭhu kāma tā ādi vohāra araha tā vuttā

original: Daṭṭhukāmatāti hi daṭṭhumicchā, rūpataṇhāti attho. Ettha ca daṭṭhukāmatāya, sesānañca
analyzed: daṭṭhu kāma tā ati hi daṭṭhum icchā rūpa taṇhā ati atthaḥ ettha ca daṭṭhu kāma tāya sesānam ca

original: taṃtaṃattabhāvanibbattakakammāyūhanakkhaṇato sati purimanibbattiyaṃ vattabbaṃ natthi,
analyzed: sati purima nibbattiyam vattabbam natthi

original: asati pana maggena asamugghātitabhāvoyeva kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yato maggena asamucchinnaṃ
analyzed: asati pana maggena asamugghātita bhāvaḥ yā iva kāraṇan ti daṭṭhabbam yatas maggena asamucchinnam

original: kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjitvā attano phalassa paccayabhāvūpagamanato vijjamānamevāti
analyzed: kāraṇa lābhe sati uppajjitvā attano phalassa paccaya bhāva upagamanataḥ vijjamānam eva ati

original: uppannatā atthitā pariyāyehi vuccati “ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ
analyzed: uppanna tā atthi tā pariyāyehi vuccati ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvento ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam

original: maggaṃ bahulīkaronto uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme antarāyeva antaradhāpetī”ti,
analyzed: maggam bahulīkarontaḥ uppanna uppanne pāpake akusale dhamme antarāya iva antaradhāpeti iti

original: “santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ kāmacchando’ti pajānātī”ti ca evamādīsu.
analyzed: santam vai ajjhattam kāmacchandam atthi me ajjhattam kāmacchandaḥ iti pajānāti iti ca evamādīsu

original: Rūpesu puggalassa, viññāṇassa vā āviñchanarasaṃ. Ādhārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ nissayapaccayabhāvato.
analyzed: rūpesu puggalassa viññāṇassa vā āviñchana rasam ādhāra bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam nissaya paccaya bhāvato

original: Daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammajabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ yesaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādo, tevassa āsannakāraṇanti
analyzed: daṭṭhu kāma tā nidāna kamma ja bhūta padaṭṭhānam yesam bhūtānam pasādo āsanna kāraṇam ti

original: katvā. Ettha ca taṃtaṃattabhāvanipphādakasādhāraṇakammavasena purimaṃ cakkhulakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: katvā ettha ca purimam cakkhu lakkhaṇam

original: vuttaṃ kāraṇavisesassa anāmaṭṭhattā. “Evarūpaṃ nāma me cakkhu hotū”ti evaṃ nibbattitaāveṇikakammavasena
analyzed: vuttam kāraṇa visesassa a nāmaṭṭha ttā evarūpam nāma me cakkhu hotu iti evam nibbattita āveṇika kamma vasena

original: dutiyanti vadanti. Satipi pana pañcannaṃ pasādabhāvasāmaññe savisayāvabhāsanasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: dutiyanti vadanti pana pasāda bhāva sāmaññe sa visaya avabhāsana saṅkhātassa

original: pasādabyāpārassa vasena purimaṃ vuttaṃ. Pasādakāraṇassa satipi kammabhāvasāmaññe,
analyzed: pasāda byāpārassa vasena purimam vuttam pasāda kāraṇassa sati pi kamma bhāva sāmaññe

original: ekatte vā attano kāraṇabhedena bhedadassanavasena dutiyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sotādīnaṃ
analyzed: ekatte vā attano kāraṇa bhedena bheda dassana vasena dutiyanti daṭṭhabbam sota ādīnam

original: lakkhaṇādīsu vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ādīsu vutta nayena iva atthaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Etthāha – cakkhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ kiṃ ekakammunā uppatti, udāhu nānākammunāti? Ubhayathāpīti
analyzed: ettha āha cakkha ādīnam indriyānam kim eka kammunā uppatti udāhu nānā kammunā ati ubhayathā api iti

original: porāṇā. Tattha nānākammunā tāva uppattiyaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ visese vattabbaṃ natthi kāraṇassa
analyzed: porāṇā tattha nānā kammunā tāva uppattiyam cakkha ādīnam visese vattabbam na atthi kāraṇassa

original: bhinnattā. Ekakammunā pana uppattiyaṃ kathaṃ nesaṃ visesoti? Kāraṇassa bhinnattā
analyzed: bhinna ttā eka kammunā pana uppattiyam katham na esam visesaḥ ti kāraṇassa bhinna ttā

original: eva. Taṃtaṃbhavapatthanābhūtā hi taṇhā taṃtaṃbhavapariyāpannāyatanābhilāsatāya sayaṃ
analyzed: eva taṃtaṃbhava patthanā bhūtā hi taṇhā taṃtaṃbhava pariyāpanna āyatana abhilāsa tāya sayam

original: vicittarūpā upanissayabhāvena taṃtaṃbhavanibbattakakammassa vicittabhedataṃ vidahati.
analyzed: vicitta rūpā upanissaya bhāvena taṃ taṃbhava nibbattaka kammassa vicitta bheda tam vidahati

original: Yato tadāhitavisesaṃ taṃ tathārūpasamatthatāyogenānekarūpāpannaṃ viya anekaṃ visiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ
analyzed: yatas tad āhita visesam tam tathārūpa samattha tā yogena aneka rūpa āpannam anekam visiṭṭha sabhāvam

original: phalaṃ nibbatteti. Na cettha samatthatā samatthabhāvato aññā veditabbā kāraṇavisesena
analyzed: phalam nibbatteti na ca ittha samattha tā samattha bhāvataḥ aññā veditabbā kāraṇa visesena

original: āhitavisesassa visiṭṭhaphalanipphādanayogyatāmattato. Ayañca ekassapi kammassa anekindriyahetutāvisesayogo
analyzed: āhita visesassa visiṭṭha phala nipphādana yogya tā mattataḥ ayaṃ ca ekassa api kammassa aneka indriya hetu tā visesa yogaḥ

original: yuttito, āgamanato ca parato āgamissati. Apica ekasseva kusalacittassa soḷasādivipākacittanibbattihetutā
analyzed: yuttitaḥ āgamanataḥ ca paratas āgamissati apica ekassa iva kusala cittassa soḷasa ādi vipāka citta nibbatti hetu tā

original: vuccati. Lokepi ekasseva sālibījassa paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇataṇḍulaātaṇḍulaphalanibbattihetutā
analyzed: vuccati loke pi ekassa iva sāli bījassa paripuṇṇa a paripuṇṇa taṇḍula ātaṇḍula phala nibbatti hetu tā

original: dissateva, kiṃ vā etāya yutticintāya. Yato kammaphalaṃ cakkhādīni, kammavipāko ca
analyzed: dissatā iva kim vā etāya yutti cintāya yatas kamma phalam cakkha ādīni kamma vipāko ca

original: sabbaso buddhānaṃyeva ñāṇassa visayoti.
analyzed: sabbasas buddhānaṃ yeva ñāṇassa visayaḥ ti

original: 434. Kecīti mahāsaṅghikesu ekacce. Tesu hi vasudhammo evaṃ vadati “cakkhumhi tejo
analyzed: keci iti mahā saṅghikesu ekacce tesu hi vasudhammaḥ evam vadati cakkhumhi tejaḥ

original: adhikaṃ, sote vāyu, ghāne pathavī, jivhāya āpo, kāye sabbepi samā”ti. Cakkhādīsu
analyzed: adhikam sote vāyu ghāne pathavī jivhāya āpaḥ kāye sabbe pi cakkha ādīsu

original: tejādiadhikatā nāma tannissayabhūtānaṃ tadadhikatāyāti dassento “tejādhikānaṃ bhūtānaṃ
analyzed: teja ādi adhika tā nāma tad nissaya bhūtānam tad adhika tāya iti dassento teja adhikānam bhūtānam

original: pasādo cakkhū”tiādimāha. Kāyo sabbesanti ko ettha viseso, nanu tejādiadhikānañca
analyzed: pasādaḥ cakkhu uti ādim āha kāyo sabbesan ti kaḥ ettha visesaḥ nanu teja ādi adhikānam ca

original: bhūtānaṃ pasādā sabbesaṃyevāti? Saccametaṃ, idaṃ pana “sabbesa”nti vacanaṃ samānānanti
analyzed: bhūtānam pasādā sabbesam yeva ati saccam etam idam pana sabbesam ti vacanam samānānam ti

original: imamatthaṃ dīpeti anuvattamānassa ekadesādhikabhāvassa nivāraṇavasena vuttattā. Tejādīnaṃ
analyzed: imam attham dīpeti anuvattamānassa eka desa adhika bhāvassa nivāraṇa vasena vutta ttā teja ādīnam

original: hi paccekaṃ adhikabhāve viya dvinnaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ vā adhikabhāvepi yathāvuttādhikabhāveneva
analyzed: hi paccekam adhika bhāve viya dvinnam tiṇṇam vā adhika bhāve pi yathā vutta adhika bhāvena iva

original: ekakādivasena labbhamānāya omattatāyapi kāyappasādo na hotīti pākaṭoyamattho. Tasmā
analyzed: ekaka ādi vasena labbhamānāya kāya ppasādaḥ na hoti iti tasmā

original: catunnampi bhūtānaṃ samabhāvena kāyappasādo hotīti sabbasaddo idha samabhāvadīpako
analyzed: catunnam pi bhūtānam sama bhāvena kāya ppasādaḥ hoti iti sabba saddaḥ idha sama bhāva dīpako

original: daṭṭhabbo. Tejādīnanti padīpasaṅkhātassa tejassa obhāsarūpena, vāyussa saddena, pathaviyā
analyzed: daṭṭhabbo teja ādīnam ti padīpa saṅkhātassa tejassa obhāsa rūpena vāyussa saddena pathaviyā

original: gandhena, kheḷasaṅkhātassa udakassa rasenāti purimavāde, pacchimavāde ca yathāyogaṃ
analyzed: gandhena kheḷa saṅkhātassa udakassa rasena ati purima vāde pacchima vāde ca yathāyogam

original: taṃtaṃbhūtaguṇehi anuggayhabhāvato, rūpādīnaṃ gahaṇe upakāritabbatoti attho. Ālokādisahakārīkāraṇasahitānaṃyeva
analyzed: tad taṃbhūta guṇehi anuggayha bhāvataḥ rūpa ādīnam gahaṇe upakāritabbato ti atthaḥ āloka ādi sahakārī kāraṇa sahitānam yeva

original: cakkhādīnaṃ rūpādiavabhāsanasamatthatā, vivarassa ca sotaviññāṇūpanissayabhāvo guṇoti
analyzed: cakkha ādīnam rūpa ādi avabhāsana samattha tā vivarassa ca sota viññāṇa upanissaya bhāvaḥ guṇo ti

original: tesaṃ laddhi. Tejādīnaṃ viya pana vivarassa bhūtabhāvābhāvato yathāyoga-ggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: tesam teja ādīnam viya pana vivarassa bhūta bhāva abhāvataḥ yathā yoga ggahaṇam

original: Atha vā rūpādayo viya vivarampi bhūtaguṇoti parādhippāye tejassa ālokarūpena, ākāsasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: atha vā rūpa ādayaḥ para adhippāye tejassa āloka rūpena ākāsa saṅkhātassa

original: vivarassa saddena, vāyussa gandhena, udakassa rasena, pathaviyā phoṭṭhabbenāti evaṃ
analyzed: vivarassa saddena vāyussa gandhena udakassa rasena pathaviyā phoṭṭhabbena ati evam

original: yathāyogaṃ taṃtaṃbhūtaguṇehīti yojanā.
analyzed: yathāyogam taṃ taṃ bhūta guṇehi iti yojanā

original: Rūpādīnaṃ adhikabhāvadassanatoti aggimhi rūpassa pabhassarassa, vāyumhi saddassa
analyzed: rūpa ādīnam adhika bhāva dassanato ti aggimhi rūpassa pabhassarassa vāyumhi saddassa

original: sabhāvena suyyamānassa, pathaviyā surabhiādino gandhassa, āpe ca rasassa madhurassāti
analyzed: sabhāvena suyyamānassa pathaviyā surabhi ādinaḥ gandhassa āpe ca rasassa madhurassa ati

original: imesaṃ visesayuttānaṃ dassanato “rūpādayo tesaṃ guṇā”ti paṭhamavādī āhāti. Tasseva

original: ca paccayantarādhīnāni liṅgādīni, tasmā yatthassa ādhipaccaṃ, taṃsadisesu matacittakatarūpesupi

original: taṃsaṇṭhānatā dissati. Esa nayo purisindriyepi. Yaṃ panettha visadisaṃ, taṃ vuttanayānusārena
analyzed: tad saṇṭhāna tā dissati esa nayo purisa indriye pi yam pana ittha visadisam tam vutta naya anusārena

original: veditabbaṃ. Tayidaṃ dvayaṃ yasmā ekasmiṃ santāne saha na pavattati “yassa itthindriyaṃ
analyzed: veditabbam tayā idam dvayam yasmai ekasmin santāne saha na pavattati yassa itthi indriyam

original: uppajjati, tassa purisindriyaṃ uppajjatīti? No”tiādi vacanato, tasmā ubhatobyañjanakassāpi
analyzed: uppajjati tassa purisa indriyam uppajjati iti na utiādi vacanato tasmā ubhatobyañjanakassa api

original: ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekameva hotīti veditabbaṃ. Ye pana “sarīrekadesavutti bhāvarūpa”nti
analyzed: ekasmin khaṇe ekam eva hoti iti veditabbam ye pana sarīra eka desa vutti bhāvarūpanti

original: vadanti, tesampi taṃ micchāti dassetuṃ “tadubhayampi…pe… byāpakamevā”ti vatvā yadi
analyzed: vadanti tesam pi tam micchā ati dassetum tat ubhayam pipe byāpakam evā ti vatvā yadi

original: evaṃ kāyappasādena saṅkaro siyāti āsaṅkaṃ nivattento “na ca kāyappasādenā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: evam kāya ppasādena saṅkaro siyāti āsaṅkam nivattentaḥ na ca kāya ppasādena ati ādim āha

original: Tassattho – yadipi sakalasarīrabyāpitāya kāyappasādena aṭṭhitokāse ṭhitanti vattabbataṃ

original: ayameva cettha nippariyāyakathā. “Rūparasādayo viyā”ti etena samānanissayesupi nāma
analyzed: ayam eva ca ittha nippariyāya kathā rūpa rasa ādayaḥ viyāti etena samāna nissayesu pi nāma

analyzed: saṅkaraḥ natthi lakkhaṇa bhedato kim aṅgam pana bhinna nissaya sabhāvesu iti dasseti

original: 439. Sahajarūpānupālanalakkhaṇanti attanā sahajātarūpānaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ. Jīvitindriyassa
analyzed: sahaja rūpa anupālana lakkhaṇam ti attanā sahajāta rūpānam anupālana lakkhaṇam jīvita indriyassa

analyzed: na katam yathā asakam khaṇa matta ṭṭhāyinaḥ api kamma ja rūpassa pavatti hetu bhāvena tam anupālakam

original: Asati anupāletabbe uppalādimhi kiṃ udakaṃ anupāleyya. Yadi kammajānaṃ ṭhitihetumantarena

original: jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ, atha kasmā sabbakālaṃ na ṭhapetīti āha “na bhaṅgato”tiādi.
analyzed: jīvitindriya paṭibaddham atha kasmā sabbakālam na ṭhapeti iti āha na bhaṅgato tiādi

original: Tassa tassa anupālanādikassa sādhanato. Taṃ sādhanañca jīvamānatāvisesassa paccayabhāvato.
analyzed: tassa tassa anupālana ādikassa sādhanataḥ tam sādhanam ca jīvamāna tā visesassa paccaya bhāvato

original: Indriyabaddharūpassa hi matarūpato kammajassa, tadanubandhabhūtassa ca utusamuṭṭhānādito
analyzed: indriya baddha rūpassa hi mata rūpataḥ kamma jassa tad anubandha bhūtassa ca utu samuṭṭhāna āditaḥ

analyzed: kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbam itarathā āyukkhayataḥ maraṇam na yujjeyya ati

original: 440. Manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayalakkhaṇaṃ hadayavatthūti kathametaṃ viññātabbanti?
analyzed: manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātūnam nissaya lakkhaṇam hadaya vatthu uti katham etam viññātabbanti

original: Āgamato, yuttito ca. “Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca pavattanti,
analyzed: āgamataḥ yuttitaḥ ca yam rūpam nissāya manaḥ dhātu ca manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu ca pavattanti

original: taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena
analyzed: tam rūpam manaḥ dhātuyā ca manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā ca tad sampayuttakānam ca dhammānam nissaya paccayena

analyzed: paccayaḥ ti evamādi āgamaḥ yadi evam kasmā rūpa kaṇḍe tam na vuttam ti tattha avacanam

analyzed: añña kāraṇam kim pana tanti desanā bhedaḥ yathā hi cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni ekantataḥ cakkha ādi nissayāni

original: Yampi ekantato hadayavatthunissayaṃ, tassa vasena “atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa vatthū”tiādinā
analyzed: yat pi ekantataḥ hadaya vatthu nissayam tassa vasena atthi rūpam manaḥ viññāṇassa vatthu uti ādinā

original: vatthārammaṇadukā bhinnagatikā siyunti ekarasā desanā na bhaveyya. Ekarasañca desanaṃ

analyzed: desetum idha satthu tasmā tattha hadaya vatthu na vuttam na a labbhamāna ttā ati daṭṭhabbam

analyzed: yutti pana evam veditabbā nipphanna aupādāyarūpa nissayam dhātu dvayam pañca vokāra bhave

analyzed: rūpa āyatana ādīnam ojāya ca indriya baddhataḥ bahi pi pavatti dassanataḥ na tad nissaya tā

original: Nanu ca indriyanissayatāyapi sādhanato viruddho hetu āpajjatīti? Na diṭṭhabādhanato.
analyzed: nanu ca indriya nissaya tāya api sādhanataḥ viruddhaḥ hetu āpajjati iti na diṭṭha bādhanataḥ

analyzed: sesam heṭṭhā vutta nayam eva

original: Kassa pana ākāravikāroti? Sāmatthiyato vāyodhātuadhikānaṃ cittajamahābhūtānaṃ. Kiṃ

analyzed: pana diṭṭham tasmā phandamāna vaṇṇa vinimuttaḥ koci vikāraḥ atthi adhippāyassa ñāpako ti

original: “Visayattamanāpannā, saddā nevatthabodhakā;
analyzed: visaya ttam an āpannā saddāḥ na iva attha bodhakā

analyzed: yadi vikāra ggahaṇam eva kāraṇam adhippāya ggahaṇassa kasmai aggahita saṅketānam adhippāya ggahaṇam

original: na hotīti? Na kevalaṃ vikāraggahaṇameva adhippāyaggahaṇassa kāraṇaṃ, atha kho purimasiddhasambandhaggahaṇañca
analyzed: na hoti iti na kevalam vikāra ggahaṇam eva adhippāya ggahaṇassa kāraṇam atha kho purima siddha sambandha ggahaṇam ca

original: imassa upanissayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Thambhanasandhāraṇacalanāni viññattivikārasahitāya
analyzed: imassa upanissayaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam thambhana sandhāraṇa calanāni viññatti vikāra sahitāya

original: vāyodhātuyā hontīti vuttaṃ. Kiṃ sabbāva vāyodhātū sabbāni tāni karontīti? Nayidamevaṃ.
analyzed: vāyodhātuyā honti iti vuttam kim sabbā va vāyodhātū sabbāni tāni karonti iti na idam evam

original: Sattamajavanasambhūtā hi vāyodhātu purimajavanasambhūtā vāyodhātuyo upathambhakapaccaye
analyzed: sattama javana sambhūtā hi vāyodhātu purima javana sambhūtāḥ vāyodhātuyo upathambhaka paccaye

original: labhitvā desantaruppattihetubhāvena calayati cittajarūpaṃ, na itarā. Itarā pana santhambhanasandhāraṇamattaṃ
analyzed: labhitvā desantara uppatti hetu bhāvena calayati citta ja rūpam na itarā itarā pana santhambhana sandhāraṇa mattam

original: karontiyo tassā upakārāya honti. Desantaruppatti eva calananti nimitte ca kattubhāvo
analyzed: karontiyaḥ tassāḥ upakārāya honti desa antara uppatti eva nimitte ca kattu bhāvaḥ

original: samāropitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññathā dhammānaṃ abyāpāratā, khaṇikatā ca na siyā. Sattahi
analyzed: samāropito ti daṭṭhabbam aññathā dhammānam abyāpāra tā khaṇika tā ca na siyā sattahi

original: yugehi ākaḍḍhitabbasakaṭamettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nidassitaṃ. Cittajarūpe pana calante
analyzed: yugehi ākaḍḍhitabba sakaṭam ettha aṭṭhakathā ayam nidassitam citta ja rūpe pana calante

original: taṃsambandhatāya utukammāhārajarūpampi calati nadīsote pakkhittasukkhagomayapiṇḍaṃ
analyzed: tad sambandha tāya calati nadī sote pakkhitta sukkha gomaya piṇḍam

original: viya phandamānavaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ viññattiggahaṇassa vuttattā. Kiṃ calanakarā eva
analyzed: viya phandamāna vaṇṇa ggahaṇa anantaram viññatti ggahaṇassa vutta ttā kim calana karāḥ eva

original: vāyodhātu viññattivikārasahitāti? Nayidamevaṃ, tathā calayitumasakkuṇantiyopi thambhanasandhāraṇamattakarā
analyzed: vāyodhātu viññatti vikāra sahitā ati na yidam evam tathā thambhana sandhāraṇa matta karā

original: paṭhamajavanādisambhūtāpi vāyodhātuyo viññattivikārasahitā evāti gahetabbaṃ. Yena
analyzed: paṭhama javana ādi sambhūtā api vāyodhātuyaḥ viññatti vikāra sahitāḥ evā ati gahetabbam yena

original: disābhāgenāyaṃ abhikkamādiṃ pavattetukāmo, tadabhimukhavikārasabbhāvato. Adhippāyasahabhāvī
analyzed: disābhāgena ayam abhikkama ādim pavattetu kāmo tad abhimukha vikāra sabbhāvataḥ adhippāya sahabhāvī

original: hi vikāro viññatti. Evañca katvā manodvārāvajjanassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakavacanaṃ
analyzed: hi vikāraḥ viññatti evam ca katvā viññatti samuṭṭhāpaka vacanam

original: suṭṭhu yujjati. Yathāvuttavikāraggahaṇamukhena taṃsamaṅgino adhippāyo viññāyatīti
analyzed: suṭṭhu yujjati yathā vutta vikāra ggahaṇa mukhena tad samaṅginaḥ adhippāyaḥ viññāyati iti

original: vuttaṃ “adhippāyappakāsanarasā”ti.
analyzed: vuttam adhippāya ppakāsana rasā ti

original: Kāyavipphandanassa hetubhūtāya vāyodhātuyā vikārabhāvato pariyāyena viññatti kāyavipphandanahetubhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā
analyzed: kāya vipphandanassa hetu bhūtāya vāyodhātuyāḥ vikāra bhāvataḥ pariyāyena viññatti kāya vipphandana hetu bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: vuttā. Cittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātupadaṭṭhānāti ca vāyodhātuyā kiccādhikatāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vuttā citta samuṭṭhāna vāyodhātu padaṭṭhānā ati ca vāyodhātuyā kicca adhika tāya vuttam

original: Kāyavipphandanena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttāti kāyavipphandanena karaṇabhūtena adhippāyassa
analyzed: kāya vipphandanena adhippāya viññāpana hetu ttā ati kāya vipphandanena karaṇa bhūtena adhippāyassa

original: viññāpanahetubhāvato kāyaviññattīti vuccatīti sambandho. Ayañhettha attho – viññāpetīti
analyzed: viññāpana hetu bhāvataḥ kāya viññatti iti vuccati iti sambandhaḥ ayam ha ittha atthaḥ viññāpeti iti

original: viññatti. Kiṃ viññāpeti? Adhippāyaṃ. Kena? Kāyena. Kīdisena? Vipphandamānenāti. Dutiyanaye
analyzed: viññatti kim viññāpeti adhippāyam kena kāyena kīdisena vipphandamānena ati dutiya naye

original: pana yathāvuttena kāyena viññāyatīti kāyaviññatti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
analyzed: pana yathā vuttena kāyena viññāyati iti kāya viññatti sesam vutta nayam eva

original: Atthāvabodhanasamattho vacīviseso vacībhedo. Tena vāyuvanappatinadīghosādiṃ nivatteti.
analyzed: attha avabodhana samatthaḥ vacī visesaḥ vacī bhedaḥ tena vāyu vanappati nadī ghosa ādim nivatteti

original: Tassa pavattakaṃ cittaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ yassā sā vacībhedappavattakacittasamuṭṭhānā,
analyzed: tassa pavattakam cittam samuṭṭhānam yassā sā vacībheda ppavattaka citta samuṭṭhānā

original: pathavīdhātu. Tassā yaṃ upādinnasaṅkhātassa akkharuppattiṭṭhānassa ghaṭṭanasaññitaṃ
analyzed: pathavī dhātu tassāḥ yam upādinna saṅkhātassa akkhara uppatti ṭṭhānassa ghaṭṭana saññitam

original: kiccaṃ, tassa sahakārīkāraṇabhūto ākāraviseso vacīviññatti nāmāti dassento āha “vacībhe…pe… vacīviññattī”ti.
analyzed: kiccam tassa sahakārī kāraṇa bhūtaḥ ākāra visesaḥ vacīviññatti nāma ati dassentaḥ āha vacī bhepe vacīviññatti iti

original: Idāni “kassa pana ākāravikāro”tiādi kāyaviññattiyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
analyzed: idāni kassa pana ākāra vikāra uti ādi kāya viññattiyam vutta nayena iva veditabbam ayam

original: pana viseso – yathā tattha “phandamānavaṇṇaggahaṇānantara”nti vuttaṃ, evamidha “suyyamānasaddasavanānantara”nti
analyzed: pana visesaḥ yathā tattha phandamāna vaṇṇa ggahaṇa anantaram ti vuttam evam idha suyyamāna sadda savana anantaram ti

original: yojetabbaṃ. Idha ca thambhanādīnaṃ abhāvato “sattamajavanasambhūtā”tiādinayo na labbhati.
analyzed: yojetabbam idha ca thambhana ādīnam abhāvataḥ na labbhati

original: Ghaṭṭanena hi saddhiṃ saddo uppajjati. Ghaṭṭanañca paṭhamajavanādīsupi labbhateva.
analyzed: ghaṭṭanena hi saddhim saddaḥ uppajjati ghaṭṭanam ca paṭhama javana ādīsu pi labbhatā iva

original: Ghaṭṭanaṃ paccayavasena bhūtakalāpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āsannataruppādo. Calanaṃ ekassāpi
analyzed: ghaṭṭanam paccaya vasena bhūta kalāpānam aññamaññam āsanna taru ppādo calanam ekassa api

original: desantaruppādaparamparatāti ayametesaṃ viseso. Yathā ca vāyodhātuyā calanaṃ kiccaṃ,
analyzed: desantara uppāda parampara tā ti ayam etesam visesaḥ yathā ca vāyodhātuyā calanam kiccam

original: evaṃ pathavīdhātuyā ghaṭṭanaṃ. Tenevāha “pathavīdhātuyā upādinnaghaṭṭanassa paccayo”ti.
analyzed: evam pathavī dhātuyāḥ ghaṭṭanam tena iva āha pathavī dhātuyāḥ upādinna ghaṭṭanassa paccayaḥ ti

original: Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Yathā hītiādi kāyavacīviññattīnaṃ anumānavasena gahetabbabhāvavibhāvanaṃ.
analyzed: sesam vutta nayam eva yathā hi itiādi kāya vacī viññattīnam anumāna vasena gahetabba bhāva vibhāvanam

original: Yathā hi ussāpetvā baddhagosīsādirūpāni disvā tadanantarappavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya
analyzed: yathā hi ussāpetvā baddha go sīsa ādi rūpāni disvā tad anantara ppavattāya a viññāyamāna antarāya

original: manodvāravīthiyā gosīsādīnaṃ udakasahacārippakārasaññāṇākāraṃ gahetvā udakaggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ dvāra vīthiyā gosīsa ādīnam udaka sahacāri ppakāra saññāṇa ākāram gahetvā udaka ggahaṇam

original: hoti, evaṃ vipphandamānasamuccāriyamānavaṇṇasadde gahetvā tadanantarapavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya
analyzed: hoti evam vipphandamāna samuccāriyamāna vaṇṇa sadde gahetvā tad anantara pavattāya a viññāyamāna antarāya

original: manodvāravīthiyā purimasiddhasambandhagahaṇūpanissayasahitāya sādhippāyavikāraggahaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: manaḥ dvāra vīthiyā purima siddha sambandha gahaṇa upanissaya sahitāya sa adhippāya vikāra ggahaṇam hoti

original: 442. Rūpāni paricchindati, sayaṃ vā tehi paricchijjati, rūpānaṃ vā paricchedamattaṃ
analyzed: rūpāni paricchindati sayam vā tehi paricchijjati vā

original: rūpaparicchedo, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti rūpaparicchedalakkhaṇā. Ayaṃ hi ākāsadhātu
analyzed: rūpa paricchedaḥ tam lakkhaṇam etissa ati rūpa pariccheda lakkhaṇā ayam hi ākāsa dhātu

original: taṃ taṃ rūpakalāpaṃ paricchindantī viya hoti. Tenāha “rūpapariyantappakāsanarasā”ti.
analyzed: tam tam rūpa kalāpam paricchindantī viya hoti tena āha rūpa pariyanta pakāsana rasā ati

original: Atthato pana yasmā rūpānaṃ paricchedamattaṃ hutvā gayhati, tasmā vuttaṃ “rūpamariyādapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti.
analyzed: atthataḥ pana yasmai rūpānam pariccheda mattam hutvā gayhati tasmai vuttam rūpa mariyāda paccupaṭṭhānā ati

original: Yasmiṃ kalāpe bhūtānaṃ paricchedo, teheva asamphuṭṭhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā. Vijjamānepi
analyzed: yasmin kalāpe bhūtānam paricchedaḥ tehi iva a samphuṭṭha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā vijjamāne pi

original: hi kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ kalāpantarabhūtehi samphuṭṭhabhāve taṃtaṃbhūtavivittatā rūpapariyanto
analyzed: hi kalāpa antara bhūtānam kalāpa antara bhūtehi samphuṭṭha bhāve rūpa pariyantaḥ

original: ākāsoti yesaṃ so paricchedo, tehi so asamphuṭṭhova. Aññathā paricchinnatā na siyā
analyzed: ākāsaḥ ti yesam so paricchedo tehi so a samphuṭṭhaḥ u va aññathā paricchinna tā na siyā

original: tesaṃ bhūtānaṃ byāpibhāvāpattito. Abyāpitā hi asamphuṭṭhatā. Tenāha bhagavā “asamphuṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: tesam bhūtānam byāpi bhāva āpattitaḥ a byāpi tā hi a samphuṭṭha tā tena āha bhagavā asamphuṭṭham

original: catūhi mahābhūtehī”ti. Kaṇṇacchiddamukhavivarādivasena ca chiddavivarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā
analyzed: catūhi mahābhūtehi iti kaṇṇa chidda mukha vivara ādi vasena ca chidda vivara bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: vā. Yesaṃ rūpānaṃ paricchedo, tattheva tesaṃ paricchedabhāvena labbhatīti vuttaṃ
analyzed: vā yesam rūpānam paricchedo tattha iva tesam pariccheda bhāvena labbhati iti vuttam

original: “paricchinnarūpapadaṭṭhānā”ti. “Yāya paricchinnesū”tiādinā ākāsadhātuyā taṃtaṃkalāpānaṃ
analyzed: paricchinna rūpa padaṭṭhānā ati paricchinnesu itiādinā

original: kalāpantarehi asaṅkarakāraṇataṃ dasseti.
analyzed: kalāpa antarehi asaṅkara kāraṇa tam dasseti

original: 443. Adandhatāti agarutā. Vinodanaṃ vikkhipanaṃ, apanayananti attho. Athaddhatāti
analyzed: a dandha tā ati a garutā vinodanam vikkhipanam apanayanam ti atthaḥ athaddha tā ati

original: akathinatā. Attano mudubhāveneva sabbakiriyāsu avirodhitā. Mudu hi katthaci na virujjhati.
analyzed: a kathina tā attanaḥ mudu bhāvena iva sabba kiriyāsu avirodhi tā mudu hi katthaci na virujjhati

original: Tīsupi ṭhānesu paṭipakkhe a-kāro dandhatādihetūnaṃ paṭipakkhasamuṭṭhānattā lahutādīnanti
analyzed: tīsu pi ṭhānesu paṭipakkhe akāraḥ dandha tā ādi hetūnam paṭipakkha samuṭṭhāna ttā lahu tā ādīnam ti

original: keci. Apare pana “sattāpaṭisedhe”ti vadanti. Sarīrena kattabbakiriyānaṃ anukūlatāsaṅkhātakammaññabhāvo
analyzed: keci apare pana sattā paṭisedhā iti vadanti sarīrena kattabba kiriyānam anukūla tā saṅkhāta kammañña bhāvaḥ

original: lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sarīrakiriyānukūlakammaññabhāvalakkhaṇā. Akammaññaṃ dubbalaṃ nāma
analyzed: lakkhaṇam etissa ati sarīra kiriyā anukūla kammañña bhāva lakkhaṇā akammaññam dubbalam nāma

original: hotīti kammaññatā adubbalabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā vuttā.
analyzed: hoti iti kammañña tā adubbala bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā vuttā

original: Lahutādīnaṃ aññamaññāvijahanena duviññeyyanānattatā vuttāti taṃtaṃvikārādhikarūpehi
analyzed: lahu tā ādīnam aññamañña avijahanena du viññeyya nānatta tā vuttā ati taṃ taṃ vikāra adhika rūpehi

original: taṃnānattappakāsanatthaṃ “evaṃ santepī”ti vuttaṃ. Dhātukkhobho vātapittasemhapakopo,
analyzed: evam sante pi iti vuttam dhātu kkhobhaḥ vāta pitta semha pakopo

original: rasādidhātūnaṃ vā vikārāvatthā. Dvidhā vuttopi atthato pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃyeva
analyzed: rasa ādi dhātūnam vā dvidhā vuttaḥ api atthato pathavī dhātu ādīnam dhātūnam yeva

original: vikāroti daṭṭhabbo. Paṭipakkhapaccayā sappāyautuāhārāvikkhittacittatā. Te ca taṃtaṃvikārassa
analyzed: vikāraḥ ti daṭṭhabbaḥ paṭipakkha paccayā te ca taṃ taṃ vikārassa

original: visesapaccayabhāvato vuttā, avisesena pana sabbe sabbesaṃ paccayā. Yato nesaṃ aññamaññāvijahanaṃ,
analyzed: visesa paccaya bhāvataḥ vuttāḥ avisesena pana sabbe sabbesam paccayāḥ yatas nesam aññamañña avijahanam

original: iddhivaḷañjanādīsu viya vasavattanaṃ maddavappakāro. Suparimadditacammasudhantasuvaṇṇagahaṇañcettha
analyzed: iddhi vaḷañjana ādīsu viya vasa vattanam madda vappa kāraḥ su parimaddita camma su dhanta suvaṇṇa gahaṇam ca ittha

original: mudukammaññasadisarūpanidassanamattaṃ, na taṃ idha adhippetaṃ mudutākammaññatāsabbhāvato.
analyzed: mudu kammañña sadisa rūpa nidassana mattam na tam idha adhippetam mudu tā kammañña tā sabbhāvato

original: Na hi anindriyabaddharūpasantāne lahutādīni sambhavanti, indriyabaddhepi rūpabhave
analyzed: na hi an indriya baddha rūpa santāne lahu tā ādīni sambhavanti indriya baddhe api rūpa bhave

original: na santi dandhattakarādidhātukkhobhābhāvato. Sati hi tādise dhātukkhobhe tappaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhānāhi
analyzed: na santi dandhatta kara ādi dhātu kkhobha abhāvataḥ sati hi tādise dhātu kkhobhe tad paṭipakkha paccaya samuṭṭhānāhi

original: lahutādīhi bhavitabbanti keci, taṃ akāraṇaṃ. Na hi vūpasametabbapaccanīkāpekkho tabbirodhidhammasamuppādo,
analyzed: lahu tā ādīhi bhavitabbanti keci tam akāraṇam na hi vūpasametabba paccanīka apekkhaḥ tad virodhi dhamma samuppādaḥ

original: tathā sati sahetukakiriyacittuppādesu kāyalahutādīnaṃ abhāvova siyā. Kasmā pana kammajarūpesu
analyzed: tathā sati sa hetuka kiriya cittuppādesu siyā kasmā pana kamma ja rūpesu

original: lahutādayo na hontīti? Paccuppannapaccayāpekkhattā. Aññathā sabbadābhāvīhi lahutādīhi bhavitabbaṃ siyāti.
analyzed: lahu tā ādayaḥ na honti iti paccuppanna paccaya apekkha ttā aññathā sabbadābhāvīhi lahu tā ādīhi bhavitabbam siyāti

original: 444. Ādi cayo, īsaṃ vā cayoti ācayo, yathāpaccayaṃ tato tato āgatassa viya cayoti
analyzed: ādi cayo īsam vā cayo ti ācayaḥ yathāpaccayam tatas tatas āgatassa viya cayo ti

original: vā ācayo, tadubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ācayo lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ācayalakkhaṇo. Rūpassa
analyzed: vā ācayaḥ tat ubhayam ekajjham gahetvā ācayaḥ lakkhaṇam etassa ati ācaya lakkhaṇaḥ rūpassa

original: upacayo paṭhamuppādo, vaḍḍhi ca “upaññattaṃ upasitta”ntiādīsu viya upa-saddassa paṭhamūpariatthassa
analyzed: upacayaḥ paṭhama uppādaḥ ca upaññattam upasittanti ādīsu viya upasaddassa paṭhama upari atthassa

original: nidassanato. Pubbantatoti pubbakoṭṭhāsato, anāgatabhāvatoti attho. Uppajjamāne rūpadhamme
analyzed: nidassanataḥ pubbantataḥ ti pubba koṭṭhāsataḥ anāgata bhāvato ti attho uppajjamāne rūpa dhamme

original: uppādo anāgatakkhaṇato ummujjāpento viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ummujjāpanaraso”ti. Tathā
analyzed: uppādaḥ anāgata kkhaṇataḥ ummujjāpentaḥ viya hoti iti vuttam ummujjāpana rasaḥ ti tathā

original: so “ime rūpadhammā”ti niyyātento viya gayhatīti āha “niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti. Paripuṇṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatā
analyzed: saḥ ime rūpa dhammā ti niyyātentaḥ viya gayhati iti āha niyyātana paccupaṭṭhānaḥ ti paripuṇṇa bhāva paccupaṭṭhāna tā

original: “uparicayo upacayo”ti imassa atthassa vasena veditabbā. Pavattilakkhaṇāti rūpānaṃ
analyzed: uparicayaḥ upacayo ti imassa atthassa vasena veditabbā pavatti lakkhaṇā ati rūpānam

original: pavattananti lakkhitabbā. Anuppabandhanarasāti pubbāparavasena anu anu pabandhanakiccā.
analyzed: pavattananti lakkhitabbā anuppabandhana rasā ti pubba apara vasena anu anu pabandhana kiccā

original: Tato eva anupacchedavasena gahetabbato anupacchedapaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: tatas eva an upaccheda vasena gahetabbataḥ an upaccheda paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Ubhayampīti upacayo santatīti ubhayampi. Jātirūpassevāti rūpuppādasseva adhivacanaṃ.

original: loke niyuttaṃ, viditanti vā lokiyaṃ. Ā bhavaggaṃ, ā gotrabhuṃ vā savantīti āsavā,

analyzed: an aññatte pi aññehi dhammehi rūpa āyatanam visesetum aññam viya katvā vuttam saha nidassanena

original: sanidassana”nti. Dhammabhāvasāmaññena hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yo nānattakaro viseso,

original: Tadaññapaccayajātanti kammato aññapaccayato jātaṃ utucittāhārajaṃ. Nakutocijātanti

original: te vipākepi labbhanti. Yasmiṃ ca ārammaṇe kusalaṃ pavattati, tattheva ayaṃ vipākopi
analyzed: te vipāke api labbhanti yasmin ca ārammaṇe kusalam pavattati tattha iva ayam vipākaḥ api

original: pavattati. Yaṃ panettha pañcamajjhānacittaṃ abhiññāppattaṃ, tassa vipāko eva natthi.
analyzed: pavattati yam pana ittha pañcama jhāna cittam abhiññā appattam tassa vipākaḥ eva natthi

original: Kasmā natthi? Asambhavato, ānisaṃsabhūtattā ca. Tañhi vipākaṃ dentaṃ rūpāvacarameva
analyzed: kasmā natthi asambhavataḥ ānisaṃsa bhūta ttā ca tat hi vipākam dentam rūpāvacaram eva

original: dadeyya. Na hi aññabhūmikaṃ kammaṃ aññabhūmikaṃ vipākaṃ deti. Kammanimittārammaṇatā
analyzed: dadeyya na hi añña bhūmikam kammam añña bhūmikam vipākam deti kamma nimitta ārammaṇa tā

original: ca rūpāvacaravipākassa vuttāti na taṃ aññaṃ ārabbha pavattati. Parittārammaṇādiārammaṇañca
analyzed: ca rūpāvacara vipākassa vuttā ati na tam aññam ārabbha pavattati paritta ārammaṇa ādi ārammaṇam ca

original: taṃ na hotīti ayamasambhavo. Jhānassa ānisaṃsabhūtañca dānādīnaṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve
analyzed: tam na hoti iti ayam asambhavaḥ jhānassa ānisaṃsa bhūtam ca dāna ādīnam tasmin atta bhāve

original: paccayalābho viyāti.
analyzed: paccaya lābhaḥ viyāti

original: Pavattito pana vipākassa, kusalassa ca attheva bhedoti taṃ dassetuṃ “kusalaṃ panā”tiādi
analyzed: pavattitaḥ pana vipākassa kusalassa ca atthā iva bhedaḥ ti tam dassetum kusalam pana atiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Kusalaṃ viya kasiṇugghāṭimākāsādiārammaṇabhedato catubbidhaṃ. Pavattibhedo
analyzed: vuttam kusalam viya kasiṇugghāṭima ākāsa ādi ārammaṇa bhedataḥ catubbidham pavatti bhedaḥ

original: vuttanayova javanavasena, paṭisandhiādivasena ca pavattanato.
analyzed: vutta nayaḥ uva javana vasena paṭisandhi ādi vasena ca pavattanato

original: Catumaggayuttacittaphalattāti catūhi ariyamaggehi sampayuttakusalacittassa phalattā,
analyzed: catu magga yutta citta phala ttā ati catūhi ariya maggehi sampayutta kusala cittassa phala ttā

original: catubbidhasāmaññaphalasampayuttabhāvatoti attho. Maggavīthiyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ, tikkhattuṃ
analyzed: catubbidha sāmañña phala sampayutta bhāvato ti attho magga vīthiyam dvi khattum ti khattum

original: vā phalasamāpattiyaṃ aparicchinnaparimāṇaṃ pavattamānampi dvīsu ṭhānesu pavattiyā
analyzed: vā phala samāpattiyam aparicchinna parimāṇam pavattamānam api dvīsu ṭhānesu pavattiyā

original: “dvidhā pavattatī”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbampīti tevīsatividhaṃ kāmāvacaravipākaṃ, pañcavidhaṃ
analyzed: dvidhā pavattati iti vuttam sabbam pi iti tevīsatividham kāmāvacara vipākam pañcavidham

original: rūpāvacaravipākaṃ, catubbidhaṃ arūpāvacaravipākaṃ, catubbidhameva lokuttaravipākanti
analyzed: rūpāvacara vipākam catubbidham arūpāvacara vipākam catubbidham eva lokuttara vipākam ti

original: sabbampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena chattiṃsavidhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: sabbam pi vipāka viññāṇam na ati saṅkhepa vitthāra nayena chattiṃsavidham hoti

original: Bhūmibhedato tividhaṃ lokuttarassa abhāvato. Lokuttarañhi kiriyacittaṃ natthi ekantena
analyzed: bhūmi bhedato tividham lokuttarassa abhāvataḥ lokuttaram hi kiriya cittam natthi ekantena

original: anantaravipākadāyibhāvato. Vuttañhi “samādhimānantarikaññamāhū”ti. Hotu tāva sekkhānaṃ
analyzed: anantara vipāka dāyi bhāvataḥ vuttam hi hotu tāva sekkhānam

original: uppajjamānaṃ anuttaraṃ kusalaṃ puggalantarabhāvūpanayanato saphalaṃ, arahato pana
analyzed: uppajjamānam anuttaram kusalam puggala antara bhāva upanayanataḥ sa phalam arahataḥ pana

original: uppajjamānaṃ puggalantarabhāvūpanayanato nipphalaṃ, tassa kiriyabhāvo kasmā na icchitoti?
analyzed: uppajjamānam puggala antara bhāva upanayanataḥ nipphalam tassa kiriya bhāvo kasmā naḥ icchito ti

original: Icchitabbo siyā. Yadi tassa punappunaṃ uppatti siyā, sakiṃyeva pana lokuttarakusalaṃ
analyzed: icchitabbaḥ siyā yadi tassa punappunam uppatti siyā pana lokuttara kusalam

original: pavattati. Yadi hi punappunaṃ pavatteyya, maggacittaṃ arahatopi pavattatīti lokuttarakiriyacittaṃ
analyzed: pavattati yadi hi punappunam pavatteyya magga cittam arahataḥ api pavattati iti lokuttara kiriya cittam

original: siyā, na cetaṃ atthi payojanābhāvato. Tasmā natthi lokuttarakiriyaviññāṇaṃ. Kiriyaviññāṇanti
analyzed: siyā na atthi payojana abhāvato tasmā natthi lokuttara kiriya viññāṇam kiriya viññāṇanti

original: ca kiriyāmattaṃ viññāṇaṃ, kusalākusalaṃ viya kiñci vipākaṃ anuppādetvā kiriyāmattameva
analyzed: ca kiriyā mattam viññāṇam kusala akusalam viya kiñci vipākam an uppādetvā kiriyā mattam eva

original: hutvā pavattanakaviññāṇanti attho. Kasmā panetaṃ vipākaṃ na uppādetīti? Vuccate –
analyzed: hutvā pavattanaka viññāṇanti attho kasmā pana itam vipākam na uppādeti iti vuccate

original: ettha hi yadetaṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ, taṃ anupacchinnabhavamūlepi santāne pavattaṃ anāsevanatāya
analyzed: ettha hi yat etam āvajjana dvayam tam an upacchinna bhava mūle api santāne an āsevana tāya

original: dubbalabhāvato abījasāmatthiyaṃ viya pupphaṃ aphalameva hoti. Yaṃ pana ucchinnabhavamūlāyaṃ
analyzed: dubbala bhāvataḥ abīja sāmatthiyam viya puppham aphalam eva hoti yam pana

original: santatiyaṃ pavattaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ, taṃ samucchinnamūlāya latāya pupphaṃ
analyzed: santatiyam pavattam aṭṭhārasavidham viññāṇam tam samucchinna mūlāya latāya puppham

original: viya phaladāyi na hotīti veditabbaṃ. Aññassa asambhavato kiriyahetunā nāma alobhādināva
analyzed: viya phala dāyi na hoti iti veditabbam aññassa asambhavataḥ kiriya hetunā nāma alobha ādinā ava

original: bhavitabbanti āha “alobhādikiriyahetuvirahita”nti.
analyzed: bhavitabbanti āha alobha ādi kiriya hetu virahitanti

original: Cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ purecarā hutvā rūpādiārammaṇānaṃ vijānanalakkhaṇā cakkhuviññāṇādipurecararūpādivijānanalakkhaṇā.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam purecarā hutvā rūpa ādi ārammaṇānam vijānana lakkhaṇā cakkhu viññāṇa ādi purecara rūpa ādi vijānana lakkhaṇā

original: Ayaṃ pana manoviññāṇato uppannāpi visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvena manomattā dhātūti manodhātu.
analyzed: ayam pana manaḥ viññāṇato uppannā api visiṭṭha manana kicca abhāvena manomattā dhātu uti manodhātu

original: Tathā hesā manoviññāṇassa paccayo na hoti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana dhātuniddese
analyzed: tathā ha isā manaḥ viññāṇassa paccayaḥ na hoti ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ vitthāraḥ pana dhātu niddese

original: āgamissati. Āvajjanarasāti ābhogarasā, cittasantānassa vā purimākārato aññathā oṇojanarasā.
analyzed: āgamissati āvajjana rasā ati ābhoga rasā citta santānassa vā purima ākārataḥ aññathā oṇojana rasā

original: Bhavaṅgavicchedapadaṭṭhānāti bhavaṅgasantānavicchedapadaṭṭhānā. Apubbārammaṇā sakideva
analyzed: bhavaṅga viccheda padaṭṭhānā ati bhavaṅga santāna viccheda padaṭṭhānā apubba ārammaṇā

original: pavattamānā sabbathā visayarasaṃ anubhavituṃ na sakkotīti iṭṭhādīsu sabbattha upekkhāyuttāva hoti.
analyzed: pavattamānā sabbathā visaya rasam anubhavitum na sakkoti iti iṭṭha ādīsu sabbattha upekkhā yuttā ava hoti

original: Sādhāraṇāti sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṃ sādhāraṇā. Asādhāraṇāti asekkhānaṃyeva āveṇikā.
analyzed: sādhāraṇā ati sekkha asekkha puthujjanānam sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇā ati asekkhānam yeva āveṇikā

original: Voṭṭhabbanāvajjanarasāti pañcadvāre santīraṇena gahitārammaṇaṃ vavatthapentī viya
analyzed: voṭṭhabbana āvajjana rasā ati pañca dvāre santi īraṇena gahita ārammaṇam vavatthapentī viya

original: pavattanato voṭṭhabbanarasā, manodvāre pana vuttanayena āvajjanarasā. Tathābhāvena
analyzed: pavattanataḥ voṭṭhabbana rasāḥ manaḥ dvāre pana vutta nayena āvajjana rasāḥ tathābhāvena

original: pañcadvāramanodvāresu yathākkamaṃ voṭṭhabbanāvajjanabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: pañca dvāra manaḥ dvāresu yathākkamam voṭṭhabbana avajjana bhāvena paccupatiṭṭhati iti tathābhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Voṭṭhabbanakāle santīraṇakiccānaṃ tissannaṃ ahetukavipākamanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ āvajjanakāle
analyzed: voṭṭhabbana kāle santīraṇa kiccānam tissannam ahetuka vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātūnam āvajjana kāle

original: yassa kassaci bhavaṅgassāti imesaṃ aññatarāpagamo etissā āsannakāraṇanti āha “ahetuka…pe… padaṭṭhānā”ti.
analyzed: yassa kassaci bhavaṅgassa ati imesam aññatara apagamaḥ etissā āsanna kāraṇanti āha ahetuka pe padaṭṭhānā ti

original: Arahatanti arahataṃyeva asādhāraṇabhāvato. Anuḷāresūti aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikapetarūpādīsu,
analyzed: arahatam iti asādhāraṇa bhāvataḥ anuḷāresu iti aṭṭhika saṅkhalika peta rūpa ādīsu

original: aññesu vā appaṇītesu vatthūsu. Hasituppādanarasāti hasitasseva uppādanarasā. Tathā
analyzed: aññesu vā appaṇītesu vatthūsu hasita uppādana rasā ati hasitassa iva uppādana rasā tathā

original: hi taṃ cittaṃ “hasituppādana”ntveva vuccati, na aññesaṃ hasituppādakacittānaṃ abhāvato.
analyzed: hi tam cittam hasita uppādanan tu eva vuccati na aññesam hasita uppādaka cittānam abhāvato

original: Aññānipi hi dvādasa somanassasahagatāni parittakusalākusalakiriyacittāni yathārahaṃ
analyzed: aññāni pi hi dvādasa somanassa sahagatāni paritta kusala akusala kiriya cittāni yathāraham

original: puthujjanādīnaṃ hasituppādakāni vijjanti, idaṃ pana cittaṃ vicāraṇapaññāvirahitaṃ
analyzed: puthujjana ādīnam hasita uppādakāni vijjanti idam pana cittam vicāraṇa paññā virahitam

original: parittesu appaṇītesu ārammaṇesu arahantānaṃ somanassamattaṃ uppādentaṃ uppajjati.
analyzed: parittesu appaṇītesu ārammaṇesu arahantānam somanassa mattam uppādentam uppajjati

original: Bhagavatopi uppajjatīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ atītaṃsādīsu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ vatvā
analyzed: bhagavataḥ api uppajjati iti aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam tam atīta aṃsa ādīsu appaṭihata ñāṇam vatvā

original: “imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavato sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ
analyzed: imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavataḥ sabbam kāya kammam ñāṇa pubbaṅgamaṃ

original: ñāṇānuparivattī”ti vacanato vicāretabbanti eke. Tattha hasituppādacittena pavattiyamānampi
analyzed: ñāṇa anuparivattī iti vacanataḥ vicāretabbanti eke tattha hasita uppāda cittena pavattiyamānam pi

original: bhagavato sitakaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsānāgataṃsasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ anuvattakattā ñāṇānuparivattiyevāti
analyzed: bhagavataḥ sita karaṇam pubbenivāsa anāgata aṃsa sabbaññu taññāṇānam anuvattaka ttā ñāṇa anuparivattiyā iva ati

original: evaṃ pana ñāṇānuparivattibhāve sati na koci pāḷiaṭṭhakathānaṃ virodho. Evañca katvā
analyzed: evam pana ñāṇa anuparivatti bhāve sati na koci virodhaḥ evam ca katvā

original: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Avassañca
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāyam tesam ñāṇānam ciṇṇa pariyante idam cittam uppajjati iti vuttam a vassam ca

original: etaṃ evaṃ icchitabbaṃ, aññathā aññassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa ahetukacittassa
analyzed: etam evam icchitabbam aññathā aññassa api viññatti samuṭṭhāpakassa ahetuka cittassa

original: bhagavato uppatti na yujjeyya. Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa taṃsamuṭṭhitāya viññattiyā
analyzed: bhagavataḥ uppatti na yujjeyya na hi viññatti samuṭṭhāpakassa tad samuṭṭhitāya viññattiyā

original: kāyakammādibhāvaṃ āpajjanabhāvo vibandhatīti. Ekantato hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānā pañcavokārabhave eva uppajjanato.
analyzed: kāya kamma ādi bhāvam āpajjana bhāvaḥ vibandhati iti ekantataḥ hadaya vatthu padaṭṭhānā pañcavokāra bhave eva uppajjanato

original: Ayamettha visesoti ayaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ uppattiyā vipākuppādanasamatthatā, arahataṃ
analyzed: ayam ettha visesaḥ ti ayam sekkha puthujjanānam uppattiyāḥ vipāka uppādana samattha tā arahatam

original: uppattiyā tadabhāvoti ubhayesaṃ santāne uppattisamupalakkhito ettha kusalakiriyaviññāṇesu
analyzed: uppattiyā tad abhāvaḥ ti ubhayesam santāne uppatti samupalakkhito ettha kusala kiriya viññāṇesu

original: viseso. Evañca katvā paccayavekallena avipākassāpi kusalākusalassa kiriyabhāvappasaṅgo
analyzed: visesaḥ evam ca katvā paccaya vekallena avipākassa api kusala akusalassa kiriya bhāva ppasaṅgo

original: nivattito hoti. Parato kusalato visesoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
analyzed: nivattitaḥ hoti paratas kusalato viseso ti ettha api esā iva nayo

original: 455. Sabbānipi kusalākusalabyākatāni ekūnanavuti viññāṇāni honti nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayenāti
analyzed: sabbāni api kusala akusala byākatāni ekūnanavuti viññāṇāni honti na ati saṅkhepa vitthāra nayena ati

original: adhippāyo. Paṭisandhiviññāṇādīnaṃ kiccaṃ nāma bhavantarapaṭisandhādinā ākārena pavatti
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ paṭisandhi viññāṇa ādīnam kiccam nāma bhava antara paṭisandhā ādinā ākārena pavatti

original: eva. Tabbinimuttañca cittassa aññaṃ kiccaṃ natthīti āha “cuddasahi ākārehi pavattantī”ti.
analyzed: eva tad vinimuttam ca cittassa aññam kiccam natthi iti āha cuddasahi ākārehi pavattanti iti

original: Ānubhāvenāti sāmatthiyena. Katūpacitaṃ hi kammaṃ avasesapaccayasamavāye vipākaṃ dentaṃ
analyzed: ānubhāvena ati sāmatthiyena kata upacitam hi kammaṃ avasesa paccaya samavāye vipākam dentam

original: attano ānubhāvaṃ vissajjantaṃ viya hoti. Devamanussesūti chasu kāmāvacaradevesu ceva
analyzed: attanaḥ ānubhāvam vissajjantam viya hoti deva manussesu iti chasu kāmāvacara devesu ca iva

original: manussesu ca. Kammakammanimittagatinimittānanti ettha kammaṃ nāma katūpacitaṃ kāmāvacarakusalakammaṃ,
analyzed: manussesu ca kamma kamma nimitta gati nimittānam ti ettha kammam nāma katu upacitam kāmāvacara kusala kammam

original: tañca kho vipākadānāya laddhokāsaṃ. Tenāha “paccupaṭṭhita”nti. Kammanimittaṃ kammāyūhanakkhaṇe
analyzed: tat ca kho vipāka dānāya laddha ukāsam tena āha paccupaṭṭhitam ti kamma nimittam kamma āyūhana khaṇe

original: cetanāya paccayabhūtaṃ deyyadhammādi. Gatinimittaṃ yaṃ gatiṃ upapajjati, tappariyāpannaṃ
analyzed: cetanāya paccaya bhūtam deyya dhamma ādi gati nimittam yam gatim upapajjati tad pariyāpannam

original: rūpāyatanaṃ. Paṇḍakādibhāvanti paṇḍakamūgamammanādibhāvaṃ. Dubbalassa dvihetukakusalassa
analyzed: rūpa āyatanam paṇḍaka ādi bhāvanti paṇḍaka mūga mammana ādi bhāvam dubbalassa dvi hetuka kusalassa

original: vipākabhūtā upekkhāsahagatāhetumanoviññāṇadhātu dubbala…pe… manoviññāṇadhātu. Nesanti
analyzed: vipāka bhūtā upekkhā sahagatā a hetu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu dubbala pe manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu na īsanti

original: bhāvitarūpārūpāvacarakusalānaṃ sattānaṃ. Kammanimittamevāti pathavīkasiṇādikaṃ attano kammārammaṇameva.
analyzed: bhāvita rūpa arūpāvacara kusalānam sattānam kamma nimittam eva ati pathavī kasiṇa ādikam attano kamma ārammaṇam eva

original: Evaṃ tāvetthāti ettha viññāṇakkhandhaniddese evaṃ saṅkhepato sarūpadassanamatteneva
analyzed: evam tāva ettha ati ettha viññāṇa kkhandha niddese evam saṅkhepato sarūpa dassana mattena iva

original: ekūnavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ paṭisandhivasena pavatti veditabbā. Bhavālambanādivibhāgena
analyzed: ekūnavīsatiyā vipāka viññāṇānam paṭisandhi vasena pavatti veditabbā bhava ālambana ādi vibhāgena

original: pana yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ paṭiccasamuppādakathāyaṃ āgamissatīti.
analyzed: pana yat ettha vattabbam tat paṭiccasamuppāda kathā ayam āgamissati iti

original: Taṃ tanti ekūnavīsatiyā paṭisandhiviññāṇesu yaṃ yaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhaṃ, taṃ taṃ
analyzed: tam tam ti ekūnavīsatiyā paṭisandhi viññāṇesu yam yam uppajjitvā niruddham tam tam

original: anantaraṃ uppattiyā anubandhamānaṃ. Tassa tassevāti yassa yassa kammassa vipākabhūtaṃ
analyzed: anantaram uppattiyāḥ anubandhamānam tassa tassa iva ati yassa yassa kammassa vipāka bhūtam

original: paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ, tassa tasseva. Tasmiññevāti kammādike eva. Kammañce paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
analyzed: paṭisandhi viññāṇam tassa tassa iva tasmin ñeva ati kamma ādike eva kammañce paṭisandhi viññāṇassa

original: ārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ kamme, atha kammanimittaṃ, gatinimittañca, tasmiṃ kammanimitte
analyzed: ārammaṇam tasmim kamme atha kamma nimittam gati nimittam ca tasmim kamma nimitte

original: gatinimitteti attho. Tādisamevāti yādisaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ hetuto, sesasampayuttadhammato
analyzed: gati nimittā iti attho tādisam eva ati yādisam paṭisandhi viññāṇam hetuto sesa sampayutta dhammato

original: ca tādisameva. Santānavinivattaketi bhavaṅgasantānassa vinivattanake. Aññasmiṃ āvajjanasaṅkhāte
analyzed: ca tādisam eva santāna vinivattakā iti bhavaṅga santānassa vinivattanake aññasmin āvajjana saṅkhāte

original: cittuppāde. Kiriyamayacitteneva supinadassanaṃ hotīti āha “supinaṃ apassato”ti. Aparimāṇasaṅkhyampi

analyzed: tasmā iti tassa niyamanam idam vuttam hoti yasmai yathāpaccayam ārammaṇa rasam anubhavati

original: tasmā vedanāti vuccatīti.
analyzed: tasmāt vedanā ati vuccati iti

original: “Kusalaviññāṇena sampayuttā”ti idaṃ kusalāya vedanāya upalakkhaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yā
analyzed: kusala viññāṇena sampayuttā ti idam kusalāya vedanāya upalakkhaṇam daṭṭhabbam yā

original: kāci kusalā vedanā, sabbā sā kusalena viññāṇena sampayuttāti, na pana tassā kusalabhāvasaṃsiddhidassanatthaṃ.
analyzed: kāci kusalā vedanā sabbā sā kusalena viññāṇena sampayuttā ati na pana tassā kusala bhāva saṃsiddhi dassana attham

original: Na hi kusalena viññāṇena sampayogato kusalāya vedanāya kusalabhāvo, atha kho yonisomanasikārādikato.
analyzed: na hi kusalena viññāṇena sampayogato kusalāya vedanāya kusala bhāvaḥ atha kho yoni so manasikāra ādikato

original: Tenāha “jātivasenā”ti. Akusalādīsupi eseva nayo. Yathā pana jātivasena kusalādiviññāṇasampayuttatāya
analyzed: tena āha jāti vasena ati akusala ādīsu pi esā iva nayaḥ yathā pana jāti vasena kusala ādi viññāṇa sampayutta tāya

original: tividhā, evaṃ yāva ekūnanavutiviññāṇasampayuttāti ekūnanavutividhā veditabbā. Sabhāvabhedatoti
analyzed: tividhā evam yāva ekūna navuti viññāṇa sampayuttā ati ekūna navuti vidhā veditabbā sa bhāva bhedato ti

original: sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇādivasena labbhamānaṃ bhedaṃ aggahetvā kevalaṃ sabhāvakatabhedato evāti attho.
analyzed: sampayutta bhūmi ārammaṇa ādi vasena labbhamānam bhedam aggahetvā kevalam sabhāva kata bhedataḥ eva ati atthaḥ

original: “Pañcavidhā”ti vatvā taṃ pañcavidhataṃ dassetuṃ “sukha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sukhayatīti
analyzed: pañcavidhā iti vatvā tam pañcavidha tam dassetum sukham ti ādi vuttam tattha sukhayati iti

original: sukhaṃ, kāyaṃ, sampayuttadhamme ca laddhassāde karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu vā khādati,
analyzed: sukham kāyam sampayutta dhamme ca laddha ssāde karoti iti attho suṭṭhu vā khādati

original: khaṇati vā kāyikaṃ ābādhanti sukhaṃ. Sukaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etassāti sukhanti apare.
analyzed: khaṇati vā kāyikam ābādhanti sukham sukaram okāsa dānam etassa ati sukhanti apare

original: Dukkhayatīti dukkhaṃ, kāyaṃ, sampayuttadhamme ca vibādhatīti attho. Duṭṭhu vā khādati,
analyzed: dukkhayati iti dukkham kāyam sampayutta dhamme ca vibādhati iti atthaḥ duṭṭhu vā khādati

original: khaṇati vā kāyikaṃ assādanti dukkhaṃ. Dukkaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etassāti dukkhanti apare.
analyzed: khaṇati vā kāyikam assādanti dukkham dukkaram okāsa dānam etassa ati dukkhanti apare

original: Somanassupekkhānaṃ saddattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Domanassassa somanasse vuttanayānusārena
analyzed: somanassa upekkhānam sadda atthaḥ heṭṭhā vuttaḥ yeva domanassassa somanasse vutta naya anusārena

original: veditabbaṃ. Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ mānasetarasātāsātavasena sukhaṃ, dukkhañca vibhajitvā

original: vuttaṃ “sukhaṃ somanassaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassa”nti, upekkhā pana mānasī, itarā ca ekadhāva
analyzed: vuttam sukham somanassam dukkham domanassanti upekkhā pana mānasī itarā ca ekadhā ava

original: vuttāti? Bhedābhāvato. Yathā hi anuggahūpaghātakatāya sukhadukkhāni aññathā kāyassa
analyzed: vuttā ati bheda abhāvataḥ yathā hi anuggaha upaghātaka tāya sukha dukkhāni aññathā kāyassa

original: anuggahamupaghātañca karonti, aññathā manaso, na evamupekkhā. Tasmā bhedābhāvato
analyzed: anuggaham upaghātañca karonti aññathā manasaḥ na evam upekkhā tasmā bheda abhāvato

original: ekadhāva upekkhā vuttāti.
analyzed: ekadhā va upekkhā vuttā ti

original: Tattha yena sabhāvabhedena vedanā pañcavidhā, sā pavattiṭṭhāne dassite supākaṭā hotīti
analyzed: tattha yena sa bhāva bhedena vedanā pañcavidhā sā pavatti ṭṭhāne dassite su pākaṭā hoti iti

analyzed: pavatti ṭṭhānam tāva dassetum tattha atiādi āraddham akusala vipākena ati ettha api kāya viññāṇena

original: sampayutta”nti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Yathā adhikaraṇīmatthake kappāsapicupiṇḍaṃ
analyzed: sampayuttam ti ānetvā sambandhitabbam yathā adhikaraṇī matthake kappāsa picu piṇḍam

original: nighaṃso balavā hoti, evaṃ paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃsassa balavabhāvato iṭṭhe, iṭṭhamajjhatte
analyzed: nighaṃsaḥ balavā hoti evam paṭighaṭṭanā nighaṃsassa balava bhāvataḥ iṭṭhe iṭṭha majjhatte

analyzed: ca ārammaṇe kāya viññāṇam sukha sahagatam hoti aniṭṭhe aniṭṭham ajjhatte ca dukkha sahagatanti

analyzed: honti rūpāvacara vipākāni cattāri kamma vasena sesāni terasa kāmāvacarāni aṭṭha

original: somanassasahagatāni hontīti āha “somanassaṃ dvāsaṭṭhiyā viññāṇehi sampayutta”nti.
analyzed: somanassa sahagatāni honti iti āha somanassam dvāsaṭṭhiyā viññāṇehi sampayuttanti

original: Domanassaṃ dvīhi akusalaviññāṇehi sampayuttaṃ cetobhisaṅkhārārammaṇādivasena.

original: Avasesapañcapaññāsāyāti yathāvuttāni chasaṭṭhi viññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasesāya pañcapaññāsāya.

analyzed: kāmam ca cetasika sukhe pi labbhati tam pana sa vikappakam hoti

original: Idantu nibbikappakaṃ sabhāvasiddhattā tato sātisayanti āha “sampayuttānaṃ upabrūhanarasa”nti.
analyzed: idam tu nibbikappakam āha sampayuttānam

original: Assādiyatīti assādo, sukhāvedanā. Tenāha bhagavā “yaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhe
analyzed: assādiyati iti assādaḥ sukhā vedanā tena āha bhagavā yam bhikkhave pañca upādānakkhandhe

analyzed: kāyika assāda paccupaṭṭhānam kāyindriya padaṭṭhānam anañña vatthuka ttā

analyzed: dukkhassa lakkhaṇa ādīni vutta naya anusārena veditabbāni

original: Somanasse vuttavipariyāyena domanassassa lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni. Domanassassa kāmadhātuyaṃ uppajjanato ekantena hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānatā tato viseso.
analyzed: somanasse vutta vipariyāyena domanassassa lakkhaṇa ādīni veditabbāni domanassassa kāmadhātuyam uppajjanataḥ ekantena hadaya vatthu padaṭṭhāna tā tatas visesaḥ

original: Majjhattassa, ārammaṇassa majjhattaṃ vā vedayitaṃ anubhavanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti
analyzed: majjhattassa ārammaṇassa majjhattam vā vedayitam anubhavanam lakkhaṇam etissa ati

original: Iti vedanākkhandhe vitthārakathāmukhavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: iti vedanā khandhe vitthāra kathā mukha vaṇṇanā

original: Saññākkhandhakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: saññā khandha kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 457. Sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ nāma saññāvātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vedanākkhandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sañjānana lakkhaṇam nāma saññā vāti ādīsu yat vattabbam tat vedanā kkhandha niddese vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: Kāmaṃ vedanāyapi vippayuttaṃ viññāṇaṃ natthi, tassā pana sabhāvato bhinnattā kāyaci
analyzed: kāmam vedanāya api vippayuttam viññāṇam natthi tassā pana sabhāvataḥ bhinna ttā kāyaci

original: vedanāya sampayuttampi kāyaci vippayuttaṃ hoti. Saññāya pana īdisaṃ natthīti āha
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam pi kāyaci vippayuttam hoti saññāya pana īdisam natthi iti āha

original: “na hi taṃ viññāṇaṃ…pe… saññāyā”ti.
analyzed: na hi tam saññāyāti

original: Sabbāvāti catubhūmikāpi. Atha vā yathā vedanā bhinnasabhāvattā bhedanalakkhaṇādito
analyzed: catu bhūmikā api atha vā yathā vedanā bhinna sabhāvattā bhedana lakkhaṇa āditaḥ

original: vuttā, na evamayaṃ, ayaṃ pana sabbāva sañjānanalakkhaṇā. Nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa

original: sañjānanaṃ saññaṃ katvā jānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sañjānanalakkhaṇā. Tathā hi sā
analyzed: sañjānanam saññam katvā jānanam lakkhaṇam etissa ati sañjānana lakkhaṇā tathā hi sā

original: abhiññāṇena sañjānanato paccābhiññāṇarasāti vuccati. Nimittena hi puna sañjānanakiccā
analyzed: abhiññāṇena sañjānanataḥ pacca abhiññāṇa rasā ti vuccati nimittena hi puna sañjānana kiccā

original: paccābhiññāṇarasā. Tassā vaḍḍhakissa dārumhi abhiññāṇaṃ katvā tena abhiññāṇena paccābhijānanakāle
analyzed: pacca abhiññāṇa rasā tassāḥ vaḍḍhakissa dārumhi abhiññāṇam katvā tena abhiññāṇena pacca abhijānana kāle

original: pavatti veditabbā. Tenāha “tadeveta”ntiādi. Puna sañjānanassa paccayo punasañjānanapaccayo,
analyzed: pavatti veditabbā tena āha tat eva etat tiādi puna sañjānanassa paccayaḥ puna sañjānana paccayo

original: tadeva nimittaṃ puna…pe… nimittaṃ, tassa karaṇaṃ, puna…pe… karaṇaṃ, punasañjānanapaccayabhūtaṃ
analyzed: tat eva nimittam punape nimittam tassa karaṇam punape karaṇam puna sañjānana paccaya bhūtam

original: vā nimittakaraṇaṃ puna…pe… karaṇaṃ, tadassā kiccanti punasañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā.
analyzed: vā nimitta karaṇam punape karaṇam tat assā kiccanti puna sañjānana paccaya nimitta karaṇa rasā

original: Punasañjānananimittakaraṇaṃ nimittakārikāya, nimittena sañjānanantiyā ca sabbāya
analyzed: puna sañjānana nimitta karaṇam nimitta kārikāya nimittena sañjānana ntiyā ca sabbāya

original: saññāya samānaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Abhinivesakaraṇaṃ “idameva sacca”nti saññābhinivesamatteneva
analyzed: saññāya samānam yojetabbam abhinivesa karaṇam idam eva saccanti saññā abhinivesa mattena iva

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāupaṭṭhitavisayapadaṭṭhānā avikappasabhāvattā. Ñāṇasampayuttā pana
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam yathā upaṭṭhita visaya padaṭṭhānā avikappa sabhāva ttā ñāṇa sampayuttā pana

original: saññā ñāṇameva anuvattati, tasmā abhinivesakārikā, viparītaggāhikā ca na hoti. Eteneva
analyzed: saññā ñāṇam eva anuvattati tasmai abhinivesa kārikā viparīta ggāhikā ca na hoti etena iva

original: samādhisampayuttatāya aciraṭṭhānatā ca na hotīti veditabbā. Evaṃ rāgadiṭṭhimānādisampayuttāya
analyzed: samādhi sampayutta tāya acira ṭṭhāna tā ca na hoti iti veditabbā evam rāga diṭṭhi māna ādi sampayuttāya

original: saññāya rāgādianuvattikabhāvoti.
analyzed: saññāya rāga ādi anuvattika bhāvo ti

original: Iti saññākkhandhe vitthārakathāmukhavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: iti saññā kkhandhe vitthāra kathā mukha vaṇṇanā

original: Saṅkhārakkhandhakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: saṅkhāra khandha kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 458. Rāsikaraṇalakkhaṇanti sampiṇḍanalakkhaṇaṃ, tato saṅkhārā āyūhanarasā vuccanti.

analyzed: cetanā apadhāna tāya hi saṅkhāra kkhandha dhammāḥ evam vuttā tena iva āha kim pana tanti

original: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ citte uppanne niyamena uppajjanato niyatā. Sarūpena āgatāti evaṃ piṭṭhivattake

analyzed: vuttam tena āha uppajjamānāḥ api ca na ekatas uppajjanti iti

analyzed: phusantāḥ viya honti ārammaṇa phusana mattam vā phassoti yujjatā iva

analyzed: sa bhāva dhammesu kattu karaṇa sādhana vacanam tad ākāra samāropanataḥ pariyāya kathā bhāva sādhana vacanam eva

analyzed: duṭṭhitam purisam disvā bhūmiyam ṭhitassa bhīruka purisassa jaṅgha calanam pisāca ādibhāyitabbam

original: Rūpasaddehi saha phassassa sāmaññaṃ anallīyamānasaṅghaṭṭanameva, na visayabhāvo.

analyzed: yathā rūpa saddā cakkhu sotāni eva vuttā evam phassassa api

original: 463. Ādhiyatīti ṭhapeti. Avisāro attano eva avisaraṇasabhāvo. Avikkhepo sampayuttānaṃ

original: Avūpasamalakkhaṇassa vikkhepassa paṭipakkhatāya cittassa upasamanākārena paccupatiṭṭhatīti

analyzed: santāna ṭhiti bhāvam samādhissa dasseti

original: Pakkhandanaṃ adhimuccanavasena ārammaṇassa anupavisanaṃ. Akālusabhāvo akālussiyaṃ,
analyzed: pakkhandanam adhimuccana vasena ārammaṇassa anupavisanam akālusa bhāvaḥ akālussiyam

original: anāvilabhāvoti attho. Pasādanīyaṭṭhānesu pasādaviparītaṃ akusalaṃ assaddhiyaṃ, micchādhimutti

original: ca, tappaccanīkova pasādabhūto vatthugato nicchayo adhimutti, na yevāpanakādhimokkho.
analyzed: ca tad paccanīkaḥ uva pasāda bhūtaḥ vatthu gataḥ nicchayaḥ adhimutti na yevāpanaka adhimokkhaḥ

original: Ratanattayaṃ, kammaṃ, kammaphalañca saddheyyavatthu. Sappurisasaṃsevanasaddhammasavanayonisomanasikāradhammānudhammappaṭipattiyo

original: sotāpattiyaṅgāni. Kusaladhammānaṃ ādāne hatthaṃ viya, sabbasampattisampadāne vittaṃ
analyzed: sotāpattiyaṅgāni kusala dhammānaṃ ādāne hattham viya sabba sampatti sampadāne vittam

original: viya, amatakasiphalaphalane bījaṃ viya daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: viya amata kasi phala phalane bījam viya daṭṭhabbā

original: 465. Saranti tāyāti saraṇakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena
analyzed: saranti tāya ati saraṇa kiriyāya pavattamānānam dhammānam tattha ādhipacca bhāvena

original: saratīti vohāro hoti. Udake alābu viya pilavitvā gantuṃ adatvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa
analyzed: sarati iti vohāraḥ hoti udake alābu viya pilavitvā gantum a datvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa

analyzed: asammosaḥ na sammosa abhāva mattam sa tārakkhena cetasā ti vacanataḥ ārakkha paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Aññato āgantvā cittavisaye abhimukho bhavati etāyāti visayābhimukhabhāvo, sati. Satiyā

original: vatthubhūtā kāyādayova kāyādisatipaṭṭhānāni, sati eva vā purimā pacchimāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.

original: 466. Kāyaduccaritādīhīti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ. Hiriyatīti lajjākārena jigucchati.
analyzed: kāya duccarita ādīhi iti hetumhi karaṇa vacanam lajjā ākārena jigucchati

original: Tehiyevāti kāyaduccaritādīhiyeva. Ottappatīti ubbijjati. Hirī pāpadhamme gūthaṃ viya

original: Taṃtaṃsamayanti ekamuhuttādiko so so samayo etassāti taṃtaṃsamayaṃ, rūpaṃ, taṃtaṃsamayavantanti attho.

original: 495. Heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ajjhattikabāhirabhedaṃ sandhāya “vuttanayo evā”ti vatvā tena aparitussamānena

original: bahiddhābāhirasaddānañca aññamaññaṃ atthabhedo. Tathā hi ajjhattikasaddo saparasantānikesu

original: dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha idhāti imasmiṃ suttantanaye. Niyakajjhattampi

original: 496. Hīnapaṇītabhedo pariyāyato, nippariyāyato ca veditabboti sambandho. Tadeva sudassīnaṃ

original: taṃ hīnaṃ aniṭṭhabhāvato. Yaṃ kusalavipākaṃ, taṃ paṇītaṃ iṭṭhabhāvato. Yathā hi akusalavipāko
analyzed: tam hīnam aniṭṭha bhāvataḥ yam kusala vipākam tam paṇītam iṭṭha bhāvataḥ yathā hi akusala vipākaḥ

original: sayaṃ aniṭṭho aniṭṭhe eva uppajjati, na iṭṭhe, evaṃ kusalavipākopi sayaṃ iṭṭho iṭṭhe

analyzed: eva uppajjati na aniṭṭhe tathā hi vuttam aṭṭhakathāyam

original: Kusalakammajañhi aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi, sabbaṃ iṭṭhamevā”ti ca.
analyzed: kusala kamma jam hi aniṭṭham nāma natthi sabbam iṭṭham eva ati ca

analyzed: kusala kamma jam aniṭṭham nāma natthi iti na ca vuttam akusala kamma jam iṭṭham nāma

original: natthī”ti, tena akusalakammajampi sobhanaṃ parasattānaṃ iṭṭhaṃ atthīti anuññātaṃ

analyzed: bhavissati iti sakkā viññātum vipākam pana na sakkā vañcetum ti vipāka vasena iṭṭha aniṭṭha ārammaṇa vavatthānam

original: iṭṭharūpādīni vuttāni.
analyzed: iṭṭha rūpa ādīni vuttāni

original: Vuttanayamevāti abhidesena lakkhaṇato dūrasantikaṃ dassitanti āha “okāsatopettha
analyzed: vutta nayam eva iti abhidesena lakkhaṇataḥ dūra santikam dassitanti āha okāsataḥ pa ittha

original: anekabhedabhinnesu yo bhedo paricchinditabbabhāvena gahito, tassa ekappakārassa pākaṭassa

original: paricchedikā taṃsahitadvārālambanappavattā, avicchedena taduppādakekavidhavisayasamāyogappavattā
analyzed: paricchedikā tad sahita dvāra ālambana ppavattā avicchedena tad uppādaka ekavidha visaya samāyoga ppavattā

original: ca santati bhavituṃ arahatīti tassā bhedantaraṃ anāmasitvā paricchedakabhāvena gahaṇaṃ
analyzed: ca santati bhavitum arahati iti tassāḥ bheda antaram paricchedaka bhāvena gahaṇam

original: kataṃ, lahuparivattino vā arūpadhammā parivattaneneva paricchedena paricchindanaṃ
analyzed: katam lahu parivattinaḥ vā arūpa dhammā parivattanena iva paricchedena paricchindanam

original: arahantīti santatikhaṇavaseneva paricchedo vutto. Ekavidhavisayasamāyogappavattā
analyzed: arahanti iti santati khaṇa vasena iva paricchedaḥ vuttaḥ ekavidha visaya samāyoga ppavattā

original: divasampi buddharūpaṃ passantassa, dhammaṃ suṇantassa pavattasaddhādisahitavedanā
analyzed: divasam pi buddha rūpam passantassa dhammam suṇantassa pavatta saddhā ādi sahita vedanā

original: paccuppannā. “Pubbantāparantamajjhattagatā”ti etena hetupaccayakiccavasena vuttanayaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: paccuppannā pubba anta apara anta majjhatta gatā ati etena hetu paccaya kicca vasena vutta nayam dasseti

original: 499. Sabyāpārasaussāhasavipākatā kusalādīhi tīhipi sādhāraṇāti asādhāraṇameva dassetuṃ
analyzed: sa byāpāra saussāhasa vipāka tā kusala ādīhi tīhi pi sādhāraṇā ati asādhāraṇam eva dassetuṃ

original: “sāvajjakiriyahetuto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sāvajjakiriyahetutoti pāṇātipātādigārayhakiriyānimittato.
analyzed: sāvajja kiriya hetuto tiādi vuttam tattha sāvajja kiriya hetuto ti pāṇātipāta ādi gārayha kiriyā nimittato

original: Kilesasantāpabhāvatoti kilesapariḷāhena sadarathabhāvato. Vūpasantasabhāvāya kusalāya
analyzed: kilesa santāpa bhāvataḥ uti kilesa pariḷāhena sada ratha bhāvataḥ kusalāya

original: vedanāya oḷārikā. Sabyāpāratoti saīhato. Tena yathā pavattamānāyassā vipākena bhavitabbaṃ,
analyzed: vedanāya oḷārikā sa byāpārato ti tena yathā pavattamānā iyassā vipākena bhavitabbam

original: tathā pavattiṃ vadanto vipākuppādanayogyatamāha. Saussāhatoti sasattito, tena vipākuppādanasamatthataṃ.
analyzed: tathā pavattim vadantaḥ vipāka uppādana yogyatam āha saussāhato ti sa sattitaḥ tena vipāka uppādana samattha tat

original: Savipākatoti vipākasabbhāvato, tena paccayantarasamavāyenassā vipākanibbattanaṃ.
analyzed: sa vipākato ti vipāka sabbhāvato tena paccaya antara samavāyena assāḥ vipāka nibbattanam

original: Tīhipi padehi vipākadhammataṃyeva dasseti. Kāyakammādibyāpārasabbhāvato vā sabyāpārato,
analyzed: tīhi pi padehi vipāka dhamma taṃyā iva dasseti kāya kamma ādi byāpāra sabbhāvataḥ vā sa byāpārataḥ

original: javanussāhavasena saussāhato, vipākuppādanasamatthatāvasena savipākatoti evamettha
analyzed: javan ussāha vasena sa aussāhataḥ vipāka uppādana samattha tā vasena sa vipākato ti evam ettha

original: attho veditabbo. Vipākaṃ anuppādentīpi kiriyā kusalā viya sabyāpārā, saussāhā eva
