original: ca hotīti tadubhayaṃ anāmasitvā kiriyābyākatavāre “savipākato” icceva vuttaṃ. Sabyābajjhatoti
analyzed: ca hoti iti tat ubhayam an āmasitvā kiriyā abyākata vāre sa vipākato iccā iva vuttam sa byābajjhato ti

original: kilesadukkhena sadukkhato. Vuttavipariyāyatoti anavajjakiriyahetuto, kilesasantāpābhāvato,
analyzed: kilesa dukkhena sa dukkhataḥ vutta vipariyāyato ti anavajja kiriya hetuto kilesa santāpa abhāvato

original: abyābajjhato ca vūpasantavuttīti evaṃ akusalāya vuttavipallāsato. Yathāyoganti yogānurūpaṃ.
analyzed: ca vūpasanta vuttī iti evam akusalāya vutta vipallāsataḥ yathāyogam iti yoga anurūpam

original: Tīsu kāraṇesu yaṃ yaṃ yassā yassā yujjati, tadanurūpanti attho. Kusalākusalavedanāhi
analyzed: tīsu kāraṇesu yam yam yassā yassā yujjati kusala akusala vedanāhi

original: vipākabyākatāya tīhipi kāraṇehi oḷārikā. Kiriyābyākatāya savipākato savipākatāvisiṭṭhasabyāpārasaussāhato
analyzed: vipāka byākatāya tīhi pi kāraṇehi oḷārikā kiriyā byākatāya sa vipākato sa vipāka tā visiṭṭha sa byāpāra saussāhato

original: vāti. Vuttapariyāyenāti vipākabyākatā abyāpārato, anussāhato, avipākato ca tāhi kusalākusalavedanāhi
analyzed: vā ati vutta pariyāyena ati vipāka byākatā abyāpārataḥ anussāhataḥ avipākato ca tāhi kusala akusala vedanāhi

original: sukhumā. Kiriyābyākatā avipākato, avipākatāvisiṭṭhasabyāpārasaussāhato vāti evaṃ
analyzed: sukhumā kiriyā abyākatā avipākataḥ avipāka tā visiṭṭha sa byāpāra saussāhataḥ vāti evam

original: kusalākusalāya vuttavipallāsena. Kammavegakkhittā hi kammapaṭibimbabhūtā ca kāyakammādibyāpāravirahato
analyzed: kusala akusalāya vutta vipallāsena kamma vega kkhittā hi kamma paṭibimba bhūtā ca kāya kamma ādi byāpāra virahato

original: nirussāhā vipākā. Saussāhā ca kiriyā avipākadhammā. Savipākadhammā hi sagabbhā viya oḷārikāti.
analyzed: nirussāhā vipākā saussāhā ca kiriyā avipāka dhammā sa vipāka dhammā hi sagabbhā viya oḷārikā ati

original: 500. Nirassādatoti assādābhāvato sukhapaṭikkhepato. Savipphāratoti saparipphandato,
analyzed: nirassādāt ti assāda abhāvataḥ sukha paṭikkhepataḥ sa vipphārāt ti sa paripphandāt

original: anupasantatoti attho. Abhibhavanatoti ajjhottharaṇato. Sukhāya majjhattatā natthi,
analyzed: anupasantato ti attho abhibhavanato ti ajjhottharaṇato sukhāya majjhatta tā natthi

original: upekkhāya sātatā. Santatādayo pana sabbattha sukhupekkhāsu labbhantīti “yathāyoga”nti
analyzed: upekkhāya sātatā santata ādayaḥ pana sabbattha sukha upekkhāsu labbhanti iti yathāyogam

original: vuttaṃ. Pākaṭatoti sukhito dukkhitoti disvāpi jānitabbattā vibhūtabhāvato. Sā adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
analyzed: vuttam pākaṭato ti sukhitaḥ dukkhitaḥ ti disvā api jānitabba ttā vibhūta bhāvato sā adukkham asukhā vedanā

original: 501. Asamāpannasamāpanna-ggahaṇena cettha bhūmivasenāpi vedanānaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā vuttāti veditabbā. Itarā samāpannassa vedanā.
analyzed: asamāpanna samāpanna ggahaṇena ca ittha bhūmi vasena api vedanānam oḷārika sukhuma tā vuttā iti veditabbā itarā samāpannassa vedanā

original: Oghaniyatoti oghehi ārammaṇaṃ katvā atikkamitabbato. Tathā yoganiyato, ganthaniyato
analyzed: ogha niyataḥ ti oghehi ārammaṇam katvā tathā yoga niyataḥ gantha niyataḥ

original: cāti etthāpi ganthova ganthanaṃ, tassa hitaṃ ārammaṇabhāvena sambandhanatoti ganthaniyaṃ.
analyzed: ca ati ettha api gantho va ganthanam tassa hitam ārammaṇa bhāvena sambandhanato ti ganthaniyam

original: Evaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ, upādāniyañca veditabbaṃ. Saṃkilese niyuttā, saṃkilesaṃ vā arahantīti
analyzed: evam nīvaraṇiyam upādāniyam ca veditabbam saṃkilese niyuttā saṃkilesam vā arahanti iti

original: saṃkilesikā. Sā anāsavā.
analyzed: saṃkilesikā sā anāsavā

original: 502. Tatthāti yathāvuttāya oḷārikasukhumatāya. Sambhedoti saṅkaro. “Oḷārikā, sukhumā”ti
analyzed: tattha ati yathā vuttāya oḷārika sukhumatāya sambhedaḥ iti saṅkaraḥ oḷārikā sukhumā ati

original: ca vuttānampi jātiādivasena puna sukhumoḷārikabhāvāpattidoso yathā na hoti, tathā
analyzed: ca vuttānam pi jāti ādi vasena puna sukhumoḷārika bhāva āpatti dosaḥ yathā na hoti tathā

original: pariharitabbo. Jātivasena sukhumāya vedanāya sabhāvapuggalalokiyavasena oḷārikataṃ
analyzed: pariharitabbaḥ jāti vasena sukhumāya vedanāya sa bhāva puggala lokiya vasena oḷārika tam

original: pāḷivasena dassetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sukhādayopīti ettha akusalā vedanā
analyzed: pāḷi vasena dassetum vuttam ha etat tiādi vuttam evam sukha ādayaḥ api iti ettha akusalā vedanā

original: jātivasena oḷārikā, sabhāvavasena sukhumā. Kusalajjhānasahagatā sukhā vedanā jātivasena
analyzed: jāti vasena oḷārikā sa bhāva vasena sukhumā kusala jhāna sahagatā sukhā vedanā jāti vasena

original: oḷārikā, samāpannassa vedanāti katvā puggalavasena sukhumāti evamādinā yojetabbā.
analyzed: oḷārikā samāpannassa vedanā ti katvā puggala vasena sukhumā iti evamādinā yojetabbā

original: “Na parāmasitabbo”ti etena jātiādayo cattāro koṭṭhāsā aññamaññaṃ avomissakā eva gahetabbā.
analyzed: na parāmasitabbaḥ ti etena jāti ādayo cattāro koṭṭhāsāḥ aññamaññam avomissakāḥ eva gahetabbā

original: Evaṃ sambhedassa parihāro, na aññathāti dasseti. Yathā abyākatamukhena, evaṃ kusalākusalamukhenapi,
analyzed: evam sambhedassa parihāraḥ na aññathā ati dasseti yathā abyākata mukhena evam kusala akusala mukhena api

original: yathā ca jātimukhena, evaṃ sabhāvādimukhenapi dassetabbanti imamatthaṃ “esa nayo
analyzed: yathā ca jāti mukhena evam sabhāva ādi mukhena api dassetabbanti imam attham esa nayaḥ

original: sabbatthā”ti atidisati.
analyzed: sabbattha iti atidisati

original: Idāni jātiādikoṭṭhāsesupi mitho akusalādīnaṃ upādāyupādāya oḷārikasukhumataṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: idāni jāti ādi koṭṭhāsesu pi mithas akusala ādīnam upādāya upādāya oḷārika sukhumatam dassetuṃ

original: “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. “Nissayadahanato”ti iminā dosasahagatāya pākaṭaṃ kurūrappavattiṃ
analyzed: apica atiādi āraddham nissaya dahanato ti iminā dosa sahagatāya pākaṭam kurūra ppavattim

original: dasseti. Niyatāti micchattaniyāmena niyatā, ānantariyabhāvappattā kappatiṭṭhanakavipākatāya
analyzed: dasseti niyatā ati micchatta niyāmena niyatā ānantariya bhāva pattā kappa tiṭṭhanaka vipāka tāya

original: kappaṭṭhitikā devadattādīnaṃ viya. Asaṅkhārikā sabhāvatikhiṇatāya oḷārikā. Diṭṭhisampayuttā
analyzed: kappa ṭṭhitikā devadatta ādīnam viya asaṅkhārikā sabhāva tikhiṇa tāya oḷārikā diṭṭhi sampayuttā

original: mahāsāvajjatāya oḷārikā. Sāpi diṭṭhisampayuttā niyatā oḷārikā, tato kappaṭṭhitikā,
analyzed: mahā sāvajja tāya oḷārikā sā api diṭṭhi sampayuttā niyatā oḷārikā tatas kappa ṭṭhitikā

original: tato asaṅkhārikāti tividhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā ekajjhaṃ vuttā visuṃ visuṃyeva yojetabbā.
analyzed: tatas asaṅkhārikā ti tividhā api heṭṭhā vutta naya ttā ekajjham vuttā visum visum yeva yojetabbā

original: Tenāha “itarā sukhumā”ti. Avisesenāti dosasahagatā, lobhasahagatāti abhedena. Akusalā
analyzed: tena āha itarā sukhumā ati avisesena ati dosa sahagatā lobha sahagatā ati abhedena akusalā

original: bahuvipākā dosussannatāya oḷārikā. Tathā kusalā appavipākā. Mandadosattā akusalā
analyzed: bahu vipākā dosussannatāya oḷārikā tathā kusalā appa vipākā manda dosattā akusalā

original: appavipākā sukhumā. Tathā kusalā bahuvipākā.
analyzed: appa vipākā sukhumā tathā kusalā bahu vipākā

original: Oḷārikasukhumanikantivatthubhāvato kāmāvacarādīnaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā, lokuttarā pana
analyzed: kāmāvacara ādīnam oḷārika sukhuma tā lokuttarā pana

original: ekantasukhumāva. Tatthāpi ca vibhāgaṃ parato vakkhati. Bhāvanāmayāpīti bhāvanāmayāya
analyzed: tattha api ca vibhāgam paratas vakkhati bhāvanā mayā api iti bhāvanā mayāya

original: bhedanena dānasīlamayānampi bhedanaṃ nayato dassitanti veditabbaṃ. Bhāvanāya paguṇabalavakālādīsu
analyzed: bhedanena dāna sīlam ayānam api bhedanam nayataḥ dassitam ti veditabbam bhāvanāya paguṇa balava kāla ādīsu

original: kadāci ñāṇavippayuttacittenapi manasikāro hotīti vuttaṃ “bhāvanāmayāpi duhetukā”ti.
analyzed: kadāci ñāṇa vippayutta cittena api manasikāraḥ hoti iti vuttam bhāvanā mayā api du hetukā ti

original: Taṃtaṃbhūmivipākakiriyāvedanāsūti ettha “kāmāvacaravipākā oḷārikā, rūpāvacarā sukhumā”tiādinā
analyzed: taṃ taṃ bhūmi vipāka kiriyā vedanāsu iti ettha kāmāvacara vipākā oḷārikā rūpāvacarā sukhumā ati ādinā

original: yāva arahattaphalā netabbaṃ. “Kāmāvacarakiriyā oḷārikā, rūpāvacarakiriyā sukhumā”tiādinā

original: kāmāvacarā ca “dānākārappavattā oḷārikā, sīlākārappavattā sukhumā”tiādinā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā
analyzed: kāmāvacarā ca dāna ākāra ppavattā oḷārikā sīla ākāra ppavattā sukhumā ati ādinā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā

original: netabbaṃ. Yathā ca jātikoṭṭhāse ayaṃ vibhāgo, evaṃ sabhāvakoṭṭhāsādīsupīti dassetuṃ
analyzed: netabbam yathā ca jāti koṭṭhāse ayam vibhāgaḥ evam sabhāva koṭṭhāsa ādīsu pi iti dassetuṃ

original: “dukkhādī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dukkha ādi itiādi vuttam

original: Sabbo cāyaṃ vibhāgo lakkhaṇasannissito vuttoti katvā āha “okāsavasena cāpī”tiādi.
analyzed: sabbaḥ ca ayam vibhāgaḥ lakkhaṇa sannissitaḥ vuttaḥ iti katvā āha okāsa vasena ca api itiādi

original: Sukhāpīti pi-saddena adukkhamasukhaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Sabbatthāti sabbāsu bhūmīsu. Yathānurūpanti
analyzed: sukhā api iti pi saddena adukkham asukham sampiṇḍeti sabbattha āti sabbāsu bhūmīsu yathā anurūpanti

original: yā yā vedanā yattha yattha labbhati, tadanurūpaṃ. Vatthuvasenāti yaṃ vatthuṃ ārabbha
analyzed: yā yā vedanā yattha yattha labbhati tad anurūpam vatthu vasena ati yam vatthum ārabbha

original: vedanā pavattati, tassa vasenāpi. Hīnavatthukāti hīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kaṅgubhattaṃ
analyzed: vedanā pavattati tassa vasena api hīna vatthukā ati hīnam vatthum ārammaṇam katvā kaṅgu bhattam

original: bhuñjantassa vedanā hīnavatthukatāya oḷārikā. Sālimaṃsodanaṃ bhuñjantassa paṇītavatthukatāya sukhumāti.
analyzed: bhuñjantassa vedanā hīna vatthuka tāya oḷārikā sāli maṃsa odanam bhuñjantassa paṇīta vatthuka tāya sukhumā ati

original: 503. Ādinā nayenāti sabbaṃ pāḷigatiṃ āmasati. Jātiādivasena asamānakoṭṭhāsatā visabhāgatā.
analyzed: ādinā nayena ati sabbam pāḷigatim āmasati jāti ādi vasena asamāna koṭṭhāsa tā visabhāga tā

original: Dukkhavipākatādivasena asadisakiccatā asaṃsaṭṭhatā, na asampayogo. Yadi siyā, dūravipariyāyena
analyzed: dukkha vipāka tā ādi vasena asadisa kicca tā asaṃsaṭṭha tā na asampayogaḥ yadi siyā dūra vipariyāyena

original: santikaṃ hotīti saṃsaṭṭhatā santikatā āpajjati, na ca vedanāya vedanāsampayogo atthi.
analyzed: santikam hoti iti saṃsaṭṭha tā santika tā āpajjati na ca vedanāya vedanā sampayogaḥ atthi

original: Santikapadavaṇṇanāya ca “sabhāgato ca sarikkhato cā”ti vakkhatīti vuttanayeneva attho
analyzed: santika pada vaṇṇanāya ca sabhāgataḥ ca sa rikkhataḥ ca ati vakkhati iti vutta nayena iva attho

original: veditabbo. Asadisasabhāvatā asarikkhatā. Sabbavāresūti oḷārikasukhumabhede vuttanayānusārena
analyzed: veditabbaḥ asadisa sabhāva tā asarikkha tā sabba vāresu iti oḷārika sukhuma bhede vutta naya anusārena

original: vattabbesu sabbesu vāresu. Jātiādivasena samānakoṭṭhāsatā sabhāgatā, dukkhavipākatādivasena
analyzed: vattabbesu sabbesu vāresu jāti ādi vasena samāna koṭṭhāsa tā sa bhāga tā dukkha vipāka tā ādi vasena

original: pana sadisasabhāvatā sarikkhatā. Tenāha “akusalā pana…pe… santike”ti.
analyzed: pana sadisa sabhāva tā sarikkha tā tena āha akusalā panape santikā iti

original: Iti vedanākkhandhassa atītādivibhāge vitthārakathāmukhavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: iti vedanā khandhassa atīta ādi vibhāge vitthāra kathā mukha vaṇṇanā

original: Kamādivinicchayakathāvaṇṇanā
504. Etanti evaṃ atītādivibhāge vitthārakathāmukhaṃ. Ñāṇabhedatthanti nānappakāraṃ
analyzed: etat ti evam atīta ādi vibhāge vitthāra kathā mukham ñāṇa bheda attham ti nānā pakāram

original: ñāṇappabhedatthaṃ. Kamatoti desanākkamato, yena kāraṇenāyaṃ desanākkamo kato, tatoti
analyzed: ñāṇa ppabheda attham kamataḥ ti desanā kkamataḥ yena kāraṇena ayam desanā kkamaḥ kataḥ tatas ti

original: attho. Visesatoti bhedato, khandhupādānakkhandhavibhāgatoti attho. Anūnādhikatoti
analyzed: atthaḥ visesataḥ ti bhedataḥ khandhu pādāna khandha vibhāgato ti atthaḥ anūna adhikato ti

original: pañcabhāvato. Upamātoti upamāhi upametabbato. Daṭṭhabbato dvidhāti dvīhi ākārehi
analyzed: pañca bhāvataḥ upamātaḥ ti upamāhi upametabbataḥ daṭṭhabbataḥ dvidhā ti dvīhi ākārehi

original: ñāṇena passitabbato. Passantassatthasiddhitoti yathā passantassa yathādhippetatthanipphattito.
analyzed: ñāṇena passitabbataḥ passantassa attha siddhitaḥ ti yathā passantassa yathā adhippeta ttha nipphattito

original: Vibhāvināti paññavatā.
analyzed: vibhāvinā ati paññavatā

original: Uppattikkamoti yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjantānaṃ uppajjanapaṭipāṭi. “Dassanenapahātabbā”tiādinā
analyzed: uppatti kkamaḥ ti yathāpaccayam uppajjantānam uppajjana paṭipāṭi dassanena pahātabbā ati ādinā

original: paṭhamaṃ pahātabbā paṭhamaṃ vuttā, dutiyaṃ pahātabbā dutiyaṃ vuttāti ayaṃ pahānakkamo.

analyzed: dhātu vitthāra kathā vaṇṇanā

original: tadayuttaṃ “lokiyā hi dhātuyo”ti visesetvā vuttattā. Atthavasena cetaṃ yathāsambhavaggahaṇaṃ

analyzed: kamma vacanicchā na tadā kattu bhāvaḥ evam sesesu pi iti yathā sambhava ggahaṇam tena āha

original: “iti cakkhādīsū”tiādi.

original: 518. Attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyoti etthāpi dhātīti dhātūti padasiddhi veditabbā

original: 519. Cakkhādīnaṃ kamo pubbe vuttoti idhekekasmiṃ tike tiṇṇaṃ dhātūnaṃ kamaṃ dassento

original: Candābhāsūriyābhādikā vaṇṇanibhā evāti āha “rūpadhātuyeva hi ābhādhātū”ti. Rūpādipaṭibaddhāti
analyzed: canda ābhā sūriya ābhā ādikāḥ vaṇṇa nibhāḥ eva ati āha rūpa dhātuyā iva hi ābhā dhātu uti rūpa ādi paṭibaddhā ati

original: rāgavatthubhāvena gahetabbākāro subhanimittanti katvā “rūpādayo evā”ti avatvā paṭibaddhavacanaṃ

analyzed: etasmin okāse ogāḍhā hutvā adhobhāge ca okāse

original: carantīti etthāvacarā. Aññattha carantāpi yathāvutte eva ṭhāne pariyāpannāti ettha pariyāpannā.
analyzed: caranti iti etthāvacarā aññattha carantā api yathā vutte eva ṭhāne pariyāpannā ati ettha pariyāpannā

original: Nekkhammadhātu dhammadhātu eva vitakkapakkhe. Sabbepi kusalā dhammāti dānamayapuññakiriyato,

analyzed: sīla maya puñña kiriyataḥ pabbajjataḥ ca paṭṭhāya yāva agga magga adhigamā pavattā sabbe api

original: anavajjadhammā. Vihiṃsādhātu cetanā, paraviheṭhanacchando vā. Avihiṃsā karuṇā.
analyzed: anavajja dhammā vihiṃsā dhātu cetanā para viheṭhana chandaḥ vā avihiṃsā karuṇā

original: Hīnāti hīḷitā. Paṇītāti sambhāvitā. “Nātihīḷitā nātisambhāvitā majjhimā”ti khandhaniddese

original: Viññāṇadhātu yadipi chaviññāṇadhātuvasena vibhattā, tathāpi viññāṇadhātuggahaṇena
analyzed: viññāṇa dhātu yadi api cha viññāṇa dhātu vasena vibhattā tathā api viññāṇa dhātu ggahaṇena

analyzed: tassa purecārika pacchācārika ttā manaḥ dhātu gahitā ava hoti iti āha viññāṇa dhātu cakkhu viññāṇa ādi satta viññāṇa dhātu

original: saṅkhepoyevā”ti. Anekesaṃ cakkhudhātuādīnaṃ, tāsu ca ekekissā nānappakāratāya nānādhātūnaṃ

analyzed: vasena aneka dhātu nānā dhātu lokaḥ vuttaḥ ti āha aṭṭhārasa dhātu pabheda mattam eva ati

original: 521. Cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanodhātumanoviññāṇadhātubhedenāti bahūsu potthakesu
analyzed: cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu bhedena ati bahūsu potthakesu

original: likhitaṃ, kesuci “cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanomanoviññāṇadhātubhedenā”ti. Tattha
analyzed: likhitam kesuci cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya manaḥ manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu bhedena ati tattha

original: na cakkhādīnaṃ kevalena dhātusaddena sambandho adhippeto vijānanasabhāvassa pabhedavacanato.

original: Viññāṇadhātusaddena ca sambandhe kariyamāne dve manogahaṇāni na kātabbāni. Na hi

analyzed: dve manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyo santi antarā vā manaḥ dhātu gahaṇam a katvā cakkhu pe kāya manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu manaḥ dhātu

analyzed: vattabbam atulya yoge dvanda samāsa abhāvataḥ ayam pana ittha pāṭhaḥ siyā cakkhupe kāya viññāṇa manaḥ manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu bhedena ati

original: Tassa viññāṇassa yebhuyyena attavādino tassa ekamekassa attassa advayataṃ, niccattañca
analyzed: tassa viññāṇassa yebhuyyena atta vādino tassa ekam ekassa attassa advaya tam niccattam ca

original: apekkhitvā ayaṃ anatisaṅkhepavitthārā.
analyzed: apekkhitvā ayam an atisaṅkhepa vitthārā

original: Assa bhagavato. Saddhammatejasā vihataṃ saddhammatejavihataṃ.

original: 522. Saṅkhatoti gaṇanato. Jātitoti cakkhubhāvasāmaññato. Atha vā jātitoti cakkhusabhāvato.

original: kusalākusalaṃ pana sabbaso aggahitamevāti.
analyzed: kusala akusalam pana sabbaso aggahitam eva ati

analyzed: tā ca cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu ādayaḥ pañca api

original: Purimehevāti anantarādīhi eva. Javanamanoviññāṇadhātu pana javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā

original: āsevanapaccayenāpi paccayo hotīti vuttovāyamattho. Dhammadhātūti pana sahajāto vedanādikkhandho
analyzed: āsevana paccayena api paccayaḥ hoti iti vuttaḥ uva ayam atthaḥ dhammadhātu iti pana sahajātaḥ vedanā ādi khandho

original: adhippeto. Tenāha “sahajāta…pe… paccayo hotī”ti. Avigatādīhīti ettha ādi-saddena
analyzed: tena āha sahajāta pe paccayaḥ hoti iti avigata ādīhi iti ettha ādi saddena

original: manoviññāṇadhātuyā yathārahaṃ hetuadhipatikammavipākāhārindriyajhānamaggapaccayabhāvo

original: saṅgayhati. Tenāha “bahudhā paccayo hotī”ti. Ekaccā ca dhammadhātu sukhumarūpanibbānappakārā,

analyzed: ekaccam dhammadhātum ārabbha pavattati iti atha vā ekaccāya manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā ati

original: manoviññāṇadhātuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, lokuttaramanoviññāṇadhātuyā pana ekaccā dhammadhātu

original: atirekepi paccayadhamme dassetuṃ “na kevala”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ālokādayoti āloko

original: nāma sūriyālokādi. Tassa suttantanayena upanissayabhāvo veditabbo, evaṃ sesānipi.
analyzed: nāma sūriya āloka ādi tassa suttanta nayena upanissaya bhāvaḥ veditabbaḥ evam sesāni pi

original: Vivaraṃ nāma visesato sotabilaṃ. Vāyu gandhūpasaṃharaṇakavāto. Āpo mukhe pakkhittaāhārassa

original: temanakaudakaṃ. Pathavī kāyappasādassa nissayabhūtā pathavīdhātu. Bhavaṅgamanaṃ dvikkhattuṃ

original: 524. Avisesato daṭṭhabbākārassa vuccamānattā āha “sabbā evā”ti. Visesato vipassanāya
analyzed: avisesataḥ daṭṭhabba ākārassa vuccamāna ttā āha sabbāḥ eva ati visesataḥ vipassanāya

analyzed: bhūmi vicāraḥ esaḥ ti visesitam ettha pubbantaḥ nāma

original: atīto addhā, aparanto nāma anāgato. Ubhayattha ca saṅkhatā dhātuyo sabhāvavivittā

original: Bheritalaṃ viya cakkhudātu saddassa viya viññāṇassa nissayabhāvato. Ādāsatalādīsupi

original: dassanādīni, dassanādīnaṃ anantarañca savanādīni na uppajjantīti yuttametaṃ. Dassanādīnaṃ,

original: pana santīramaṇassa ca abhinnavisayatāya dassanādianantaraṃ na manāviññāṇadātu hotīti

original: ayuttanti? Nayidamevaṃ niyatāniyatavisayānaṃ bhinnavisayabhāvupapattito. Yadi ca
analyzed: na yidam evam bhinna visaya bhāva upapattitaḥ yadi ca

original: dassanādianantaraṃ kāci viññāṇadhātu uppajjeyya, sāpi dassanādidvāratāya dassanādiviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: dassana ādi anantaram kāci viññāṇa dhātu uppajjeyya sā api dassana ādi dvāra tāya dassana ādi viññāṇa dhātu

original: eva siyā, na manoviññāṇadhātu, tato ca dassanādikiccavidhuraṃ cintanaṃ manananti
analyzed: eva siyā na manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu tatas ca dassana ādi kicca vidhuram cintanam manananti

original: manodvārappavattānaṃ mananakiccāpariccāgo viya dassanaviññāṇadhātuyā dassanakiccāpariccāgo

analyzed: āpajjati tathā tad anantarassa ati sabbāya api dassana viññāṇa bhāvato ca viññāṇa kāyāḥ na bhaveyyuṃ

original: Yathā pana manoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ manodhātu, tato cakkhuviññāṇādīni, evaṃ dassanaviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ

original: na siyā, na cetaṃ yuttaṃ. Tasmā sukhadukkhānaṃ viya upekkhā cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ, manoviññāṇassa
analyzed: na siyā na ca itam yuttam tasmā sukha dukkhānam viya upekkhā cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam manaḥ viññāṇassa

original: ata kho mananakiccāvisesato manoviññāṇasabhāgatā. Mano hi hadayavatthumhi vattamāno
analyzed: atas kho manana kicca avisesataḥ manaḥ viññāṇa sabhā ga tā manaḥ hi hadaya vatthumhi vattamāno

analyzed: manana matte ṭhatvā nivattati añña vatthu sannissita viññāṇa nirodhe ca uṭṭhahantaḥ aggi

original: viya usumamatte uṭṭhahati. Paccayānurūpapavattikāni ca mananamattāni manoviññāṇadhātuyā
analyzed: viya usuma matte uṭṭhahati paccaya anurūpa pavattikāni ca manana mattāni manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā

original: antāni honti. Paṭighasaññāsahagatānañhi pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ indriyārammanapaṭighātajatāya
analyzed: antāni honti paṭigha saññā sahagatānaṃ hi pañcannam viññāṇānam indriya ārammana paṭighāta ja tāya

original: abhinipātamattakiccaṃ, mananalakkhaṇindriyasamuppannassa ca manoviññāṇassa visayavicintanāsambhūtatāya
analyzed: abhinipāta matta kiccam manana lakkhaṇa indriya samuppannassa ca manaḥ viññāṇassa visaya vicintana a sambhūta tāya

analyzed: tad anurūpā a cintanā tasmai abhinipāta ppaccaya paṭighaṭṭana a nighaṃsa balena bhavaṅga lakkhaṇam

original: cittaṃ calanāvatthaṃ hutvā nivattamānaṃ cintanāvisesavirahato abhinipātānuguṇaṃ cintanāvasānaṃ
analyzed: cittam calana avattham hutvā nivattamānam cintanā visesa virahataḥ abhinipāta anuguṇam cintana avasānam

original: mananamattaṃ uppādeti.
analyzed: manana mattam uppādeti

original: Dassanādipi abhinipātamattaṃ dutiyaṃ khaṇaṃ anativattamānaṃ attānuguṇaṃ cintanāmananasamaññāvirahato

analyzed: nibbattā iti tasmā vatthu kiccehi tam manaḥ viññāṇa kāya saṅgahitā api manaḥ dhātu manaḥ dvāra nikkhama pavesa bhūtā

original: ārammaṇantare dvārantaramanasikāratabbisayasampaṭicchanabhāvena pañcannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ

original: visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvato dhātubhāvasāmaññena manomattā dhātu manodhātūti vuccati.
analyzed: visiṭṭha manana kicca abhāvataḥ dhātu bhāva sāmaññena manaḥ mattā dhātu manodhātu iti vuccati

original: Yathāvutteneva ca hetunā matta-saddalopaṃ katvā viññāṇaṭṭhayogato manomattaṃ viññāṇanti
analyzed: yathā vuttena iva ca hetunā matta sadda lopam katvā viññāṇa ṭṭhayogataḥ manaḥ mattam viññāṇan ti

original: manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahopi cassā yujjati eva. Aññaviññāṇehi pana dvārārammaṇehi ca

original: dvārasamaññārahattā na manodhātūti vuccati. Tañhi manodvārantogadhaṃ, na ca dassanādipurecarānucaranti

original: mananakiccaṃ, viññāṇakiccañcāti mattasaddassa lopamantarena “manoviññāṇa”nti, nijjīvabhāvavibhāvanatthaṃ
analyzed: manana kiccam viññāṇa kiccam ca ati matta saddassa lopam antarena manaḥ viññāṇam ti nijjīva bhāva vibhāvana attham

original: “manoviññāṇadhātū”ti ca vuccatīti.
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu uti ca vuccati iti

original: Sallamiva sūlamiva tividhadukkhatāsamāyogato daṭṭhabbo. Vedanāsallasūlayogāti vedanāsaṅkhātasallasūlayogato.

original: Āturā viyāti tena āturibhūtā puggalā viya. Āsāyeva dukkhaṃ āsādukkhaṃ, āsāvighātaṃ
analyzed: āturāḥ viya ati tena āturi bhūtā puggalāḥ viya āsāya iva dukkham āsā dukkham āsā vighātam

original: dukkhaṃ vā. Saññā hi asubhādikampi subhādito sajjānantī āsaṃ, tassā ca vighātaṃ āsīsitasubhādiasiddhiyā
analyzed: dukkham vā saññā hi asubha ādikam pi subha āditaḥ sat jānantī āsam tassā ca vighātam

original: janetīti. Vanamigo tiṇapurisaṃ purisoti gaṇhanto ayathābhūccanimittaggāhako, tathā
analyzed: janeti iti vana migaḥ tiṇa purisam purisaḥ iti gaṇhantaḥ tathā

original: saññāpīti āha “vanamigo viyā”ti. Kammapadhānā saṅkhārāti “paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanato”tiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Jātidukkhānubandhatoti attanā nibbattiyamānena jātidukkhena anubandhatā.
analyzed: vuttam jāti dukkha anubandhato ti attanā nibbattiyamānena jāti dukkhena anubandhatā

original: Bhavapaccayā jāti hi jātidukkhanti. Padumaṃ viya dissamānaṃ khuracakkaṃ viya rūpampi
analyzed: bhava paccayā jāti hi jāti dukkhanti padumam viya dissamānam khura cakkam viya rūpam pi

original: itthiādibhāvena dissamānaṃ nānāvidhupaddavaṃ janeti. Sabbe anatthā rāgādayo, jātiādayo

original: ca visayabhūtā, anupasantā, sappaṭibhayā cāti. Tappaṭipakkhabhūtattā asaṅkhatā dhātu

original: amatādito daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: amata āditaḥ daṭṭhabbā

original: Nānāvesadhārī raṅganaṭo.
Āyatanadātuniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: āyatana dātu niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Iti pannarasamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: iti pannarasama pariccheda vaṇṇanā

original: 16. Indriyasaccaniddesavaṇṇanā
Indriyavitthārakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: indriya vitthāra kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 525. Bāvīsatīti gaṇanaparicchedo. Indriyānīti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ. Cakkhundriyantiādi

original: Ādhipaccaṃ indriyapaccayabhāvo. Asatipi ca indriyapaccayabhāve itthipurisindriyānaṃ,

original: attano attano paccayavasena pavattamāne taṃsahitasantāne aññākārena appavattamānehi

original: 526. Sattānaṃ ariyabhūmipaṭilābho bhagavato desanāya sādhāraṇaṃ, padānañca payojananti

original: sameti. Indriyavibhaṅge pana manindriyānantaraṃ jīvitindriyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ purimapacchimānaṃ

original: ajjhāttikabāhirānaṃ anupālakabhāvadīpanatthaṃ tesa majjhe vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Yañca
analyzed: ajjhāttika bāhirānam anupālaka bhāva dīpana attham tesa majjhe vuttan ti veditabbam yat ca

original: kiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ. Yāva ca duvidhattabhāvānupālakassa jīvitindriyassa

original: Tassevāti anaññātaññassāmītindriyasseva. Tato anantaraṃ bhāvetabbattāti bhāvanāmaggasampayuttaṃ
analyzed: tassa iva āti tatas anantaram bhāvetabba ttā ti bhāvanā magga sampayuttam

original: aññindriyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dassanāntarā hi bhāvanāti.
analyzed: aññindriyam sandhāya vuttam dassana antarā hi bhāvanā ti

original: Bhedoti idha sabhāvato bhedo adhippeto, na bhūmipuggalādivasenāti āha “sesānaṃ abhedo”ti.
analyzed: bhedaḥ ti idha sabhāvataḥ bhedaḥ adhippetaḥ na bhūmi puggala ādi vasena ati āha sesānam abhedaḥ ti

original: Nanu ca jīvitindriyassa anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo, tenassa duvidhassāpi abhedoti?
analyzed: nanu ca jīvita indriyassa anupālana lakkhaṇam sabhāvaḥ tenassa duvidhassa api abhedaḥ ti

original: Na, yathā desitesu bāvīsatiyā indriyesu bhedābhedassa adhippetattā.

original: 527. Cakkhundriyādīnaṃ satipi purejātādipaccayabhāve indriyapaccayabhāvena sādhetabbameva

analyzed: tikkha manda ādi ākāraḥ atta ākāro tassa anuvattāpanam atta ākāra anuvattāpanam tena āha tikkha manda ādi saṅkhāta atta ākāra anuvattāpanam ti

analyzed: nimitta bhāvaḥ anuvidhānam

analyzed: āgacchati samudayataḥ ti vai āyam dukkham tassa ūhanam pavattanam āyūhanam ayam sa rasena iva

original: āvibhavanākāro. Nidadāti dukkhanti nidānaṃ, “idaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti sampaṭicchāpentaṃ
analyzed: āvibhavana ākāraḥ nidadāti dukkhanti nidānam idam tam dukkhanti sampaṭicchāpentam

original: viya samuṭṭhāpetīti attho. Ayaṃ nidānaṭṭho dukkhadassanena āvibhavanākāro. Saṃsāradukkhena
analyzed: viya samuṭṭhāpeti iti atthaḥ ayam nidāna aṭṭhaḥ dukkha dassanena āvi bhavana ākāro saṃsāra dukkhena

original: saṃyojanaṃ saṃyogaṭṭho. Maggādhigamananivāraṇaṃ palibodhaṭṭho. Ime ca saṃyogapalibodhaṭṭhā
analyzed: saṃyojanam saṃyoga ṭṭhaḥ magga adhigamana nivāraṇam palibodha ṭṭhaḥ ime ca saṃyoga palibodha ṭṭhā

original: nirodhamaggadassanehi āvibhavanākārā. Nissaranti sattā ettha, sayameva vā nissaṭaṃ
analyzed: nirodha magga dassanehi āvi bhavana ākārāḥ nissaranti sattāḥ ettha sayam eva vā nissaṭam

original: visaṃyuttaṃ sabbasaṅkhatehi sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggabhāvatoti nissaranaṃ. Ayamassa
analyzed: visaṃyuttam sabba saṅkhatehi sabba upadhi paṭinissagga bhāvato ti nissaranam ayam assa

original: sabhāvena āvibhavanākāro, itare vivekāsaṅkhātāmataṭṭā, samudayakkharaapaccayaavināsitā
analyzed: sa bhāvena āvi bhavana ākāraḥ itare

original: vā samudayamaggadukkhadassanena āvibhavanākārā.
analyzed: vā samudaya magga dukkha dassanena āvi bhavana ākārā

original: Saṃsārato niggamanaṃ niyyānaṃ. Ayamassa sarasena āvibhavanākāro. Paribodhūpacchedanena
analyzed: saṃsārataḥ niggamanam niyyānam ayam assa sa rasena āvi bhavana ākāraḥ paribodhu upacchedanena

original: nibbānādhigamova nibbānanimittattā maggassa hetuṭṭho. Paññāpadhānattā cassa nibbānadassanaṃ,
analyzed: nibbāna adhigamaḥ uva nibbāna nimitta ttā maggassa paññā apadhāna ttā ca ssa nibbāna dassanam

original: catusaccadassanaṃ vā dassanaṭṭho. Catusaccadassane, kilesadukkhasantāpavūpasamane
analyzed: catu acca dassanam vā catu acca dassane kilesa dukkha santāpa vūpasamane

original: ca ādhipaccaṃ karonti maggadhammā sampayuttadhammesūti so maggassa ādhipateyyaṭṭho.
analyzed: ca ādhipaccam karonti magga dhammā sampayutta dhammesu iti saḥ maggassa ādhipateyya ṭṭhaḥ

original: Visesato vā ālambanādhipatibhūtā maggadhammā honti “maggādhipatino”ti vacanatoti
analyzed: visesataḥ vā ālambana adhipati bhūtāḥ magga dhammāḥ honti magga adhipatino ti vacanato ti

original: so tesaṃ ākāro ādhipateyyaṭṭho. Ete hetudassanādhipateyyaṭṭhā samudayanirodhadukkhadassanehi
analyzed: saḥ tesam ākāraḥ ādhipateyya ṭṭhaḥ ete hetu dassana ādhipateyya ṭṭhā samudaya nirodha dukkha dassanehi

original: āvibhavanākārā. Evamādi āhāti sambandho. Abhisamayaṭṭhoti abhisametabbaṭṭho. Abhisamayassa
analyzed: āvi bhavana ākārā evamādi āha ati sambandhaḥ abhisamaya ṭṭho ti abhisametabba ṭṭhaḥ abhisamayassa

original: vā visayabhūto attho abhisamayaṭṭho. Atha vā abhisamayassa pavattiākāro abhisamayaṭṭho.
analyzed: vā visaya bhūtaḥ atthaḥ abhisamaya ṭṭho atha vā abhisamayassa pavatti ākāraḥ abhisamaya ṭṭho

original: So cettha abhisametabbena pīḷanādinā dassitoti daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: so ca ittha abhisametabbena pīḷana ādinā dassito ti daṭṭhabbo

original: 530. Kucchitaṃ khaṃ dukkhaṃ, gārayhaṃ hutvā asāranti attho.
analyzed: kucchitam kham dukkham gārayham hutvā asāranti attho

original: “Samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu kevalassa āgamasaddassa, eta-saddassa ca payoge saṃyogatthassa
analyzed: samāgamaḥ sameta nti ādīsu kevalassa āgama saddassa eta saddassa ca payoge saṃyoga atthassa

original: anupalabbhanato, saṃ-saddassa ca saṃyoge upalabbhanato “saṃyogaṃ dīpetī”ti āha anvayato,
analyzed: anupalabbhanato saṃsaddassa ca saṃyoge upalabbhanataḥ saṃyogam dīpeti iti āha anvayato

original: byatirekato ca tadatthajotakatāsiddhito. Uppannaṃ uditanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Aya-saddo
analyzed: byatirekataḥ ca tad attha jotaka tā siddhitaḥ uppannam uditan ti ettha api esā iva nayaḥ aya saddo

original: gatiatthe siddho hetusaddoviya kāraṇaṃ dīpeti. Attano phalanipphādanena ayati pavattati,
analyzed: gati atthe siddhaḥ kāraṇam dīpeti attanaḥ phala nipphādanena ayati pavattati

original: eti vā etasmā phalanti ayoti, saṃyoge uppattikāraṇaṃ samudayoti. Ettha visuṃ payujjamānāpi
analyzed: vā etasmai phalanti saṃyoge uppatti kāraṇam ettha visum

original: upasaggasaddā sadhātukaṃ saṃyogatthaṃ, uppādatthañca dīpenti, kiriyāvisesakattāti veditabbā.
analyzed: upasagga saddā sa dhātukam saṃyoga ttham uppāda ttham ca dīpenti kiriyā visesaka ttā iti veditabbā

original: “Abhāvo ettha rodhassāti nirodho”ti etena nibbānassa dukkhavivittabhāvaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: abhāvaḥ ettha rodhassa ati nirodhaḥ iti etena nibbānassa dukkha vivitta bhāvam dasseti

original: Samadhigate tasmiṃ tadadhigamato puggalassa rodhābhāvo pavattisaṅkhātassa rodhassa
analyzed: samadhigate tasmin tad adhigamataḥ puggalassa rodha abhāvo pavatti saṅkhātassa rodhassa

original: paṭipakkhabhūtāya nivattiyā adhigatattāti. Etasmiñca atthe abhāvo etasmiṃ rodhassāti
analyzed: paṭipakkha bhūtāya nivattiyāḥ adhigata ttā ati etasmin ca atthe abhāvaḥ etasmin rodhassa ati

original: nirodho icceva padasamāso. Dukkhābhāvo panettha puggalassa, na nibbānasseva. Anuppādo
analyzed: nirodhaḥ iccā iva pada samāsaḥ dukkha abhāvo pana ittha puggalassa na nibbānassa iva anuppādo

original: eva nirodho anuppādanirodho. Āyatiṃ bhavādīsu appavatti, na pana bhaṅgoti bhaṅgavācakaṃ
analyzed: eva nirodhaḥ anuppāda nirodhaḥ āyatim bhava ādīsu appavatti na pana bhaṅgo ti bhaṅga vācakam

original: nirodhasaddaṃ nivattetvā anuppādavācakaṃ gaṇhāti. Etasmiṃ atthe kāraṇe phalūpacāraṃ
analyzed: nirodha saddam nivattetvā anuppāda vācakam gaṇhāti etasmin atthe kāraṇe phala upacāram

original: katvā nirodhapaccayo nirodhoti vutto.
analyzed: katvā nirodha paccayaḥ nirodhaḥ ti vutto

original: Paṭipadā ca hoti puggalassa dukkhanirodappattiyā. Nanu ca sā eva dukkhanirodappattīti
analyzed: paṭipadā ca hoti puggalassa dukkha niroda ppattiyā nanu ca sā eva dukkha niroda ppattī iti

original: tassā eva sā paṭipadāti na yujjatīti? Na puggalādhigamassa pattibhāvena, yehi so
analyzed: tassāḥ eva sā paṭipadā ati na yujjati iti na puggala adhigamassa patti bhāvena yehi so

original: adhigacchati, tesaṃ kāraṇabhūtānaṃ paṭipadābhāvena ca vuttattā. Sacchi kiriyāsacchikaraṇadhammānañhi
analyzed: adhigacchati tesam kāraṇa bhūtānam paṭipada abhāvena ca vutta ttā sacchi kiriyā a sacchikaraṇa dhammānam hi

original: aññatthābhāvepi puggalasacchikiriyādhammabhāvehi nānattaṃ katvā niddeso katoti. Atha
analyzed: aññattha abhāve pi puggala sacchikiriyā dhamma bhāvehi nānattam katvā niddeso kato ti atha

original: vā yaṃ dukkhanirodhappattiyā niṭṭhānaṃ phalaṃ, sayañca dukkhanirodhappattibhūtaṃ,
analyzed: vā yam dukkha nirodha ppattiyāḥ niṭṭhānam phalam sayam ca dukkha nirodha ppatti bhūtam

original: tassa abhisamayabhūtāya dukkhanirodhappattiyā paṭipadatā daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: tassa abhisamaya bhūtāya dukkha nirodha ppattiyā paṭipada tā daṭṭhabbā

original: 531. Buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhantīti ettha paṭividdhakāle pavattaṃ buddhādivohāraṃ
analyzed: buddha ādayaḥ ariyā paṭivijjhanti iti ettha paṭividdha kāle pavattam buddha ādi vohāram

original: “agamā rājagahaṃ buddho”tiādīsu viya bhāvini bhūte viya upacāroti purimakālepi āropetvā
analyzed: agamā rājagaham buddha uti ādīsu viya bhāvini bhūte viya āropetvā

original: “buddhādayo”ti vuttaṃ. Te hi buddhādayo catūhi maggehi paṭivijjhantīti. Tasmā ariyasaccānīti
analyzed: buddha ādayaḥ iti vuttam te hi buddha ādayaḥ catūhi maggehi paṭivijjhanti iti tasmai ariya saccāni iti

original: vuccantīti ettha ariyapaṭivijjhitabbāni saccāni ariyasaccānīti purimapade uttarapadalopo
analyzed: vuccanti iti ettha ariya paṭivijjhitabbāni saccāni ariya saccāni iti purima pade uttara pada lopaḥ

original: ariyasaccānīti vuccantīti attho. Tathāgatena hi sayaṃ adhigatattā, paveditattā, tato
analyzed: ariya saccāni iti vuccanti iti attho tathāgatena hi sayam adhigata ttā pavedita ttā tatas

original: eva ca aññehi adhigamanīrattā tāni tassa hontīti. Ariyabhāvasiddhitopīti ettha ariyasādhakāni
analyzed: eva ca aññehi tāni tassa honti iti ariya bhāva siddhitaḥ api iti ettha ariya sādhakāni

original: saccāni ariyasaccānīti pubbe viya uttarapadalopo daṭṭhabbo. Ariyāni saccānītipīti
analyzed: saccāni ariya saccāni iti pubbe viya uttara pada lopaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ ariyāni saccāni iti pi iti

original: ettha avitathabhāvena araṇīyattā adhigantabbattā ariyāni, ariyasamaññā vā avisaṃvādake
analyzed: ettha avitatha bhāvena araṇīya ttā adhigantabba ttā ariyāni ariya samaññā vā avisaṃvādake

original: avitathe niruḷhā daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: avitathe niruḍhā daṭṭhabbā

original: 532. Bādhanalakkhaṇanti ettha dukkhadukkhatannimittabhāvo, udayavayapaṭipīḷitabhāvo
analyzed: bādhana lakkhaṇan ti ettha dukkha dukkha tad nimitta bhāvaḥ udaya vaya paṭipīḍita bhāvaḥ

original: vā bādhanaṃ. Bhavādīsu jātiādivasena, cakkhurogādivasena ca anekadā dukkhassa pavattanameva
analyzed: vā bādhanam bhava ādīsu jāti ādi vasena cakkhu roga ādi vasena ca anekadā dukkhassa pavattanam eva

original: puggalassa santāpanaṃ, tadassa kiccaṃ rasoti santāpanarasaṃ. Pavattinivattīsu saṃsāravimokkhesu
analyzed: puggalassa santāpanam tat assa kiccam raso ti santāpana rasam pavatti nivattīsu saṃsāra vimokkhesu

original: pavatti hutvā gayhatīti pavattipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Pabhavati etasmā dukkhaṃ nibbattati,
analyzed: pavatti hutvā gayhati iti pavatti paccupaṭṭhānam pabhavati etasmā dukkham nibbattati

original: purimabhavena pacchimabhavo ghaṭito saṃyutto hutvā pavattatīti pabhāvo. “Evampi taṇhānusaye
analyzed: purima bhavena pacchima bhavaḥ ghaṭito saṃyuttaḥ hutvā pavattati iti evam pi taṇhā anusaye

original: anūhate, nibbattati dukkhamidaṃ punappuna”nti evaṃ punappunaṃ uppādanaṃ anupacchedakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: anūhate nibbattati dukkham idam punappunanti evam punappunam uppādanam an upaccheda karaṇam

original: Bhavanissaraṇanivāraṇaṃ palibodho. Taṇhakkhayādibhāvena sabbadukkhasantatā santi.
analyzed: bhava nissaraṇa nivāraṇam palibodho taṇhā khaya ādi bhāvena sabba dukkha santatā santi

original: Accutirasanti accutisampattikaṃ acavanakiccaṃ vā. Kiccanti ca cavanābhāvaṃ kiccamiva
analyzed: accuti rasanti accuti sampattikam a cavana kiccam vā ca cavana abhāvam kiccam iva

original: katvā pariyāyena vuttaṃ, acavanañcassa sabhāvāpariccajanaṃ avikāritā daṭṭhabbā. Pañcakkhandhanimittasuññatāya
analyzed: katvā pariyāyena vuttam a cavanam ca sabhāva a pariccajanam a vikāri tā daṭṭhabbā pañca kkhandha nimitta suñña tāya

original: aviggahaṃ hutvā gayhatīti animittapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Anusayasamucchindanena saṃsāracārakato
analyzed: a viggaham hutvā gayhati iti animitta paccupaṭṭhānam anusaya samucchindanena saṃsāra cārakato

original: niggamanūpāyabhāvo niyyānaṃ. Sabbakilesānaṃ anuppādanirodhanaṃ kilesappahānakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: niggamana upāya bhāvaḥ niyyānam sabba kilesānam anuppāda nirodhanam kilesa ppahāna karaṇam

original: Nimittato, pavattato ca cittassa vuṭṭhānaṃ hutvā gayhatīti vuṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: nimittataḥ pavattataḥ ca cittassa vuṭṭhānam hutvā gayhati iti vuṭṭhāna paccupaṭṭhānam

original: 533. Asuvaṇṇādi suvaṇṇādi viya dissamānaṃ māyāti vatthusabbhāvā tassā viparītatā
analyzed: a suvaṇṇa ādi suvaṇṇa ādi viya dissamānam mā āyāti vatthu sabbhāvā tassāḥ viparīta tā

original: vuttā. Udakaṃ viya dissamānā pana marīci upagatānaṃ tucchā. Vatthumattampi tassā
analyzed: vuttā udakam viya dissamānā pana marīci upagatānam tucchā vatthumattam pi tassā

original: na dissatīti visaṃvādikā vuttā. Marīcimāyāattavidhuro bhāvo tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo.
analyzed: na dissati iti visaṃvādikā vuttā marīci māyā atta vidhuraḥ bhāvo tad chā viparīta bhūta bhāvo

original: Ariyañāṇassāti ariyassa avitathaggāhakassa ñāṇassa, tena paṭivedhañāṇaṃ viya paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi
analyzed: ariya ñāṇassa ati ariyassa avitatha gāhakassa ñāṇassa tena paṭivedha ñāṇam viya paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇam pi

original: gahitaṃ hoti. Tesaṃ gocarabhāvo paṭivijjitabbatā, ārammaṇabhāvo ca daṭṭhabbo. Aggilakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: gahitam hoti tesam gocara bhāvaḥ paṭivijjitabba tā ārammaṇa bhāvo ca daṭṭhabbo aggi lakkhaṇam

original: uṇhattaṃ. Tañhi katthaci kaṭṭhādiupādānabhede visaṃvādakaṃ, viparītaṃ, abhūtaṃ vākadācipi
analyzed: tat hi katthaci kaṭṭha ādi upādāna bhede visaṃvādakam viparītam abhūtam

original: na hoti. “Jātidhammā jarādhammā, atho maraṇadhammino”ti evaṃ vuttā jātiādikā lokapakati.
analyzed: na hoti jāti dhammā jarā dhammā atho maraṇa dhammino ti evam vuttā jāti ādikā loka pakati

original: Ekaccānaṃ tiracchānānaṃ tiriyaṃ dīghatā, manussādīnaṃ uddhaṃ dīghatā, vuddhiniṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: ekaccānam tiracchānānam tiriyam dīghatā manussa ādīnam uddham dīghatā vuddhi niṭṭham

original: pattānaṃ puna avaḍḍhananti evamādikā ca lokapakatīti vadanti. Tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvesu
analyzed: pattānam puna evamādikā ca lokapakatī iti vadanti tad chā viparīta bhūta bhāvesu

original: pacchimo tathatā. Paṭhamo avitathatā, majjhimo anaññatatāti ayametesaṃ viseso,
analyzed: pacchimaḥ tathatā paṭhamaḥ avitathatā majjhimaḥ anaññatatā ati ayam etesam visesaḥ

original: Dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhaka nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu taṇhāpi jāti viya dukkhanimittatāya
analyzed: dukkhā aññam na bādhaka nti kasmā vuttam nanu taṇhā api jāti viya dukkha nimitta tāya

original: bādhikāti? Na, bādhakappabhavabhāvena visuṃ gahitattā. Evamhi pavatti, pavattihetu
analyzed: bādhikā ati na bādhaka ppabhava bhāvena visum gahita ttā evamhi pavatti pavatti hetu

original: ca asaṅkarato bodhitā honti. Atha vā jātiādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvo, dukkhadukkhatā
analyzed: ca asaṅkarataḥ bodhitāḥ honti atha vā jāti ādīnam viya dukkhassa adhiṭṭhāna bhāvaḥ dukkha dukkha tā

original: ca bādhakatā, na dukkhappabhavatāti natthi taṇhāya pabhavabhāvena visuṃ gahitāya
analyzed: ca bādhaka tā na dukkha ppabhava tā ati natthi taṇhāya pabhava bhāvena visum gahitāya

original: bādhakabhāvapasaṅgo. Tenāha “dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhaka”nti. Bādhakattaniyāmenāti dukkhaṃ
analyzed: bādhaka bhāva pasaṅgo tena āha dukkhāḥ aññam na bādhakanti bādhaka tta niyāmena ati dukkham

original: bādhakameva, dukkhameva bādhakanti evaṃ dvidhāpi bādhakattāvadhāranenāti attho. Bādhakattaniyāmenāti
analyzed: bādhakam eva dukkham eva bādhakanti evam dvidhā api bādhaka ttā avadhāranena ati atthaḥ bādhaka tta niyāmena ati

original: hi bādhakassa, bādhakatte ca niyāmena. Yatā bādhakattassa dukkhe niyatatā, evaṃ dukkhassa
analyzed: hi bādhakassa bādhaka tte ca niyāmena yatā bādhaka ttassa dukkhe niyatatā evam dukkhassa

original: ca bādhakatte niyatatāti.
analyzed: ca bādhaka tte niyata tāti

original: Taṃ vinā nāññatoti satipi avasesakilesaavasesākusalasāsavakusalamūlāvasesasāsavakusaladhammānaṃ
analyzed: tam vinā na aññatas ti avasesa kilesa avasesa akusala sāsava kusala mūla avasesa sāsava kusala dhammānam

original: dukkhahetubhāve na taṇhāya vinā tesaṃ dukkhahetubhāvo atthi, tehi pana vināpi taṇhāya
analyzed: dukkha hetu bhāve na taṇhāya vinā tesam dukkha hetu bhāvo atthi tehi pana vinā api taṇhāya

original: dukkhahetubhāvo atthi kusalehi vinā akusalehi rūpāvacarādikusalehi vinā kāmāvacarādīhi
analyzed: dukkha hetu bhāvaḥ atthi kusalehi vinā akusalehi rūpāvacara ādi kusalehi vinā kāmāvacara ādīhi

original: ca taṇhāya dukkhanibbattakattā. Santabhāvassa, santabhāve vā niyāmo santabhāvaniyāmo,
analyzed: ca taṇhāya dukkha nibbattaka ttā santa bhāvassa santa bhāve vā niyāmaḥ santa bhāva niyāmaḥ

original: tena santabhāvaniyāmena. Tacchaniyyānabhāvattāti dvidhāpi niyāmena taccho niyyānabhāvo
analyzed: tena santa bhāva niyāmena dvidhā api niyāmena

original: etassa, na micchāmaggassa viya viparītatāya, na lokiyamaggassa viya vā anekantikatāya
analyzed: etassa na micchāmaggassa viya viparīta tāya na lokiya maggassa viya vā anekantika tāya

original: atacchoti tacchaniyyānabhāvo, maggo, tassa bhāvo tacchaniyyānabhāvattaṃ, tasmā tacchaniyyānabhāvattā.
analyzed: a taccho ti tad śa niyyāna bhāvaḥ maggo tassa bhāvaḥ tad śa niyyāna bhāvattam tasmā tad śa niyyāna bhāvattā

original: Sabbattha dvidhāpi niyāmena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo vuttoti āha “iti tacchāvipallāsā”tiādi.

analyzed: sītam uṇham ca hutvā upatiṭṭhati sarīram tat śetvā khāra avasecana karaṇam

original: khārāpaṭicchakaṃ. Dukkhuppattiṭṭhāneti gabbhāsayasaññitaṃ tatiyaṃ āvaṭṭaṃ sandhāyāha.
analyzed: khārā paṭicchakam dukkha uppatti ṭṭhāne iti gabbhā saya saññitam tatiyam āvaṭṭam sandhāya āha

original: Parivattetvāti uddhaṃpādaadhosīsabhāvena parivattetvā. Idaṃ vijāyanamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ,
analyzed: parivattetvā ti uddhaṃpāda adhosīsa bhāvena parivattetvā idam vijāyana mūlakam dukkham

original: vissaranti, mahandhakāraṃ mahāviduggaṃ pakkhandhā viya honti.
analyzed: vissaranti mahā andhakāram mahā viduggam pakkhandhāḥ viya honti

original: Vadhentassāti socanaparidevanasīsapaṭihananādinā bādhentassa. Khuppipāsā hi ātapāvaṭṭhānādinā ca ātāpanaṃ. Pañcaggitāpanādinā paritāpanaṃ.
analyzed: vadhentassa ati socana paridevana sīsa paṭihanana ādinā bādhentassa khuppipāsā hi ātapa avaṭṭhāna ādinā ca ātāpanam pañcaggi tāpana ādinā paritāpanam

original: Imassāti yathāvuttassa sattavidhassa. Sabbassāpīti gabbhakālādīsu tāpanamaddanādinirayaggidāhādisañjanitassa
analyzed: imassa ati yathā vuttassa sattavidhassa sabbassa api iti gabbha kāla ādīsu tāpana maddana ādi niraya ggi dāha ādi sañjanitassa

original: sakalassāpi. Vatthumeva hoti tadabhāve abhāvato. Tenevāha “jāyetha no ce”tiādi.
analyzed: sakalassa api vatthum eva hoti tad abhāve abhāvato tena iva āha jāyetha no ca itiādi

original: 541. Vicittanti vividhaṃ, acchariyaṃ vā.
analyzed: vicittanti vividham acchariyam vā

original: Iti jātiniddesavaṇṇanā.

original: Jarāniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: jarā niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: Iti jarāniddesavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: iti jarā niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: Pāpassāti pāpayogena pāpassa, upacitapāpakammassāti attho. Pāpakammādinimittanti

analyzed: tamhi passantassa iva kassaci anubhavantassa viya mahā dukkham hoti bhaddassa ati bhadda kammassa

original: 544. Soti soko. Atthato domanassameva hoti cetasikantarābhāvato. Domanassaviseso

analyzed: ñāti byasana ādi visayam kevalam citta santhāpa bhūtam anusocanam soko ti anusocana paccupaṭṭhāna tte pi ayam etesam viseso

analyzed: na labhati iti hi vuttam matthaka ppattam pana icchita lābham dassetum pāḷiyam jāti dhammānam

analyzed: iti icchitā lābha niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: Pañcupādānakkhandhaniddesavaṇṇanā
552. Yaṃ vuttamidhāti idha saccaniddese yaṃ sarūpato vuttaṃ. Avuttanti aññattha dukkhakkhandhabālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu
analyzed: yam vuttam idha āti idha sacca niddese yam sarūpataḥ vuttam avuttam ti aññattha dukkha kkhandha bāla paṇḍita sutta ādīsu

original: tattha khandhasannissayameva dukkhaṃ khandhe vibādhatīti dassetuṃ “indanamiva pāvako”ti

original: Yathā ca gorūpaṃ ḍaṃsamakasādivibādhāya, yathā ca khettaṃ nipphannasassalāyanassa,

analyzed: samāsetvā sāmañña niddesena vā saṅkhepam katvā

original: Iti dukkhaniddesakathāvaṇṇanā.

analyzed: samudaya niddesa kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: patiṭṭhāya khaya saṅkhātaḥ maggaḥ rāga ādayaḥ khepeti iti tad sacchikaraṇa abhāve

original: anuppattinirodhagamanābhāvā taṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyantīti vuccanti. Ekaṃsena cetaṃ
analyzed: anuppatti nirodha gamana abhāvā tam āgamma rāga ādayaḥ khīyanti iti vuccanti ekaṃsena ca itaṃ

original: evaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, itarathā yathārutavasena pāḷiyā atthe gayhamāne bahū dosā
analyzed: evam sampaṭicchitabbam itarathā yathā ruta vasena pāḷiyā atthe gayhamāne bahū dosā

original: āpajjantīti te dassetuṃ “arahattassāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Arahattañhi aggaphalapamukhā
analyzed: āpajjanti iti te dassetum arahattassa api itiādi vuttam arahattam hi agga phala pamukhā

original: cattāro khandhāti na tassa rāgādikhayamattatā yuttā. Tampi hi…pe… niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: cattāro khandhā ti na tassa rāga ādi khaya matta tā yuttā hipe niddiṭṭham tattha

original: bahūdosā āpajjantīti dassetuṃ “kiñca bhiyyo”tiādi āraddhaṃ.

original: Tattha ittarakālādippattidosatoti rāgādīnaṃ khayamattatāya parittakālatā, saṅkhatalakkhaṇatā,
analyzed: tattha ittara kāla ādi ppatti dosato ti rāga ādīnam khaya matta tāya paritta kāla tā saṅkhata lakkhaṇa tā

original: Rāgasseva khayo rāgakkhayo, na dosādīnaṃ. Tathā dosakkhayādayopīti añño rāgakkhayo,

analyzed: pākaṭaḥ antamasaḥ dīpi miga makkaṭa ādīnam pi su viññeyyaḥ ti oḷārikam nibbānam hoti gotrabhukkhaṇe

original: Kiñca bhiyyo – yo pacchimabhavato tatiyattabhāveyeva rāgādīsu ādīnavaṃ disvā jhānabhāvanāya

analyzed: tassa api ittara kālatā ādi dosa samāyogaḥ eva ati āha bhāve pi ca atiādi

analyzed: anuppatti dhamma tā āpādanan ti khayaḥ ti ca vuccati iti tam itara khayataḥ visesentaḥ anuppatti nirodha saṅkhātassa

analyzed: assa ti nibbānassa idam api kho ṭhānam su duddasanti ādinā paccavekkhataḥ bhagavataḥ

analyzed: aṇu ādīnam ti aṇu pakati kāla purisa ādīnam nicca bhāva āpatti iti kūṭaṭṭha nicca tā

original: atthitāya sīlassa atthibhāvato tividhenāpi sīlena te tayopi gahitāti tattha antogadhā.
analyzed: atthitāya sīlassa atthi bhāvato tividhena api sīlena te gahitā ati tattha antogadhā

original: Cittasamādhīti cittiddhipādaṃ vadati. “Cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti hi cittamukhena
analyzed: cittasamādhi iti citta iddhipādam vadati cittam paññam ca bhāvayanti hi citta mukhena

original: samādhi vuttoti samādhimukhena cittampi vattabbataṃ arahati. Cittiddhipādabhāvanāya
analyzed: samādhi vuttaḥ ti samādhi mukhena cittam api vattabbatam arahati citta iddhipāda bhāvanāya

original: pana samādhipi adhimatto hotīti vīmaṃsiddhipādādivacanaṃ viya cittiddhipādoti avatvā
analyzed: adhimattaḥ hoti iti avatvā

original: idha “cittasamādhī”ti vuttaṃ. “Pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ

analyzed: vedeti sukhinaḥ cittam samādhiyati iti vacanataḥ samādhi upakārā pīti passaddhiyaḥ tasmā

original: samādhiggahaṇena gahitā. Upekkhā pana samādhiupakārakato, taṃsadisakiccato ca. Tasmā

analyzed: antogadhānam pabheda vinicchaya vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 565. Bhāro viya dukkhasaccaṃ vighātakattā, saṃharaṇīyavasena vihantabhāvatoti attho.
analyzed: bhāraḥ viya dukkha saccam vighātaka ttā saṃharaṇīya vasena vihanta bhāvato ti attho

analyzed: vā roga vūpasamaḥ viya subhikkham iva ca santi lakkhaṇa ttā sukha bhāvataḥ nibbānam

original: paramaṃ sukha”nti hi vuttaṃ. Bhesajjamiva, suvuṭṭhi viya ca dukkhassa hetupacchedato,
analyzed: paramam sukhanti hi vuttam bhesajjam iva su vuṭṭhi viya ca dukkhassa hetu pacchedato

original: tassa ca apagamūpāyabhāvato. Niyyānalakkhaṇañhi maggasaccaṃ. Aniṭṭhabhāvato, sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayato

original: Verasamugghāto veravūpasamo mettā. Verasamugghātupāyo saṅgahavatthūni.

original: Upamāto vinicchayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: upamātaḥ vinicchaya vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: esa nayaḥ samudaya ādīsu iti atthi ca ittha samudayaḥ na ariya saccam atthi ariya saccam

original: Sesasaccadvayepi eseva nayo. Na ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyyapahātabbāsaṅkhataniyyānabhāvābhāvato.
analyzed: sesa sacca dvaye pi esā iva nayaḥ na ariya saccam pariññeyya pahātabba asaṅkhata niyyāna bhāva abhāvato

analyzed: itaram pana ariya sacca dvayanti samudaya magga sacca dvayam āha siyā dukkham saṅkhāra dukkha tāya

analyzed: tena āha aniccato ti tathattena ati tatha sa bhāvena pariññeyya bhāvena ati attho etena

original: imamatthaṃ dasseti. Ariyasaccasaddaparā hi dukkhādisaddā pariññeyyādibhāvaṃ vadanti.

original: Teneva ariyasaccasaddānapekkhaṃ dukkhasaddaṃ sandhāya maggasampayuttasāmaññaphaladhammānaṃ

original: ādipadasaṅgaho vutto, ariyasaccasaddāpekkhaṃ pana sandhāya catutthapadasaṅgaho.
analyzed: ādi pada saṅgahaḥ vuttaḥ ariya sacca sadda apekkham pana sandhāya catuttha pada saṅgaho

original: Sabbākārenāti sabbappakārena. Yathā maggasampayuttadhammādayo ekaṅgavikalā, evaṃ
analyzed: sabba ākārena ati sabba ppakārena yathā magga sampayutta dhamma ādayaḥ ekaṅga vikalāḥ evam

original: ahutvā sabbaṅgayogena dukkhatāya ceva ariyasaccatāya cāti attho. “Upādānakkhandhapañcaka”nti

original: visuṃ ariyasaccabhāvato. Samudayādīsu avasesakilesādayo pabhavaṭṭhena samudayo, na

analyzed: ariya saccam suttanta saṃvaṇṇanāḥ ayanti katvā nirodhaḥ ariya saccam na samudayaḥ itaram

original: pana ariyasaccadvayaṃ siyā samudayo attano phalassa paccayaṭṭhena, na pana yassa

analyzed: pahānāya bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati tathattena sabba ākārena pana taṇhā samudayo

analyzed: ca iva ariya saccam ca magga sampayutta dhammā sāmañña phalāni ca yassa pahānāya bhagavati

analyzed: brahmacariyam vussati tathattena nā iva samudayaḥ na ariya saccam saṅkhāra nirodho

analyzed: nirodha samāpatti ca nirodhaḥ na ariya saccam samudayaḥ ariya saccam na nirodhaḥ itaram

analyzed: pana ariya sacca dvayam siyā nirodhaḥ khaṇa nirodha sabbhāvataḥ na pana yassa sacchikiriyāya

analyzed: bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati tathattena sabba ākārena pana asaṅkhatā dhātu nirodho

original: ceva ariyasaccañca. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Ariyamaggato aññāni maggāni maggo, na ariyasaccaṃ.

analyzed: nirodhaḥ ariya saccam na maggaḥ itaram pana sacca dvayam siyā maggaḥ bhava gāmini paṭipada abhāvato

analyzed: suññatas vinicchaya vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: iti magga niddesa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Ekavidhādivinicchayakathāvaṇṇanā
568. Pavattibhāvatoti saṃsārassa pavattibhāvato. Catuāhārabhedatoti catuāhārappaccayavisesato.
analyzed: pavatti bhāvataḥ ti saṃsārassa pavatti bhāvataḥ catu āhāra bhedataḥ ti catu āhāra ppaccaya visesato

original: Etena cattāro kabaḷīkārādiāhāravisese, ajjhoharaṇīyavatthu, saḷāyatana, avijjā, abhisaṅkhārasaṅkhāte
analyzed: etena cattāro kabaḷīkāra ādi āhāra visese ajjhoharaṇīya vatthu saḷāyatana avijjā abhisaṅkhāra saṅkhāte

original: tappaccayabhūtadhammavisese ca saṅgaṇhāti, ojaṭṭhamakarūpa, vedanā, paṭisandhiviññāṇa,
analyzed: tad paccaya bhūta dhamma visese ca saṅgaṇhāti vedanā paṭisandhi viññāṇa

original: Pavattakabhāvato pavattidukkhassa. Rūpābhinandanādibhedo rūpakkhandhādiabhinandanabhedo,
analyzed: pavattaka bhāvataḥ pavatti dukkhassa rūpa abhinandana ādi bhedaḥ rūpa kkhandha ādi abhinandana bhedaḥ

original: rūpārammaṇādivasenāpīti vadanti. Rūpataṇhādīnaṃ paccekaṃ anekabhedattā cha taṇhākāyā, tesaṃ bhedato.
analyzed: rūpa ārammaṇa ādi vasena api iti vadanti rūpa taṇhā ādīnam paccekam aneka bheda ttā cha taṇhā kāyā tesam bhedato

original: Upādānehi upādīyatīti upādi, upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ. Tannissaraṇabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ,
analyzed: upādānehi upādīyati iti upādi upādāna khandha pañcakam tad nissaraṇa bhūtam nibbānam

original: anavasesatañca upādāya saupādisesanibbānadhātu, nirupādisesanibbānadhātūti dvidhā

analyzed: vuttam aññathā ekassa sataḥ nibbānassa kutas bhedaḥ ti

analyzed: samatha vipassanā bhedato ti ettha sammā diṭṭhi sammā saṅkappā vipassanā itare samathā ati

analyzed: vadanti sīlam pi hi samathassa upakāraka ttā samatha ggahaṇena gayhati iti tesam adhippāyaḥ

original: Atha vā yānadvayassa vasena laddho maggo samatho vipassanāti āgamanavasena vuttoti

original: cetaṃ atthīti “anaññathatā”ti vuttaṃ. Paccayatoti paccayabhāvato. Paccayasamūhatoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
analyzed: atthi iti anaññathatā ati vuttam paccayato ti paccaya bhāvato paccaya samūhato ti ettha api esā iva nayo

original: 573. Idappaccayā eva idappaccayatāti tā-saddena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ, na kiñci atthantaraṃ

analyzed: yathā devaḥ eva devatā ati idappaccayānam vā samūhaḥ idappaccaya tā ati samūha attham tāsaddam āha

original: yathā “janānaṃ samūho janatā”ti. Nanu ca “atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena
analyzed: yathā janānam samūhaḥ janatā ati nanu ca atthi idappaccayā jarā maraṇanti iti puṭṭhena

original: satā, ānanda, atthītissa vacanīyaṃ. Kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya, jātipaccayā

original: jarāmaraṇanti iccassa vacanīya”nti jātisaddapaccayasaddasamānādhikaraṇena kiṃ-saddena
analyzed: jarā maraṇanti iccassa vacanīyanti jāti sadda paccaya sadda samāna adhikaraṇena kiṃsaddena

original: idaṃsaddassa samānādhikaraṇatādassanato idappaccayasaddassa kammadhārayasamāso dissati,
analyzed: idam saddassa samāna adhikaraṇa tā dassanataḥ idappaccaya saddassa kammadhāraya samāsaḥ dissati

original: na hettha “imassa paccayā idappaccayā”ti jarāmaraṇassa, aññassa vā paccayato jarāmaraṇasambhavapucchā
analyzed: na ha ittha imassa paccayāḥ idappaccayā ati jarā maraṇassa aññassa vā paccayataḥ jarā maraṇa sambhava pucchā

original: sambhavati viditabhāvato, asambhavato ca, jarāmaraṇassa pana paccayapucchā sambhavati.
analyzed: sambhavati vidita bhāvataḥ asambhavataḥ ca jarā maraṇassa pana paccaya pucchā sambhavati

original: Paccaya-saddena ca samānādhikaraṇatāya idaṃ-saddassa imasmā paccayāti paccayapucchā
analyzed: paccaya saddena ca samāna adhikaraṇa tāya idam saddassa imasmā paccayā ati paccaya pucchā

original: yujjati. Sā ca samānādhikaraṇatā bāhiratthasamāsepi labbhati. Tato ca aññapadatthavacanicchābhāve
analyzed: yujjati sā ca samāna adhikaraṇa tā bāhirattha samāse pi labbhati ca añña padattha vacanicchā bhāve

original: kammadhārayasamāso labbhati.
analyzed: kammadhāraya samāsaḥ labbhati

original: Sāmivacanasamāse pana samānādhikaraṇatā natthīti na kathañci kammadhārayasamāsasambhavoti?
analyzed: sāmivacana samāse pana samāna adhikaraṇa tā natthi iti na kathañci kammadhāraya samāsa sambhavā ti

original: Nayidamevaṃ vacanicchantarabhāvato. Paṭiccasamuppādavacanicchā hesā “idappaccayatā
analyzed: na yidam evam vacaniccha antara bhāvato paṭicca samuppāda vacanicchā ha esā idappaccaya tā

original: paṭiccasamuppādo”ti ettha. “Atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ettha pana jarāmaraṇassa
analyzed: paṭiccasamuppādaḥ ti ettha atthi idappaccayā jarā maraṇanti ettha pana jarā maraṇassa

original: paccayamattaparipucchā, tasmā yathā idaṃ-saddassa paṭiccasamuppādavisesanatā, pucchitabbapaccayavisesanatā

analyzed: ca hoti tathā samāsa vikappaḥ ettha tattha ca kātabbaḥ iti na samāsa antara dassanam sāmi vacana samāsa bādhakam

original: Kasmā panetthāpi kammadhārayasamāso na icchitoti? Hetuppabhavānaṃ hetu paṭiccasamuppādoti
analyzed: kasmā pana itthā api kammadhāraya samāsaḥ na icchitaḥ iti hetu ppabhavānam hetu paṭiccasamuppādaḥ ti

analyzed: kammadhāraya samāse asambhavataḥ imassa attanaḥ paccaya anurūpassa anurūpaḥ

analyzed: paccayaḥ idappaccayaḥ ti imassa ca atthassa icchita ttā yaḥ pana ittha idaṃsaddena gahitaḥ

analyzed: tattha kammadhāraya samāsaḥ ettha pana idam saddassa tatas pariccajana kāraṇam na atthi iti

analyzed: idappaccaya tāya paṭiccasamuppāda tā anupapattī iti na ayam dosaḥ attha antara abhāvato ti vuttaḥ uva ayam attho

analyzed: vijjamānam hoti atha sattvam sam nāma yassa sataḥ bhāvaḥ tam asam nāma siyā na hi

original: na vindatī”ti ca. Attanissitāni katvā cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ pavattanaṃ uppādanaṃ āyatanaṃ.
analyzed: na vindati iti ca atta nissitāni katvā cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam pavattanam uppādanam āyatanam

original: Sammohabhāveneva anabhisamayabhūtattā aviditaṃ aññātaṃ karoti. Antavirahite javāpetīti
analyzed: sammoha bhāvena iva an abhisamaya bhūta ttā aviditam aññātam karoti anta virahite javāpeti iti

original: vaṇṇāgamavipariyāyavikāravināsadhātuatthavisesayogehi pañcavidhassa niruttilakkhaṇassa
analyzed: vaṇṇa āgama vipariyāya vikāra vināsa dhātu attha visesa yogehi pañcavidhassa nirutti lakkhaṇassa

original: vasena a-kāra vi-kāra ja-kāre gahetvā aññesaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ lopaṃ, ja-kārassa ca dutiyassāgamaṃ
analyzed: vasena akāra vikāra jakāre gahetvā aññesam vaṇṇānam lopam jakārassa ca dutiyassa āgamam

original: katvā “avijjā”ti vuttaṃ. Byañjanatthaṃ vatvā sabhāvatthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: katvā avijjā ti vuttam byañjana attham vatvā sabhāva ttham dassetum api ca itiādi vuttaṃ

original: Cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthārammaṇāni “idaṃ vatthu, idaṃ ārammaṇa”nti avijjāya ñātuṃ
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam vattha ārammaṇāni idam vatthu idam ārammaṇanti avijjāya ñātum

original: na sakkāti avijjā tappaṭicchādikā vuttā. Vatthārammaṇasabhāvachādanato eva avijjādīnaṃ
analyzed: na sakkā ati avijjā tad paṭicchādikā vuttā vattha ārammaṇa sabhā avachādanato eva avijjā ādīnam

original: paṭiccasamuppādabhāvassa, jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ paṭiccasamuppannabhāvassa ca chādanato
analyzed: paṭiccasamuppāda bhāvassa jarā maraṇa ādīnam paṭiccasamuppanna bhāvassa ca chādanataḥ

original: paṭiccasamuppādapaṭiccasamuppannacchādanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: paṭiccasamuppāda paṭicca samuppanna chādanam veditabbam

original: Apaccakkhitvāti paccakkhānaṃ akatvā apaṭikkhipitvā. Upakārakaṭṭho paccayaṭṭho yathā piṇḍapātādi sarīrassa.
analyzed: a paccakkhitvā ti paccakkhānam a katvā a paṭikkhipitvā upakāraka ṭṭhaḥ paccaya ṭṭhaḥ yathā piṇḍapāta ādi sarīrassa

original: Saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti yathā saṅkhataṃ hoti, evaṃ abhisaṅkharonti. Saṅkhārasaddaggahaṇena
analyzed: saṅkhatam abhisaṅkharonti iti yathā saṅkhatam hoti evam abhisaṅkharonti saṅkhāra sadda gahaṇena

original: āgatā saṅkhārā saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārā. Yadipi avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāpi saṅkhārasaddena
analyzed: āgatā saṅkhārā saṅkhāra saddena āgata saṅkhārā yadi api avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā api saṅkhāra saddena

original: āgatā, te pana imissā desanāya padhānāti visuṃ vuttā, tasmā “duvidhā”ti ettha saṅkhārasaddena
analyzed: āgatā te pana imissā desanāya padhānā ati visum vuttā tasmā duvidhā iti ettha saṅkhāra saddena

original: āgatasaṅkhāresu abhisaṅkharaṇakasaṅkhāraṃ vajjetvā tadaññe saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārā
analyzed: āgata saṅkhāresu abhisaṅkharaṇaka saṅkhāram vajjetvā tad aññe saṅkhāra saddena āgata saṅkhārā

original: yojetabbā. Saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārāti vā samudāyo vutto. Tadekadesā ca idha
analyzed: yojetabbā saṅkhāra saddena āgata saṅkhārā ati vā samudāyaḥ vuttaḥ tad eka desā ca idha

original: vaṇṇetabbabhāvena gahitā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, tasmā vaṇṇetabbasabbasaṅgāhakavasena
analyzed: vaṇṇetabba bhāvena gahitāḥ avijjā paccayāḥ saṅkhārāḥ tasmā vaṇṇetabba sabba saṅgāhaka vasena

original: duvidhatā vuttāti veditabbā. “Paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati vacīsaṅkhāro”tiādinā vitakkavicāraassāsapassāsasaññāvedanāvacīsaṅkhārādayo
analyzed: duvidha tā vuttā iti veditabbā paṭhamam nirujjhati vacī saṅkhāraḥ ti ādinā vitakka vicāra assāsa passāsa saññā vedanā vacī saṅkhāra ādayaḥ

original: vuttā, na avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāresu vuttā kāyasañcetanādayo.
analyzed: vuttā na avijjā paccayā saṅkhāresu vuttā kāya sañcetanā ādayaḥ

original: Saṅkhatasaṅkhārā nāma yathāsakaṃ paccayehi saṅkhatattā. Satipi paccayanibbattānaṃ
analyzed: saṅkhata saṅkhārāḥ nāma yathāsakam paccayehi saṅkhata ttā sati pi paccaya nibbattānam

original: sabbesampi saṅkhatabhāve “mametaṃ phala”nti tatthābhimukhena viya kammunā nibbattitattā
analyzed: sabbesam pi saṅkhata bhāve mama etam phalanti tattha abhimukhena viya kammunā nibbattita ttā

original: tebhūmakavipākakaṭattārūpesu sātisayo saṅkhatabhāvoti adhippāyena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kammanibbattānaṃ
analyzed: tebhūmaka vipāka kaṭattā rūpesu sa atisayaḥ saṅkhata bhāvo ti adhippāyena aṭṭhakathāyam kamma nibbattānam

original: abhisaṅkhatasaṅkhāratā vuttā. Pāḷiyaṃ pana tathā āgataṭṭhānassa abhāvato “tepi …pe…
analyzed: abhisaṅkhata saṅkhāra tā vuttā pāḷiyam pana tathā āgata ṭṭhānassa abhāvato te pi pe

original: ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchantī”ti vuttaṃ. Aniccā vata saṅkhārāti vuttā ubhuādisamuṭṭhānāpi
analyzed: ettha iva saṅgaham gacchanti iti vuttam aniccāḥ vata saṅkhārāḥ ati vuttā

original: sabbadhammā. Abhisaṅkharaṇakasaṅkhāroti vuccati attano phalassa abhisaṅkharaṇato.
analyzed: sabba dhammā abhisaṅkharaṇaka saṅkhāro ti vuccati attanaḥ phalassa abhisaṅkharaṇato

original: Kāyapayogasamuṭṭhāpanavīriyaṃ kāyikavīriyaṃ. Abhisaṅkhārassāti payogavegassa.
analyzed: kāya payoga samuṭṭhāpana vīriyam kāyika vīriyam abhisaṅkhārassa ati payoga vegassa

original: Vācaṃ saṅkharotīti vacīsaṅkhāro. Kāyena saṅkharīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāro. Cittena saṅkharīyati,
analyzed: vācam saṅkharoti iti vacī saṅkhāraḥ kāyena saṅkharīyati iti kāya saṅkhāraḥ cittena saṅkharīyati

original: cittaṃ vā saṅkharotīti cittasaṅkhāro. Saṅkhepato pana sabbepi yathārahaṃ saṅkharonti,
analyzed: cittam vā saṅkharoti iti citta saṅkhāro saṅkhepato pana sabbe pi yathāraham saṅkharonti

original: saṅkharīyantīti ca saṅkhārāti veditabbā. Vuttanti saṅkhāraṭṭhapaccayaṭṭhādimāha.
analyzed: saṅkharīyanti iti ca saṅkhārā ati veditabbā vuttam ti saṅkhāra ṭṭha paccaya ṭṭha ādim āha

original: Namatīti ekantasārammaṇatāya ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namati. Paritassatīti pipāsati, taṇhāparitāpatāya
analyzed: namati iti ekanta sārammaṇatāya ārammaṇa abhimukham namati paritassati iti pipāsati taṇhā paritāpa tāya

original: vā vicalati. Upādiyatīti daḷhaṃ ādiyati. Bhavatīti upapattibhavaṃ sandhāyāha. Bhāvayatīti
analyzed: vā vicalati upādiyati iti daḷham ādiyati bhavati iti upapatti bhavam sandhāya āha bhāvayati iti

original: kammabhavaṃ. Cuti khandhānaṃ maraṇanti “maranti etenā”ti vuttaṃ. Dukkhā vedanā uppādadukkhā,
analyzed: kamma bhavam cuti khandhānam maraṇanti maranti etena ati vuttam dukkhā vedanā uppāda dukkhā

original: ṭhitidukkhāti ca katvā “dvedhā khaṇatī”ti vuttaṃ. Āyāso parissamo visādo.
analyzed: ṭhiti dukkhā ti ca katvā dvedhā khaṇati iti vuttam āyāsaḥ parissamaḥ visādaḥ

original: Niddiṭṭhanayadassananti yathāniddiṭṭhavidhisandassanaṃ. Kevala-saddo asammissavācako
analyzed: niddiṭṭha naya dassanam ti yathā niddiṭṭha vidhi sandassanam kevala saddaḥ asammissa vācakaḥ

original: ca hoti “kevalā sālayo”tiādīsu, niravasesavācako ca “kevalā aṅgamagadhā”tiādīsu,
analyzed: ca kevalā ca kevalā aṅga magadha ati ādīsu

original: tasmā dvidhāpi atthaṃ vadati. Tattha asammissassāti sukharahitassa. Na hi ettha kiñci
analyzed: tasmā dvidhā api attham vadati tattha asammissassa ati sukha rahitassa na hi ettha kiñci

original: uppādavayarahitaṃ atthi. Sakalassāti sabbabhavādigatassa, sabbakālikassa ca.
analyzed: uppāda vaya rahitam atthi sakalassa ati sabba bhava ādi gatassa sabba kālikassa ca

original: 588. “Lakkhaṇekavidhādito”ti ettha ādi-saddo paccekaṃ parisamāpetabboti dassento
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ekavidha ādeḥ ti ettha ādi saddo paccekam parisamāpetabbaḥ ti dassento

original: āha “lakkhaṇādito”ti. Sampayutte, taṃsamaṅgipuggale vā sammohayatīti sammohanarasā.
analyzed: āha lakkhaṇa āditaḥ ti sampayutte tad samaṅgi puggale vā sammohayati iti sammohana rasā

original: Ārammaṇasabhāvassa chādanaṃ hutvā gayhatīti chādanapaccupaṭṭhānā. “Āsavasamudayā
analyzed: ārammaṇa sabhāvassa chādanam hutvā gayhati iti chādana paccupaṭṭhānā āsava samudayā

original: avijjāsamudayo”ti vacanato āsavapadaṭṭhānā. Paṭisandhijananatthaṃ āyūhanti byāpāraṃ
analyzed: avijjā samudayo ti vacanataḥ āsava padaṭṭhānā paṭisandhi janana attham āyūhanti byāpāram

original: karontīti āyūhanarasā. Rāsikaraṇaṃ vā āyūhanaṃ. Cetanāsabhāvattā cetanā hutvā gayhatīti
analyzed: karonti iti āyūhana rasāḥ rāsi karaṇam vai āyūhanam cetanā sabhāvat tā cetanā hutvā gayhati iti

original: cetanāpaccupaṭṭhānā. Nāmarūpassa purecārikabhāvena pavattatīti pubbaṅgamarasaṃ. Purimabhavena
analyzed: cetanā paccupaṭṭhānā nāma rūpassa purecārika bhāvena pavattati iti pubbaṅgama rasam purima bhavena

original: saddhiṃ ghaṭanaṃ hutvā gayhatīti paṭisandhipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Viññāṇena saha, aññamaññañca
analyzed: saddhim ghaṭanam hutvā gayhati iti paṭisandhi paccupaṭṭhānam viññāṇena saha aññam aññam ca

original: sampayujjatīti sampayogarasaṃ. Samaṃ pakārehi yogo sampayogo. Visuṃ abhāvo avinibbhogo.
analyzed: sampayujjati iti sampayoga rasam samam pakārehi yogaḥ sampayogaḥ visum abhāvaḥ avinibbhogo

original: Rūpaṃ sampayogābhāvato vikiratīti vikiraṇarasaṃ. Tato eva hi pisiyamānā taṇḍulādayo
analyzed: rūpam sampayoga abhāvataḥ vikirati iti vikiraṇa rasam eva hi taṇḍula ādayaḥ

original: vikiranti, cuṇṇībhūtā viddhaṃsanti, nāmassa kadāci kusalādibhāvopi atthīti tato visesanatthaṃ
analyzed: vikiranti cuṇṇībhūtāḥ viddhaṃsanti nāmassa kadāci kusala ādi bhāvaḥ api atthi iti tatas visesana attham

original: “abyākatapaccupaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ. “Acetano abyākato”ti ettha viya anārammaṇatā vā
analyzed: abyākata paccupaṭṭhānanti vuttam acetanaḥ abyākato ti ettha viya anārammaṇa tā vā

original: abyākatatā daṭṭhabbā. Āyatanalakkhaṇanti ghaṭṭanalakkhaṇaṃ, āyānaṃ tananalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: abyākata tā daṭṭhabbā āyatana lakkhaṇanti ghaṭṭana lakkhaṇam āyānam tanana lakkhaṇam

original: vā. Dassanassa yathāsakaṃ visayaggahaṇassa karaṇato dassanarasaṃ. “Dassanādirasa”nti
analyzed: vā dassanassa yathāsakam visaya ggahaṇassa karaṇataḥ dassana rasam dassana ādi rasanti

original: pana sammohavinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vatthudvārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ yathārahaṃ viññāṇamanoviññāṇadhātūnanti
analyzed: pana sammoha vinodaniyam vuttam vatthu dvāra bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam yathāraham viññāṇa manaḥ viññāṇa dhātūnam ti

original: adhippāyo. Vatthuggahaṇañcettha cakkhādipañcakāpekkhaṃ. Akusalavipākupekkhāya aniṭṭhabhāvato
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ vatthu ggahaṇam ca ittha cakkha ādi pañcaka apekkham akusala vipāka upekkhāya aniṭṭha bhāvato

original: dukkhena, itarāya iṭṭhabhāvato sukhena saṅgahitattā “sukhadukkhapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti
analyzed: dukkhena itarāya iṭṭha bhāvato sukhena saṅgahita ttā sukha dukkha paccupaṭṭhānā ati

original: vuttaṃ. Dukkhasamudayattā hetulakkhaṇā taṇhā. “Tatratatrābhinandinī”ti vacanato abhinandanarasā.
analyzed: vuttam dukkha samudaya ttā hetu lakkhaṇā taṇhā tatra tatra abhinandinī iti vacanataḥ abhinandana rasā

original: Cittassa, puggalassa vā rūpādīsu atittabhāvo hutvā gayhatīti atittabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: cittassa puggalassa vā rūpa ādīsu a titta bhāvaḥ hutvā gayhati iti a titta bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Amuñcanarasaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinivesavasena. Taṇhādaḷhattaṃ hutvā kāmupādānaṃ, sesāni
analyzed: amuñcana rasam taṇhā diṭṭha abhinivesa vasena taṇhā daḷha ttam hutvā kāma upādānam sesāni

original: diṭṭhi hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti taṇhādaḷhattadiṭṭhipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Kammupapattibhavavasena
analyzed: diṭṭhi hutvā upaṭṭhahanti iti taṇhā daḷha tta diṭṭhi paccupaṭṭhānam kamma upapatti bhava vasena

original: bhavassa lakkhaṇādayo yojetabbā.
analyzed: bhavassa lakkhaṇa ādayaḥ yojetabbā

original: 589. Mohādibhāvatoti ettha ādi-saddena ananubodhādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Dukkhādīsu aññāṇavasena
analyzed: moha ādi bhāvato ti ettha ādi saddena ananubodha ādīnam saṅgahaḥ dukkha ādīsu aññāṇa vasena

original: appaṭipatti, asubhādīsu subhādivipallāsavasena micchāpaṭipatti. Diṭṭhivippayuttavasena
analyzed: appaṭipatti asubha ādīsu subha ādi vipallāsa vasena micchā paṭipatti diṭṭhi vippayutta vasena

original: vā appaṭipatti, diṭṭhisampayuttavasena micchāpaṭipatti. Dvārārammaṇatoti dvārato,
analyzed: vā appaṭipatti diṭṭhi sampayutta vasena micchā paṭipatti dvāra ārammaṇato ti dvārataḥ

original: ārammaṇato ca chasu dvāresu, chasu ārammaṇesu ca pavattanato. Ayaṃ pana vibhāgo na
analyzed: ārammaṇato ca chasu dvāresu chasu ārammaṇesu ca pavattanataḥ ayam pana vibhāgaḥ na

original: avijjāya eva, aññesupi paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu arūpadhammānaṃ labbhatīti āha “sabbesupī”ti.
analyzed: avijjāya eva aññesu pi paṭiccasamuppāda aṅgesu arūpa dhammānam labbhati iti āha sabbesu pi iti

original: Vipākadhammadhammādibhāvatoti ettha ādi-saddena nevasekkhānāsekkhasaṃyojaniyādibhāve saṅgaṇhāti. Catuyonisaṃvattanatoti catuyonipariyāpannattabhāvanibbattanato.
analyzed: vipāka dhamma dhamma ādi bhāvataḥ ti ettha ādi saddena nevasekkha anāsekkha saṃyojaniya ādi bhāve saṅgaṇhāti catu yoni saṃvattanato ti catu yoni pariyāpanna tta bhāva nibbattanato

original: Lokiyavibhāgādibhāvatoti ettha ādi-saddena abyākatasappaccayasaṅkhatādibhāve saṅgaṇhāti. Sahetukāhetukāditoti ādi-saddena sasaṅkhārāsaṅkhārādibhede saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: lokiya vibhāga ādi bhāvataḥ ti ettha ādi saddena abyākata sappaccaya saṅkhata ādi bhāve saṅgaṇhāti sa hetuka ahetuka ādeḥ ti ādi saddena sa saṅkhāra asaṅkhāra ādi bhede saṅgaṇhāti

original: Kāmaṃ nāmarūpaṃ paccuppannaddhavasena vuccati, tathāpi yathā paccuppannaṃ, evaṃ atītānāgatampīti addhadvayapariyāpannassāpi nayato gahetabbattā vuttaṃ “atītādito tividha”nti.
analyzed: kāmam nāma rūpam paccuppanna ddha vasena vuccati tathā api yathā paccuppannam evam atīta anāgatam pi iti addha dvaya pariyāpannassa api nayataḥ gahetabba ttā vuttam atīta āditaḥ tividham ti

original: Sañjātisamosaraṇaṭṭhānatoti viññāṇataṃsampayuttadhammānaṃ uppattipavattidesabhāvato.
analyzed: sañjāti samosaraṇa ṭṭhānato ti viññāṇa tad sampayutta dhammānam uppatti pavatti desa bhāvato

original: “Bhūtappasādaviññāṇato”ti pāṭho yutto. “Viññāṇādito”ti pana paṭhanti. Ekasesanayena
analyzed: bhūta ppasāda viññāṇato ti pāṭhaḥ yuttaḥ viññāṇa āditaḥ ti pana paṭhanti eka sesa nayena

original: bāhirāyatanassāpi saṅgahe sati ādi-saddena tassa saṅgahitatā daṭṭhabbā. Nobhayagocaranti
analyzed: bāhira āyatanassa api saṅgahe sati ādi saddena tassa saṅgahita tā daṭṭhabbā na ubhaya gocaranti

original: manāyatanamāha. Na hi arūpadhammānaṃ desavasena āsannatā, dūratā vā atthi aviggahattā,
analyzed: mana āyatanam āha na hi arūpa dhammānam desa vasena āsanna tā dūra tā vā atthi aviggaha ttā

original: tasmā manāyatanassa gocaro manāyatanaṃ sampatto, asampatto vāti na vuccati. Phassādīnampīti
analyzed: tasmā manāyatanassa gocaraḥ manāyatanam sampattaḥ a sampattaḥ vāti na vuccati phassa ādīnam pi iti

original: ettha phasso tāva phusanasabhāvato, lokiyasāsavādibhāvato ca ekavidho. Paṭighasamphassaadhivacanasamphassabhedato,
analyzed: ettha phasso tāva phusana sa bhāvataḥ lokiya sāsava ādi bhāvataḥ ca ekavidho paṭigha samphassa adhivacana samphassa bhedato

original: sahetukādibhāvato ca duvidho. Bhavattayapariyāpannato, vedanāttayasampayogato, ahetukaduhetukatihetukato
analyzed: ca duvidhaḥ bhavat taya pariyāpannataḥ vedanāt taya sampayogataḥ ahetuka duhetuka tihetukato

original: ca tividho. Yonigativasena catubbidho, pañcavidho ca.
analyzed: ca tividhaḥ yoni gati vasena catubbidhaḥ pañcavidhaḥ ca

original: Vedanā anubhavanalakkhaṇato, lokiyasāsavādibhāvato ca ekavidhā. Pañcadvārikamanodvārikabhedato
analyzed: vedanā anubhavana lakkhaṇato lokiya sāsava ādi bhāvato ca ekavidhā pañcadvārika manodvārika bhedato

original: duvidhā. Sukhādibhedato tividhā. Yonigativasena catubbidhā, pañcavidhā ca. Chaḷārammaṇabhedato chabbidhā.
analyzed: duvidhā sukha ādi bhedataḥ tividhā yoni gati vasena catubbidhā pañcavidhā ca chaṭ ārammaṇa bhedato chabbidhā

original: Taṇhā lokassa samudayabhāvato ekavidhā. Duvidhā diṭṭhisampayuttavippayuttabhāvato.
analyzed: taṇhā lokassa samudaya bhāvataḥ ekavidhā duvidhā diṭṭhi sampayutta vippayutta bhāvato

original: Tividhā kāmabhavavibhavataṇhābhedato. Catubbidhā catumaggapaheyyato. Pañcavidhā rūpābhinandanādibhāvato.
analyzed: tividhā kāma bhava vibhava taṇhā bhedato catubbidhā catu magga paheyyato pañcavidhā rūpa abhinandana ādi bhāvato

original: Chabbidhā chataṇhākāyabhedato.
analyzed: chabbidhā chat ṇhā kāya bhedataḥ

original: Upādānaṃ ekavidhaṃ daḷhaggāhabhāvato. Duvidhaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhibhedato. Tividhaṃ bhavattayūpanissayabhāvato. Catubbidhaṃ kāmupādānādibhedato. Pañcavidhaṃ pañcagatisaṃvattanato.
analyzed: upādānam ekavidham daḷha ggāha bhāvataḥ duvidham taṇhā diṭṭhi bhedataḥ tividham bhava tayūpanissaya bhāvataḥ catubbidham kāma upādāna ādi bhedato pañcavidham pañca gati saṃvattanato

original: Bhavo ekavidho lokiyasāsavādibhāvato. Duvidho kammupapattibhedato. Tividho kāmabhavādibhedato.
analyzed: bhavo ekavidhaḥ lokiya sāsava ādi bhāvataḥ duvidho kammupapatti bhedato tividho kāma bhava ādi bhedato

original: Catubbidho caturupādānapaccayato. Pañcavidho pañcagatisaṃvattanato. Chabbidho kāmakammabhavādibhedato.
analyzed: catubbidhaḥ catur upādāna paccayato pañcavidhaḥ pañca gati saṃvattanato chabbidhaḥ kāma kamma bhava ādi bhedato

original: Sattavidho sattaviññāṇaṭṭhitisaṅgahato. Aṭṭhavidho caturupādānapaccayakammabhavādibhedato.
analyzed: sattavidhaḥ satta viññāṇa ṭṭhiti saṅgahataḥ aṭṭhavidhaḥ catur upādāna paccaya kamma bhava ādi bhedato

original: Navavidho kāmabhavādibhedato.
analyzed: navavidhaḥ kāma bhava ādi bhedataḥ

original: Jāti ekavidhā tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattibhāvato. Duvidhā rūpakkhandhasaṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahato.
analyzed: jāti ekavidhā tattha tattha bhave paṭhama abhinibbatti bhāvataḥ duvidhā rūpa kkhandha saṅkhāra kkhandha saṅgahato

original: Tividhā bhavattayapariyāpannato. Yonigativasena catubbidhā, pañcavidhā ca. Iminā
analyzed: tividhā yoni gati vasena catubbidhā pañcavidhā ca iminā

original: nayena jarāmaraṇādīnampi ekavidhādibhāvo veditabbo.
analyzed: nayena jarā maraṇa ādīnam pi ekavidha ādi bhāvaḥ veditabbo

original: 590. Sokādīnampi gahitattā aṅgabahuttappasaṅge “dvādasevā”ti aṅgavavatthānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: soka ādīnam pi gahita ttā aṅga bahu tta pasaṅge dvādasā iva āti aṅga vavatthānam veditabbam

original: Na hi sokādayo aṅgabhāvena vuttā, phalena pana kāraṇaṃ avijjaṃ mūlaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: na hi soka ādayaḥ aṅga bhāvena vuttā phalena pana kāraṇam avijjam mūlaṅgam dassetuṃ

original: te vuttā. Jarāmaraṇabbhāhatassa hi bālassa te sambhavantīti sokādīnaṃ jarāmaraṇakāraṇatā
analyzed: te vuttā jarā maraṇa bbhā hatassa hi bālassa te sambhavanti iti soka ādīnam jarā maraṇa kāraṇa tā

original: vuttā, na pana “kāyikāya dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho”ti ca sutte jarāmaraṇanimittañca
analyzed: vuttā na pana kāyikāya dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭhaḥ ti ca sutte jarā maraṇa nimittam ca

original: dukkhaṃ saṅgahitanti taṃ tannimittānaṃ jarāmaraṇabbhāhatassa sambhave sādhakabhāvena
analyzed: dukkham saṅgahitanti tam tad nimittānam jarā maraṇa abbhāhatassa sambhave sādhaka bhāvena

original: vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana jarāmaraṇeneva sokādīnaṃ ekasaṅkhepo kato, tasmā tesaṃ jātipaccayatā
analyzed: vuttam yasmā pana jarā maraṇena iva soka ādīnam eka saṅkhepo kato tasmā tesam jāti paccaya tā

original: yujjati. Jarāmaraṇapaccayabhāve hi avijjāya ekasaṅkhepo kātabbo siyā. Jātipaccayā
analyzed: yujjati jarā maraṇa paccaya bhāve hi avijjāya eka saṅkhepaḥ kātabbaḥ siyā jāti paccayā

original: pana jarāmaraṇaṃ, sokādayo ca sambhavantīti tattha jarāmaraṇaṃ ekantikaṃ aṅgabhāvena
analyzed: pana jarā maraṇam soka ādayo ca sambhavanti iti tattha jarā maraṇam ekantikam aṅga bhāvena

original: gahitaṃ. Sokādayo pana rūpabhavādīsu abhāvato anekantikā kevalaṃ pākaṭena phalena
analyzed: soka ādayaḥ pana rūpa bhava ādīsu abhāvataḥ kevalam pākaṭena phalena

original: avijjānidassanatthaṃ gahitā. Tena anāgate jātiyā sati tato parāya paṭisandhiyā hetuhetubhūtā
analyzed: gahitā tena anāgate jātiyā sati tato parāya paṭisandhiyā hetu hetu bhūtā

original: avijjā dassitāti bhavacakkassa avicchedo dassito hotīti. Suttañca sokādīnaṃ avijjā
analyzed: avijjā dassitā ati bhava cakkassa avicchedaḥ dassito hoti iti suttam ca soka ādīnam avijjā

original: kāraṇanti etasseva atthassa sādhakaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na sokādīnaṃ bālassa jarāmaraṇanimittatāmattassa.
analyzed: kāraṇam ti etassa iva atthassa sādhakam daṭṭhabbam na soka ādīnam bālassa jarā maraṇa nimitta tā mattassa

original: “Assutavā puthujjano”ti hi vacanena avijjā sokādīnaṃ kāraṇanti dassitā, na ca jarāmaraṇanimittameva dukkhaṃ dukkhanti.
analyzed: assutavā puthujjanaḥ ti hi vacanena avijjā soka ādīnam kāraṇanti dassitā na ca jarā maraṇa nimittam eva dukkham dukkhanti

original: Aparo nayo jarāmaraṇampi paccayo, aññathā dvādasaṅgāni na paripūrenti. Kassa pana
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ jarā maraṇam pi paccayaḥ aññathā dvādasaṅgāni na paripūrenti kassa pana

original: so paccayo? Sokādīnaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā “jarāmaraṇapaccayā sokādayo sambhavantī”ti
analyzed: so paccayaḥ soka ādīnam yadi evam kasmā jarā maraṇa paccayā soka ādayo sambhavanti iti

original: avatvā “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ, sokādayo ca sambhavantī”ti vuttanti? Yasmā tadaññenapi
analyzed: a vatvā jāti paccayā jarā maraṇam soka ādayo ca sambhavanti iti vuttam ti yasmā tad aññena api

original: dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa te sambhavanti, tasmā appahīnasaṃyojanassāpi tesaṃ tappaccayatā
analyzed: dukkha dhammena phuṭṭhassa te sambhavanti tasmai appahīna saṃyojanassa api tesam tad paccaya tā

original: na ekaṃsikāti jātipaccayatāva vuttā. Atha vā jarāmaraṇaggahaṇena upapattibhavo saṅgahito.
analyzed: na ekaṃsikā iti jāti paccaya tā ava vuttā atha vā jarā maraṇa ggahaṇena upapatti bhavaḥ saṅgahito

original: Upādinnakkhandhaparipāko hi āyuno saṃhāni, indriyānaṃ paripāko ca jarā, tesañca bhedo
analyzed: upādinna kkhandha paripākaḥ hi āyuno ca jarā tesam ca bhedaḥ

original: maraṇanti. Sati ca upapattibhave tattha katupacitaṃ, porāṇaṃ vā kammaṃ kammabhavo,
analyzed: sati ca upapatti bhave tattha kata upacitam porāṇam vā kammam kamma bhavaḥ

original: kammādiupaṭṭhāne cutianantaraṃ paṭisandhiṃ janetīti upapattibhavo jātiyā paccayo,
analyzed: kamma ādi upaṭṭhāne cuti anantaram paṭisandhim janeti iti upapatti bhavaḥ jātiyā paccayaḥ

analyzed: tasmā jarā maraṇam pi jātiyā paccaya tāya paṭiccasamuppādaḥ yasmā pana bhava paccayā

original: Ayaṃ tāvāti “desanābhedato”tiādinā vuttaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ sandhāyāha.
analyzed: ayam tāva iti desanā bhedataḥ ti ādinā vuttam attha saṃvaṇṇanam sandhāya āha

original: Avijjāpaccayāsaṅkhārapadakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: avijjā paccaya asaṅkhāra pada kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: ayam pana iti idāni vakkhamānam katamā ca bhikkhave avijjā dukkhe aññāṇa nti ādinā

analyzed: suttantesu catu ṭṭhānikā avijjā vuttā ati suttanta pariyāyena ati vuttam nikkhepa kaṇḍe

analyzed: kathita ttā tad attha vaṇṇanā vasena vibhāvanam kātum abhidhamma pariyāyena ati ārabhitvā

original: “Aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇa”nti ānetvā taṃ sambandhitabbaṃ. Sesaṭṭhānesūti dukkhasamudayesu,
analyzed: aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇanti ānetvā tam sambandhitabbam sesa ṭṭhānesu ti dukkha samudayesu

analyzed: pubbanta ādīsu ca ārammaṇa vasena āti ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena api idha āti imasmim dukkhe

analyzed: paṭicchādetvā ti ettha vuttam paṭicchādana ākāram dassetum yāthāvasa rasa lakkhaṇam

analyzed: paccakkhataḥ jānitum na deti

analyzed: puñña upagam hoti viññāṇan ti ādinā āgatam dutiya ttikaḥ vibhaṅga sutta vasena tattha

analyzed: kasiṇesu ca uppāditassa catuttha jhāna samādhissa ānisaṃsa bhūtā abhiññā yathā āha so

original: Na hi āruppe kāmarūpabhūmīsu viya vipāko rūpassa paccayo hoti.
analyzed: na hi āruppe kāmarūpa bhūmīsu viya vipākaḥ rūpassa paccayaḥ hoti

original: 608. Satipi janakabhāve upatthambhakattaṃ āhārānaṃ padhānakiccanti āha “rūpārūpānaṃ
analyzed: sati api janaka bhāve padhāna kiccanti āha

original: upatthambhakattenā”ti. Upatthambhakattañhi satipi janakatte arūpīnaṃ āhārānaṃ, āhārajarūpasamuṭṭhāpakarūpāhārassa
analyzed: upatthambhaka ttena ati upatthambhaka ttam hi sati pi janaka tte arūpīnam āhārānam āhāra ja rūpa samuṭṭhāpaka rūpa āhārassa

original: ca hoti. Asatipi catusamuṭṭhānikarūpūpatthambhakarūpāhārassa, asati pana upatthambhakatte
analyzed: ca hoti asati pi catu samuṭṭhānika rūpu upatthambhaka rūpa āhārassa asati pana upatthambhaka tte

analyzed: āhārānam janaka ttam natthi iti upatthambhaka ttam padhānam atha vā janayamānaḥ api āhāro

analyzed: honto āhāra paccayo na hoti iti viruddham etat ti apare na anujānanti rūpa āhāro ca ittha

analyzed: citta samuṭṭhānānam rūpānam pacchājātā kusalā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
