original: añño tesaṃ koci sabhāvo siyā, tesaṃ dhammāyatanasaṅgaho. Gandharasabhāve pana āyatanabhāve

analyzed: kabaḷīkāra āhārassa tattha abhāvaḥ viññāyati tasmā yathā pāḷiyāḥ avirodhaḥ hoti tathā

original: Mātughātādi, mahaggatamaññaṃ vā tādisaṃ garukaṃ nāma. Samāsevitaṃ abhiṇhaso kataṃ.

original: Tattha assādayamānanti pāpuṇantaṃ, paṭilabhamānanti attho.

original: Bhavantarādipaṭisandhānatoti bhavantarassa aññabhavassa ādipaṭisandhānabhāvato. Bhavantarādayo

analyzed: vā bhava yoni gati viññāṇa ṭṭhiti sattā vāsa antarāni tesam paṭisandhānato ti attho tat etam

analyzed: pavatta taṇhā visayaḥ kamma ādi

analyzed: sadda paṭighosa ādīnam sati pi paccaya paccaya uppanna bhāve santāna bandho na pākaṭaḥ ti

analyzed: tesam ekatta nānatta bhāvam an āmasitvā anāgamana atīta hetu samuppādam eva dassentaḥ ettha

original: ca paccayo hoti, aphalitaniyyātanādiphalanti attho.
analyzed: ca paccayaḥ hoti a phalita niyyātana ādi phalanti atthaḥ

original: 636. Sammohavighātatthanti bāttiṃsāya viññāṇesu yathāvuttasaṅkhārānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavattiyañca paccayabhāve vibhajja avibhāvite pavattanakasammohassa apanayanatthaṃ.
analyzed: sammoha vighāta attham ti bāttiṃsāya viññāṇesu yathāvutta saṅkhārānam paṭisandhiyam pavattiyam ca paccaya bhāve vibhajja a vibhāvite pavattanaka sammohassa apanayana tham

original: Puññābhisaṅkhāreti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Avisesenāti “tihetuko tihetukassā”tiādikaṃ

original: Abhiññācetanāya hi avipākatā heṭṭhā vibhāvitā eva. Avisesena panāti etthāpi eseva
analyzed: abhiññā cetanāya hi avipāka tā heṭṭhā vibhāvitā eva avisesena panāti ettha api esā iva

original: Pañcannanti cakkhusotaviññāṇānaṃ, sampaṭicchanamanodhātuyā, dvinnaṃ santīraṇamanoviññāṇadhātūnañcāti

original: etesaṃ pañcannaṃ. Tathevāti dvedhā eva. Kathaṃ pana iṭṭhārammaṇeyeva pavattanakāni

original: Thero hi tattha iddhiyā vassaṃ nimminitvā katipayaṃ velaṃ nirayaggiṃ vūpasametvā

original: tesaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.

original: Sveva kāmāvacaro puññābhisaṅkhāro. Avisesena pana puññābhisaṅkhāroti kāmāvacaraṃ, rūpāvacarañcāti duvidhampi puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ekajjhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: su eva kāmāvacaraḥ puñña abhisaṅkhāro avisesena pana puñña abhisaṅkhāro ti kāmāvacaram rūpāvacaram ca ati duvidham pi puñña abhisaṅkhāram ekajjham saṅgaṇhāti

original: Dvādasākusalacetanābhedoti ettha uddhaccasahagatacetanāya gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ na dissati,
analyzed: ettha uddhacca sahagata cetanāyaḥ gahaṇe kāraṇam na dissati

original: Rūpabhave catunnanti akusalavipākānaṃ cakkhusotaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇānaṃ.
analyzed: rūpa bhave akusala vipākānam cakkhu sota viññāṇa sampaṭicchana santīraṇānam

analyzed: puñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ vutta nayena iva ati nānākkhaṇika kamma paccayena ca iva upanissaya paccayena

original: Tādiseyevāti nānattakāyaekattasaññīsaṅkhāteyeva.
analyzed: tādisā iya iva ati nānatta kāya ekatta saññī saṅkhātā iya iva

original: Catunnaṃ viññāṇānanti bhavādayo apekkhitvā vuttaṃ. Catūsu antogadhānaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ

original: Viññāṇapaccayānāmarūpapadavitthārakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: viññāṇa paccaya nāma rūpa pada vitthāra kathā vaṇṇanā

original: pathavīādivasena ca vibhāgo.
analyzed: pathavī ādi vasena ca vibhāgaḥ

analyzed: duvidham pi tam

analyzed: pañcavokāra bhave ca pavattiyanti rūpa ajanaka kamma ja pañca viññāṇa ppavatti kālam

original: 640. Suttantikapariyāyatoti paṭṭhāne rūpānaṃ upanissayapaccayassa avuttattā vuttaṃ.

analyzed: vā vācāvatthumattam eva āha vācāvatthumattam eva hi attā ati upādiyanti attassa abhāvāt

original: “Dhammasaṅkhepavitthāre pana kāmupādānaṃ saṅkhepato taṇhādaḷhattaṃ, sesupādānattayaṃ
analyzed: dhamma saṅkhepa vitthāre pana kāma upādānam saṅkhepataḥ taṇhā daḷha ttam

original: diṭṭhimattameva, vitthārato panā”ti evaṃ dhammasaṅkhepavitthārasamudāyato tadavayavabhūtaṃ

original: saṅkhepaṃ, vitthārañca niddhāretīti. Dhammasaṅkhepavitthāreti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ
analyzed: saṅkhepam vitthāram ca niddhāreti iti dhamma saṅkhepa vitthārā iti niddhāraṇe bhummam

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāmesūti pañcasu kāmaguṇesu. Kāmacchandoti kāmasaṅkhāto chando, na kattukamyatāchando,
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam kāmesu iti pañcasu kāmaguṇesu kāma chando ti kāma saṅkhāto chandaḥ na kattu kamyatā chando

original: na ca dhammacchando. Kāmanavasena, rañjanavasena ca kāmoyeva rāgo kāmarāgo, evaṃ
analyzed: na ca dhammacchando kāmana vasena rañjana vasena ca rāgo kāma rāgo evam

original: sabbattha kāmatthaṃ viditvā kāmo eva nandanaṭṭhena kāmanandī, taṇhāyanaṭṭhena kāmoyeva
analyzed: sabbattha kāmattham viditvā kāmaḥ eva nandana ṭṭhena kāma nandī taṇhāyana ṭṭhena

original: kāmamucchā, gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpanaṭṭhena kāmajjhosānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Appattavisayapatthanā
analyzed: kāma mucchāḥ gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpana ṭṭhena kāma ajjhosānam veditabbam appatta visaya patthanā

original: taṇhā ārammaṇe paritassanabhāvato, sampattavisayaggahaṇaṃ upādānaṃ ārammaṇe daḷhaggāhabhāvato.

original: Appicchatāpaṭipakkhā taṇhā visayābhimukhabhāvato, santuṭṭhipaṭipakkhā upādānaṃ taṇhādaḷhattaṃ
analyzed: appiccha tā paṭipakkhā taṇhā visaya abhimukha bhāvato santuṭṭhi paṭipakkhā upādānam taṇhā daḷha ttam

analyzed: hutvā pariyesana dukkha mūlā taṇhā appatta visaya patthanā bhāvato

original: ārakkhadukkhamūlaṃ upādānaṃ sampattavisayaggahaṇabhāvato.
analyzed: ārakkha dukkha mūlam upādānam sampatta visaya ggahaṇa bhāvataḥ

original: Natthi dinnantiādīsu dinnanti dānamāha, taṃ aphalattā rūpaṃ viya dānaṃ nāma na hotīti
analyzed: natthi dinna nti ādīsu dinna nti dānam āha tam a phalattā rūpam viya dānam nāma na hoti iti

original: paṭikkhipati. Yiṭṭhaṃ vuccati mahāvijitayaññasadiso mahāyāgo. Hutanti āhunapāhunamaṅgalakiriyā.
analyzed: paṭikkhipati yiṭṭham vuccati mahā vijita yañña sadisaḥ mahā yāgaḥ hutan ti āhuna pāhuna maṅgala kiriyā

original: Tattha āmantetvā havanaṃ dānaṃ āhunaṃ, pāhunānaṃ atithīnaṃ atithikiriyā pāhunaṃ,
analyzed: tattha āmantetvā havanam dānam āhunam pāhunānam atithīnam atithi kiriyā pāhunam

original: āvāhādīsu maṅgalatthaṃ dānaṃ maṅgalakiriyā, dasa kusalakammapathā sukatakammāni nāma,
analyzed: āvāha ādīsu maṅgala attham dānam maṅgala kiriyā dasa kusala kammapathā sukata kammāni nāma

original: dasa akusalakammapathā dukkaṭakammāni nāma, phalaṃ vipākoti nissandādiphalañceva
analyzed: dasa akusala kamma pathāḥ dukkaṭa kammāni nāma phalam nissanda ādi phalam ca eva

original: nippariyāyavipāko ca natthīti yojanā. Yathā cettha, evaṃ “natthi dinna”ntiādīsupi
analyzed: nippariyāya vipāko ca natthi iti yojanā yathā ca ittha evam natthi dinnanti ādīsu pi

original: phalavipākapaṭikkhepova daṭṭhabbo. Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhito imaṃ lokaṃ “natthī”ti
analyzed: phala vipāka paṭikkhepaḥ uva daṭṭhabbo na atthi ayam loko ti para loke ṭhitaḥ imam lokam na atthi iti

original: gaṇhāti. Imaṃ hi lokaṃ avekkhitvā paraloko, parañca lokaṃ avekkhitvā ayaṃ loko hoti
analyzed: gaṇhāti imam hi lokam avekkhitvā para lokaḥ paraṃ ca lokam avekkhitvā ayam lokaḥ hoti

original: gantabbato, āgantabbato cāti paralokato idhāgamanassa abhāvā tattheva ucchijjanato
analyzed: gantabbataḥ āgantabbataḥ ca ati para lokataḥ idha āgamanassa abhāvā tattha iva ucchijjanato

original: cittena paraloke ṭhito imaṃ lokaṃ “natthī”ti gaṇhātīti attho. Na hi ayaṃ diṭṭhi paraloke
analyzed: cittena para loke ṭhitaḥ imam lokam natthi iti gaṇhāti iti atthaḥ na hi ayam diṭṭhi para loke

original: ṭhitasseva hotīti. Natthi paralokoti idhaloke ṭhito paralokaṃ “natthī”ti gaṇhāti.
analyzed: ṭhitassa iva hoti iti natthi para lokaḥ idha loke ṭhitaḥ para lokam natthi iti gaṇhāti

original: Idhāpi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ vā ettha attho – saṃsaraṇappadeso idhaloko,
analyzed: idha api vutta nayena iva atthaḥ veditabbaḥ ayam vā ettha atthaḥ saṃsaraṇa ppadesaḥ idhaloko

original: paraloko ca nāma koci natthi saṃsaraṇassa abhāvā tattha tattheva ucchijjanatoti.
analyzed: para loko ca nāma koci natthi saṃsaraṇassa abhāvā tattha tattha iva ucchijjanato ti

original: Purimabhavato pacchimabhave upapatanaṃ upapāto, so yesaṃ sīlaṃ, te opapātikā. Te
analyzed: purima bhavataḥ pacchima bhave upapatanam upapāto saḥ yesam sīlam te opapātikā te

original: pana cavanakaupapajjanakasattā natthīti dassento āha “natthi sattā opapātikā”ti.
analyzed: pana cavanaka aupapajjanaka sattā natthi iti dassento āha natthi sattā opapātikā ti

original: Natthi loke samaṇa…pe… pavedentīti anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannattā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā
analyzed: natthi loke samaṇape pavedenti iti anuloma paṭipadam paṭipannattā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā

original: dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā lokasmiṃ natthi, ye imañca lokaṃ, parañca lokaṃ attanā eva

analyzed: abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena paccakkhataḥ ñatvā pavedana samatthā sabbaññu buddhāḥ nāma natthi iti

original: dasseti. Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatītiādīsu vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
analyzed: dasseti rūpam attataḥ samanupassati iti ādīsu vattabbam heṭṭhā vuttam eva

original: Pakatiaṇuādīnaṃ sassataggāhapubbaṅgamo, sarīrassa ucchedaggāhapubbaṅgamo ca tesaṃ
analyzed: pakati aṇu ādīnam sa sata ggāha pubbaṅgamaḥ sarīrassa uccheda ggāha pubbaṅgamaḥ ca tesam

original: gāhānaṃ sāmibhūto koci sassato, ucchijjamāno vā attā atthīti attaggāho kadāci hotīti

original: “yebhuyyenā”ti vuttaṃ. Svāyaṃ attaggāho atthato khandhārammaṇo eva daṭṭhabbo. Yebhuyyena
analyzed: yebhuyyena ati vuttam svāyam attaggāhaḥ atthataḥ khandha ārammaṇaḥ eva daṭṭhabbaḥ yebhuyyena

original: paṭhamaṃ attavādupādānantiādināva sambandho. Yadipi bhavarāgajavanavīthi paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: sambandhaḥ sambandhaḥ

original: pavattati gahitapaṭisandhikassa bhavanikantiyā pavattitabbattā, so pana bhavarāgo
analyzed: pavattati gahita paṭisandhikassa bhava nikantiyā pavattitabba ttā saḥ pana bhava rāgaḥ

original: taṇhādaḷhattaṃ na hotīti maññamāno na kāmupādānassa paṭhamuppattimāha.

original: Taṇhā kāmupādānanti pana vibhāgassa akaraṇe sabbāpi taṇhā kāmupādānaṃ, karaṇepi vā kāmarāgato aññāpi taṇhā daḷhabhāvaṃ pattā kāmupādānanti tassa arahattamaggavajjhatā vuttā.
analyzed: taṇhā kāma upādānanti pana vibhāgassa akaraṇe sabbā api taṇhā kāma upādānam karaṇe pi vā kāma rāgato aññā api taṇhā daḷha bhāvam pattā kāma upādānanti tassa arahatta magga vajjha tā vuttā

original: Uppattiṭṭhānabhūtā cittuppādā visayo. Pañcupādānakkhandhā ālayo. Tattha ramatīti
analyzed: uppatti ṭṭhāna bhūtā cittuppādāḥ visayo pañca upādānakkhandhāḥ ālayo tattha ramati iti

original: ālayarāmā, pajā. Teneva sā ālayarāmatā sasantāne, parasantāne ca pākaṭā hoti. Kāmānanti
analyzed: ālaya rāmā pajā tena iva sā ālaya rāma tā sa santāne para santāne ca pākaṭā

original: vatthukāmānaṃ. “Sukhadukkhaṃ kammunā hotī”ti aggahetvā kotūhalamaṅgalādibahulo hoti.

original: Sā kotūhalamaṅgalādibahulatā. Assa kāmupādānavato. Tanti diṭṭhupādānaṃ, anattani

original: dhammamatte “attā”ti micchābhinivesassa sukhumataradhammupādānatāya sukhumatā vuttā.
analyzed: dhamma matte attā ati micchā abhinivesassa sukhumatara dhamma upādāna tāya sukhuma tā vuttā

original: Upanissayavacanena ārammaṇānantarapakatūpanissayā vuttāti anantarapaccayādīnampi saṅgaho kato hoti.

original: Upādānapaccayābhavapadavitthārakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: upādāna paccaya ābhava pada vitthāra kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 646. Atthatoti vacanatthato. Dhammatoti sabhāvadhammato. Sātthatoti sātthakato, pubbe
analyzed: atthato ti vacana tthataḥ dhammato ti sabhāva dhammato sa atthato ti sa atthakato pubbe

original: vuttassapi puna vacanassa sappayojanato. Bhedasaṅgahāti bhedato saṅgahato, vibhāgato

original: ceva vibhattassa saṅkhipanato cāti attho. Yaṃ yassa paccayoti yaṃ yaṃ upādānaṃ yassa
analyzed: ca iva vibhattassa saṅkhipanato ca ati atthaḥ yam yassa paccayaḥ ti yam yam upādānam yassa

analyzed: yassa bhavassa paccayaḥ hoti tatas ca ati attho

original: Bhavatīti bhavoti phalavohārena kammabhavo vutto. Upapattibhavanibbacanameva hi dvayassapi
analyzed: bhavati iti bhavaḥ ti phala vohārena kamma bhavaḥ vuttaḥ upapatti bhava nibbacanam eva hi dvayassa api

original: sattassa punabbhavabhāvena savisesaṃ bhavatīti bhavo. Tato eva na sabbassa bhavantarassa,
analyzed: sattassa punabbhava bhāvena sa visesam bhavati iti bhavaḥ tatas eva na sabbassa bhavantarassa

original: taṃhetuno vā bhavabhāvappasaṅgo. Duvidhenāti dvīhi ākārehi pavattitoti attho. Duvidhenāti
analyzed: tad hetunaḥ vā bhava bhāva ppasaṅgaḥ duvidhena ati dvīhi ākārehi pavattito ti atthaḥ duvidhena ati

original: vā paccattatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, duvidhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Atthīti saṃvijjati.
analyzed: vā paccatta atthe karaṇa vacanam duvidhaḥ ti vuttam hoti atthi iti saṃvijjati

original: 647. Attano paccayehi karīyatīti kammaṃ, attano phalaṃ karotīti kammanti keci, “kamma”nti
analyzed: attano paccayehi karīyati iti kammam attano phalam karoti iti kammanti keci kammanti

original: evaṃ vattabbā kammasaṅkhātā. Parittabhūmakoti kāmabhūmako. Mahābhūmakoti mahaggatabhūmako.
analyzed: evam vattabbā kamma saṅkhātā paritta bhūmakaḥ ti kāma bhūmakaḥ mahā bhūmakaḥ ti mahaggata bhūmakaḥ

original: Sabbanti anavasesaṃ. Bhavaṃ gacchati, gameti cāti bhavagāmi. Gacchatīti ca nipphādanasamatthatāvasena,
analyzed: sabbam iti anavasesam bhavam gacchati ca ati bhava gāmi gacchati iti ca nipphādana samattha tā vasena

original: adhippetaṃ. “Bhavagāmī”ti ca etena kammakkhayakaraṃ kammaṃ nivatteti. Ayañhi vaṭṭakathā,
analyzed: adhippetam bhava gāmi iti ca etena kamma khaya karam kammam nivatteti ayam hi vaṭṭa kathā

original: tañca vivaṭṭanissitanti. Apuññābhisaṅkhāroti dvādasa cetanāti uddhaccasahagatacetanāyapi
analyzed: tat ca vivaṭṭa nissitanti apuñña abhisaṅkhārā iti dvādasa cetanā ati uddhacca sahagata cetanāya api

original: gahaṇaṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ettha viya veditabbaṃ. “Bhavapaccayā jātī”ti ettha
analyzed: gahaṇam avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā ti ettha viya veditabbam bhava paccayā jātī iti ettha

original: pana “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti ettha viya sāpi apanetabbā. Mandabahuvipākatāti appamahāvipākatā.
analyzed: pana saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇanti ettha viya sā api apanetabbā manda bahu vipāka tā ati appa mahā vipāka tā

original: “Sabbampi bhavagāmikammanti iminā cetanāsampayuttā abhijjhādayo vuttā”ti etena ācayagāmitāya
analyzed: sabbam pi bhava gāmi kamman ti iminā cetanā sampayuttāḥ abhijjhā ādayaḥ vuttā ati etena ācaya gāmi tāya

original: tesaṃ kammasaṅkhātatā vuttāti kammabhavapariyāpannataṃ pariyāyena vadati, nippariyāyena
analyzed: tesam kamma saṅkhāta tā vuttā ati kamma bhava pariyāpanna tam pariyāyena vadati nippariyāyena

original: pana cetanāva kammabhavo. Vuttañhi “kammabhavo tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya
analyzed: pana cetanā ava kamma bhavaḥ vuttañhi kamma bhavaḥ tīhi khandhehi ekena āyatanena ekāya

original: dhātuyā sampayutto, ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto”ti.
analyzed: dhātuyā sampayuttaḥ ekena khandhena ekena āyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttaḥ ti

original: Upapattibhavo tīhipi tikehi vutto upādinnakkhandhova. Yathāha “upapattibhavo… kāmabhavo…
analyzed: upapatti bhavaḥ tīhi pi tikehi vuttaḥ upādinna kkhandhaḥ va yathā āha upapatti bhavaḥ kāma bhavaḥ

original: saññābhavo… pañcavokārabhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi
analyzed: saññā bhavo pañcavokāra bhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi

original: saṅgahito”tiādi. Yadi hi anupādinnakānampi gahaṇaṃ siyā, “dvādasahi āyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi
analyzed: saṅgahita uti ādi yadi hi gahaṇam siyā dvādasahi āyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi

original: dhātūhī”ti vattabbaṃ siyāti. Kāmataṇhāya kāmetabbato kāmanissayatāya bhogā viya,
analyzed: dhātūhi iti vattabbam siyā iti kāma taṇhāya kāmetabbataḥ kāma nissaya tāya bhogāḥ viya

original: kāmasahacaritatāya “kuntā pacarantī”ti viya, kāmārammaṇatāya “sukhaṃ rūpa”nti viya,

original: kāmapaccayaṭṭhānatāya “sukho saggo”ti viya kāmāti avīciparanimmitavasavattiparicchinnā
analyzed: kāma paccaya ṭṭhāna tāya sukhaḥ saggo ti viya avīci para nimmita vasa vatti paricchinnā

original: upādinnakkhandhā vuccanti. Rūpāvirāgato yaṃ nissitā, tadupacārena “mañcā ghosantī”ti
analyzed: upādinna khandhāḥ vuccanti rūpa avirāgataḥ yam nissitā tad upacārena mañcāḥ ghosanti iti

original: viya, “phandanadevatā”ti viya ca “rūpa”nti vuccanti brahmakāyikākaniṭṭhaparicchinnā upādinnakkhandhā.
analyzed: viya phandana devatā ati ca vuccanti brahmakāyikā kaniṭṭha paricchinnāḥ upādinna khandhāḥ

original: Rūpameva bhavo rūpabhavo, tathā arūpanti ākāsānañcāyatanabhavaggaparicchinnā cattāro
analyzed: rūpam eva bhavaḥ rūpa bhavaḥ tathā cattāro

original: upādinnakkhandhā vuccanti. Arūpameva bhavo arūpabhavo. Kāmo eva bhavoti kāmabhavo,
analyzed: upādinna kkhandhāḥ vuccanti arūpam eva bhavaḥ arūpa bhavaḥ kāmaḥ eva bhavaḥ ti kāma bhavaḥ

original: so pana yasmā yathāvuttenatthena “kāmo”ti vattabbo hoti, tasmā “kāmasaṅkhāto bhavo”ti
analyzed: saḥ pana yasmai yathā vuttena atthena kāmaḥ iti vattabbaḥ hoti tasmai kāma saṅkhātaḥ

original: vuttaṃ. Kāmāvacarasaññito vā bhavo “kāmasaṅkhāto bhavo”ti vutto. Tathā rūpārūpabhavoti
analyzed: vuttam kāma avacara saññitaḥ vā bhavo kāma saṅkhātaḥ bhavo ti vutto tathā rūpa arūpa bhavo ti

original: Tassa vā atthe akāraṃ katvā “saññabhavo”tipi pāṭho. Tenāha “saññāvā”tiādi. Vokiṇṇoti
analyzed: tassa vā atthe akāram katvā tena āha saññāvā atiādi vokiṇṇaḥ ti

original: etena vokārasaddassa kammasādhanatamāha. Vokirīyati pasārīyati vitthārīyatīti vokāro,

original: Bhavacakkakathāvaṇṇanā

original: assa taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa, tadassa vā bhaveyya upādānaṃ. Byasanāvahatāya ajānanato

original: gambhīrāvabhāso. Yathārahanti atthādivasena yathānurūpaṃ.

original: Jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na na hoti, hoti evāti avadhāraṇe siddhe “siyā nu kho jarāmaraṇaṃ
analyzed: jātitaḥ jarā maraṇam na na hoti hoti eva ati avadhāraṇe siddhe siyā nu kho jarā maraṇam

analyzed: vacanato tena assa na aññam jātiyā sahakārī kāraṇa bhūtam nivattitam hoti esa nayaḥ itas

analyzed: paresu pi itthanti idam pakāram iminā pakārena ati atthaḥ jāti paccaya sambhūta samudāgata ṭṭho ti

original: Esa nayo sesesupi. “Hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti etena vacanena atthassa

original: pañcavokārabhave sahavattanato avinibbhogo ca veditabbo.

original: Adhipatiyaṭṭho nāma idha indriyapaccayabhāvo. “Lokopeso dvārāpesā khettampeta”nti

original: samāse bhummavacanassa alopo daṭṭhabbo. Evañhi tena āyūhanābhisaṅkharaṇapadānaṃ samāso

original: Sambahulasuttantasaṃsandanākathāvaṇṇanā
672. Soti so vipassanākammiko yogāvacaro. Evanti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Yāthāvasarasatoti

original: Dukkhameva sambhotīti dukkhadukkhatādibhedaṃ tividhaṃ dukkhameva sambhavati, yathāpaccayaṃ

original: uppajjati, tadeva dukkhaṃ khaṇaṭṭhitipabandhaṭṭhitivasena tiṭṭhati ceva khaṇanirodhaāyukkhayanirodhādivasena
analyzed: uppajjati tat eva dukkham khaṇa ṭṭhiti pabandha ṭṭhiti vasena tiṭṭhati ca iva khaṇa nirodha āyu khaya nirodha ādi vasena

original: nirujjhati cāti attho. Idāni dukkhamevāti evakārena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “nāññatrā”tiādi

original: 674. Tassāti sattoti gahitassa attano. Vināsanti niruddhassa vināsaṃ. Avināsanti

original: 687. Paṭisandhidānādivasena vipākasantānassa nibbattakaṃ janakaṃ. Tenāha “taṃ paṭisandhiyampi
analyzed: paṭisandhi dāna ādi vasena vipāka santānassa nibbattakam janakam tena āha tam paṭisandhiyam pi

original: pavattepi rūpārūpavipākakkhandhe janetī”ti. Sukhadukkhasantānassa, nāmarūpappabandhassa
analyzed: pavatte api rūpa arūpa vipāka khandhe janeti iti sukha dukkha santānassa nāma rūpa ppabandhassa

original: vā ciratarappavattihetubhūtaṃ upatthambhakaṃ. Tenāha “sukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti,
analyzed: vā ciratara ppavatti hetu bhūtam upatthambhakam tena āha sukha dukkham upatthambheti

original: addhānaṃ pavattetī”ti. Upapīḷakaṃ sukhadukkhappabandhe pavattamāne saṇikaṃ saṇikaṃ
analyzed: addhānam pavatteti iti upapīḍakam sukha dukkha pabandhe pavattamāne saṇikam saṇikam

original: taṃ hāpeti. Tenāha “sukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti bādhati, addhānaṃ pavattituṃ na detī”ti.
analyzed: tam ha apeti tena āha sukha dukkham pīḍeti bādhati addhānam pavattitum na deti iti

original: Ghātetvāti upacchinditvā. Kammassa upacchindanaṃ nāma tassa vipākapaṭibāhanamevāti
analyzed: ghātetvā ati upacchinditvā kammassa upacchindanam nāma tassa vipāka paṭibāhanam eva ati

original: āha “tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā”ti. Tañca attano vipākuppattiyā okāsakaraṇanti vuttaṃ
analyzed: āha tassa vipākam paṭibāhitvā ti tat ca attanaḥ vipāka uppattiyā okāsa karaṇam ti vuttam

original: “attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karotī”ti. Vipaccanāya katokāsaṃ kammaṃ vipakkameva nāma
analyzed: attanaḥ vipākassa okāsam karoti iti vipaccanāya kata ukāsam kammam vipakkam eva nāma

original: hotīti āha “evaṃ pana kammena kate okāse taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma vuccatī”ti. Upapīḷakaṃ
analyzed: hoti iti āha evam pana kammena kate okāse tam vipākam uppannam nāma vuccati iti upapīḍakam

analyzed: aññassa vipākam upacchindati na sayam attanaḥ vipākam deti upaghātakam pana dubbalam

original: kammaṃ upacchinditvā attano vipākaṃ uppādetīti ayametesaṃ viseso. Bavhābādhatādipaccayūpanipātena
analyzed: kammam upacchinditvā attanaḥ vipākam uppādeti iti ayam etesam visesaḥ bavha ābādha tā ādi paccaya upanipātena

original: vipākassa vibādhakaṃ upapīḷakaṃ, tathā vipākasseva upacchedakaṃ upaghātakaṃ. Kammaṃ
analyzed: vipākassa vibādhakam upapīḷakam tathā vipākassa iva upacchedakam upaghātakam kammaṃ

original: upaghātetvā attano vipākassa okāsakaraṇena vipaccane sati janakameva siyā, janakādibhāvo

analyzed: nāma vipākam pati icchitabbaḥ na kammam pati iti vipākassa iva upaghātaka tā yuttā viya

original: dissati, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
analyzed: dissati vīmaṃsitabbam

original: Kammantaranti kammaviseso kammānaṃ balābalabhedo. Vipākantaranti vipākaviseso, tassa
analyzed: kammantaranti kamma viseso kammānam bala abala bhedaḥ vipākantaranti vipāka viseso tassa

original: hīnapaṇītatādibhedo. Aparo nayo – yasmiṃ kamme kate paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavatte ca vipākakaṭattārūpānaṃ

original: uppatti hoti, taṃ janakaṃ. Yasmiṃ pana kate aññena janitassa iṭṭhassa vā aniṭṭhassa
analyzed: uppatti hoti tam janakam yasmin pana kate aññena janitassa iṭṭhassa vā aniṭṭhassa

original: vā phalassa vibādhakavicchedakapaccayānuppattiyā, upabrūhanapaccayuppattiyā ca janakānubhāvānurūpaṃ
analyzed: vā phalassa vibādhaka vicchedaka paccaya anuppattiyā upabrūhana paccaya uppattiyā ca janaka anubhāva anurūpam

original: pariposaciratarappabandhā honti, taṃ upatthambhakaṃ. Janakena nibbattitaṃ kusalaphalaṃ
analyzed: pariposa ciratara ppabandhāḥ honti tam upatthambhakam janakena nibbattitam kusala phalam

original: vā akusalaphalaṃ vā yena paccanīkabhūtena rogadhātusamatādinimittatāya bādhīyati,
analyzed: vā akusala phalam vā yena paccanīka bhūtena roga dhātu sama tā ādi nimitta tāya bādhīyati

original: taṃ upapīḷakaṃ. Yena pana kammunā janakasāmatthiyavasena ciratarappabandhārahampi
analyzed: tam upapīḷakam yena pana kammunā janaka sāmatthiya vasena ciratara ppabandha araham pi

original: samānaṃ phalaṃ vicchedakapaccayuppattiyā upahaññati vicchijjati, taṃ upaghātakaṃ.
analyzed: samānam phalam vicchedaka paccaya uppattiyāḥ upahaññati vicchijjati tam upaghātakam

original: Tattha keci dutiyassa kusalabhāvaṃ itthannāmagatassa appābādhadīghāyukatāsaṃvattanavasena,
analyzed: tattha keci dutiyassa kusala bhāvam itthannāma gatassa appa ābādha dīgha āyuka tā saṃvattana vasena

original: pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ akusalabhāvaṃ bavhābādhaappāyukatāsaṃvattanavasena vaṇṇenti.
analyzed: pacchimānam dvinnam akusala bhāvam bavha ābādha appāyuka tā saṃvattana vasena vaṇṇenti

original: Devadattādīnaṃ, pana nāgādīnaṃ, ito anupadinnena yāpanakapetānañca narakādīsu akusalavipākupatthambhanupapīḷanupaghātakāni
analyzed: devadatta ādīnam pana nāga ādīnam itas anupadinnena naraka ādīsu akusala vipāka upatthambhan upapīḍan upaghātakāni

analyzed: na na santi iti catunnam pi akusala akusala bhāvaḥ na virujjhati buddha āveṇika tāya asādhāraṇassa iva

original: ñāṇassa gocarabhāvato kammantarādi “asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehī”ti vuttaṃ. Ekadesato jānitabbaṃ
analyzed: ñāṇassa gocara bhāvato kamma antara ādi asādhāraṇam sāvakehi iti vuttam ekadesataḥ jānitabbam

original: anavasesato jānituṃ na sakkā avisayattā. Sabbena sabbaṃ ajānane paccayapariggaho na paripūratīti.
analyzed: anavasesataḥ jānitum na sakkā a visaya ttā sabbena sabbam a jānane paccaya pariggahaḥ na paripūrati iti

original: 688. Yathāvuttaṃ kammaṃ vattamānavipākappabandhanimittameva adhippetanti kammekadesatāya
analyzed: yathā vuttam kammam vattamāna vipāka ppabandha nimittam eva adhippetanti kamma ekadesa tāya

analyzed: dvādasavidham kammam kamma vaṭṭe pakkhipitvā iti vuttam kilesa vaṭṭam pi kamma sahāya tāya

original: kammavaṭṭapakkhikameva katvā āha “kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasenā”ti. Yādisato paccayato

original: atītānāgate nayaṃ neti, taṃ dassento “ida”ntiādimāha. Tattha anāgatepi kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasenevāti

original: ettha vuttaṃ eva-saddaṃ “etarahi atītepī”ti etthāpi ānetvā vattabbaṃ addhattayepi
analyzed: ettha vuttam eva saddam etarahi atīte pi iti ettha api ānetvā vattabbam addhattaye pi

original: kiriyākiriyaphalamattatādassanaparattā codanāya. Iti kammañcevātiādi vuttassevatthassa
analyzed: kiriyā akiriya phala matta tā dassana para ttā codanāya iti kamman ca iva atiādi

original: nigamanavasena vuttaṃ. Aparāparaṃ vaṭṭanaṭṭhena vaṭṭaṃ. Tathā pavattanaṃ pavattaṃ.
analyzed: nigamana vasena vuttam aparāparam vaṭṭana ṭṭhena vaṭṭam tathā pavattanam pavattam

original: Hetuphalabhāvena sambandhatīti santati, pabandho. Karaṇaṭṭhena, paccayehi karīyatīti vā kiriyā.
analyzed: hetu phala bhāvena sambandhati iti santati pabandho karaṇa ṭṭhena paccayehi karīyati iti vā kiriyā

original: Kammāti kammato. Sambhavati etasmāti sambhavo, kammaṃ sambhavo etassāti kammasambhavo, vipāko.
analyzed: kamma ati kammataḥ sambhavati etasmā ati sambhavaḥ kammam sambhavaḥ etassa ati kamma sambhavaḥ vipāko

original: Kāraṇasāmaggiyaṃ dānādīhi sādhitakiriyāya vattamānāya kāraṇamatte kattuvohāroti āha

analyzed: na iva kāraṇataḥ uddham kārakam passati iti karoti iti hi kārakam vipāka paṭisaṃvedakam

analyzed: na passati iti sambandho kāmam bālā api kārako paṭisaṃvedako ti vadantā atthataḥ paññattimattam eva

analyzed: vadanti te pana viparīta abhinivesa vasena api vadanti iti tam appamāṇam ti āha samaññā mattena

original: paṇḍitā voharantī”ti.
analyzed: paṇḍitāḥ voharanti iti

original: 689. Evetanti evaṃvidhaṃ etaṃ dassanaṃ, sammadassanaṃ, aviparītadassananti attho.
analyzed: eva itanti evaṃvidham etam dassanam samma dassanam aviparīta dassanam ti attho

original: Bījarukkhādikānaṃvāti yathā bījato rukkho, rukkhato puna bījanti anādikālikattā bījarukkhasantānassa
analyzed: bīja rukkha ādikānam vā ti yathā bījataḥ rukkhaḥ rukkhataḥ puna bījanti anādikālika ttā bīja rukkha santānassa

original: pubbakoṭi natthi, evaṃ kammapaccayā vipāko, vipākapaccayā kammanti anādikālikattā

analyzed: kamma vipāka santānassa pubba koṭi na paññāyati ādi saddena kukkuṭiyāḥ aṇḍam aṇḍataḥ

analyzed: kukkuṭī evamādim saṅgaṇhāti anāgate pi saṃsāra iti yathā

original: atīte, evaṃ anāgatepi addhāne “khandhānañca paṭipāṭī”tiādinā vutte saṃsāre sati kammavipākānaṃ
analyzed: atīte evam anāgate pi addhāne khandhānam ca paṭipāṭi iti ādinā vutte saṃsāre sati kamma vipākānam

original: appavattaṃ na dissati, kammavipākānaṃ appavatti na dissati, pavattati evāti attho.
analyzed: appavattam na dissati kamma vipākānam appavatti na dissati pavattati eva ati attho

original: Etamatthanti “kammassa kārako natthī”tiādinā vuttamatthaṃ. Asayaṃvasīti na sayaṃvasino,
analyzed: etam attham ti kammassa kārakaḥ natthi itiādinā vuttam attham a sayaṃvasī iti na sayaṃvasinaḥ

original: micchābhinivesaparavasāti attho. Aññamaññavirodhitāti itarītaravirodhitā, diṭṭhiyo,
analyzed: micchā abhinivesa para vasā ti atthaḥ aññamañña virodhi tā ati itarītara virodhi tā diṭṭhiyaḥ

original: diṭṭhiyā vā aññamaññena virodhitā viruddhā.
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā vā aññamaññena virodhitā viruddhā

original: Gambhīrañāṇagocaratāya gambhīraṃ. Tathā nipuṇaṃ. Sattasuññatāya, aññamaññasabhāvasuññatāya
analyzed: gambhīra ñāṇa gocara tāya gambhīram tathā nipuṇam satta suñña tāya aññamañña sabhāva suñña tāya

analyzed: ca suññam paccayanti nāma rūpassa paccayam tad paccaya paṭivedhena iva ca sabbam paṭividdham

original: hotīti. Kammaṃ natthi vipākamhītiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
analyzed: hoti iti kammam na atthi vipākamhi itiādīsu yam vattabbam tat heṭṭhā vuttam eva

original: Paccayasuññaṃ phalanti yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā na sūriye”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tesanti sūriyādīnaṃ. Soti aggi. Sambhārehīti ātapādīhi kāraṇehi.
analyzed: paccaya suññam phalanti yathāvuttam attham upamāya vibhāvetum yathā na sūriya iti ādi vuttam tesan ti sūriya ādīnam saḥ ti aggi sambhārehi iti ātapa ādīhi kāraṇehi

original: Yadi ca hetu ca phalañca aññamaññarahitaṃ, kathaṃ hetuto phalaṃ nibbattatīti āha
analyzed: yadi ca hetu ca phalam ca aññamañña rahitam katham hetutaḥ phalam nibbattati iti āha

original: “kammañca kho upādāyā”ti. Na kevalaṃ kammaphalameva suññaṃ katturahitaṃ, sabbampi
analyzed: kammam ca kho upādāya ati na kevalam kamma phalam eva suññam kattu rahitam sabbam pi

original: dhammajātaṃ kārakarahitanti dassetuṃ “na hettha devo”ti gāthā vuttā. Hetusambhārapaccayāti
analyzed: dhamma jātam kāraka rahitanti dassetum na ha ittha devaḥ ti gāthā vuttā hetu sambhāra paccayā ti

original: hetusamūhanimittaṃ, hetupaccayanimittaṃ vā.
analyzed: hetu samūha nimittam hetu paccaya nimittam vā

original: 690. Cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā hontīti kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena paccayapariggahassa
analyzed: cuti paṭisandhi vasena viditāḥ honti iti kamma vaṭṭa vipāka vaṭṭa vasena paccaya pariggahassa

original: katattā cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā hontīti vadanti. Vuttanayena pana sappaccayanāmarūpassa
analyzed: kata ttā cuti paṭisandhi vasena viditāḥ honti iti vadanti vutta nayena pana sa paccaya nāma rūpassa

original: dassanena tīsu addhāsu pahīnavicikicchassa addhattayapariyāpannā dhammā atītapaccuppannānāgatabhavesu
analyzed: dassanena tīsu addhāsu pahīna vicikicchassa addha ttaya pariyāpannāḥ dhammāḥ atīta paccuppanna anāgata bhavesu

original: ca cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā honti, na anupadadhammavasena tathāpariggahassa akatattā.
analyzed: ca cuti paṭisandhi vasena viditāḥ honti na anupada dhamma vasena tathā pariggahassa a kata ttā

original: Sāssa hoti ñātapariññāti yāya nāmarūpapariggahaṃ, tassa ca paccayapariggahaṃ karoti,
analyzed: sā assa hoti ñāta pariññāti yāya nāma rūpa pariggaham tassa ca paccaya pariggaham karoti

original: sā assa yogino “idaṃ nāmaṃ, ettakaṃ nāma”ntiādinā, “tassa ayaṃ paccayo, ettako paccayo”tiādinā

original: ca paricchedavasena ñātavatī paññāti katvā ñātapariññā.
analyzed: ca pariccheda vasena ñātavatī paññā ati katvā ñāta pariññā

original: Idāni yena kāraṇena addhattayapariyāpannā dhammā cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā honti,
analyzed: idāni yena kāraṇena addha ttaya pariyāpannāḥ dhammā cuti paṭisandhi vasena viditāḥ honti

original: taṃ dassetuṃ “so evaṃ pajānātī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena dhammānaṃ bhavantarasaṅkamo nāma
analyzed: tam dassetum saḥ evam pajānāti itiādi vuttam tena dhammānam bhavantara saṅkamaḥ nāma

original: na kadācipi atthi, tattha tattheva nirujjhanatoti dasseti. Sajjhāya mantodakapāna
analyzed: na kadācipi atthi tattha tattha iva nirujjhanato ti dasseti sajjhāya manta udaka pāna

original: mukhamaṇḍana padīpasīkhūpamāhi tameva dhammānaṃ saṅkamābhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “apica kho”tiādimāha.
analyzed: tam eva dhammānam saṅkama abhāvam vibhāvetum apica kho ti ādim āha

original: Manodhātuanantaranti kiriyamanodhātuyā anantaraṃ labbhamānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Na ceva
analyzed: manaḥ dhātu anantaram ti kiriya manaḥ dhātuyāḥ anantaram labbhamānam cakkhu viññāṇam na ca eva

original: āgatanti kiriyamanodhātuto na ceva āgataṃ kiriyamanodhātuyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa abhāvato.
analyzed: āgatanti kiriya manaḥ dhātutaḥ na ca iva āgatam kiriya manaḥ dhātuyam cakkhu viññāṇassa abhāvato

original: Nāpi na nibbattaṃ anantaranti kiriyamanodhātuto anāgacchantampi paccayasāmaggilābhena
analyzed: na api na nibbattam anantaranti kiriya manaḥ dhātutaḥ an āgacchantam pi paccaya sāmaggi lābhena

original: tato anantaraṃ nāpi na nibbattaṃ, nibbattameva hoti. Yathāyaṃ pavattiyaṃ cittappavatti,
analyzed: tatas anantaram na api na nibbattam nibbattam eva hoti yathāyam pavattiyam citta ppavatti

original: tatheva paṭisandhimhi vattate cittasantati, cuticittato anāgacchantampi paṭisandhicittaṃ
analyzed: tathā iva paṭisandhimhi vattate citta santati cuti cittataḥ an āgacchantam pi paṭisandhi cittam

original: tato anantaraṃ nāpi na nibbattati, paccayasāmaggivasena nibbattatevāti attho. Santatigahaṇena
analyzed: tatas anantaram nā api na nibbattati paccaya sāmaggi vasena nibbatta tā iva ati attho santati gahaṇena

original: cettha kutoci āgamābhāvameva vibhāveti. Hetuphalabhāvena hi sambandhatāti dhammappavatti
analyzed: ca ittha kutoci āgama abhāvam eva vibhāveti hetu phala bhāvena hi sambandha tā ati dhamma ppavatti

original: santatīti. Tenāha “purimaṃ bhijjate citta”ntiādi. Purimanti cuticittaṃ. Bhijjateti
analyzed: santati iti tena āha purimam bhijjate citta ntiādi purimanti cuti cittam bhijjata iti

original: nirujjhati. Pacchimanti paṭisandhicittaṃ. Tatoti cuticittato anantarameva jāyati.
analyzed: nirujjhati pacchimanti paṭisandhi cittam tato ti cuti cittataḥ anantaram eva jāyati

original: ca udayabbayañāṇe maggāmaggavavatthānaṃ hotīti āha “tīraṇapariññāya vattamānāyā”ti.
analyzed: ca udaya bbaya ñāṇe magga amagga vavatthānam hoti iti āha tīraṇa pariññāya vattamānāya ati

original: Kalāpasammasane tāva yogo kātabboti etthāpi tasseva paṭhamārambhe kāraṇaṃ vuttanayeneva
analyzed: kalāpa sammasane tāva yogo kātabbo ti ettha api tassa iva paṭhama ārambhe kāraṇam vutta nayena iva

original: veditabbaṃ. Yasmā kalāpasammasanaṃ nāma ekavisuddhiyampi na antogadhaṃ, ekacce ca
analyzed: veditabbam yasmā kalāpa sammasanam nāma na antogadham ekacce ca

original: taṃ anāmasitvāva vipassanācāraṃ vaṇṇenti. Evaṃ santepi taṃ suttantesu ekadesena,
analyzed: tam a āmasitvā ava vipassanā ācāram vaṇṇenti evam sante pi tam suttantesu ekadesena

original: anavasesato ca dassitaṃ. Paṭisambhidāyaṃ ādikammikānaṃ manasikārasukaratāya vipassanāya
analyzed: anavasesato ca dassitam paṭisambhidā idam ādikammikānam manasikāra sukara tāya vipassanāya

original: ādibhāvena ṭhapitaṃ. Vipassantassa ca obhāsādīsu uppannesu maggāmaggañāṇasambhavo,
analyzed: ādi bhāvena ṭhapitam vipassantassa ca obhāsa ādīsu uppannesu magga amagga ñāṇa sambhavo

original: tasmā “taṃ sampādetukāmenā”tiādinā ayaṃ vicāro katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: tasmā tam sampādetu kāmena ati ādinā ayam vicāro kato ti daṭṭhabbam

original: 693. Tatrāti tasmiṃ tīraṇapariññāya ñātapariññānantarabhāve, tāsu vā pariññāsu. Vinicchayoti
analyzed: tatra ati tasmin tīraṇa pariññāya ñāta pariññā anantara bhāve tāsu vā pariññāsu

original: sarūpato, kiccato, bhūmito ca sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Lokuttarāpi purimasmiṃ saccadvaye maggasampayuttā
analyzed: sarūpataḥ kiccataḥ bhūmito ca sanniṭṭhānam lokuttarā api purimasmim sacca dvaye magga sampayuttā

original: tividhāpi pariññā kiccavasena labbhatīti “lokiyapariññā”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. Sabhāvadhammānaṃ
analyzed: tividhā api pariññā kicca vasena labbhati iti lokiya pariññā iti visesetvā vuttam sabhāva dhammānam

original: lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇato ñeyyaabhimukhā paññā abhiññāpaññā. Ñātaṭṭheti ñātabhāvanimittaṃ.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa sat lakkhaṇataḥ ñeyya abhimukhā paññā abhiññā paññā ñāta ṭṭhā iti ñāta bhāva nimittam

original: Abhiññeyyassa jānanahetu “ñāṇa”nti vuccati. Pariññāpaññāti aniccādilakkhaṇāni paricchijja
analyzed: abhiññeyyassa jānana hetu ñāṇanti vuccati pariññā paññā ti anicca ādi lakkhaṇāni paricchijja

original: jānanapaññā. Tīraṇaṭṭheti sammasanabhāvahetu. Pahānapaññāti pahātabbassa pajahanapaññā.
analyzed: jānana paññā tīraṇa ṭṭhā iti sammasana bhāva hetu pahāna paññā ati pahātabbassa pajahana paññā

original: Vedayitādilakkhaṇavidhuratāya ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ paccattalakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Tesaṃyeva

analyzed: tīsu pi khaṇesu sallakkhitabbāni paṭiniyata rūpatāya hutvā gayhanti

original: na evamaniccatādilakkhaṇāni. Tāni pana bhaṅgudayabbayapīḷāvasavattanākāramukhena

original: gahetabbato samāropitarūpāni viya gayhantīti vuttaṃ “sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā”ti.
analyzed: gahetabbataḥ samāropita rūpāni viya gayhanti iti vuttam sāmañña lakkhaṇam āropetvā ati

original: Lokiyapariññānaṃyeva adhippetattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāva “pahānapariññā”ti vuttā.
analyzed: lokiya pariññānaṃ yeva adhippeta ttā lakkhaṇa ārammaṇika vipassanā ava pahāna pariññā ti vuttā

original: Saṅkhārapaṭicchedatoti nāmarūpavavatthānato, yā “diṭṭhivisuddhī”ti vuttā. Keci pana
analyzed: saṅkhāra paṭicchedato ti nāma rūpa vavatthānato yā diṭṭhi visuddhī iti vuttā keci pana

original: “khandhādīnaṃ vipassanāya bhūmibhāvato sabbopi khandhādivicāro saṅkhāraparicchedo”ti
analyzed: khandha ādīnam vipassanāya bhūmi bhāvato sabbaḥ api khandha ādi vicāraḥ saṅkhāra paricchedaḥ ti

original: vadanti. “Paccattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva ādhipacca”nti iminā nāmarūpapaccayapariggahapaññānaṃ
analyzed: vadanti paccatta lakkhaṇa paṭivedhassa iva iminā nāma rūpa paccaya pariggaha paññānam

original: tīraṇapahānāsamatthataṃ dasseti. Tāsampi pana “namanalakkhaṇaṃ nāmaṃ, ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: tīraṇa pahāna asamattha tam dasseti tāsam pi pana namana lakkhaṇam nāmam ruppana lakkhaṇam

original: rūpa”nti arūparūpānaṃ sādhāraṇākārasallakkhaṇavasena pavattiyā ekenākārena tīraṇapariyāyo,
analyzed: arūpa rūpānam sādhāraṇa ākāra sat lakkhaṇa vasena pavattiyā ekena ākārena tīraṇa pariyāyo

original: diṭṭhikaṅkhāvikkhambhanena pahānapariyāyo labbhatīti siyā tīraṇapahānesupi ādhipaccanti
analyzed: diṭṭhi kaṅkhā vikkhambhanena pahāna pariyāyaḥ labbhati iti siyā tīraṇa pahānesu pi

original: vadanti. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena pana yathā diṭṭhivisuddhiyāva saṅkhāraparicchedatā, evaṃ
analyzed: vadanti ukkaṭṭha niddesena pana yathā saṅkhāra pariccheda tā evam

original: lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya eva tīraṇapahānakiccatā veditabbā. Evaṃ hi tissopi pariññā
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ārammaṇika vipassanāyaḥ eva tīraṇa pahāna kicca tā veditabbā evam hi tissā api pariññā

original: vavatthitā honti, aññathā saṅkāro siyā. Tīraṇapariññāya bhūmi tattha paññāya aniccatādilakkhaṇasantīraṇato.
analyzed: vavatthitāḥ honti aññathā saṅkāro siyā tīraṇa pariññāya bhūmi tattha paññāya anicca tā ādi lakkhaṇa santīraṇato

original: Tenāha “etasmiṃ…pe… ādhipacca”nti. Kāmaṃ udayabbayañāṇampi kañci micchābhinivesaṃ
analyzed: tena āha kāmam udaya bbaya ñāṇam pi kañci micchā abhinivesam

original: pajahati, tassa pana athāmagatattā na sātisayaṃ pahānanti vuttaṃ “bhaṅgānupassanaṃ
analyzed: pajahati tassa pana atha āma gata ttā na sa atisayam pahānam ti vuttam bhaṅga anupassanam

original: ādiṃ katvā upari pahānapariññāya bhūmī”ti. Aniccato anupassantoti aniccākārato saṅkhāre

analyzed: anupassantaḥ sammasantaḥ nicca saññanti te niccā sassatā ati pavattam micchāsaññam

original: Saññāsīsena diṭṭhicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Eseva nayo ito paresupi. Nibbindantoti

original: aniccānupassanādisambhūtāya nibbidānupassanāya saṅkhāre nibbijjanavasena passanto.
analyzed: anicca anupassana ādi sambhūtāya nibbida anupassanāya saṅkhāre nibbijjana vasena passanto

original: Nandinti sappītikataṇhaṃ. Virajjantoti virāgānupassanāya virajjanavasena yathā saṅkhāresu
analyzed: nandin ti sappītika taṇham virajjantaḥ iti virāga anupassanāya virajjana vasena yathā saṅkhāresu

original: rāgo nuppajjati, evaṃ anupassanto. Tathābhūto hi rāgaṃ pajahatīti vuccati. Nirodhentoti
analyzed: rāgaḥ nuppajjati evam anupassanto tathābhūtaḥ hi rāgam pajahati iti vuccati nirodhento ti

original: evaṃ anupassanto. Tathābhūto hi saṅkhārānaṃ samudayaṃ pajahati nāma anuppattidhammatāpādanato.
analyzed: evam anupassantaḥ tathābhūtaḥ hi saṅkhārānam samudayam pajahati nāma an uppatti dhamma tā āpādanato

original: Paṭinissajjantoti paṭinissaggānupassanāya yathā saṅkhārā na puna ādiyanti, evaṃ vossajjanto.
analyzed: paṭinissajjantaḥ ti paṭinissagga anupassanāya yathā saṅkhārāḥ na puna ādiyanti evam vossajjantaḥ

original: Tenāha “ādānaṃ pajahatī”ti, niccādivasena vā gahaṇaṃ vissajjetīti attho. Sādhitattāti
analyzed: tena āha ādānam pajahati iti nicca ādi vasena vā gahaṇam vissajjeti iti attho sādhita ttā ti

analyzed: paccāharantaḥ tena vutta nti ādim āha tam vutta ttham eva

original: 694. Tatrāti tasmiṃ kalāpasammasane vibhāvetabbe, tassa vā kalāpasammasanassa ādibhāve.
analyzed: tatra ati tasmim kalāpa sammasane vibhāvetabbe tassa vā kalāpa sammasanassa ādi bhāve

original: haraṇe ca uddharaṇe viya sallahukasabhāvarūpappavattīti tāsaṃyeva dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ
analyzed: haraṇe ca uddharaṇe viya sat lahuka sabhāva rūpa ppavattī iti tāsam yā iva dvinnam dhātūnam

original: adhimattatā icchitabbāti āha “tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesū”ti. Yathā uddharaṇādīsu
analyzed: adhimatta tā icchitabbā iti āha tathā atiharaṇa vītiharaṇesu iti yathā uddharaṇa ādīsu

original: sallahukasabhāvattā pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ kiccaṃ adhikaṃ hoti, itarāsaṃ hīnaṃ,
analyzed: pacchimānam dvinnam dhātūnam kiccam adhikam hoti itarāsam hīnam

original: evaṃ vossajjanādīsu tīsu garusabhāvattā purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kiccaṃ adhikaṃ hoti, itarāsaṃ
analyzed: evam vossajjana ādīsu tīsu garu sabhāvattā purimānam dvinnam kiccam adhikam hoti itarāsam

original: hīnanti dassento āha “vossajjane”tiādi.
analyzed: hīna iti dassentaḥ āha vossajjana itiādi

original: Tadupādāyarūpānīti tā dhātuyo nissāya pavattaupādārūpāni. Etthevāti uddharaṇeyeva.
analyzed: tad upādāya rūpāni iti tāḥ dhātuyaḥ nissāya etthā iva ati uddharaṇeya iva

original: Tenāha “atiharaṇaṃ appatvā”ti. Itīti evaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ uddharaṇādikoṭṭhāse.
analyzed: tena āha atiharaṇam ap patvā iti iti iti evam tattha tattha ati tasmin tasmin uddharaṇa ādi koṭṭhāse

original: Pabbaṃ pabbantiādi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ koṭṭhāsantarasaṅkarābhāvadassanaṃ. Taṭataṭāyantāti
analyzed: pabbam pabbanti ādi tesam dhammānam koṭṭhāsa antara saṅkara abhāva dassanam taṭataṭāyantā ti

original: taṭataṭāyanti viya, tena nesaṃ pavattikkhaṇassa ittarataṃ dasseti.
analyzed: taṭataṭāyanti viya tena nesam pavatti kkhaṇassa ittaratam dasseti

original: 711. Assāti sammasanassa. Dārutiṇukkādīsūti dāruukkātiṇukkādīsu. “Kiṃ andhabāla ekaghanaṃ
analyzed: assa ati sammasanassa dāru tiṇukka ādīsu iti dāru ukkā tiṇukka ādīsu kim andha bāle eka ghanam

original: satataṃ sabbadābhāviṃ ekanti maññasī”ti adhippāyenāha “kimettha manāpa”nti. Idampīti
analyzed: satatam sabbadābhāvim ekanti maññasi iti adhippāyena āha kim ettha manāpanti idam api iti

original: yadidaṃ telavaṭṭikkhayena padīpassa apaññāyanaṃ vuttaṃ, idampi. Aṅgulaṅgulantareti
analyzed: yat idam tela vaṭṭi khayena padīpassa a paññāyanam vuttam idam pi aṅgula aṅgula antareti

original: aṅguliyā mitaṃ aṅgulanti aṅgulappamāṇe padeseti attho. Tantuno avayavalesabhūtaṃ
analyzed: aṅguliyā mitam aṅgulanti aṅgula ppamāṇe padese ti tantuno avayava lesa bhūtam

original: paramasukhumabhāvappattaṃ aṃsuṃ sandhāyāha “aṃsuṃ pana muñcitvā”ti.
analyzed: parama sukhuma bhāva ppattam aṃsum sandhāya āha aṃsum pana muñcitvā iti

original: Tatthātiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Tattha kāmaṃ upameyye viya upamāyaṃ pākaṭo kālabhedo
analyzed: tattha atiādi upamā saṃsandanam tattha kāmam upameyye viya upamāyam pākaṭaḥ kāla bhedaḥ

original: natthi, ekakoṭṭhāsagataṃ pana koṭṭhāsantaraṃ na pāpuṇātīti ettāvatā upamābhāvo veditabbo.
analyzed: natthi eka koṭṭhāsa gatam pana koṭṭhāsa antaram na pāpuṇāti iti ettāvatā upamā bhāvaḥ veditabbo

original: Upamāyampi vā tāva yāvāti kālassa bhedamattā labbhatevāti tassā gahaṇe kālabhedavasenāpi upamā yojetabbā.
analyzed: vā tāva yāvā ati kālassa bheda mattā labbhateva ati tassāḥ gahaṇe kāla bheda vasena api upamā yojetabbā

original: 712. Pubbe ādānanikkhepādivasena catusantatirūpaṃ saṅgharitvā dassitaṃ, idāni āhārasamuṭṭhānādivasena
analyzed: pubbe ādāna nikkhepa ādi vasena catu santati rūpam saṅgharitvā dassitam idāni āhāra samuṭṭhāna ādi vasena

original: bhinditvā dassento “tadeva rūpaṃ visaṅkharitvā”tiādimāha. Tattha visaṅkharitvā vibhajitvā.
analyzed: bhinditvā dassentaḥ tat eva rūpam visaṅkharitvā iti ādim āha tattha visaṅkharitvā vibhajitvā

original: “Visaṅgharitvā”ti vā pāṭho, ayamevattho. Āhāramayanti āhārena nibbattaṃ. Jhattanti
analyzed: visaṅgharitvā iti vā pāṭhaḥ ayam eva atthaḥ āhāram ayanti āhārena nibbattam jhattam ti

original: milātaṃ. Kilantanti khinnaṃ. Dhātanti tittaṃ. Pīṇitanti maṃsūpacayasampattiyā pīṇitaṃ.
analyzed: milātam kilantanti khinnam dhātanti tittam maṃsu upacaya sampattiyā pīṇitam

original: Tato eva mudu. Siniddhanti siniddhacchavitāya saṇhaṃ. Tato eva phassavantaṃ.
analyzed: tatas eva mudu sinidh hanti sinidh ha chavitāya saṇham tatas eva phassavantam

original: 713. Uṇhakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpanti uṇhasantāpena santattaṃ rūpaṃ sandhāyāha. Sītautunāti sappāyena sītautunā.
analyzed: uṇha kāle samuṭṭhitam rūpam iti uṇha santāpena santattam rūpam sandhāya āha sītautunā iti sappāyena sītautunā

original: 714. Āyatanadvāravasenāti āyatanasaṅkhātadvāravasena. Kammadvāranivattanatthaṃ āyatanaggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: āyatana dvāra vasena ati āyatana saṅkhāta dvāra vasena kamma dvāra nivattana attham āyatana ggahaṇam

original: Kāyadvāreti pasādakāyadvāre. Manodvāraṃ nāma sāvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ. Tassa nissayabhāvato
analyzed: kāya dvāra iti pasāda kāya dvāre manodvāram nāma sa āvajjanam bhavaṅgam tassa nissaya bhāvato

original: hadayavatthuṃ sandhāya nissitavohārena “manodvāre”ti vuttaṃ, yattha manodvāruppatti.
analyzed: hadaya vatthum sandhāya nissita vohārena manodvāra iti vuttam yattha manodvāra uppatti

original: 715. Somanassitadomanassitavasenāti somanassitadomanassitapuggalavasena, somanassitadomanassitakālavasena vā.
analyzed: somanassita domanassita vasena ati somanassita domanassita puggala vasena somanassita domanassita kāla vasena vā

original: Ayamatthoti ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno saṅkhārānaṃ atiittarakhaṇatāsaṅkhāto attho.
analyzed: ayam atthaḥ iti ayam idāni vuccamānaḥ saṅkhārānam ati ittara khaṇa tā saṅkhātaḥ atthaḥ

original: Jīvitanti jīvitindriyaṃ. Sukhadukkhāti sukhadukkhavedanā. Upekkhāpi hi sukhadukkhāsu
analyzed: jīvitanti jīvitindriyam sukha dukkhā ati sukha dukkha vedanā upekkhā api hi sukha dukkhāsu

original: eva antogadhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato. Attabhāvoti jīvitavedanāviññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhadhammā
analyzed: eva antogadhā iṭṭha aniṭṭha bhāvataḥ atta bhāvaḥ ti jīvita vedanā viññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭha dhammā

original: vuttā. Saññāti keci. Kevalāti attanā niccabhāvena vā avomissā. Ekacittasamāyuttāti
analyzed: vuttā saññā iti keci kevalā ati attanā nicca bhāvena vā avomissā eka citta samāyuttā ti

original: ekekena cittena sahitā. Lahuso vattate khaṇoti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko
analyzed: ekekena cittena sahitā lahusaḥ vattate khaṇo ti vutta nayena eka citta khaṇika tāya lahukaḥ

original: atiittaro jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati.
analyzed: atiittaraḥ jīvita ādīnam khaṇaḥ vattati

original: Cullāsītisahassāni kappanti caturāsītisahassaparimāṇaṃ kappaṃ, accantasaṃyoge etaṃ
analyzed: culla asīti sahassāni kappanti catur asīti sahassa parimāṇam kappam accanta saṃyoge etam

original: upayogavacanaṃ. Kappanti ca sāmaññavasena ekavacanaṃ. Marūti devā. Dvīhi cittehi
analyzed: upayoga vacanam ca sāmañña vasena eka vacanam devā dvīhi cittehi

original: samohitāti evaṃ cirajīvinopi te dvīhi cittehi sahitā hutvā na tiṭṭhanti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: evam cira jīvinaḥ pi te dvīhi cittehi sahitāḥ hutvā na tiṭṭhanti idam vuttam

original: hoti – tesampi santāne jīvitādīni dvīhi cittehi saha na tiṭṭhanti, ekena cittena
analyzed: hoti tesam pi santāne jīvita ādīni dvīhi cittehi saha na tiṭṭhanti ekena cittena

original: saha uppannāni teneva saha nirujjhanato yāva dutiyā na tiṭṭhantīti.
analyzed: sahaḥ uppannāni tena iva saha nirujjhanataḥ yāva dutiyāḥ na tiṭṭhanti iti

original: Ye niruddhā marantassāti cavantassa sattassa cuticittena saddhiṃ niruddhāti vattabbā
analyzed: ye niruddhāḥ marantassa ati cavantassa sattassa cuti cittena saddhim niruddhā ati vattabbā

original: ye khandhā. Tiṭṭhamānassa vā idhāti ye vā idha pavattiyaṃ tiṭṭhantassa dharantassa
analyzed: ye khandhāḥ tiṭṭhamānassa vai idha ati ye vai idha pavattiyam tiṭṭhantassa dharantassa

original: bhaṅgappattiyā niruddhakkhandhā. Sabbepi sadisā te sabbepi ekasadisā atthaṅgatā appaṭisandhikā
analyzed: bhaṅga ppattiyā niruddha kkhandhā sabbe api sadisā te sabbe api eka sadisā atthaṅgatā appaṭisandhikā

original: puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena vigatā. Yathā hi cutikkhandhā na nibbattanti, evaṃ
analyzed: punar āgantvā paṭisandhāna abhāvena vigatā yathā hi cuti khandhāḥ na nibbattanti evam

original: tato pubbepi khandhā. Tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: tatas pubbe api khandhāḥ tasmai eka citta khaṇikam sattānam jīvitanti adhippāyaḥ

original: Anantarā ca ye bhaggāti ye saṅkhārā anantarameva bhaggā niruddhā. Ye ca bhaggā anāgateti
analyzed: anantarā ca ye bhaggāḥ ati ye saṅkhārāḥ anantaram eva bhaggāḥ niruddhāḥ ye ca bhaggāḥ anāgata iti

original: ye ca saṅkhārā anāgate bhaggā bhañjanasīlā bhijjissanti. Tadantarā niruddhānanti
analyzed: ye ca saṅkhārāḥ anāgate bhaggāḥ bhañjana sīlāḥ bhijjissanti tad antarā

original: tesaṃ atītānāgatānaṃ antarā vemajjhe paccuppannataṃ patvā niruddhānaṃ bhaggānaṃ.
analyzed: tesam atīta anāgatānam antarā vemajjhe paccuppanna tam patvā niruddhānam bhaggānam

original: Vesamaṃ natthi lakkhaṇeti tesaṃ tividhānampi bhaṅgalakkhaṇanimittaṃ visamatā visadisatā natthi.
analyzed: vesamam natthi lakkhaṇā iti tesam tividhānam pi bhaṅga lakkhaṇa nimittam visama tā visadisa tā natthi

original: Anibbattena na jātoti anuppannena cittena jāto na hoti, ajāto nāma hoti. Paccuppannena
analyzed: anibbattena na jātaḥ ti anuppannena cittena jātaḥ na hoti ajātaḥ nāma hoti paccuppannena

original: vattamānena cittena jīvati jīvamāno nāma hoti. Cittabhaṅgā mato lokoti cuticittassa
analyzed: vattamānena cittena jīvati jīvamānaḥ nāma hoti citta bhaṅgā mataḥ cuti cittassa

original: viya sabbassapi tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅgappattiyā ayaṃ loko paramatthato mato nāma
analyzed: viya sabbassa api tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅga ppattiyā ayam loko paramatthataḥ mataḥ nāma

original: hoti niruddhassa appaṭisandhikattā. Evaṃ santepi paññatti paramatthiyā yāyaṃ taṃ
analyzed: hoti niruddhassa appaṭisandhika ttā evam sante pi paññatti paramatthiyā yā ayam taṃ

original: taṃ santaṃ sanissayaṃ cittaṃ upādāya “tisso jīvati, phusso jīvatī”ti evaṃ vacanappavattiyā
analyzed: tam santam sa nissayam cittam upādāya tissaḥ jīvati phussaḥ jīvati iti evam vacana ppavattiyā

original: visayabhūtā santānapaññatti, sā ettha paramatthiyā paramatthabhūtā. Tathā hi vadanti
analyzed: visaya bhūtā santāna paññatti sā ettha paramatthiyā paramattha bhūtā tathā hi vadanti

original: “nāmagottaṃ na jīratī”ti.
analyzed: nāma gottam na jīrati iti

original: Anidhānagatā bhaggāti ye bhaggā, na te katthaci nidhānaṃ gatā, atha kho abhāvameva
analyzed: a nidhāna gatāḥ bhaggāḥ ati ye bhaggāḥ na te katthacid nidhānam gatāḥ atha kho abhāvam eva

original: gatā. Puñjo natthi anāgate yato āgaccheyyuṃ vattamānabhāvaṃ. Nibbattā yepīti ye paṭiladdhattabhāvā
analyzed: gatā puñjaḥ na atthi anāgate yatas āgaccheyyum vattamāna bhāvam nibbattāḥ ye pi iti ye

original: paccuppannā, tepi āragge sāsapūpamā tiṭṭhanti. Yathā nāma sūciyaṃ ṭhitāyaṃ sāsapo
analyzed: paccuppannā te pi āragge sāsapa upamā tiṭṭhanti yathā nāma sūciyam ṭhitā ayam sāsapaḥ

original: khitto tassā sikhaṃ phuṭṭhamatto vigacchati na tiṭṭhati, evaṃ saṅkhārā uppajjitvā
analyzed: khitto tassā sikham phuṭṭha mattaḥ vigacchati na tiṭṭhati evam saṅkhārāḥ uppajjitvā

original: bhijjanti, na tesaṃ avaṭṭhānaṃ atthīti.
analyzed: bhijjanti na tesam avaṭṭhānam atthi iti

original: Bhaṅgo nesaṃ purakkhatoti tesaṃ nibbattadhammānaṃ bhaṅgo nāma purato eva kato, ekaṃsabhāvī na apasakkatīti attho. Purāṇehīti purimakehi atītehi.
analyzed: bhaṅgaḥ nesam purakkhataḥ ti tesam nibbatta dhammānam bhaṅgaḥ nāma puratas eva kataḥ ekaṃsa bhāvī na apasakkati iti attho purāṇehi iti purimakehi atītehi

original: Adassanatoti apassitabbato. Āyantīti āgacchanti. “Uppajjantī”ti imināpi kutoci rāsito
analyzed: a dassanataḥ ti a passitabbataḥ āyanti iti āgacchanti uppajjanti iti iminā api kutoci rāsitaḥ

original: āgamanābhāvamevāha. Bhaggā gacchantudassananti bhaggāpi katthaci upagamanābhāvato
analyzed: āgamana abhāvam eva āha bhaggāḥ gacchantu dassananti bhaggā api katthaci upagamana abhāvato

original: sabbena sabbaṃ adassanaṃ abhāvameva gacchanti. Tattha nidassanamāha “vijjuppādo…pe… vayanti cā”ti.
analyzed: sabbena sabbam adassanam abhāvam eva gacchanti tattha nidassanam āha vijjuppāda upe vayanti ca ati

original: 716. “Vivaṭṭakappato paṭṭhāya uppajjanakarūpa”nti iminā sayameva uppajjanakadhammatāya
analyzed: vivaṭṭa kappataḥ paṭṭhāya uppajjanaka rūpan ti iminā sayam eva uppajjanaka dhamma tāya

original: “dhammatārūpa”nti anvatthanāmataṃ dasseti. Ayalohādīsu ayo nāma kāḷalohaṃ. Lohaṃ
analyzed: dhamma tā rūpam ti anvattha nāma tam dasseti aya loha ādīsu ayaḥ nāma kāḷa loham loham

original: nāma jātilohaṃ vijātilohaṃ kittimalohaṃ pisācalohanti catubbidhaṃ. Tattha ayo rajataṃ
analyzed: nāma jāti loham vijāti loham kittima loham pisāca lohanti catubbidham tattha ayaḥ rajatam

original: suvaṇṇaṃ tipu sīsaṃ tambalohaṃ vekantakalohanti imāni satta jātilohāni. Nāganāsikalohaṃ
analyzed: suvaṇṇam tipu sīsam tamba loham vekantaka lohanti imāni satta jāti lohāni nāga nāsika loham

original: vijātilohaṃ. Kaṃsalohaṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ hārakūṭanti tīṇi kittimalohāni. Morakkhakādi pisācalohaṃ.
analyzed: vijāti loham kaṃsa loham vaṭṭa loham hārakūṭanti tīṇi kittima lohāni morakkhaka ādi pisāca loham

original: Tattha tambalohaṃ vekantakanti imehi dvīhi jātilohehi saddhiṃ sesaṃ sabbampi idha
analyzed: tattha tamba loham vekantakam ti imehi dvīhi jāti lohehi saddhim sesam sabbam pi idha

original: “loha”nti gahitanti. Tipūti setatipu. Sīsanti kāḷatipu. Suvaṇṇaṃ ākaruppannarasaviddhādibhedaṃ.
analyzed: suvaṇṇam

original: Muttā sāmuddikamuttādi. Maṇīti veḷuriyalohitaṅgamasāragallāni ṭhapetvā avaseso sabbo
analyzed: muttā sāmuddika muttā ādi maṇi iti veḷuriya lohitaṅgama sāragallāni ṭhapetvā avasesaḥ sabbo

original: maṇiviseso. Veḷuriyo vaṃsavaṇṇamaṇi. Saṅkho sāmuddikasaṅkho. Silāti kāḷasilāpaṇḍusilādibhedā
analyzed: maṇi visesaḥ veḷuriyaḥ vaṃsavaṇṇamaṇi saṅkhaḥ sāmuddika saṅkhaḥ silā ati kāḷa silā paṇḍu silā ādi bhedā

original: sabbāpi ratanasammatasilā. Pavāḷaṃ nāma vaṭṭumaṃ viddhamaṃ. Lohitaṅgaṃ rattamaṇi.
analyzed: sabbā api ratana sammata silā pavāḷam nāma vaṭṭumam viddhamam lohitaṅgam ratta maṇi

original: Masāragallaṃ kabaramaṇi. Bhūmiādayo pākaṭāva. Tadassāti taṃ dhammatārūpaṃ assa yogino.
analyzed: masāragallam kabara maṇi bhūmi ādayaḥ tat assa ati tam dhamma tā rūpam assa yogino

original: Taruṇapallavavaṇṇanti ambādīnaṃ taruṇapallavena samānavaṇṇaṃ. Sabhāgarūpasantatinti
analyzed: ambā ādīnam taruṇa pallavena samāna vaṇṇam

original: vaṇṇādinā samānabhāgaṃ rūpasantānaṃ. Anuppabandhāpayamānanti hetuphalaparamparāya
analyzed: vaṇṇa ādinā samāna bhāgam rūpa santānam hetu phala paramparāya

original: sambandhanavasena pavattanti.
analyzed: sambandhana vasena pavattanti

original: Soti yogī. Tanti asokarukkhapaṇṇaṃ. Pariggahetvāti ñāṇena paricchijja gahetvā. Iminā
analyzed: saḥ ti yogī tanti asoka rukkha paṇṇam pariggahetvā ati ñāṇena paricchijja gahetvā iminā

original: nayenāti iminā asokapaṇṇe vuttena nayena. Sabbampi ayalohādibhedaṃ dhammatārūpaṃ.
analyzed: nayena ati iminā asoka paṇṇe vuttena nayena sabbam pi aya loha ādi bhedam dhamma tā rūpam

original: Tampi hi sītakāle sītalaṃ, uṇhakāle sūriyasantāpena uṇhataraṃ hoti. Tattha sītabhāvena
analyzed: tat pi hi sīta kāle sītalam uṇha kāle sūriya santāpena uṇhataram hoti tattha sīta bhāvena

original: pavattaṃ rūpaṃ uṇhaṃ uṇhabhāvena pavattaṃ rūpaṃ sītaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Tattha tattheva
analyzed: pavattam rūpam uṇham uṇha bhāvena pavattam rūpam sītam na pāpuṇāti tattha tattha iva

original: taṭataṭāyantaṃ bhijjatītiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: taṭa taṭāyantam bhijjati iti ādinā yojetabbam

original: Arūpasattakasammasanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: arūpa sattaka sammasana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 717. Kalāpatoti arūpadhammakalāpato.
analyzed: kalāpato ti arūpa dhamma kalāpato

original: Yasmā tattha phassapañcamakā dhammā sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇā supākaṭā, suviññeyyā
analyzed: yasmā tattha phassa pañcamakā dhammā sabba cittuppāda sādhāraṇā su pākaṭā su viññeyyā

original: ca, tasmā tesaṃ vasena dassento “kalāpatoti phassapañcamakā dhammā”ti āha. Ye ime
