analyzed: taṇhā vasena saṅkhāresu ninnatam abhinivesanti atta abhinivesam etesam hi nimitta ādīnam

original: paṭipakkhabhāvena aniccānupassanādayo animittādināmehi vuttāti aniccānupassanādīhi
analyzed: paṭipakkha bhāvena anicca anupassanā ādayaḥ animitta ādi nāmehi vuttā ati anicca anupassanā ādīhi

original: pahātabbā niccasaññādayo viya nimittaggāhādayova paṭipakkhāti daṭṭhabbā. Rūpādiārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: pahātabbāḥ nicca saññā ādayaḥ viya nimitta ggāha ādayaḥ uva paṭipakkhā ati daṭṭhabbāḥ rūpa ādi ārammaṇam

original: ñatvā tadārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā saṅkhārā eva bhijjanti, saṅkhārānaṃ maraṇaṃ,
analyzed: ñatvā tad ārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgam disvā saṅkhārāḥ eva bhijjanti saṅkhārānam maraṇaṃ

original: na añño koci atthīti bhaṅgavasena suññataṃ gahetvā pavattā vipassanā adhipaññā ca
analyzed: na aññaḥ koci atthi iti bhaṅga vasena suññatam gahetvā pavattā vipassanā adhipaññā ca

original: sā dhammesu ca vipassanāti adhipaññādhammavipassanā, tāya niccasārādiādānavasena
analyzed: sā dhammesu ca vipassanā ati adhi paññā dhamma vipassanā tāya nicca sāra ādi ādāna vasena

original: pavattaṃ abhinivesaṃ sataṇhaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pajahati. Yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ nāma sappaccayanāmarūpadassanaṃ.
analyzed: pavattam abhinivesam sa taṇham diṭṭhim pajahati yathā bhūta ñāṇa dassanam nāma sappaccaya nāmarūpa dassanam

original: Tena “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”nti evamādikaṃ, “issarato loko sambhavatī”ti
analyzed: tena ahosim nu khalu aham atītam addhā ananti evamādikam issarataḥ lokaḥ sambhavati iti

original: evamādikañca sammohābhinivesaṃ pajahati. Bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena uppannaṃ sabbabhavādīsu
analyzed: evamādikam ca sammoha abhinivesam pajahati bhaya tu paṭṭhāna vasena uppannam sabba bhava ādīsu

original: ādīnavadassanañāṇaṃ ādīnavānupassanā, tāya kassacipi ālayanissayaadassanato ālayābhinivesaṃ
analyzed: ādīnava dassana ñāṇam ādīnava anupassanā tāya kassacipi ālaya nissaya adassanataḥ ālaya abhinivesam

original: tathāpavattaṃ taṇhaṃ pajahati. Saṅkhārānaṃ muñcanassa upāyabhūtaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ
analyzed: tathā pavattam taṇham pajahati saṅkhārānam muñcanassa upāya bhūtam paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇam

original: paṭisaṅkhānupassanā, tāya aniccādīsu appaṭisaṅkhātattā paṭisaṅkhānassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ
analyzed: paṭisaṅkhā anupassanā tāya anicca ādīsu appaṭisaṅkhāta ttā paṭisaṅkhānassa paṭipakkha bhūtam

original: avijjaṃ pajahati. Saṅkhārupekkhā, anulomañāṇañca vivaṭṭānupassanā. Tassā hi vasena
analyzed: avijjam pajahati saṅkhāra upekkhā anuloma ñāṇam ca vivaṭṭā anupassanā tassā hi vasena

original: tassa padumapalāse udakabindu viya sabbasaṅkhārehi cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati,
analyzed: tassa paduma palāse udaka bindu viya sabba saṅkhārehi cittam patilīyati patikuṭati

original: tasmā tāya saṃyogābhinivesaṃ kāmasaṃyogādikilesappavattiṃ pajahati. Aniccānupassanādayo
analyzed: tasmā tāya saṃyoga abhinivesam kāma saṃyoga ādi kilesa ppavattim pajahati anicca anupassanā ādayaḥ

original: satta anupassanā heṭṭhā atthato vibhattāti, parato ca saṃvaṇṇīyantīti idha na vuttā.
analyzed: satta anupassanā heṭṭhā atthataḥ vibhattā ati paratas ca idha na vuttā

original: Tāsūti aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu. Imināti yoginā. Tasmāti aniccādilakkhaṇattayavasena
analyzed: tāsu iti aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu iminā ati yoginā tasmā iti anicca ādi lakkhaṇa ttaya vasena

original: saṅkhārānaṃ diṭṭhattā. Taṃdassanañhi aniccādianupassanāti. Paṭividdhāti paṭiladdhā.
analyzed: saṅkhārānam diṭṭha ttā tad dassanam hi anicca ādi anupassanā ti paṭividdhā ati paṭiladdhā

original: Yadaggena hi ñāṇena savisayo paṭividdho, tadaggena taṃ paṭiladdhaṃ nāma hoti. Byañjanameva
analyzed: yad aggena hi ñāṇena sa visayaḥ paṭividdhaḥ tad aggena tam paṭiladdham nāma hoti byañjanam eva

original: nānaṃ yathā “rukkho pādapo tarū”ti. Tāpi animittāpaṇihitasuññatānupassanā.
analyzed: nānam yathā rukkhaḥ pādapo animitta apaṇihita suññatā anupassanā

original: Sabbāpi vipassanā, tasmā ekadesena paṭividdhā hontīti adhippāyo. Kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyā
analyzed: sabbā api vipassanā tasmai eka desena paṭividdhāḥ honti iti adhippāyaḥ kaṅkhā vitaraṇa visuddhiyā

original: eva saṅgahitaṃ, tasmā taṃ pageva siddhanti attho. Tenāha “idampi dvayaṃ paṭividdhameva
analyzed: eva saṅgahitam tasmā tam pagā iva tena āha idam pi dvayam paṭividdham eva

original: hotī”ti. Sesesu nibbidānupassanādīsu dasasu. “Kiñci paṭividdhaṃ kiñci appaṭividdha”nti
analyzed: hoti iti sesesu nibbida anupassanā ādīsu dasasu kiñci paṭividdham kiñci appaṭividdhanti

original: iminā tesaṃ ekadesapaṭivedhamāha. Aniccānupassanāya hi siddhāya nirodhānupassanā,
analyzed: iminā tesam eka desa paṭivedham āha anicca anupassanāya hi siddhāya nirodha anupassanā

original: khayānupassanā, vayānupassanā, vipariṇāmānupassanā ca ekadesena siddhā nāma honti,
analyzed: khaya anupassanā vayā anupassanā vipariṇāma anupassanā ca eka desena siddhāḥ nāma honti

original: dukkhānupassanāya siddhāya nibbidānupassanā, ādīnavānupassanā ca, anattānupassanāya siddhāya itarāti.
analyzed: dukkha anupassanāya siddhāya nibbida anupassanā ādīnava anupassanā ca anatta anupassanāya siddhāya itarā ati

original: Udayabbayañāṇakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: udaya bbaya ñāṇa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 723. Parato paṭipadāñāṇadassanakathāyaṃ abbhādivigamena ākāsassa viya, paṅkamalavigamena
analyzed: paratas paṭipadā āñāṇa dassana kathā ayam abbha ādi vigamena ākāsassa viya paṅka mala vigamena

original: udakassa viya, kāḷakāpagamena suvaṇṇassa viya saṃkilesavigamena ñāṇassa parisuddhīti
analyzed: udakassa viya kāḷaka apagamena suvaṇṇassa viya saṃkilesa vigamena ñāṇassa parisuddhi iti

original: āha “niccasaññādīnaṃ pahānena visuddhañāṇo”ti. Anekākāravokārasaṅkhāresu lakkhaṇattayasallakkhaṇasammasanassa
analyzed: āha nicca saññā ādīnam pahānena visuddha ñāṇo ti aneka ākāra vokāra saṅkhāresu lakkhaṇa ttaya sat lakkhaṇa sammasanassa

original: katattā vuttaṃ “sammasanañāṇassa pāraṃ gantvā”ti. Tattha sammasanañāṇassāti nayavipassanāsaṅkhātassa
analyzed: kata ttā vuttam sammasana ñāṇassa pāram gantvā ti tattha sammasana ñāṇassa āti naya vipassanā saṅkhātassa

original: kalāpasammasanañāṇassa. Tasseva hi thirabhāvāya itare sammasanavisesāti vadanti.
analyzed: kalāpa sammasana ñāṇassa tassa iva hi thira bhāvāya itare sammasana visesā ti vadanti

original: Sammasanañāṇassāti vā kalāpasammasanādisammasanañāṇassa. Anupadadhammavipassanāya
analyzed: sammasana ñāṇassa ati vā kalāpa sammasana ādi sammasana ñāṇassa an upada dhamma vipassanāya

original: sadisā hi sā. Tāya hi diṭṭhiugghāṭanādi sambhavatīti. Vitthārato bhāvanāvidhānaṃ
analyzed: sadisā hi sā tāya hi diṭṭhi ugghāṭana ādi sambhavati iti vitthārataḥ bhāvanā vidhānam

original: parato vattukāmo “saṅkhepato tāva ārabhatī”ti āha. Saṅkhepato hi ārambho ādikammikassa
analyzed: paratas vattu kāmo saṅkhepato tāva ārabhati iti āha saṅkhepataḥ hi ārambhaḥ ādikammikassa

original: sukaro. Tatrāti saṅkhepena ārambhe.
analyzed: sukaro tatra ati saṅkhepena ārambhe

original: Kathanti kathetukamyatāpucchā. Yaṃ “paccuppannānaṃ…pe… udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa”nti
analyzed: katham ti kathā itu kamya tā pucchā yam udaya bbaya anupassane ñāṇam ti

original: vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ ñātabbanti ceti attho. Santatipaccuppanne, khaṇapaccuppanne vā
analyzed: vuttam tam katham ñātabbanti ca iti attho santati paccuppanne khaṇa paccuppanne vā

original: dhamme udayabbayadassanābhiniveso kātabbo, na atītānāgateti vuttaṃ “paccuppannānaṃ
analyzed: dhamme udaya bbaya dassana abhiniveso kātabbaḥ na atīta anāgata iti vuttam paccuppannānam

original: dhammāna”nti. Udayadassanañcettha yāvadeva vayadassanatthanti vayadassanassa padhānataṃ
analyzed: dhammānanti udaya dassanam ca ittha yāvat eva vaya dassana attham ti vaya dassanassa padhāna taṃ

original: dassetuṃ “vipariṇāmānupassane paññā”ti vatvā taṃ pana vayadassanaṃ udayadassanapubbakanti
analyzed: dassetum vipariṇāma anupassane paññā iti vatvā tam pana vaya dassanam udaya dassana pubbakanti

original: āha “udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa”nti.
analyzed: āha udaya bbaya anupassane ñāṇam ti

original: Jātanti nibbattaṃ paṭiladdhattabhāvaṃ. Ayaṃ hi jātasaddo khaṇattayasamaṅgitaṃ sandhāya vutto “ye dhammā jātā bhūtā”tiādīsu viya, na atītaṃ
analyzed: jātam ti nibbattam ayam hi jāta saddaḥ khaṇa ttaya samaṅgi tam sandhāya vuttaḥ ye dhammāḥ jātāḥ bhūta ati ādīsu viya na atītam

original: “Ye te jātā na te santi, ye na jātā tattheva te;
analyzed: ye te jātāḥ na te santi ye na jātā tattha iva te

original: Laddhattabhāvā no bhaggā, teva santi sabhāvato”ti. –
analyzed: naḥ bhaggā tā iva santi

original: Ādīsu viya, nāpi jātatāmattaṃ “yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhata”ntiādīsu viya. Tenāha
analyzed: ādīsu viya na api jāta tā mattam yam tam jātam bhūtam tena āha

original: “jātaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppanna”nti, paccuppannarūpaṃ nāma jātaṃ khaṇattayapariyāpannanti
analyzed: jātam rūpam paccuppannanti paccuppanna rūpam nāma jātam khaṇa ttaya pariyāpannanti

original: attho. Taṃ pana ādito duppariggahanti santatipaccuppannavasena vipassanābhiniveso
analyzed: atthaḥ tam pana āditas duppariggahanti santati paccuppanna vasena vipassanā abhiniveso

original: kātabbo. Tassāti rūpassa. Paccayalakkhaṇapapañcaṃ anāmasitvā nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayoti
analyzed: kātabbaḥ tassa ati rūpassa paccaya lakkhaṇa papañcam an āmasitvā nibbatti lakkhaṇam udayaḥ ti

original: nibbattanasaññitaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ udayo uppādo. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayoti vipariṇāmasaññitaṃ
analyzed: nibbattana saññitam saṅkhata lakkhaṇam udayaḥ uppādaḥ vipariṇāma lakkhaṇam vayaḥ ti vipariṇāma saññitam

original: saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ vayo vināso. Anupassanāñāṇanti yā udayassa, vayassa ca anupekkhanā,
analyzed: saṅkhata lakkhaṇam vayaḥ vināsaḥ anupassanā ñāṇam ti yā udayassa vayassa ca anupekkhanā

original: taṃ ñāṇaṃ. Kiñcāpi kalāpasammasanādīsu jātijarāmaraṇasīsena jātijarāmaraṇavanto dhammā
analyzed: tam ñāṇam kiñca api kalāpa sammasana ādīsu jāti jarā maraṇa sīsena jāti jarā maraṇavanto dhammā

original: vuttā, idha pana udayabbayañāṇaniddese “jāti paccuppannā, tassā nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: vuttāḥ idha pana udaya bbaya ñāṇa niddese jāti paccuppannā tassāḥ nibbatti lakkhaṇam

original: udayo, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayo”tiādinā vuccamāne jātijarāmaraṇānaṃ jātijarāmaraṇavantatā,
analyzed: udayaḥ vipariṇāma lakkhaṇam vayaḥ ti ādinā vuccamāne jāti jarā maraṇavanta tā

original: nipphannatā ca anuññātā viya hotīti taṃ pariharituṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu bhavapariyosānāva desanā katā.
analyzed: nipphanna tā ca anuññātā viya hoti iti tam pariharitum paṭiccasamuppāda aṅgesu bhava pariyosānā va desanā katā

original: Soti yogī. Iminā pāḷinayenāti imāya “jātaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppanna”ntiādinā dassitāya pāḷigatiyā.
analyzed: saḥ ti yogī iminā pāḷi nayena ati imāya jātam rūpam paccuppanna nti ādinā dassitāya pāḷi gatiyā

original: Jātinti na pasūtiṃ, na ca paṭhamābhinibbattimattaṃ, atha kho uppādaṃ nibbattivikāraṃ.
analyzed: na pasūtim na ca paṭhama abhinibbatti mattam atha kho uppādam nibbatti vikāram

original: Svāyaṃ vikāro yasmā saṅkhārānaṃ abhinavāvaṭṭhānajarā viya navabhāvāpagamoti āha “abhinavākāra”nti.
analyzed: vikāraḥ āha

original: Samanupassatīti sambandho. Anuppannassa rāsi vā nicayo vā natthi yato āgaccheyya
analyzed: samanupassati iti sambandhaḥ anuppannassa rāsi vā nicayaḥ vā na atthi yatas āgaccheyya

original: uppajjamānaṃ aladdhattabhāvassa sabbena sabbaṃ avijjamānattā. Tenāha “uppajjamāna…pe…
analyzed: uppajjamānam sabbena sabbam a vijjamāna ttā tena āha uppajjamāna pe

original: natthī”ti. Yathā anāgate addhani ime dhammā sabbena sabbaṃ natthi, evaṃ atītepi addhanīti
analyzed: natthi iti yathā anāgate addhani ime dhammā sabbena sabbam natthi evam atīte api addhani iti

original: dassento “nirujjhamānassāpī”tiādiṃ vatvā avijjamānānaṃyeva rūpārūpadhammānaṃ hetupaccayasamavāye
analyzed: dassentaḥ nirujjhamānassa api itiādim vatvā avijjamānānam yeva rūpa arūpa dhammānam hetu paccaya samavāye

original: uppādo, uppajjitvā ca sabbaso abhāvūpagamoti imamatthaṃ samudāyagataṃ tadekadesabhūtāya
analyzed: uppādaḥ uppajjitvā ca sabbasas abhāva upagamo ti imam attham samudāya gatam tad eka desa bhūtāya

original: upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha rāsitoti rāsibhāvena samussito
analyzed: upamāya vibhāvetum yathā pana atiādi vuttam tattha rāsitaḥ ti rāsi bhāvena samussitaḥ

original: puñjo rāsi. Yathā tathā piṇḍibhūto nicayo. Bhūmiyaṃ nidahitvā ṭhapitaṃ nidhānaṃ.
analyzed: puñjaḥ rāsi yathā tathā piṇḍi bhūtaḥ nicayaḥ nidahitvā ṭhapitam nidhānam

original: Upavīṇeti etenāti upavīṇaṃ, vīṇāvādanaṃ.
analyzed: upavīṇā iti etena ati upavīṇam vīṇā vādanam

original: 724. Evaṃ saṅkhepato udayabbayamanasikāravidhiṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato dassetuṃ
analyzed: evam saṅkhepataḥ udaya bbaya manasikāra vidhim dassetvā idāni vitthārataḥ dassetum

original: “puna yānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha avijjāsamudayāti avijjāya uppādā, atthibhāvāti attho.
analyzed: puna yāni itiādi vuttam tattha avijjā samudayā ti avijjāya uppādāḥ atthi bhāvā ti attho

original: Nirodhavirodhīhi uppādo atthibhāvavācakopi hotīti vuttovāyamattho. Tasmā purimabhavasiddhāya
analyzed: nirodha virodhīhi uppādaḥ atthi bhāva vācakaḥ api hoti iti vuttaḥ uva ayam atthaḥ tasmai purima bhava siddhāya

original: avijjāya sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpassa uppādo hotīti attho. Paccayasamudayaṭṭhenāti
analyzed: avijjāya sati imasmin bhave rūpassa uppādo hoti iti attho paccaya samudaya ṭṭhena ati

original: paccayassa uppannabhāvena, atthibhāvatoti attho. Avijjādīhi ca tīhi atītakālikāni
analyzed: paccayassa uppanna bhāvena atthi bhāvato ti attho avijjā ādīhi ca tīhi atīta kālikāni

original: tesaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtāni upādānādīnipi gahitānevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: tesam sahakārī kāraṇa bhūtāni upādāna ādīni pi gahitāni eva ati daṭṭhabbam

original: Pavattipaccayesu kabaḷīkārāhārassa balavatāya so eva gahito “āhārasamudayā”ti. Tasmiṃ
analyzed: pavatti paccayesu kabaḷīkāra āhārassa balavatāya saḥ eva gahitaḥ tasmin

original: pana gahite pavattipaccayatāsāmaññena utucittānipi gahitāneva hontīti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpassa
analyzed: pana gahite pavatti paccaya tā sāmaññena utu cittāni pi gahitāna eva honti iti catu samuṭṭhānika rūpassa

original: paccayato udayadassanaṃ vibhāvitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avijjātaṇhupanissayasahiteneva
analyzed: paccayataḥ udaya dassanam vibhāvitam eva ati daṭṭhabbam avijjā taṇhā upanissaya sahitena eva

original: kammunā rūpakāyassa nibbatti. Asati ca avijjupanissayāya bhavanikantiyā jātiyā asambhavo
analyzed: kammunā rūpa kāyassa nibbatti asati ca avijja upanissayāya bhava nikantiyā jātiyāḥ asambhavaḥ

original: evāti. Yathā ca rūpassa avijjātaṇhupanissayatā, evaṃ vedanādīnampi daṭṭhabbā. Āhāro
analyzed: eva ti yathā ca rūpassa avijjā taṇhā upanissaya tā evam vedanā ādīnam pi daṭṭhabbā āhāro

original: pana uppannassa rūpassa posako, kabaḷīkārāhārassa adhippetattā, kāmadhātādhiṭṭhānattā
analyzed: pana uppannassa rūpassa posako kabaḷīkāra āhārassa adhippeta ttā kāmadhātā adhiṭṭhāna ttā

original: ca desanāya. Ukkaṃsaniddesena vā āhāraggahaṇaṃ. “Nibbattilakkhaṇa”ntiādinā kālavasena
analyzed: ca desanāya ukkaṃsa niddesena vā āhāra ggahaṇam nibbatti lakkhaṇa nti ādinā kāla vasena

original: udayadassanamāha. Tattha addhānavasena pageva udayaṃ passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena
analyzed: udaya dassanam āha tattha addhāna vasena pagā iva udayam passitvā ṭhitaḥ idha santati vasena

original: disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati. Pañca lakkhaṇānīti avijjā taṇhā kammaṃ āhāroti
analyzed: disvā anukkamena khaṇa vasena passati pañca lakkhaṇāni iti avijjā taṇhā kammam āhāro ti

original: imesaṃ paccayānaṃ atthitāsaṅkhātalakkhaṇāni ceva rūpassa nibbattilakkhaṇañcāti imāni
analyzed: imesam paccayānam atthi tā saṅkhāta lakkhaṇāni ca iva rūpassa nibbatti lakkhaṇam ca ati imāni

original: pañca lakkhaṇāni. Tesaṃ atthitā hi rūpassa udayo lakkhīyati etehīti lakkhaṇānīti
analyzed: pañca lakkhaṇāni tesam atthi tā hi rūpassa udayaḥ lakkhīyati etehi iti lakkhaṇāni iti

original: vuccanti. Nibbatti pana saṅkhatalakkhaṇamevāti.
analyzed: vuccanti nibbatti pana saṅkhata lakkhaṇam eva ati

original: Avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhoti aggamaggañāṇena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato anāgatassa
analyzed: avijjā nirodhā rūpa nirodho ti aggamagga ñāṇena avijjāya anuppāda nirodhataḥ anāgatassa

original: rūpassa anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato. Paccayanirodhaṭṭhenāti avijjāsaṅkhātassa
analyzed: rūpassa anuppāda nirodhaḥ hoti paccaya abhāve abhāvataḥ paccaya nirodha ṭṭhena ati avijjā saṅkhātassa

original: anāgate uppajjanakarūpapaccayassa niruddhabhāvena. Taṇhānirodhā kammanirodhāti etthāpi
analyzed: anāgate uppajjanaka rūpa paccayassa niruddha bhāvena taṇhā nirodhā kamma nirodhā ti ettha api

original: eseva nayo. Āhāranirodhāti pavattipaccayassa kabaḷīkārāhārassa abhāve. Rūpanirodhoti
analyzed: esa eva nayaḥ āhāra nirodhā ti pavatti paccayassa kabaḷīkāra āhārassa abhāve rūpa nirodho ti

original: taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa abhāvo hoti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇanti
analyzed: tad samuṭṭhāna rūpassa abhāvaḥ hoti sesam heṭṭhā vutta naya anusārena veditabbam vipariṇāma lakkhaṇam ti

original: bhaṅgakālavasena tesaṃ vayadassanaṃ. Tasmā taṃ addhāvasena pageva passitvā ṭhito
analyzed: bhaṅga kāla vasena tesam vaya dassanam tasmā tam addhā vasena pagā iva passitvā ṭhitaḥ

original: idha santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati. Pañca lakkhaṇānīti idha
analyzed: idha santati vasena disvā anukkamena khaṇa vasena passati pañca lakkhaṇāni iti idha

original: avijjādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ anuppādanirodho, rūpassa khaṇanirodho cāti imāni
analyzed: avijjā ādīnam catunnam paccayānam anuppāda nirodho rūpassa khaṇa nirodho ca ati imāni

original: pañca lakkhaṇāni. Tesañhi anuppādanirodho, rūpassa accantanirodho lakkhīyati etehīti
analyzed: pañca lakkhaṇāni tesaṃ hi anuppāda nirodhaḥ rūpassa accanta nirodhaḥ lakkhīyati etehi iti

original: lakkhaṇānīti vuccanti.
analyzed: lakkhaṇāni iti vuccanti

original: Vipariṇāmo saṅkhatalakkhaṇameva. Esa nayo vedanākkhandhādīsu. Ayaṃ pana viseso –
analyzed: vipariṇāmo saṅkhata lakkhaṇam eva esa nayaḥ vedanā khandha ādīsu ayam pana visesaḥ

original: “phuṭṭho vedeti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti, phuṭṭho cetetī”ti, “phassapaccayā vedanā, cakkhusamphassajā
analyzed: phuṭṭhaḥ vedeti phuṭṭhaḥ sañjānāti phuṭṭhaḥ ceteti iti phassa paccayā vedanā cakkhu samphassa jā

original: vedanā, saññā, cetanā”ti, ca vacanato phasso vedanā saññā saṅkhārakkhandhānaṃ pavattipaccayo,
analyzed: vedanā saññā cetanā ti ca vacanato phassaḥ vedanā saññā saṅkhāra kkhandhānam pavatti paccayo

original: taṃnirodhā ca tesaṃ nirodho, mahāpadāna mahānidānasuttesu, abhidhamme ca aññamaññapaccayavāre
analyzed: tad nirodhā ca tesam nirodhaḥ mahāpadāna mahānidāna suttesu abhidhamme ca aññamañña paccaya vāre

original: “nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa pavattipaccayo, taṃnirodhā
analyzed: nāma rūpa paccayā viññāṇanti vacanataḥ nāma rūpam viññāṇassa pavatti paccayo tad nirodhā

original: tassa nirodhoti vuttaṃ “phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayo”tiādi.
analyzed: tassa nirodho ti vuttam phassa samudayā vedanā samudayaḥ tiādi

original: Ettha ca keci tāva āhu “arūpakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayadassanaṃ addhāsantativaseneva,
analyzed: ettha ca keci tāva āhu arūpa kkhandhānam udaya bbaya dassanam addhā santati vasena iva

original: na khaṇavasenā”ti. Tesaṃ matena khaṇato udayabbayadassanameva na siyā. Apare panāhu
analyzed: na khaṇa vasena ati tesam matena khaṇataḥ udaya bbaya dassanam eva na siyā apare pana āhu

original: “paccayato udayabbayadassane atītādivibhāgaṃ anāmasitvā sabbasādhāraṇato avijjādipaccayā
analyzed: paccayataḥ udaya bbaya dassane atīta ādi vibhāgam an āmasitvā sabba sādhāraṇataḥ avijjā ādi paccayā

original: vedanāsambhavaṃ labbhamānataṃ passati, na uppādaṃ. Avijjādiabhāve ca tassā asambhavaṃ
analyzed: vedanā sambhavam labbhamāna tam passati na uppādam avijjā ādi abhāve ca tassāḥ asambhavam

original: alabbhamānataṃ passati, na bhaṅgaṃ. Khaṇato udayabbayadassane paccuppannānaṃ uppādaṃ,
analyzed: a labbhamāna tam passati na bhaṅgam khaṇataḥ udaya bbaya dassane paccuppannānam uppādam

original: bhaṅgañca passatī”ti, taṃ yuttaṃ. Santativasena hi rūpārūpadhamme udayato, vayato
analyzed: bhaṅgam ca passati iti tam yuttam santati vasena hi rūpa arūpa dhamme udayataḥ vayato

original: ca manasi karontassa anukkamena bhāvanāya balappattakāle ñāṇassa tikkhavisadabhāvappattiyā
analyzed: ca manasi karontassa anukkamena bhāvanāya bala ppatta kāle ñāṇassa tikkha visada bhāva ppattiyā

original: khaṇato udayabbayā upaṭṭhahantīti. Ayañhi paṭhamaṃ paccayato udayabbayaṃ manasi karonto
analyzed: khaṇataḥ udaya bbayā upaṭṭhahanti iti ayan hi paṭhamam paccayataḥ udaya bbayam manasi karontaḥ

original: avijjādike paccayadhamme vissajjetvā udayabbayavante khandhe gahetvā tesaṃ paccayato
analyzed: avijjā ādike paccaya dhamme vissajjetvā udaya bbayavante khandhe gahetvā tesam paccayato

original: udayabbayadassanamukhena khaṇatopi udayabbayaṃ manasi karoti.
analyzed: udaya bbaya dassana mukhena khaṇataḥ api udaya bbayam manasi karoti

original: Tassa yadā ñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ visadaṃ hutvā pavattati, tadā rūpārūpadhammā khaṇe khaṇe
analyzed: tassa yadā ñāṇam tikkham visadam hutvā pavattati tadā rūpa arūpa dhammā khaṇe khaṇe

original: uppajjantā, bhijjantā ca hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Tena vuttaṃ “evampi rūpassa udayo”tiādi.
analyzed: uppajjantā bhijjantā ca hutvā upaṭṭhahanti tena vuttam evam pi rūpassa udayaḥ tiādi

original: Tattha evampi rūpassa udayoti evaṃ vuttanayena avijjāsamudayāpi. Taṇhā…pe… kamma…pe…
analyzed: tattha evam pi rūpassa udayo ti evam vutta nayena avijjā samudayā api taṇhā pe kamma pe

original: āhārasamudayāpi rūpassa sambhavo. Evampi rūpassa vayoti evaṃ vuttanayeneva avijjānirodhāpi
analyzed: rūpassa sambhavaḥ evam pi rūpassa vayaḥ ti evam vutta nayena iva avijjā nirodhā api

original: taṇhā…pe… āhāranirodhāpi rūpassa vayo anuppādoti paccayato vitthārena manasikāraṃ
analyzed: rūpassa vayaḥ anuppādaḥ ti paccayataḥ vitthārena manasikāram

original: karoti. Evampi rūpaṃ udetīti evaṃ vuttanayena nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi
analyzed: karoti evam pi rūpam udeti iti evam vutta nayena nibbatti lakkhaṇam passanto api kamma samuṭṭhāna rūpam pi

original: āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi udeti uppajjati nippajjatīti. Evaṃ vuttanayeneva vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: āhāra otu citta samuṭṭhāna rūpam pi udeti uppajjati nippajjati iti evam vutta nayena iva vipariṇāma lakkhaṇam

original: passanto kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi veti nirujjhatīti
analyzed: passanto kamma samuṭṭhāna rūpam pi āhāra otu citta samuṭṭhāna rūpam pi vā iti nirujjhati iti

original: khaṇato vitthārena manasikāraṃ karotīti yojanā.
analyzed: khaṇataḥ vitthārena manasikāram karoti iti yojanā

original: 725. Evaṃ manasi karoto na yāva udayabbayañāṇaṃ uppajjati, tāva udayabbayā suṭṭhu
analyzed: evam manasi karotaḥ na yāva udaya bbaya ñāṇam uppajjati tāva udaya bbayā suṭṭhu

original: pākaṭā na hontīti katvā vuttaṃ “iti kirime dhammā…pe… paṭiventī”ti, nayadassanavasena
analyzed: pākaṭāḥ na honti iti katvā vuttam iti naya dassana vasena

original: vā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Paṭhamañhi paccuppannadhammānaṃ udayabbayaṃ disvā atha atītānāgate
analyzed: vā evam vuttam paṭhamam hi paccuppanna dhammānam udaya bbayam disvā atha atīta anāgate

original: nayaṃ neti. Dukkhādisaccappabhedā, anulomādipaṭiccasamuppādappabhedā, ekattādinayappabhedā,
analyzed: nayam neti dukkha ādi sacca ppabhedā anuloma ādi paṭiccasamuppāda ppabhedā ekatta ādi naya ppabhedā

original: aniccatādilakkhaṇappabhedā ca saccapaṭiccasamuppādanayalakkhaṇappabhedā. Paṭiccasamuppādaggahaṇeneva
analyzed: anicca tā ādi lakkhaṇa ppabhedā ca sacca paṭiccasamuppāda naya lakkhaṇa ppabhedā paṭiccasamuppāda ggahaṇena iva

original: cettha paṭiccasamuppannadhammānampi gahaṇaṃ, tesampi attano phalaṃ pati paṭicca samuppādabhāvato.
analyzed: ca ittha paṭicca samuppanna dhammānam pi gahaṇam tesam pi attanaḥ phalam pati paṭicca samuppāda bhāvato

original: 726. Yanti karaṇe paccattavacanaṃ, yena ñāṇenāti atthaṃ vadanti. Yanti vā kiriyāparāmasanaṃ.
analyzed: yanti karaṇe paccatta vacanam yena ñāṇena ati attham vadanti yanti vā kiriyā parāmasanam

original: Khandhānaṃ samudayaṃ passati, khandhānaṃ nirodhaṃ passatīti ettha yadetaṃ dassananti
analyzed: khandhānam samudayam passati khandhānam nirodham passati iti ettha yat etam dassanam ti

original: attho. Yaṃ panāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Ettha ca yathā avijjādisamudayanirodhato khandhānaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ yam panāti ettha api esā iva nayaḥ ettha ca yathā avijjā ādi samudaya nirodhato khandhānam

analyzed: samudaya nirodhassa aññattā avijjā samudayā rūpa samudaya uti ādi vacana bhedaḥ kataḥ na

analyzed: evam nibbatti vipariṇāma lakkhaṇehi khandhānam udaya bbayassa bhedaḥ atthi abhinna adhikaraṇa ttā ati

analyzed: nibbatti lakkhaṇa vipariṇāma lakkhaṇāni passantaḥ khandhānam udaya bbayam passati iti

original: vacanabhedaṃ akatvā vuttaṃ. Uppattikkhaṇeyeva hīti hi-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā uppādakkhaṇeyeva
analyzed: vacana bhedam a katvā vuttam uppatti kkhaṇeya iva hi iti hi saddaḥ hetu atthaḥ yasmai uppāda kkhaṇeya iva

original: nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ, bhaṅgakkhaṇeyeva ca vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ, tasmā tāni passanto khaṇato
analyzed: nibbatti lakkhaṇam bhaṅga kkhaṇeya iva ca vipariṇāma lakkhaṇam tasmā tāni passanto khaṇataḥ

analyzed: khandhānam udaya bbaye passati nāma ati yam pana ati ādinā vuttam eva attham pākaṭataram karoti

original: 727. Iccassevanti ettha iti-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā “avijjā samudayā”tiādi paccayato
analyzed: iccassa ivanti ettha iti saddaḥ hetu atthaḥ yasmai avijjā samudaya ati ādi paccayato

original: khandhānaṃ udayabbayadassanaṃ, “nibbattilakkhaṇa”ntiādi khaṇato, tasmāti attho. Assāti

original: yogino. Evanti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Ye pana “iccassa paccayato”ti paṭhanti, tesaṃ
analyzed: yoginaḥ evanti vutta ppakāra parāmasanam ye pana iccassa paccayato ti paṭhanti tesam

original: itīti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Janakāvabodhatoti khandhānaṃ janakassa avijjādipaccayassa
analyzed: iti iti vutta ppakāra parāmasanam janaka avabodhato ti khandhānam janakassa avijjā ādi paccayassa

original: avabujjhanato. Jātidukkhāvabodhatoti jātisaṅkhātassa dukkhassa avabujjhanato. Dukkhasaccaṃ
analyzed: avabujjhanataḥ jāti dukkha avabodhataḥ ti jāti saṅkhātassa dukkhassa avabujjhanataḥ dukkha saccam

original: pākaṭaṃ hoti ekadesadassanena pabbatasamuddādidassanakānaṃ viya. Maraṇadukkhāvabodhatoti
analyzed: pākaṭam hoti eka desa dassanena pabbata samudda ādi dassanakānam viya maraṇa dukkha avabodhato ti

original: etthāpi eseva nayo. “Paccayānuppādenā”ti etena paccayānaṃ anuppādanirodho idha paccayanirodhoti
analyzed: ettha api esā iva nayo paccaya anuppādena ati etena anuppāda nirodho idha paccaya nirodho ti

analyzed: dasseti paccayavatanti paccayataḥ uppajjanakānam yam ca assa udaya bbaya dassananti yam

original: assa yogino paccayato, khaṇato ca udayabbayānaṃ dassanaṃ. Tattha asammoho, tappadhāno
analyzed: assa yogino paccayataḥ khaṇataḥ ca udaya bbayānam dassanam tattha asammohaḥ tad padhāno

original: vā vitakkādidhammapuñjo maggo vāyaṃ lokikoti niyyānānulomato lokiko maggo evāyaṃ.
analyzed: vā vitakka ādi dhamma puñjaḥ maggaḥ vā ayam lokikaḥ ti niyyāna anulomataḥ lokikaḥ maggaḥ eva ayam

original: Iti tasmā maggasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti sabhāvāvabodhato. Tenāha “tatra sammohavighātato”ti,
analyzed: iti tasmai magga saccam pākaṭam hoti sabhāva avabodhato tena āha tatra sammoha vighātato ti

original: tadaṅgavasenāti attho. Atha vā yathāvutto sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhāto maggo ariyamaggassa
analyzed: tad aṅga vasena āti atthaḥ atha vā yathā vuttaḥ sammādiṭṭhi saṅkhātaḥ maggaḥ ariya maggassa

original: upāyabhūto asammohasabhāvo attānampi pakāseti padīpo viyāti maggasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
analyzed: upāya bhūtaḥ asammoha sabhāvaḥ attānam pi pakāseti padīpaḥ viyāti magga saccam pākaṭam hoti

original: Svāyaṃ pākaṭabhāvo mohandhakāravidhamanenāti āha “tatra sammohavighātato”ti.
analyzed: pākaṭa bhāvaḥ moha ndhakāra vidhamanena ati āha tatra

original: 728. “Avijjāpaccayā”tiādiko anulomo paṭiccasamuppādo pavattiyā anulomanato. “Avijjāsamudayā”tiādinā
analyzed: avijjā paccaya ati ādikaḥ anulomaḥ paṭiccasamuppādaḥ pavattiyāḥ anulomanataḥ avijjā samudaya ati ādinā

original: avijjādīsu santesūti ayamattho vuttoti āha “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti avabodhato”ti.
analyzed: avijjā ādīsu santesu iti ayam attho vutto ti āha imasmin sati idam hoti iti avabodhato ti

original: Pavattiyā vilomanato “avijjāyatveva asesavirāganirodhā”tiādiko paṭilomo paṭiccasamuppādo.
analyzed: pavattiyāḥ vilomanataḥ paṭilomaḥ paṭiccasamuppādo

original: Te ca saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā “jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppanna”ntiādivacanato.
analyzed: te ca saṅkhatā paṭicca samuppannā jarā maraṇam bhikkhave aniccam saṅkhatam paṭicca samuppannam nti ādi vacanato

original: Paṭiccasamuppannassa ca pākaṭatā paccayākārapākaṭatāya eva “imassetaṃ phala”nti avabodhato.
analyzed: paṭicca samuppannassa ca pākaṭa tā paccaya ākāra pākaṭa tāya eva imassa etam phalanti avabodhato

original: 729. Purimapurimānaṃ nirodho uttaruttarānaṃ uppādānubandhoti ayamattho paccayato
analyzed: purima purimānam nirodhaḥ uttaruttarānam uppāda anubandho ti ayam attho paccayato

original: udayadassanena sijjhamāno ekattanayādhigamāya hoti. Yato “añño karoti, añño paṭisaṃvedayatī”tiādi
analyzed: udaya dassanena sijjhamānaḥ eka tta naya adhigamāya hoti yatas aññaḥ karoti aññaḥ paṭisaṃvedayati itiādi

original: vohārasiddhiyā ucchedadiṭṭhiyā anokāsatā. Tenāha “hetuphalasambandhenā”tiādi. Saṅkhārā
analyzed: vohāra siddhiyāḥ uccheda diṭṭhiyāḥ anokāsa tā tena āha hetu phala sambandhena atiādi saṅkhārāḥ

original: khaṇe khaṇe uppajjantīti ayamattho khaṇato udayadassanena sijjhamāno nānattanayādhigamāya
analyzed: khaṇe khaṇe uppajjanti iti ayam atthaḥ khaṇataḥ udaya dassanena sijjhamānaḥ nānat tanaya adhigamāya

original: hoti. Yato paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ sabhāvabhedāvabodhato “so karoti, so paṭisaṃvedayatī”tiādinayappavattāya
analyzed: hoti yatas paccaya paccaya uppannānam sabhāva bheda avabodhato so karoti so paṭisaṃvedayati iti ādi naya ppavattāya

original: sassatadiṭṭhiyā anokāsatā. Tenāha “khaṇato udayadassanenā”tiādi. Paccayato udayabbayadassanena
analyzed: anokāsa tā tena āha khaṇataḥ udaya dassanena atiādi paccayataḥ udaya bbaya dassanena

original: paccaye sati phalassa bhāvo, asati abhāvoti imassa atthassa siddhiyā atthitāmatteneva
analyzed: paccaye sati phalassa bhāvaḥ asati abhāvaḥ ti imassa atthassa siddhiyā atthi tā mattena iva

original: te dhammā kāraṇanti abyāpāranayo pākaṭo hoti. Yato attadiṭṭhiyā anokāsatā vasavattitāya
analyzed: te dhammā kāraṇanti a byāpāra nayaḥ pākaṭaḥ hoti yatas atta diṭṭhiyāḥ anokāsa tā vasa vatti tāya

original: alabbhaneyyato. Tena vuttaṃ “dhammāna”ntiādi. Avasavattibhāvo parāyattatā, sā ca
analyzed: tena vuttam dhamma ananti ādi avasavatti bhāvaḥ parāyatta tā sā ca

original: sappaccayatāya veditabbā. Paccayato udayadassanena tehi tehi paccayehi ime dhammā
analyzed: sappaccaya tāya veditabbā paccayataḥ udaya dassanena tehi tehi paccayehi ime dhammā

original: uppajjanti, uppajjamānā ca paccayānurūpameva uppajjantīti hetuphalassa hetuanurūpato
analyzed: uppajjanti uppajjamānā ca paccaya anurūpam eva uppajjanti iti hetu phalassa hetu anurūpato

original: siddhiyā akiriyadiṭṭhiyā anokāsatāvāti āha “paccayato panā”tiādi. Sati kāraṇe kuto
analyzed: siddhiyā a kiriya diṭṭhiyā anokāsa tāvā ti āha paccayato pana atiādi sati kāraṇe kutas

original: akiriyavādo. Karotīti hi kāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: akiriya vādaḥ karoti iti hi kāraṇam

analyzed: tam sa ādīnavam tena āha

original: Atthīti paccekaṃ. Na ca kvacani parassa attā atthīti parassa attano abhāvaṃ passati.
analyzed: atthi iti paccekam na ca kvacani parassa attā atthi iti parassa attanaḥ abhāvam passati

original: Tassa parassa attano mama kiñcanatā na catthīti parassa attano anattaniyataṃ passati.
analyzed: tassa parassa attanaḥ mama kiñcana tā na catthi iti parassa attanaḥ anatta niyatam passati

original: Evaṃ ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhā ca khandhānaṃ attattaniyasuññatā suddhasaṅkhārapuñjatā catukoṭikasuññatāpariggaṇhanena
analyzed: evam ajjhattam bahiddhā ca khandhānam attattaniya suñña tā suddha saṅkhāra puñja tā catu koṭika suñña tā pariggaṇhanena

original: diṭṭhā hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “evamaya”ntiādi.
analyzed: diṭṭhā hoti tena vuttam evam ayam tiādi

original: 761. “Chahākārehī”tiādinā niddesādīsu tattha tattha āgate pakāre suññatānupassanāya
analyzed: chahā ākārehi iti ādinā niddesa ādīsu tattha tattha āgate pakāre suññatā anupassanāya

original: paribrūhanaṃ saṅgahetvā dasseti. Tattha chahākārehīti chahi gahaṇākārehi, gahetabbākārehi
analyzed: paribrūhanam saṅgahetvā dasseti tattha chahā ākārehi iti chahi gahaṇa ākārehi gahetabba ākārehi

original: vā. Niccenāti “nicco”ti parikappitena attanā vā aññena vā kenaci. Niccenāti vā niccabhāvena.
analyzed: vā niccena ati nicco ti parikappitena attanā vā aññena vā kenacid niccena ati vā nicca bhāvena

original: Dhuvādayo “nicco”ti gahitasseva gahetabbākārā. Tabbibhāgena hi imassa chakkatā. Tattha
analyzed: dhuva ādayaḥ nicca uti gahitassa iva gahetabba ākārā tad bibhāgena hi imassa chakka tā tattha

original: niccatā nāma kūṭaṭṭhatā. Dhuvabhāvo thiratā. Sadā bhāvitā sassatatā. Nibbikāratā
analyzed: nicca tā nāma kūṭaṭṭha tā dhuva bhāvaḥ thira tā sadā bhāvitā sassata tā nibbikāra tā

original: avipariṇāmadhammatā. Yāva jarāmaraṇāti peyyālaṃ akatvā pariyosānapadameva dasseti.
analyzed: a vipariṇāma dhamma tā yāva jarā maraṇā ti peyyālam a katvā pariyosāna padam eva dasseti

original: 762. Na sāranti asāraṃ, natthi etassa sāranti nissāraṃ. Sārato apagataṃ, sāraṃ vā
analyzed: na sāranti asāram natthi etassa sāranti nissāram sārataḥ apagatam sāram vā

original: tato apagatanti sārāpagataṃ. Keci panettha “niccasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena vā
analyzed: tatas apagatanti sāra apagatam keci pana ittha nicca sāra sārena vā sukha sāra sārena vā

original: attasārasārena vā”ti pāḷīti adhippāyena “asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagata”nti padattayaṃ
analyzed: atta sāra sārena vāti pāḷī iti adhippāyena asāram nissāram sāra apagatanti

original: eko suññatāpariggahākāro, aññathā satteva ākārā siyuṃ, na aṭṭhāti vadanti. Apare
analyzed: ekaḥ suñña tā pariggaha ākāraḥ aññathā sattā iva ākārāḥ siyum na aṭṭhā ti vadanti apare

original: pana “subhasārasārenātipi pāḷiyaṃ atthīti ‘asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagata’nti idaṃ padattayaṃ
analyzed: pana atthi iti asāram nissāram sāra apagatam ti idam

original: ‘niccasārasārenā’tiādīsu paccekaṃ yojetabba”nti vadanti. Setavacchoti setavaruṇako.
analyzed: nicca sāra sārena ati ādīsu paccekam yojetabbanti vadanti setavaccho ti setavaruṇako

original: “Minarukkho”tipi vadanti. Pāḷibhaddakoti kiṃsuko.
analyzed: vadanti pāḷibhaddakā iti kiṃsuko

original: 763. Niccasārādīnaṃ abhāvato rittato passati. Parittato, lāmakattā vā tucchato. Attasārābhāvena
analyzed: nicca sāra ādīnam abhāvataḥ rittato passati parittataḥ lāmaka ttā vā tucchataḥ atta sāra abhāvena

original: suññato. Sayaṃ anattatāya anattato. Issariyassa abhāvato, kenaci issariyaṃ kāretuṃ
analyzed: suññatas sayam anatta tāya anattataḥ issariyassa abhāvataḥ kenaci issariyam kāretum

original: asakkuṇeyyatāya ca anissariyato. Pheṇapiṇḍena bhājanādiṃ kātukāmassa viya rūpassa
analyzed: a sakkuṇeyyatāya ca a nissariyataḥ pheṇa piṇḍena bhājana ādim kātu kāmassa viya rūpassa

original: niccatādiṃ kātukāmassa taṃ na sijjhati, sakaicchāvasena vā kāci kiriyā natthīti akāmakāriyato.
analyzed: nicca tā ādim kātu kāmassa tam na sijjhati saka ecchā vasena vā kāci kiriyā natthi iti akāmakāriyato

original: “Evaṃ rūpaṃ hotu, mā eva”nti alabbhanīyato. Sayaṃ aññassa vase na vattati, nāpi aññaṃ
analyzed: evam rūpam hotu mā evanti a labbhanīyataḥ sayam aññassa vase na vattati na api aññam

original: attano vase vattetīti avasavattakato. Yasmiṃ santāne sayaṃ tassa paro viya avidheyyatāya
analyzed: attanaḥ vase vatteti iti a vasa vattakataḥ yasmin santāne sayam tassa paras viya a vidheyya tāya

original: parato. Kārakādi viya kāraṇehi, phalena ca vivittato. Na hi kāraṇena phalaṃ, phalena
analyzed: paratas kāraka ādi viya kāraṇehi phalena ca na hi kāraṇena phalam phalena

original: vā kāraṇaṃ sagabbhaṃ tiṭṭhati. Esa nayo vedanādīsupi.
analyzed: vā kāraṇam sa gabbham tiṭṭhati esa nayaḥ vedanā ādīsu pi

original: 764. Rūpaṃ na sattotiādīsu yo lokavohārena satto, rūpaṃ so na hotīti ayamattho idha
analyzed: rūpam na satto ti ādīsu yaḥ lokavohārena sattaḥ rūpam saḥ na hoti iti ayam atthaḥ idha

original: nādhippeto tassāvuttasiddhattā. Na hi loko rūpamattaṃ “satto”ti voharati, bāhirakaparikappito
analyzed: na adhippeto na hi lokaḥ rūpa mattam satto ti voharati bāhiraka parikappito

original: pana attā “satto”ti adhippeto. So hi tehi rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya paresaṃ sañjāpanaṭṭhena
analyzed: pana attā satto ti adhippeto saḥ hi tehi rūpa ādīsu satta visatta tāya paresam sañjāpana ṭṭhena

original: “satto”ti vuccati, rūpaṃ so na hotīti attho. Suññatāpariggaṇhanañhetanti. Esa nayo
analyzed: satto ti vuccati rūpam so na hoti iti attho esa nayo

original: na jīvotiādīsupi. Tattha jīvanaṭṭhena jīvo. Naranaṭṭhena netubhāvena naro. “Ahamasmī”ti
analyzed: na jīvaḥ ti ādīsu pi tattha jīva naṭṭhena jīvaḥ netu bhāvena naraḥ aham asmi iti

original: mānuppattiṭṭhānatāya māno ettha vāti pavattatīti mānavo. Thiyati ettha gabbhoti itthī.
analyzed: māna uppatti ṭṭhāna tāya māno ettha vāti pavattati iti mānavaḥ thiyati ettha gabbho ti itthī

original: Padhānabhāvena puri setīti puriso. Āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti attā. Paccattaṃ tassa tassa
analyzed: padhāna bhāvena seti iti purisaḥ āhitaḥ ahaṃmānaḥ ettha ati attā paccattam tassa tassa

original: ahaṃkāravatthutāya “aha”nti ca diṭṭhigatikehi attā vuccati, rūpaṃ pana tādisaṃ na
analyzed: ahaṃkāra vatthu tāya ahanti ca diṭṭhi gatikehi attā vuccati rūpam pana tādisam na

original: hotīti suññatāpariggaṇhanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ na satto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tasmā aṭṭhahipi
analyzed: hoti iti suñña tā pariggaṇhana vidhim dassetum rūpam na sattā itiādi vuttam tasmai

original: padehi rūpassa attasuññatāva dassitā. Itarehi catūhi tassa kiñcanatābhāvo. Tattha
analyzed: padehi rūpassa dassitā itarehi catūhi tassa kiñcana tā bhāvo tattha

original: na mamāti mayhaṃ attano santakaṃ na hoti, tathā aññassa attano santakaṃ na hoti,
analyzed: na mama ati mayham attanaḥ santakam na hoti tathā aññassa attanaḥ santakam na hoti

original: kassacipi attano santakaṃ na hoti attanoyeva abhāvato. “Na attaniya”nti padena pakāsito
analyzed: kassaci pi attano santakam na hoti attano yā iva abhāvataḥ na padena pakāsito

original: evattho pariyāyantarehi tīhipi padehi pakāsito. Esa nayo vedanādīsupi.
analyzed: evatthaḥ pariyāya antarehi tīhi pi padehi pakāsitaḥ esa nayaḥ vedanā ādīsu pi

original: 765. Heṭṭhā kalāpasammasanassa daḷhabhāvāya vuttasammasananayāpi suññatānupassanāya
analyzed: heṭṭhā kalāpa sammasanassa daḷha bhāvāya vutta sammasana nayā api suññatā anupassanāya

original: daḷhabhāvāya saṃvattantīti dassento “tīraṇapariññāvasenā”tiādimāha. Tattha bhayassa
analyzed: daḷha bhāvāya saṃvattanti iti dassentaḥ tīraṇa pariññā vasena ati ādim āha tattha bhayassa

original: ahiṃsanena asaraṇato. “Saraṇa”nti gahetuṃ ayuttatāya asaraṇībhūtato. “Anassādato”ti
analyzed: a hiṃsanena a saraṇataḥ gahetum ayutta tāya a saraṇībhūtataḥ

original: idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ natthi. Sati ca tecattālīsa ākārā siyuṃ. Rūpappavattiyaṃ sabbādīnavūpaladdhiyā
analyzed: idam pāḷiyam natthi sati ca tecattālīsaḥ ākārāḥ siyum rūpa ppavattiyam sabba ādīnava upaladdhiyā

original: ādīnavato. “Samudayato atthaṅgamato”ti idaṃ dvayaṃ yathā aniccato dassanaṃ panāḷikāya,
analyzed: ādīnavataḥ samudayataḥ atthaṅgamato ti idam dvayam yathā aniccataḥ dassanam

original: niccasāravirahadīpanena vā suññatāvibhāvanaṃ hoti, evaṃ suññatāvibhāvananti katvā
analyzed: nicca sāra viraha dīpanena vā suñña tā vibhāvanam hoti evam suñña tā vibhāvanam ti katvā

original: vuttaṃ. Tathā “yaṃ kho rūpaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ rūpassa assādo”ti
analyzed: vuttam tathā yam kho rūpam paṭicca uppajjati sukham somanassam ayam rūpassa assādaḥ ti

original: dassanaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatāvibhāvanena suññatāvibhāvanaṃ. “Yaṃ rūpaṃ aniccaṃ
analyzed: dassanam paccaya paccaya uppanna tā vibhāvanena suñña tā vibhāvanam yam rūpam aniccam

original: dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, ayaṃ rūpassa ādīnavo”ti ca dassanaṃ niccatādisuññatābhāvanato.
analyzed: dukkham vipariṇāma dhammam ayam rūpassa ādīnavaḥ ti ca dassanam nicca tā ādi suñña tā bhāvanato

original: Tathā “yo rūpe chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ rūpassa nissaraṇa”nti evaṃ
analyzed: tathā yaḥ rūpe chanda rāga vinayaḥ chanda rāga pahānam idam rūpassa nissaraṇaṃ ti evam

original: samudayādidassanānaṃ, itaresañca yathārahaṃ suññatānupassanānubrūhanatā daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: samudaya ādi dassanānam itaresam ca yathāraham suñña tā anupassana anubrūhana tā daṭṭhabbā

original: Yaṃ pana ādīnavato dassanaṃ, pubbe vatvāpi puna vacanaṃ assādapaṭikkhepato dassanaṃ
analyzed: yam pana ādīnavataḥ dassanam pubbe vatvā api puna vacanam assāda paṭikkhepataḥ dassanam

original: sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Vedanādīsupi dvācattālīsa
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam ti veditabbam sesam heṭṭhā vutta nayam eva vedanā ādīsu pi dvācattālīsa

original: ākārā netabbāti āha “vedanaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ aniccato…pe… nissaraṇato passatī”ti.
analyzed: ākārāḥ netabbā ti āha vedanaṃ pe viññāṇam anicca tā pe nissaraṇato passati iti

original: Vuttampi ca niddese etaṃ suññatāpariggaṇhanakathāsandassanaṃ “asukāya pāḷiyā ayaṃ niddeso”ti dassanatthaṃ, tassa phalasandassanatthañca.
analyzed: vuttam pi ca niddese etam suñña tā pariggaṇhana kathā sandassanam asukāya pāḷiyā ayam niddeso ti dassana attham tassa phala sandassana ttham ca

original: 766. Evaṃ tīraṇapariññāvasena paccekaṃ khandhesu dvācattālīsāya ākārehi suññataṃ
analyzed: evam tīraṇa pariññā vasena paccekam khandhesu dvācattālīsāya ākārehi suññatam

original: pariggahetvāpi tividhānupassanāvaseneva bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇuppattīti
analyzed: pariggahetvā api tividha anupassanā vasena iva bhāvanam anuyuñjantassa saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇa uppatti iti

original: dassento “evaṃ suññato”tiādimāha. Tattha pariggaṇhantoti sammasanto. Bhayañca nandiñca
analyzed: dassentaḥ evam suññato tiādim āha tattha pariggaṇhanto ti sammasantaḥ bhayam ca nandiñca

original: vippahāyāti ajjhupekkhakatāya saṅkhārānaṃ vipattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakabhayañceva
analyzed: vippahāya ati ajjhupekkhaka tāya saṅkhārānam vipattim nissāya uppajjanaka bhayam ca eva

original: tesaṃ sampattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakapītiñca pajahitvā. Atha vā bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena
analyzed: tesam sampattim nissāya uppajjanaka pītim ca pajahitvā atha vā

original: uppajjanakañāṇabhayañca sammasanavasena uppajjanakapītisaṅkhātaṃ nandiñca pahāya.
analyzed: uppajjanaka ñāṇa bhayam ca sammasana vasena uppajjanaka pīti saṅkhātam nandim ca pahāya

original: Na hi sabbaso suññatāya diṭṭhāya bhayanandīnaṃ avasaro atthi, atha kho upekkhāva
analyzed: na hi sabbaso suññatāya diṭṭhāya bhaya nandīnam avasaraḥ atthi atha kho upekkhāva

original: saṇṭhāti. Tenāha “saṅkhāresu udāsīno hotī”ti. Tattha yena micchāgāhena anudāsīnatā
analyzed: tena āha saṅkhāresu udāsīnaḥ hoti iti tattha yena micchāgāhena anudāsīna tā

original: siyā, tadabhāvaṃ dassento “ahanti vā mamanti vā na gaṇhātī”ti āha. Idānissa udāsīnatāya
analyzed: siyā tad abhāvam dassentaḥ ahanti vā mamanti vā na gaṇhāti iti āha idāni issaḥ udāsīna tāya

original: upamaṃ dassento “vissaṭṭhabhariyo viya puriso”tiādimāha.
analyzed: upamam dassentaḥ vissaṭṭha bhariyaḥ viya purisaḥ iti ādim āha

original: Tattha anudāsīnatāpubbikā udāsīnatā vuccamānā idha opammatthaṃ pharatīti dassetuṃ
analyzed: tattha anudāsīna tā pubbikā udāsīna tā vuccamānā idha opamma attham pharati iti dassetum

original: “iṭṭhā kantā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ativiya naṃ mamāyeyya itthīnaṃ sāṭheyyakūṭeyyavaṅkeyyādīnaṃ
analyzed: iṭṭhā kantā atiādi vuttam ativiya nam itthīnam sāṭheyya kūṭeyya vaṅkeyya ādīnam

original: ajānanato. Muñcitukāmo hutvāti muñcitukāmova hutvā, taṃ vissajjeyya nirapekkhatāya
analyzed: a jānanataḥ muñcitu kāmaḥ hutvā ati muñcitu kāmaḥ iva hutvā tam vissajjeyya nirapekkha tāya

original: vasenevāti adhippāyo. Ayaṃ yogāvacaro. Muñcitukāmatāya uddhaṃ yāva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ
analyzed: vasena iva ati adhippāyaḥ ayam yogāvacaraḥ muñcitu kāma tāya uddham yāva saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇam

original: na uppajjati, tāva pavattā vipassanā paṭisaṅkhānupassanā evāti āha “paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya
analyzed: na uppajjati tāva pavattā vipassanā paṭisaṅkhā anupassanā eva ati āha paṭisaṅkhā anupassanāya

original: saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto”ti.
analyzed: saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto ti

original: Patilīyatīti ekapassena nilīyati nilīnaṃ viya hoti. Patikuṭatīti saṅkucati. Paṭivaṭṭatīti vivaṭṭati. Na sampasāriyatīti na visarati, abhirativasena na pakkhandatīti attho.
analyzed: patilīyati iti eka passena nilīyati nilīnam viya hoti patikuṭati iti saṅkucati paṭivaṭṭati iti vivaṭṭati na sampasāriyati iti na visarati abhirati vasena na pakkhandati iti attho

original: Iccassāti iti evaṃ assa yogino.
analyzed: iti evam assa yoginaḥ

original: 767. Tikkhavisadasūrabhāvena saṅkhāresu ajjhupekkhane sijjhamāne taṃ panetaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ
analyzed: tikkha visada sūra bhāvena saṅkhāresu ajjhupekkhane sijjhamāne tam pana itam saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇam

original: anekavāraṃ pavattamānaṃ paripākagamanena anulomañāṇassa paccayabhāvaṃ gacchantaṃ
analyzed: aneka vāram pavattamānam paripāka gamanena anuloma ñāṇassa paccaya bhāvam gacchantam

original: nibbānaṃ santato passati nāma. Tathābhūtañca sabbaṃ saṅkhārappavattaṃ vissajjetvā
analyzed: nibbānam santataḥ passati nāma tathābhūtam ca sabbam saṅkhāra ppavattam vissajjetvā

original: nibbānameva pakkhandati nāma. Tayidaṃ idha ñāṇaṃ anulomagotrabhuñāṇehi saddhiṃ ekattaṃ
analyzed: nibbānam eva pakkhandati nāma tayā idam idha ñāṇam anuloma gotra bhuñāṇehi saddhim ekattam

original: netvā vuttaṃ ekattanayavasena. No ce nibbānaṃ santato passatīti tāva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa
analyzed: netvā vuttam ekatta naya vasena no ce nibbānam santataḥ passati iti tāva saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇassa

original: aparipakkatamevāha. Samuddaṃ tarantīti sāmuddikā, saṃyattikā. Disājānanako kāko disākāko,
analyzed: a paripakka tam eva āha samuddam taranti iti sāmuddikā saṃyattikā disājānanakaḥ kākaḥ disākāko

original: lakkhaṇamattañcetaṃ yo koci tādiso sakunto veditabbo. Videsanti adesaṃ samudde aparicitaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa mattam ca itam yaḥ koci tādisaḥ sakuntaḥ veditabbaḥ adesam samudde a paricita ṭṭhānam

original: Anugantvāti anu anu gantvā.
analyzed: anugantvā ati anu anu gantvā

original: Tayidaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Piṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭayamānaṃ viyāti thūlathūlato vivecanavasena nipphoṭiyamānaṃ
analyzed: tayā idam vipassanā ñāṇam piṭṭham vaṭṭayamānam viyāti thūla thūlataḥ vivecana vasena nipphoṭiyamānam

original: saṇhaṃ saṇhaṃ piṭṭhacuṇṇaṃ viya. Nibbaṭṭitakappāsanti nibbaṭṭitabījaṃ kappāsaṃ. Vihanamānaṃ
analyzed: saṇham saṇham piṭṭha cuṇṇam viya nibbaṭṭita kappāsanti nibbaṭṭita bījam kappāsam vihanamānam

original: viyāti dhanukena vihaññamānaṃ viya. Upamādvayenapi punappunaṃ sammasanena vipassanāñāṇassa
analyzed: viyā ati dhanukena vihaññamānam viya upamā dvayena api punappunam sammasanena vipassanā ñāṇassa

original: sukhumatarabhāvāpattimāha. Yathā yathā hi vipassanābhāvanābalena tikkhā, visadā,
analyzed: sukhumatara bhāva āpattim āha yathā yathā hi vipassanā bhāvanā balena tikkhā visadā

original: sūrā ca hoti, tathā tathā sukhumatarāpi hotīti. Saṅkhāravicinaneti pavicayassa sikhāppattatāya
analyzed: sūrā ca hoti tathā tathā sukhumatarā api hoti iti saṅkhāra vicinanā iti pavicayassa sikhā appatta tāya

original: saṅkhāresu viya tesaṃ vicinanepi udāsīnaṃ hutvā tividhānupassanāvasena tiṭṭhati pakārantarassa

original: manosamuttejana, samanupassanapadānīti vadanti, “sabbasaṅkhāre”tiādīni pana tīṇi

analyzed: padānam vutta ttā eva pañha vissajjane ti aniccataḥ manasi karotaḥ katham saṅkhārāḥ upaṭṭhahanti iti

analyzed: pañhassa vissajjane

analyzed: evam vimokkha mukhāni dassetvā idāni vimokkhe dassetum katame pana atiādi vuttam

original: bhavaṅgavasena vattituṃ adatvā. Visadisacittapavattisaṅkhātāya vīciyā abhāvena avīcikā,

original: cittasantati. Kiriyamanodhātuyā hi bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite kiriyamayacittapavattivipākacittuppattiyā
analyzed: citta santati kiriya manaḥ dhātuyāḥ hi bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite kiriya maya citta pavatti vipāka citta uppattiyā

original: savīcikā santarā, na evaṃ manodvārāvajjanenāti vuttaṃ “avīcikaṃ cittasantatiṃ anuppabandhamāna”nti.
analyzed: sa vīcikā santarā na evam manaḥ dvāra āvajjanena ati vuttam avīcikam citta santatim an uppabandhamānam ti

original: Tathevāti yathā atītāsu dvattiṃsajavanavīthīsu saṅkhārupekkhā “aniccā”ti vā “dukkhā”ti
analyzed: tathā iva iti yathā atītāsu dvattiṃsa javana vīthīsu saṅkhāra upekkhā aniccā ati vā dukkhā ati

original: vā “anattā”ti vā saṅkhāre ārammaṇamakāsi, tatheva. Parikammanti vuccati maggassa
analyzed: vā anattā ati vā saṅkhāre ārammaṇam akāsi tathā iva parikammanti vuccati maggassa

original: parikammattā paṭisaṅkhārakattā. Upacāranti vuccati maggassa āsannattā, samīpacārikattā
analyzed: parikamma ttā paṭisaṅkhāraka ttā upacāranti vuccati maggassa āsanna ttā samīpa cārika ttā

original: vā. Anulomattaṃ sayameva vadati.
analyzed: vai anulomattam sayam eva vadati

original: Ayañca nayo kāmaṃ maggavīthiyaṃ paṭhamajavanassa paṭisaṅkharaṇaṭṭho, dutiyassa tato
analyzed: ayam ca nayo kāmam magga vīthiyam paṭhama javanassa paṭisaṅkharaṇa ṭṭhaḥ dutiyassa tatas

original: āsannaṭṭho, tatiyassa heṭṭhimuparimānaṃ anulomaṭṭho ca yuttoti vutto, tathāpi sabbesampi
analyzed: āsanna ṭhaḥ tatiyassa heṭṭhim uparimānam anuloma ṭṭhaḥ ca yuttaḥ iti vuttaḥ tathā api sabbesam pi

original: imā samaññā sambhavantīti dassetuṃ “avisesena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha āsevananti
analyzed: imāḥ samaññā sambhavanti iti dassetum avisesena pana atiādi vuttam tattha āsevananti

original: ādarena sevanaṃ. Purimabhāgapacchimabhāgānanti heṭṭhimānaṃ, uparimānañca dhammakoṭṭhāsānaṃ.
analyzed: ādarena sevanam purima bhāga pacchima bhāgānam ti heṭṭhimānam uparimānam ca dhammakoṭṭhāsānam

original: Aṭṭhannanti udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ. Sabbāpi vipassanā lakkhaṇattayasammasanakiccāva,
analyzed: aṭṭhannam ti udaya bbaya ñāṇa ādīnam aṭṭhannam sabbā api vipassanā lakkhaṇa ttaya sammasana kiccā ava

original: idampi tathevāti vuttaṃ “tathakiccatāyā”ti. Uparīti magge. Bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ
analyzed: idam pi tathā iva ati vuttam tatha kicca tāya ati upari iti magge bodhi pakkhiya dhammānam

original: tathakiccatāya anulometi sammosādipaṭipakkhavidhamanato. Idāni anulomañāṇassa tadubhayakiccānulomaṃ
analyzed: tathā kicca tāya anulomā iti sammosa ādi paṭipakkha vidhamanataḥ idāni anuloma ñāṇassa tad ubhaya kicca anulomam

original: vitthārato dassetuṃ “tañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha anulomañāṇaṃ saccapaṭicchādakamohakkhandhādīnaṃ
analyzed: vitthārataḥ dassetum tat hi itiādi vuttam tattha anuloma ñāṇam sacca paṭicchādaka moha kkhandha ādīnam

original: sātisayaṃ vidhamanena lokiyañāṇesu ukkaṃsapariyantagataṃ, tato eva heṭṭhā nibbattitaudayabbayañāṇādīnampi
analyzed: sa atisayam vidhamanena lokiya ñāṇesu ukkaṃsa pariyanta gatam tatas eva heṭṭhā nibbattita udayabbaya ñāṇa ādīnam pi

original: kiccaṃ paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena atthato sādhentameva hutvā pavattati, tathāpavattamānañca
analyzed: kiccam paṭipakkha dūrībhāvena atthataḥ sādhentam eva hutvā pavattati tathā pavattamānam ca

original: tesaṃ kiccaṃ anulomentaṃ viya hotīti āha “udayabbayavantānaṃ…pe… tathakiccatāya anulometī”ti.
analyzed: tesam kiccam anulomentam viya hoti iti āha udaya bbayavantānam pe tatha kiccatāya anulometi iti

original: Tattha “bhayato upaṭṭhita”nti imināpi ārammaṇasīsena ñāṇabyāpārameva vadati sappaṭibhayānaṃ
analyzed: tattha bhayataḥ upaṭṭhitan ti iminā api ārammaṇa sīsena ñāṇa byāpāram eva vadati sa paṭibha yānam

original: saṅkhārānaṃ yathāsabhāvadassanadīpanato. Sesesu pana sattasupi ṭhānesu ñāṇabyāpārova
analyzed: saṅkhārānam yathā sabhāva dassana dīpanato sesesu pana sattasu pi ṭhānesu ñāṇa byāpāraḥ uva

original: dassito. Yasmā etaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ aniccādīsu aññataralakkhaṇavaseneva saṅkhāre ārabbha
analyzed: dassitaḥ yasmai etam anuloma ñāṇam anicca ādīsu aññatara lakkhaṇa vasena iva saṅkhāre ārabbha

original: pavattati, tasmā vuttaṃ “aniccalakkhaṇādivasena saṅkhāre ārabbha pavattattā”ti. Tāya
analyzed: pavattati tasmā vuttam anicca lakkhaṇa ādi vasena saṅkhāre ārabbha pavatta ttā ti tāya

original: paṭipattiyāti yā sā anulomañāṇassa thūlathūlasaccapaṭicchādakasaṃkilesavikkhambhanapaṭipatti,
analyzed: paṭipattiyā ti yā sā anuloma ñāṇassa thūla thūla sacca paṭicchādaka saṃkilesa vikkhambhana paṭipatti

original: tāya. Na hi anulomañāṇe tathā anuppanne gotrabhuñāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ālambituṃ sakkoti,
analyzed: tāya na hi anuloma ñāṇe tathā anuppanne gotrabhu ñāṇam nibbānam ālambitum sakkoti

original: gotrabhuñāṇe vā anuppanne maggañāṇaṃ uppajjatīti.
analyzed: gotra bhuñāṇe vā anuppanne magga ñāṇam uppajjati iti

original: Vuttamatthaṃ opammena pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha aṭṭhannaṃ
analyzed: vutta mattham opammena pākaṭataram kātum yathā hi itiādi vuttam tattha aṭṭhannam

original: vohārikamahāmattānaṃ agatigamanaṃ pahāya taṃtaṃvinicchayakaraṇaṃ viya aṭṭhannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ
analyzed: vohārika mahāmattānam agati gamanam pahāya taṃ taṃ vinicchaya karaṇam viya aṭṭhannam ñāṇānam

original: yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ pahāya saṅkhāresu udayabbayādipaṭipatti, rañño majjhattabhāvo
analyzed: yathāsakam paṭipakkham pahāya saṅkhāresu udaya bbaya ādi paṭipatti raññaḥ majjhatta bhāvaḥ

original: viya anulomañāṇassa purimapacchimadhammakoṭṭhāsassa anukūlatā. Tenevāti heṭṭhimañāṇānaṃ
analyzed: viya anuloma ñāṇassa purima pacchima dhamma koṭṭhāsassa anukūla tā tena iva ati heṭṭhima ñāṇānam

original: anulomanamukhena uparibodhipakkhiyānaṃ anulomanatoyeva. Saccānulomikanti vuccati
analyzed: anulomana mukhena upari bodhi pakkhiyānam anulomana toyā iva sacca ānulomikanti vuccati

original: maggasaccassa anulomikattā.
analyzed: maggasaccassa anulomika ttā

original: Anulomañāṇaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: anuloma ñāṇam niṭṭhitam

original: Vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanākathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: vuṭṭhāna gāminī vipassanā kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 805. Kiñci asaṅkhatārammaṇampi ñāṇaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā ekasaṅgahanti katvā “saṅkhārārammaṇāyā”ti
analyzed: kiñci asaṅkhata ārammaṇam pi ñāṇam vuṭṭhāna gāminiyā eka saṅgahanti katvā saṅkhāra ārammaṇāya ati

original: visesanaṃ kataṃ. Tañhi visesato vuṭṭhānaṃ ariyamaggaṃ gacchati upetīti vuṭṭhānagāminīti
analyzed: visesanam katam tat hi visesataḥ vuṭṭhānam ariya maggam gacchati upeti iti vuṭṭhāna gāminī iti

original: vattabbataṃ labhati. Tenāha “sabbena sabba”ntiādi. Asammohatthanti tattha tattha
analyzed: vattabba tam labhati tena āha sabbena sabba ntiādi asammoha atthanti tattha tattha

original: sutte pariyāyantarehi āgatāya sammohābhāvatthaṃ. Suttasaṃsandanāti suttānaṃ tesaṃ
analyzed: sutte āgatāya sammoha abhāva attham sutta saṃsandanā ati suttānam tesam

original: tesaṃ suttapadānaṃ anusandānaṃ.
analyzed: tesam sutta padānam anusandānam

original: Ye lokiye saṅkhāre ārabbha anulomapariyosānā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā pavattati, taṃsannissitā
analyzed: ye lokiye saṅkhāre ārabbha anuloma pariyosānā vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanā pavattati tad sannissitā

original: tappaṭibaddhā taṇhā tehi vinā appavattanato tammayā nāma, tammayāva tammayatā, tammayā
analyzed: tad paṭibaddhā taṇhā tehi vinā appavattanato tammayā nāma tammayā ava tammaya tā tammayā

original: vā taṇhāsampayuttā khandhā, tesaṃ bhāvo tammayatā, sā eva taṇhā. Tappaṭipakkhā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā
analyzed: vā taṇhā sampayuttā khandhā tesam bhāvaḥ tad maya tā sā eva taṇhā tad paṭipakkhā vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanā

original: atammayatā. Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tammayatā nāma taṇhā, tassā pariyādiyanato
analyzed: a tammaya tā tena vuttam aṭṭhakathāyam tammaya tā nāma taṇhā tassā pariyādiyanato

original: vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā atammayatāti vuccatī”ti. Nissāyāti taṃ atammayataṃ nissayaṃ
analyzed: vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanā atammayatā ati vuccati iti nissāya ati tam atammayatam nissayam

original: katvā, bhāvetvāti attho. Ekattāti ettha ayaṃ pāḷi “atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā rūpesu…pe…
analyzed: katvā bhāvetvā iti atthaḥ ekattā ati ettha ayam pāḷi atthi bhikkhave upekkhā

original: phoṭṭhabbesu, ayaṃ, bhikkhave, upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā”ti, sayampi nānāsabhāvā,
analyzed: phoṭṭhabbesu ayam bhikkhave upekkhā nānattā nānatta sitā ati sayam pi nānā sabhāvā

original: nānārammaṇanissitā cāti attho. Sā pana samādhisampayuttā vipassanupekkhā veditabbā.
analyzed: nānā ārammaṇa nissitā ca ati attho sā pana samādhi sampayuttā vipassanā upekkhā veditabbā

original: “Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā ākāsānañcāyatananissitā…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatananissitā,
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave upekkhā ākāsa nañca āyatana nissitā āpe nevasaññānāsaññāyatana nissitā

original: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā”ti. Yā hi taṃtaṃarūpacittuppādapariyāpannā
analyzed: ayam bhikkhave upekkhā ekattā ekatta sitā ati yā hi taṃtaṃa rūpa cittuppāda pariyāpannā

original: upekkhā, sā ekasabhāvattā, ekārammaṇattā ca ekattā, ekattasitā cāti vuccati, sā pana
analyzed: upekkhā sā eka sabhāva ttā eka ārammaṇa ttā ca ekattā ekatta sitā ca ati vuccati sā pana

original: taṃtaṃjhānasahagatavedanupekkhā ca tadārammaṇavipassanupekkhā cāti vadanti. Taṃ pajahathāti
analyzed: tad tad jhāna sahagata vedan upekkhā ca tad ārammaṇa vipassan upekkhā ca ati vadanti tam pajahatha ati

original: tadārammaṇakilesapahānena pajahatha. Tenāha “taṃ samatikkamathā”ti.
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa kilesa pahānena pajahatha tena āha tam samatikkamatha iti

original: Nibbidāti vuṭṭhānagāminī. Tattha hi sutte virajjatīti maggakiccamāha, vimuccatīti phalakiccaṃ.
analyzed: nibbidā ti vuṭṭhāna gāminī tattha hi sutte virajjati iti magga kiccam āha vimuccati iti phala kiccam

original: Susimasuttaṃ nidānavagge. Tattha dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminīti vuttā dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ paṭiccasamuppāde asammuyhanavasena pavattanato. Nibbāne ñāṇanti maggañāṇamāha.
Saññā kho, poṭṭhapādāti ettha kāmaṃ “saññā”icceva vuccati, pubbe pana “saññaggaṃ phusatī”ti vuttattā āha “saññagganti vuttā”ti.
analyzed: saññā kho poṭṭhapādā ti ettha kāmam vuccati pubbe pana saññaggam phusati iti vuttattā āha saññaggam ti vuttā ati

original: Paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīti tadekadesabhūtā vuṭṭhānagāminī vuttā. Samudāyesu hi pavattā vohārā avayavesupi pavattantīti. Pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅganti pārisuddhiyā padhānakāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: paṭipadā ñāṇa dassana visuddhī iti tad eka desa bhūtā vuṭṭhāna gāminī vuttā samudāyesu hi pavattāḥ vohārāḥ avayavesu pi pavattanti iti pārisuddhi padhāniyaṅganti pārisuddhiyā padhāna kāraṇam

original: Tīhi nāmehīti anulomagotrabhuvodānasaṅkhātehi tīhi nāmehi.
analyzed: tīhi nāmehi iti anuloma gotra bhuvaḥ udāna saṅkhātehi tīhi nāmehi

original: Kittitāti thomitā ariyamaggādhiṭṭhānatāya. Mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esanaṭṭhena mahesinā sammāsambuddhena. Santakilesatāya santā. Yoganti bhāvanaṃ, bhāvanābhiyogaṃ vā.
analyzed: kittitā ati thomitā ariya magga adhiṭṭhāna tāya mahantānam sīla kkhandha ādīnam esanaṭṭhena mahesinā sammāsambuddhena santa kilesa tāya santāḥ bhāvanam bhāvanā abhiyogam vā

original: Paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: paṭipad āñāṇa dassana visuddhi niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Iti ekavīsatimaparicchedavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: iti ekavīsatima pariccheda vaṇṇanā

original: 22. Ñāṇadassanavisuddhiniddesavaṇṇanā
Paṭhamamaggañāṇakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: paṭhama magga ñāṇa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 806. Idāni ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā niddese anuppatte sā yassa ñāṇassa anantaraṃ uppajjati,
analyzed: idāni ñāṇa dassana visuddhiyāḥ niddese an uppatte sā yassa ñāṇassa anantaram uppajjati

original: taṃ tāva dassento “ito paraṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ hotī”ti āha. Ito paranti ito anulomañāṇato
analyzed: tam tāva dassentaḥ itas param gotra bhuñāṇam hoti iti āha itas param ti itas anuloma ñāṇato

original: upari. Tanti gotrabhuñāṇaṃ. Neva paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ bhajati aniccādivasena
analyzed: upari gotra bhuñāṇam na iva paṭipad āñāṇa dassana visuddhim bhajati anicca ādi vasena

original: saṅkhārānaṃ aggahaṇato. Na ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ bhajati satipi nibbānārammaṇatte
analyzed: saṅkhārānam aggahaṇataḥ na ñāṇa dassana visuddhim bhajati sati pi nibbāna ārammaṇa tte

original: kilesānaṃ akhepanato. Tato evetaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ visayaṃ uddesantaṃ dassanakiccaṃ
analyzed: kilesānaṃ a khepanato tatas eva itam viññāṇa dhātūnam visayam dassana kiccam

original: karontaṃ kiriyamanodhātu viya maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṃ vuccati. Antarāti chaṭṭhasattamavisuddhīnaṃ
analyzed: karontam kiriya manaḥ dhātu viya maggassa āvajjana ṭṭhāniyam vuccati chaṭṭha sattama visuddhīnam

original: vemajjhe. Abbohārikameva hoti ubhayavisuddhilakkhaṇatābhāvato. Tathāpi vuṭṭhānagāminiyā
analyzed: vemajjhe abbohārikam eva hoti ubhaya visuddhi lakkhaṇa tā bhāvato tathā api vuṭṭhāna gāminiyā

original: pariyosānatāya vipassanāpakkhikaṃ. Tenevassa taṃsotapatitatā. Tenāha “vipassanāsote…pe…
analyzed: pariyosāna tāya vipassanā pakkhikam tena iva assa taṃsa uta patita tā tena āha vipassanā sotepe

original: saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti. Etenassa paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhibhajanaṃ dasseti. Sotassa
analyzed: saṅkham gacchati iti etena assa paṭipadā ñāṇa dassana visuddhi bhajanam dasseti sotassa

original: ariyassaādito pajjanaṃ sotāpatti, so eva maggo, sotaṃ vā ariyaṃ ādito pajjati adhigacchatīti
analyzed: ariyassa āditas pajjanam sotāpatti saḥ eva maggo sotam vai ariyam āditas pajjati adhigacchati iti

original: sotāpatti, paṭhamako. Tassa maggo sotāpattimaggo. Paṭisandhivasena sakideva imaṃ
analyzed: sotāpatti paṭhamako tassa maggo sotāpatti maggo paṭisandhi vasena imaṃ

original: manussalokaṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī, tassa maggo sakadāgāmimaggo. Paṭisandhivasena
analyzed: manussa lokam āgacchati iti sakadāgāmī tassa maggo sakadāgāmi maggo paṭisandhi vasena

original: kāmabhavaṃ na āgacchatīti anāgāmī, tassa maggo anāgāmimaggo. Kilesādīnaṃ hananādinā
analyzed: kāma bhavam naḥ āgacchati iti anāgāmī tassa maggaḥ anāgāmi maggaḥ kilesa ādīnam hanana ādinā

original: arahaṃ, aggamaggaṭṭho. Tassa bhāvo arahattaṃ, so eva maggoti arahattamaggo. Catūsu
analyzed: araham tassa bhāvaḥ arahattam saḥ eva maggo ti arahatta maggo catūsu

original: maggesu ñāṇaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
analyzed: maggesu ñāṇam ekajjham gahetvā ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma

original: Tehi tīhipīti heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ anulomañāṇānaṃ vuttattā vuttaṃ, tīsu vā dvinnaṃ antogadhattā.
analyzed: tehi tīhi pi iti heṭṭhā tiṇṇam anulomañāṇānam vutta ttā vuttam tīsu vā dvinnam antogadha ttā

original: Tīhipīti vā vikappantarasampiṇḍanattho pi-saddo, tena tīhipi dvīhipīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tīhi pi iti vā vikappa antara sampiṇḍana tthaḥ pi saddo tena tīhi pi dvīhi pi iti vuttam hoti

original: Attano balānurūpenāti attano attano ānubhāvānukūlaṃ. Paṭhamañhi anulomañāṇaṃ sabboḷārikaṃ,
analyzed: attanaḥ bala anurūpena ati attanaḥ attanaḥ ānubhāva anukūlam paṭhamam hi anuloma ñāṇam sabboḷārikam

original: dutiyaṃ tato nātioḷārikaṃ, tatiyaṃ tato nātioḷārikaṃ tamaṃ antaradhāpeti. Atha vā
analyzed: dutiyam tatas na ati oḷārikam tatiyam tatas na ati oḷārikam tamam antaradhāpeti atha vā

original: balānurūpenāti heṭṭhā saṅkhārupekkhāya āhitabalānurūpena. Pubbābhisaṅkhāravasena
analyzed: bala anurūpena ati heṭṭhā saṅkhāra upekkhāya āhita bala anurūpena pubba abhisaṅkhāra vasena

original: hi anulomañāṇassāpi maggañāṇassa viya saddhāvimuttadiṭṭhippattānaṃ pavattiākārasiddho
analyzed: hi anuloma ñāṇassa api magga ñāṇassa viya saddhā vimutta diṭṭhi ppattānam pavatti ākāra siddho

original: attheva mudutikkhatāviseso. Palibodhato upaṭṭhāti palibodhabhāvapaṭicchādakassa tamassa

original: Dutiyañāṇaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: dutiya ñāṇam niṭṭhitam

original: Tatiyamaggañāṇakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: tatiya magga ñāṇa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 814. Sakidevāti ekavāraṃyeva. “Imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā”ti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro
analyzed: sakideva ati eka vāraṃya iva imam lokam āgantvā ati iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro

original: vajjetvā ekova gahito. Ekacco idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva loke parinibbāti,
analyzed: vajjetvā ekaḥ iva gahitaḥ ekaccaḥ idha sakadāgāmi phalam patvā idha iva loke parinibbāti

original: ekacco idha patvā devaloke parinibbāti, ekacco devaloke patvā tattheva parinibbāti,
analyzed: ekaccaḥ idha patvā deva loke parinibbāti ekaccaḥ deva loke patvā tattha iva parinibbāti

original: ekacco devaloke patvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāti. Ime cattāropi idha na gahitā. Yo
analyzed: ekaccaḥ deva loke patvā idhu upapajjitvā parinibbāti ime cattāraḥ api idha na gahitā

original: pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāti, ayaṃ
analyzed: pana idha patvā deva loke yāvatāyukam vasitvā punar idhu upapajjitvā parinibbāti ayam

original: ekova idha gahitoti veditabbo.
analyzed: ekaḥ u vā idha gahito ti veditabbo

original: Kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ anavasesappahānāyāti tesaṃyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanukatānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ niravasesappahānāya. Paṭisandhivasena kāmabhavassa anāgamanato anāgāmī.
analyzed: kāma rāga byāpādānam anavasesa pahānāya ati tesam yeva sakadāgāmi maggena tanukatānam saṃyojanānam niravasesa ppahānāya paṭisandhi vasena kāma bhavassa an āgamanataḥ anāgāmī

original: Tatiyañāṇaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: tatiya ñāṇam niṭṭhitam

original: Catutthamaggañāṇakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: catuttha magga ñāṇa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 815. Opapātikoti upapātayoniko. Imināssa gabbhaseyyā paṭikkhittā. Tattha parinibbāyīti
analyzed: opapātikaḥ ti upapāta yonikaḥ iminā assa gabbhaseyyā paṭikkhittā tattha parinibbāyi iti

original: tattha suddhāvāse parinibbāyitā. Anāvattidhammo tasmā lokāti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena
analyzed: tattha suddhāvāse parinibbāyitā an āvatti dhammaḥ tasmā lokā ti paṭisandhi ggahaṇa vasena

original: tasmā lokā idha anāvattanasabhāvo, buddhadassanadhammassavanānaṃ panatthāya āgamanaṃ hotiyeva.
analyzed: tasmā lokāḥ idha an āvattana sabhāvaḥ buddha dassana dhamma ssavanānam pana atthāya āgamanam

original: Rūparāgaarūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjānaṃ anavasesappahānāyāti etesaṃ pañcannaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ
analyzed: rūpa rāga arūpa rāga māna auddhacca avijjānam anavasesa pahānāya ati etesam pañcannam uddhambhāgiya saṃyojanānam

original: nissesappajahanatthāya. Tattha rūpabhave chandarāgo rūparāgo. Arūpabhave chandarāgo
analyzed: nissesa ppajahana tthāya tattha rūpa bhave chanda rāgaḥ rūpa rāgaḥ a rūpa bhave chanda rāgaḥ

original: arūparāgo. Māno arahattamaggavajjhamāno. Tathā uddhaccāvijjā.
analyzed: arūpa rāgaḥ mānaḥ arahatta magga vajjha mānaḥ tathā uddhacca avijjā

original: Catutthañāṇaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: catuttha ñāṇam niṭṭhitam

original: Arahantapuggalakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: arahanta puggala kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 816. Mahākhīṇāsavoti mahānubhāvatānibandhanaṃ pūjāvacanametaṃ, na upādāyavacanaṃ
analyzed: mahā khīṇāsavaḥ iti mahā anubhāva tā nibandhanam pūjā vacanam etam na upādāya vacanam

original: yathā “mahāmoggallāno”ti. Na hi cūḷakhīṇāsavo nāma atthi. Antimadehaṃ dhāretīti antimadehadhārī.
analyzed: yathā mahā moggallānaḥ iti na hi cūḷa khīṇa āsavaḥ nāma atthi antima deham dhārā iti iti antima deha dhārī

original: Khandhakilesābhisaṅkhārabhārānaṃ ohitattā oropitattā ohitabhāro. Anuppatto sadatthaṃ
analyzed: khandha kilesa abhisaṅkhāra bhārānaṃ ohita ttā oropita ttā ohita bhāro anuppatto sadattham

original: sakatthanti anuppattasadattho. Sadatthoti ca arahattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tañhi attupanibandhanaṭṭhena,
analyzed: sakatthanti anuppatta sadattho sadattho ti ca arahattam veditabbam tat hi atta upanibandhana ṭṭhena

original: attānaṃ avijahanaṭṭhena, attano paramatthaṭṭhena ca attano atthattā sakatthoti vuccati.
analyzed: attānam a vijahana ṭhena attano paramattha ṭhena ca attano atthattā sakatthā ti vuccati

original: Parikkhīṇāni dasapi bhavasaṃyojanāni etassāti parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano. Khandhādiatthaṃ
analyzed: parikkhīṇāni dasa api bhava saṃyojanāni etassa ati parikkhīṇa bhava saṃyojanaḥ khandha ādi attham

original: sammā aññāya vimuttoti sammadaññāvimutto. Aggo ca so dakkhiṇeyyo ca, aggadakkhiṇaṃ
analyzed: sammā aññāya vimutto ti sammadaññā vimuttaḥ aggaḥ ca so dakkhiṇeyyaḥ ca agga dakkhiṇam

original: vā arahatīti aggadakkhiṇeyyo.
analyzed: vā arahati iti aggadakkhiṇeyyaḥ

original: Bodhipakkhiyakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: bodhipakkhiya kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 817. Catunnaṃ maggañāṇānaṃ vasena catuñāṇāya. Ānubhāvavijānanatthanti satipaṭṭhānapāripūriādikassa ānubhāvassa bodhanatthaṃ.
analyzed: catunnam magga ñāṇānam vasena catu ñāṇāya ānubhāva vijānana attham ti sati paṭṭhāna pāripūri ādikassa ānubhāvassa bodhana attham

original: Paripuṇṇā bodhipakkhiyā etassāti paripuṇṇabodhipakkhiyo, maggo. Tassa bhāvo paripuṇṇabodhipakkhiyabhāvo.
analyzed: paripuṇṇā bodhi pakkhiyā etassa ati paripuṇṇa bodhi pakkhiyaḥ maggaḥ tassa bhāvaḥ paripuṇṇa bodhi pakkhiya bhāvaḥ

original: Vuṭṭhānabalehi sampayuttatāva vuṭṭhānabalasamāyogo, ye saṃyojanādayo yena paṭhamamaggādinā pahātabbā.
analyzed: vuṭṭhāna balehi vuṭṭhāna bala samāyogaḥ ye saṃyojana ādayaḥ yena paṭhama magga ādinā pahātabbā

original: 818. Bujjhanaṭṭhena vā bodho, maggacittuppādo. Tassa bujjhanakiriyāya anuguṇabhāvato pakkhe bhavāti bodhipakkhiyā.
analyzed: bujjhana ṭṭhena vā bodhaḥ magga cittuppādaḥ tassa bujjhana kiriyāya anuguṇa bhāvataḥ pakkhe bhavāti bodhi pakkhiyā

original: 819. Tesu bodhipakkhiyesu. Ārammaṇesūti kāyādiārammaṇesu. Okkhanditvāti anupavisitvā.
analyzed: tesu bodhi pakkhiyesu ārammaṇesu ti kāya ādi ārammaṇesu okkhanditvā ati anupavisitvā

original: Pakkhanditvāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Upaṭṭhānatoti asubhākārādiggahaṇavasena upagantvā
analyzed: pakkhanditvā ti tassa iva vevacanam upaṭṭhānataḥ ti asubha ākāra ādi gahaṇa vasena upagantvā

original: avaṭṭhānato. Kāyādīsu asubhākārādiggahaṇaṃ pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānavasena subhasaññādipahānakiccasādhanaṃ
analyzed: avaṭṭhānato kāya ādīsu asubha ākāra ādi gahaṇam pubba bhāga sati paṭṭhāna vasena subha saññā ādi pahāna kicca sādhanam

original: maggasatipaṭṭhānavasena veditabbaṃ. Tattha hi ekāva sati catukiccasādhanavasena pavattati.
analyzed: magga sati paṭṭhāna vasena veditabbam tattha hi sati catu kicca sādhana vasena pavattati

original: 820. Padahantīti vāyamanti, kāyacittāni paggaṇhanti vā. Asobhāhetūnaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ
analyzed: padahanti iti vā āyamanti kāya cittāni paggaṇhanti vā asobhā hetūnam saṃkilesa dhammānam

original: pajahanena, sobhāhetūnañca vodānadhammānaṃ bhāvanena sobhanaṃ, sundaranti attho.
analyzed: pajahanena sobhā hetūnam ca vodāna dhammānam bhāvanena sobhanam sundaranti attho

original: Seṭṭhabhāvāvahanatoti pāsaṃsatamabhāvasādhanato. Padhānabhāvakāraṇatoti uttamabhāvahetuto.
analyzed: seṭṭha bhāva āvahanatā ati pāsaṃsatama bhāva sādhanataḥ padhāna bhāva kāraṇataḥ ti uttama bhāva hetutaḥ

original: 821. Pubbe vuttenāti iddhividhañāṇaniddese vuttena. Ijjhanaṭṭho nipphajjanaṭṭho,
analyzed: pubbe vuttena āti iddhividha ñāṇa niddese vuttena ijjhana ṭhaḥ nipphajjana ṭṭhaḥ

original: paṭilābhasampadā vā, yena vā ijjhanti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā honti, taṃ ijjhanaṃ.
analyzed: paṭilābha sampadā vā yena vā ijjhanti iddhāḥ vuddhāḥ ukkaṃsa gatāḥ honti tam ijjhanam

original: Samādhipadhānasaṅkhārapamukhā maggadhammā idha “iddhī”ti adhippetā. Pubbaṅgamaṭṭho
analyzed: samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra pamukhāḥ magga dhammāḥ idha iddhī iti adhippetā pubbaṅgamaṭṭho

original: adhipatipaccayabhāvo. Tasmā sotāpattimaggo ijjhatīti iddhi, tasmā sampayuttā chandādayo
analyzed: adhipati paccaya bhāvaḥ tasmā sotāpatti maggo ijjhati iti id hi tasmā sampayuttā chanda ādayo

original: pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena pādo. Tassā eva phalabhūtāya vuṭṭhānagāminiyā chandādayo pubbabhāgakāraṇaṭṭhena
analyzed: pubbaṅgama ṭṭhena pādaḥ tassāḥ eva phala bhūtāya vuṭṭhāna gāminiyā chanda ādayo pubba bhāga kāraṇaṭṭhena

original: pādo. Soti iddhipādo. Ime lokuttarāvāti ime yathāvuttā chandādayo uttaracūḷabhājanīye
analyzed: pādaḥ saḥ ti iddhipādaḥ ime ime ime yathā vuttā chanda ādayaḥ uttaracūḍabhājanīye

original: āgatanayena lokuttarā veditabbā. Chandādiadhipativasena paṭiladdhadhammāpi phassādayo
analyzed: āgata nayena lokuttarā veditabbā chanda ādi adhipati vasena paṭiladdha dhammā api phassa ādayaḥ

original: iddhipādā hontīti attho. Kāmañcettha iddhipādo no adhipati, adhipati vā no iddhipādo
analyzed: iddhipādāḥ honti iti kāmañca ittha iddhipādaḥ naḥ adhipati adhipati vā naḥ iddhipādaḥ

original: nāma natthi, yathā pana ekasmiṃ rajje rajjārahesu catūsu rājakumāresu ekasmiṃ kāle
analyzed: nāma na atthi yathā pana ekasmin rajje rajjārahesu catūsu rāja kumāresu ekasmin kāle

original: ekova rajjamanusāsati, na sabbe, evaṃ ekamekasmiṃ cittuppāde ekova adhipati, iddhipādo
analyzed: ekaḥ iva rajjam anusāsati na sabbe evam ekam ekasmin cittuppāde ekaḥ iva adhipati iddhipādaḥ

original: ca hotīti veditabbo.
analyzed: ca hoti iti veditabbaḥ

original: 822. Assaddhiyaṃ saddhāpaṭipakkhā akusalā dhammā, avatthugato pasādapatirūpako micchādhimokkho
analyzed: assaddhiyam saddhā paṭipakkhāḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ avatthu gataḥ pasāda patirūpakaḥ micchā adhimokkho

original: vā. Kosajjaṃ thinamiddhapadhāno akusalacittuppādo. Pamādo satisammoso tathāpavattā
analyzed: vā kosajjam thinam iddha padhānaḥ akusala cittuppādo pamādaḥ sati sammoso tathā pavattā

original: akusalā khandhā. Abhibhavanasaṅkhātena adhipatiyaṭṭhenāti assaddhiyādīnaṃ abhibhavanato
analyzed: akusalāḥ khandhāḥ abhibhavana saṅkhātena adhipatiya ṭṭhena ati assaddhi ādīnam abhibhavanataḥ

original: abhibhavananti vattabbena adhimokkhapaggahaupaṭṭhānaavikkhepapajānanassa ekalakkhaṇena
analyzed: abhibhavananti vattabbena adhimokkha paggaha upaṭṭhāna avikkhepa pajānanassa eka lakkhaṇena

original: sampayuttadhammesu adhipatiyaṭṭhena. Assaddhiyādīhi cāti ca-saddo samuccayattho aṭṭhānappayutto,
analyzed: sampayutta dhammesu adhipatiya ṭṭhena assaddhi ādīhi ca ati ca saddo samuccaya tthaḥ aṭṭhāna ppayuttaḥ

original: tasmā akampiyaṭṭhena ca sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca balanti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
analyzed: tasmai akampiya ṭṭhena ca sampayutta dhammesu thira bhāvena ca balam ti evam ettha adhippāyaḥ veditabbo

original: 823. Bujjhanakasattassāti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ paṭivijjhanakasattassa. Yo heso
analyzed: bujjhanaka sattassa ti catunnam ariya saccānam paṭivijjhanaka sattassa yaḥ ha iso

original: lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya satiādidhammasāmaggiyā karaṇabhūtāya bujjhati
analyzed: lokuttara magga kkhaṇe uppajjamānāya sati ādi dhamma sāmaggiyā karaṇa bhūtāya bujjhati

original: kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahati, cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva
analyzed: kilesa santāna niddāya uṭṭhahati cattāri vā ariya saccāni paṭivijjhati nibbānam eva

original: vā sacchikarotīti bodhīti vuccati ariyasāvako, tassa bodhissa bujjhanakasattassa
analyzed: vā sacchikaroti iti bodhī iti vuccati ariyasāvako tassa bodhissa bujjhanaka sattassa

original: aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā. Niyyānikaṭṭhenāti vaṭṭato nissaraṇaṭṭhena.
analyzed: aṅgā ati bojjhaṅgāḥ niyyānika ṭṭhena ati vaṭṭataḥ nissaraṇa ṭṭhena

original: 824. Pubbabhāge nānācittesu labbhantīti sambandho. Cuddasavidhenāti ānāpānairiyāpathacatusampajaññapaṭikkūlamanasikāradhātumanasikārapabbāni,
analyzed: pubbabhāge nānā cittesu labbhanti iti sambandhaḥ cuddasavidhena āti ānāpāna eriyāpatha catu sampajañña paṭikkūla manasikāra dhātu manasikāra pabbāni

original: nava sivathikapabbāni cāti evaṃ cuddasavidhena. Kāyaṃ pariggaṇhato ca kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: nava sivathika pabbāni ca ati evam cuddasavidhena kāyam pariggaṇhato ca kāya anupassanā sati paṭṭhānam

original: labbhati, na vedanādayo pariggaṇhato. Esa nayo sesesupi. “Sukhaṃ vedana”ntiādināti
analyzed: labbhati na vedanā ādayo pariggaṇhato esa nayo sesesu pi sukham vedanā nti ādinā ati

original: vā “sāmisa”ntiādināti vā “nirāmisa”ntiādināti vā evaṃ navavidhena. Sarāgadosamohasaṃkhittamahaggatasamāhitasauttaravimuttapadānaṃ
analyzed: vā sāmisanti ādinā ati vā nirāmisanti ādinā ati vā evam navavidhena sa rāga dosa moha saṃkhitta mahaggata samāhita sa auttara vimutta padānam

original: sapaṭipakkhānaṃ vasena soḷasavidhena. Nīvaraṇupādānakkhandhāyatanabojjhaṅgasaccapabbānaṃ
analyzed: sa paṭipakkhānam vasena soḷasavidhena nīvaraṇa upādāna khandha āyatana bojjhaṅga sacca pabbānam

original: vasena pañcavidhena. Imasmiṃ attabhāveti paccuppanne attabhāve. Anuppannapubbanti
analyzed: vasena pañcavidhena imasmin atta bhāve iti paccuppanne atta bhāve anuppannapubbanti

original: attano abhūtapubbaṃ. Parassa uppannaṃ akusalaṃ disvā tannimittañca vadhabandhārahādīnīti
analyzed: attanaḥ abhūta pubbam parassa uppannam akusalam disvā tad nimittam ca vadha bandha araha ādīni iti

original: adhippāyo. Tassāti tādisassa. Bhavati hi taṃsadisepi tabbohāro yathā “tāniyeva osadhānī”ti.
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ tassa ati tādisassa bhavati hi tad sadise pi tad bohāraḥ yathā tāniyā iva osadhāni iti

original: Tassa pahānāyāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Jhānavipassanā ito aññasmiṃ attabhāve uppannapubbāpi
analyzed: tassa pahānāya ati ettha api esā iva nayaḥ jhāna vipassanā itas aññasmin attabhāve uppanna pubbā api

original: siyunti vuttaṃ “imasmiṃ attabhāve anuppannapubba”nti, chandiddhipādasammāvācānaṃyeva
analyzed: siyum ti vuttam imasmin atta bhāve anuppanna pubbanti chanda iddhipāda sammāvācānaṃ yeva

original: gahaṇaṃ. Tesu vuttesu sesiddhipādasesaviratiyo atthato vuttāva hontīti lakkhaṇahāravasena
analyzed: gahaṇam tesu vuttesu sesa iddhipāda sesa viratiyaḥ atthataḥ vuttā ava honti iti lakkhaṇa hāra vasena

original: ayamattho veditabbo. Evaṃ nānācittesu labbhanti pubbabhāge ete satipaṭṭhānasammappadhānaiddhipādā.
analyzed: ayam atthaḥ veditabbaḥ evam nānā cittesu labbhanti pubbabhāge ete sati paṭṭhāna sammappadhāna eddhipādā

original: Catunnaṃ ñāṇānanti catunnaṃ ariyamaggañāṇānaṃ. Kāmaṃ sabbepi bodhipakkhiyadhammā
analyzed: catunnam ñāṇānam ti catunnam ariya magga ñāṇānam kāmam sabbe pi bodhi pakkhiya dhammā

original: maggacittuppādapariyāpannāva, tathāpi sātisayo sammappadhānabyāpāro maggakkhaṇeti
analyzed: magga cittuppāda pariyāpannā ava tathā api sa atisayaḥ sammappadhāna byāpāraḥ magga kkhaṇa iti

original: vuttaṃ “phalakkhaṇe ṭhapetvā cattāro sammappadhāne”ti. Avasesā tettiṃsa labbhanti,
analyzed: vuttam phala kkhaṇe ṭhapetvā cattāro sammappadhāne iti avasesā tettiṃsa labbhanti

original: te ca kho pariyāyato, na nippariyāyatoti adhippāyo.
analyzed: te ca kho pariyāyataḥ na nippariyāyataḥ ti adhippāyaḥ

original: 825. Sesesu panāti iddhipādādīsu pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu. Yathā sativīriyesu “satipaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: sesesu pana ati iddhipāda ādīsu pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu yathā sati vīriyesu sati paṭṭhānam

original: sammappadhāna”nti saṅkhipanavasena hāpanaṃ, “kāyānupassanā”tiādivibhāgadassanavasena
analyzed: sammappadhānam ti saṅkhipana vasena hāpanam kāya anupassanā āti ādi vibhāga dassana vasena

original: vaḍḍhanaṃ atthi, īdisaṃ hāpanavaḍḍhanaṃ natthīti attho.
analyzed: vaḍḍhanam atthi īdisam hāpana vaḍḍhanam na atthi iti attho

original: 826. Idāni sabbesu eva yathārahaṃ labbhamānavibhāgadassanatthaṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: idāni sabbesu eva yathāraham labbhamāna vibhāga dassana ttham apica ati ādi āraddham

original: Tattha tesūti sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammesu. Chaddhāti ekadhā dvedhā catudhā
analyzed: tattha tesu iti sattatiṃsāya bodhi pakkhiya dhammesu chaddhā ati ekadhā dvedhā catudhā

original: pañcadhā aṭṭhadhā navadhāti evaṃ chappakārena te bhavanti.
analyzed: pañcadhā aṭṭhadhā navadhā ati evam cha pakārena te bhavanti

original: Chandiddhipādādivasenāti chando chandiddhipādavaseneva, cittaṃ cittiddhipādavaseneva,
analyzed: chanda iddhipāda ādi vasena ati chando chanda iddhipāda vasena iva cittam citta iddhipāda vasena iva

original: pītipassaddhiupekkhā bojjhaṅgavaseneva, saṅkappādayo maggavasenevāti evaṃ nava ekavidhāva honti.
analyzed: pīti passaddhi upekkhāḥ bojjhaṅga vasena iva saṅkappa ādayaḥ magga vasena iva ati evam nava ekavidhā ava honti

original: Cuddaseva asambhinnāti sati vīriyaṃ chando cittaṃ paññā saddhā samādhi pīti passaddhi
analyzed: cuddasā iva asambhinnā ati sati vīriyam chandaḥ cittam paññā saddhā samādhi pīti passaddhi

analyzed: upekkhā sammā saṅkappo sammā vācā sammā kammanto sammā ājīvo ti ime asambhinnā pada antara sambhedena

original: vinā aggahitaggahaṇena gayhamānā cuddaseva ca sabhāvadhammā. Cuddasāti ca ukkaṃsaparicchedena
analyzed: vinā aggahita ggahaṇena gayhamānā cuddasā iva ca sabhāvadhammā cuddasā ati ca ukkaṃsa paricchedena

original: terasa, tatiyacatutthapañcamajjhānikesu pītisambojjhaṅgābhāvato dvādasa honti. “Sattatiṃsappabhedato”ti
