analyzed: idam pi ukkaṃsa vasena iva vuttam avakaṃsataḥ pana vutta nayena ekasmin khaṇe chattiṃsa

original: pañcatiṃsa honti, catunnaṃ adhipatīnaṃ ekajjhaṃ anuppajjanato ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekasseva
analyzed: pañcatiṃsa honti catunnam adhipatīnam ekajjham an uppajjanataḥ ekasmin khaṇe ekassa iva

original: iddhipādassa sambhavoti dvattiṃsa ca hontīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: iddhipādassa sambhavaḥ ti dvattiṃsa ca honti iti veditabbam

original: Sattatiṃsapabhedato kathanti āha “sakiccanipphādanato”tiādi, ekaccassa sabhāvato

original: ekassāpi attano ānubhāvānurūpakāyānupassanāditaṃtaṃkiccasādhanatoti attho. Sarūpena

original: Etthāti ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃ. Kasmā pana bodhipakkhiyesu jhānakoṭṭhāso na gahito,

original: kasmā pana bodhipakkhiyesu jhānakoṭṭhāso na gahito, nanu jhānarahito ariyamaggo natthi,

analyzed: na ca tam paṭipadā viya ekanta pubbabhāgiyam na api ekacca paṭisambhidā viya magga nissandaḥ

original: atha kho maggacittuppādapariyāpanno, yato “lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetī”ti vuttaṃ, maggamaggaparivāradhammā

analyzed: ca bodhi pakkhiya dhammā ti vuccate yat tāva vuttam jhāna rahitaḥ ariya maggaḥ natthi iti

original: tattha na ariyamaggasampayogamattena jhānassa bodhipakkhiyatā labbhati atippasaṅgato.

original: akāraṇanti dassitaṃ hoti.
analyzed: akāraṇam ti dassitam hoti

original: Atha dutiyo, idaṃ vicāretabbaṃ. Kathaṃ pavattamānaṃ jhānaṃ maggassa parikkhāro? Yadi

original: sahajātādipaccayabhāvena, evaṃ sati phassādīnampi maggaparikkhāratā āpajjati. Atha

original: paṭipakkhavidhaṃsanena, na sabbe jhānadhammā paṭipakkhavidhaṃsanasamatthā. Na hi

analyzed: vicāraḥ vedanā ca kassaci saṃkilesa dhammassa uju paṭipakkha bhāvena pavattanti yam

original: pana peṭake “sukhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccassa, vicāro vicikicchāya paṭipakkho”ti vuttaṃ,

original: Tena vuttaṃ “taṃ pariyāyena vutta”nti. Vitakkasamādhayo eva pana jhānadhammesu ujukaṃ

original: Vuṭṭhānabalasamāyogakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: vuṭṭhāna bala samāyoga kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Aṇusahagatāti aṇubhāvaṃ gatā pattā, tanubhūtāti attho.

analyzed: vipassanā bhāvanāya samāna bhāvena yuge naddhāḥ baddhāḥ viya honti iti yuga naddhā tena āha

original: Pahātabbadhammapahānakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: pahātabba dhamma pahāna kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: khandhehi khandhānam ti idhaloka kkhandhehi paraloka kkhandhānam yāvat hi te iti te rūpa rāga ādayaḥ

original: hitāni uddhaṃbhāgiyāni.
analyzed: hitāni uddhaṃbhāgiyāni

original: Kilissanti, kilesenti cāti duvidhampi atthaṃ dassento “sayaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhattā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: kilissanti kilesenti ca ati duvidham pi attham dassentaḥ sayam saṃkiliṭṭha ttā ati ādim āha

original: Micchāvimutti “lokathūpikādīsu mokkho”ti pavattamicchāvimokkho. Abhinivisanādivasena micchā viparītaṃ na sammā pavattanato micchāñāṇaṃ mohova.
analyzed: micchā vimutti lokathūpika ādīsu mokkho ti pavatta micchā vimokkhaḥ abhinivisana ādi vasena micchā viparītam na sammā pavattanataḥ micchā ñāṇam mohaḥ uva

original: Lokappavattiyāti khandhappavattiyaṃ sati. Anuparamadhammakattāti puññapāpavasena aparāparaṃ avicchijjanato. “Lābhahetuko lābho”tiādinā kāraṇopacārena.
analyzed: loka ppavattiyā ti khandha ppavattiyam sati anuparama dhammaka ttā ati puñña pāpa vasena apara aparam a vicchijjanataḥ lābha hetukaḥ lābha uti ādinā kāraṇa upacārena

original: Āvāse macchariyaṃ, āvāsahetukaṃ vā macchariyaṃ āvāsamacchariyaṃ.
analyzed: āvāse macchariyam āvāsa hetukam vā macchariyam āvāsa macchariyam

original: Tayoti vatthuṃ abhinditvā vuttaṃ, bhinditvā pana vuccamāne dvādasa honti.
analyzed: tayo ti vatthum a bhinditvā vuttam bhinditvā pana vuccamāne dvādasa honti

original: Ganthakaraṇaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paṭibaddhatākaraṇaṃ ganthananti taṃ rūpakāyepi labbhatīti
analyzed: gantha karaṇam kāraṇa bhāvena paṭibaddha tā karaṇam ganthanan ti tam rūpa kāye pi labbhati iti

original: āha “nāmakāyassa ceva rūpakāyassa cā”ti. Tattha byāpādassāpi abhisajjanupanayhavasena
analyzed: āha nāma kāyassa ca iva rūpa kāyassa ca ati tattha byāpādassa api abhisajjan upanayha vasena

original: pavattanato ganthanaṭṭho veditabbo, yato tassa paṭighasaṃyojanabhāvo vutto.
analyzed: pavattanataḥ ganthana ṭṭho veditabbaḥ yatas tassa paṭigha saṃyojana bhāvaḥ vutto

original: Chandadosamohabhayehīti chandadosamohabhayahetu. Tañhīti akattabbakaraṇaṃ, kattabbākaraṇañca.
analyzed: chanda dosa moha bhayehi iti chanda dosa moha bhaya hetu tat hi iti a kattabba karaṇam kattabba a karaṇam ca

original: Savanāti pavattanato. Savanatoti kilesāsucibhāvena vissandanato. Puna savanatoti pasavanato.
analyzed: pavattanataḥ savanato ti kilesa asuci bhāvena vissandanataḥ puna savanatoti pasavanato

original: Ākaḍḍhanaṭṭhena, duruttaraṇaṭṭhena cāti etena oghā viya oghāti dasseti. Ārammaṇena,
analyzed: ākaḍḍhana ṭhena duruttaraṇa ṭṭhena ca ati etena oghā viya oghā ti dasseti ārammaṇena

original: dukkhena ca viyogassa appadānasaṅkhātena yojanaṭṭhena yogāti dasseti, saṃkilesakaraṇaṭṭhenāti

original: attho. Tesaññevāti kāmarāgādīnaṃyeva. Te hi sotavasena vattamānā soto viya sotapatite
analyzed: tesam eva ati kāma rāga ādīnam yeva te hi sota vasena vattamānā sotaḥ viya sota patite

original: satte apāyasamuddaṃ pāpenti, saṃsārasamuddato ca sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na denti, yathāgahitañca
analyzed: satte apāya samuddam pāpenti saṃsāra samuddato ca sīsam ukkhipitum na denti yathā gahitam ca

original: ārammaṇaṃ vissajjituṃ na denti, yādisañca pāpaṃ katvā dukkhappatte punapi tādisena yojenti.
analyzed: ārammaṇam vissajjitum na denti yādisam ca pāpam katvā dukkha ppatte puna api tādisena yojenti

original: Cittassāti kusalacittassa, visesato jhānacittassa. Ādito varaṇaṃ āvaraṇaṃ. Kilesavāsanaṃ
analyzed: cittassa ati kusala cittassa visesataḥ jhāna cittassa āditas varaṇam āvaraṇam kilesa vāsanam

original: netvā varaṇaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ. Kuṭṭakavāṭādīhi viya pidahanaṃ paṭicchādanaṃ, taṃ pana kusalādīni
analyzed: netvā varaṇam nīvaraṇam kuṭṭaka vāṭa ādīhi pidahanam paṭicchādanam tam pana kusala ādīni

original: saṅgaṇhituṃ, pariññātuṃ, ñātuñca appadānavasena daṭṭhabbaṃ.

original: Tassa tassa dhammassa sabhāvanti kāyādikassa tassa tassa dhammassa asubhādisabhāvaṃ. Abhūtaṃ sabhāvanti subhādisabhāvaṃ.
analyzed: tassa tassa dhammassa sabhāvanti kāya ādikassa tassa tassa dhammassa asubha ādi sabhāvam abhūtam sabhāvanti subha ādi sabhāvam

analyzed: sabhāvaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ yena te eva bhagavatā vuttāḥ anusayanam ca maggena

original: uppattihetubhāvena anusentiyevā”ti.
analyzed: uppatti hetu bhāvena

original: Dummocanīyabhāvena pavattiṃ sandhāyāha “telañjanakalalaṃ viyā”ti.
analyzed: dummocanīya bhāvena pavattim sandhāya āha telañjana kalalam viyāti

original: 830. Sesāti anapāyagamanīyā. Sukhumā kāmarāgapaṭighāti sambandho. Catutthañāṇavajjhā

analyzed: eva iti avadhāraṇena paṭhama ñāṇa ādi vajjha tā nivattīyati tayā idam niyama dassanam aññattha api

original: netabbanti dassento “parato”tiādimāha. Tattha “niyamaṃ na karissāmā”ti etena niyame

original: akate heṭṭhimamaggavajjhatāpi anuññātā eva hotīti.
analyzed: a kate heṭṭhima magga vajjha tā api anuññātā eva hoti iti

original: Lobha…pe… catutthañāṇavajjhānītiādīsu paṭhamañāṇādīhi hatāpāyagamanīyādibhāvānīti adhippāyo veditabbo. Ādisaddena oḷārikasukhumatā gahitā.
analyzed: lobhape catuttha ñāṇa vajjhāni iti ādīsu paṭhama ñāṇa ādīhi hata apāya gamanīya ādi bhāvāni iti adhippāyaḥ veditabbaḥ ādi saddena oḷārika sukhuma tā gahitā

original: Yaseti parivāre.
analyzed: yasā iti parivāre

original: Agatīsu chandādayo kiñcāpi uparimaggavajjhā, tathāpi taṃmūlakassa akattabbakaraṇassa, kattabbākaraṇassa ca apāyagamanīyatāya paṭhamamaggavajjhā.
analyzed: agatīsu chanda ādayaḥ kiñca api upari magga vajjhā tathā api taṃmūlakassa akattabba karaṇassa kattabba akaraṇassa ca apāya gamanīya tāya paṭhama magga vajjhā

original: Katākatākusalākusalavisayaṃ yaṃ vippaṭisārabhūtaṃ kukkuccaṃ, taṃ idha tatiyañāṇavajjhaṃ
analyzed: kata akata akusala akusala visayam yam vippaṭisāra bhūtam kukkuccam tam idha tatiya ñāṇa vajjham

analyzed: vuttam yam pana kukkucca pakata tāya āpattim āpajjati iti vuttam kukkuccam tam sandhāya

original: vacanānaṃ adhippāyo veditabbo. Aññesupi edisesu ṭhānesu adhippāyo maggitabbo, na

original: vinayakukkuccaṃ nāma, taṃ tathāpavattacittuppādova.
analyzed: vinayakukkuccam nāma tam

original: Kāmarāgapaṭighānusayā aṇusahagatā tatiyañāṇavajjhā. Oḷārikānaṃ pana dutiyañāṇavajjhatā heṭṭhā vuttanayāva.
analyzed: kāma rāga paṭigha anusayāḥ aṇu sahagatā tatiya ñāṇa vajjhāḥ oḷārikānam pana dutiya ñāṇa vajjha tā heṭṭhā vutta nayā va

original: Cittuppādaggahaṇena cettha makkhapaḷāsamāyāsāṭheyyapamādathambhasārambhādīnaṃ saṅgaho katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

original: 831. Aphalo vāyāmoti ettha atītānaṃ tāva pajahane aphalo hotu vāyāmo niruddhattā,
analyzed: aphalaḥ vāyāmaḥ iti ettha aphalaḥ

original: anāgatānaṃ pana kathanti tesampi vakkhamānaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ ajānanto natthitāmattaṃ

original: gahetvā codeti, tathāpi “aphalo”ti pubbe pahātabbānaṃ natthitāya codanā katā, idāni
analyzed: gahetvā codeti tathā api aphalo ti pubbe pahātabbānam na thitāya codanā katā idāni

analyzed: pahānassa yadi hi pahānam atthi katham pahātabbā santi atha pahātabbā santi katham

analyzed: pahānam hoti pahātabbā ca santi pahānam ca hoti iti vippaṭisiddham etam kasmā pahātabbesu

analyzed: santesu pahānassa asambhavataḥ tad upagaḥ vāyāmaḥ aphalaḥ saha avaṭṭhāne sati

analyzed: ālokassa aphala tā viya atha api kathañci pahānam siyā saṃkilesikā ca magga bhāvanā

original: evamidhāpīti dassento āha “na ca paccuppannakileso cittavippayutto nāma atthī”ti.

original: Arūpadhammā hi ekavatthukādibhāvena vattamānā khaṇattayapariyāpannā paccuppannā,

analyzed: sambandhaḥ sva ayam puggalaḥ hañci iti yadi

original: Vinibaddhoti mānena patthaddhacitto. Parāmaṭṭhoti micchābhiniviṭṭho. Thāmagatoti

original: tāya sādhetabbaṃ kiccaṃ natthīti attho. “Na hi natthi maggabhāvanā”tiādinā catukkhattuṃ

original: Evamevāti yathā ajātaphale taruṇarukkhe mūle chinne asati chedane āyatiṃ uppajjanārahāni
analyzed: evam eva ati yathā ajāta phale taruṇa rukkhe mūle chinne asati chedane āyatim uppajjana arahāni

original: dukkhahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ nirodhā. Dukkhanirodhoti āyatiṃ uppajjanakadukkhassa nirodho.

original: Uppādapavattanimittāyūhanā paccuppannabhavavasena gahitā.

original: 832. Etenāti “ajātāyeva na jāyantī”tiādivacanena. Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtaṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: etena ati ajātāya iva na jāyanti iti ādi vacanena vipassanāya ārammaṇa bhūtam upādāna khandha pañcaka saṅkhātam

original: bhūmipavattiṭṭhānaṃ laddhavanto bhūmiladdhā yathā “aggiāhito”ti, laddhabhūmikāti
analyzed: bhūmi pavatti ṭṭhānam laddhavantaḥ bhūmi laddhāḥ yathā aggi āhitaḥ iti laddha bhūmikā iti

original: attho. Vattamānādiuppannavidhuratāya bhūmiladdhuppannā eva nāma teti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: atthaḥ vattamāna ādi uppanna vidhura tāya bhūmiladdhuppannāḥ eva nāma te iti vuttam

original: 833. Anubhavitvā, bhavitvā ca apagataṃ bhūtāpagataṃ. Anubhūtabhūtā hi bhūtatāsāmaññena

analyzed: bhūta saddena vuttā sāmaññam eva hi upasaggena visesīyati iti anubhūta saddo ca kamma vacanicchāya

analyzed: kiriyāḥ ahetukānam ati dubbala tāya sa hetukānam ca khīṇa kilesassa chaḷaṅgu pekkhāvato

analyzed: uppajjamānānam ettha ca purima naye kusala akusalam eva vattum adhippāya vasena

original: “bhūtāpagata”nti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ “uppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya uppannānaṃ
analyzed: bhūta apagatam ti vuttam yam uppannānam akusalānam dhammānam pahānāya uppannānam

analyzed: kusalānam dhammānam ṭhitiyā ti ettha uppannanti gahetvā tad sadisānam pahānam vuddhi

original: ca vuttā. Pacchimanaye ca-saddena kusalākusalañca ākaḍḍhitvā sabbaṃ saṅkhataṃ vuttaṃ

original: pahānasiddhiyañca ñātatīritabhāvasiddhito. Maggañāṇañhi dukkhe pariññābhisamayavasena
analyzed: pahāna siddhiyam ca ñāta tīrita bhāva siddhitaḥ magga ñāṇam hi dukkhe pariññā abhisamaya vasena

original: pavattamānaṃ tassa sabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ viya sāmaññalakkhaṇampi paṭivijjhatīti vuccati
analyzed: pavattamānam tassa sabhāva lakkhaṇam viya sāmañña lakkhaṇam pi paṭivijjhati iti vuccati

original: tappaṭicchādakasammohaviddhaṃsanato. Tenāha “pariññattayampi…pe… veditabba”nti.
analyzed: tad paṭicchādaka sammoha viddhaṃsanataḥ tena āha veditabbanti

original: 848. Pariññā viyāti tividhatāsāmaññaṃ nidasseti, na pariññāpahātabbatāsāmaññaṃ vikkhambhanappahānassa
analyzed: pariññā viyā ti tividha tā sāmaññam nidasseti na pariññā apahātabba tā sāmaññam vikkhambhana ppahānassa

original: aripaññākiccabhāvato. Kāmacchandādayo yathā na cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhanti, evaṃ
analyzed: ari paññā kicca bhāvataḥ kāmacchanda ādayaḥ yathā na cittam pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhanti evam

original: pariyuṭṭhānassa nisedhanaṃ appavattikaraṇaṃ vikkhambhanaṃ, vikkhambhanameva pahānaṃ
analyzed: pariyuṭṭhānassa nisedhanam appavatti karaṇam vikkhambhanam vikkhambhanam eva pahānam

original: vikkhambhanappahānaṃ. Pākaṭattāti “ayaṃ abyāpannacitto vigatathinamiddho”tiādinā
analyzed: vikkhambhana ppahānam pākaṭa ttā ti ayam a byāpanna cittaḥ vigata thinamiddhaḥ ti ādinā

original: paresampi pākaṭattā. “Na sahasā cittaṃ ajjhottharantī”ti idaṃ paṭiladdhamattassa
analyzed: paresam pi na sahasā cittam ajjhottharanti iti idam paṭiladdha mattassa

original: jhānassa vasena vuttaṃ, subhāvite pana paguṇajjhāne yāva carimakacittampi na ajjhottharanteva.
analyzed: jhānassa vasena vuttam su bhāvite pana paguṇa jjhāne yāva carimaka cittam pi na ajjhottharantā iva

original: Atha vā jhānassa pubbabhāgepīti jhānādhigamatthāya pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā. Pacchābhāgepīti
analyzed: atha vā jhānassa pubbabhāge api iti jhāna adhigama atthāya pubbabhāga paṭipattiyā pacchābhāge api iti

original: jhānaṃ labhitvā aññakiccappasutassapi. Vitakkādayoti vitakkavicārapītisukharūpasaññādayo.
analyzed: jhānam labhitvā añña kicca ppasutassa api vitakka ādayaḥ ti vitakka vicāra pīti sukha rūpa saññā ādayaḥ

original: Dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ paṭipakkhā dutiyādīsu appitesuyeva vikkhambhanti, tato tato vuṭṭhitamattassa
analyzed: dutiya jhāna ādīnam paṭipakkhāḥ dutiya ādīsu vikkhambhanti tatas tatas vuṭṭhita mattassa

original: pana pavattanti parittacittavaseneva vuṭṭhahanato.
analyzed: pana pavattanti paritta citta vasena iva vuṭṭhahanataḥ

original: 849. “Padīpena andhakārassa viyā”ti idaṃ paṭipakkhena pahīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: padīpena andhakārassa viya iti idam paṭipakkhena pahīna bhāva dassana tham vuttam

original: Paṭipakkho hi padīpo andhakārassa, ghaṭappahāro pana sevālassa na paṭipakkho, kevalaṃ
analyzed: paṭipakkhaḥ hi padīpaḥ andhakārassa ghaṭa ppahāro pana sevālassa na paṭipakkhaḥ kevalam

original: pavattinivāraṇamattameva karotīti. Tena asatipi ujuvipaccanīkatāya dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ
analyzed: pavatti nivāraṇa mattam eva karoti iti tena uju vipaccanīka tāya dutiya jhāna ādīnam

original: vitakkādīnaṃ vikkhambhanassa taṃ nidassanaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ yujjati. “Vipassanāya avayavabhūtenā”ti
analyzed: vitakka ādīnam vikkhambhanassa tat nidassanam suṭṭhutaram yujjati vipassanāya avayava bhūtena ati

original: idaṃ idhādhikatatadaṅgappahānassa dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlavisodhanādināpi hi tadaṅgappahānaṃ
analyzed: idam idha adhika ta tad aṅga ppahānassa dassana ttham vuttam sīla visodhana ādinā api hi tad aṅga ppahānam

original: hotiyevāti. Ñāṇaṅgenāti ñāṇasaṅkhātena kāraṇena. Tadaṅgena tadaṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ.
analyzed: hotiyā iva ati ñāṇa aṅgena ati ñāṇa saṅkhātena kāraṇena tad aṅgena tad aṅgassa pahānam tad aṅga ppahānam

original: Sati vijjamāne khandhapañcakasaṅkhāte kāye, sayaṃ vā tattha sati diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
analyzed: sati vijjamāne khandha pañcaka saṅkhāte kāye sayam vā tattha sati diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi

original: “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinā nayena vuttā attānudiṭṭhi. Soḷasavatthukā, aṭṭhavatthukā
analyzed: rūpam attataḥ samanupassati itiādinā nayena vuttā attānudiṭṭhi soḷasa vatthukā aṭṭha vatthukā

original: ca kaṅkhāva malaṃ kaṅkhāmalaṃ. Samūhagāhassāti “attā attaniya”nti evaṃ pavattasamūhagahaṇassa
analyzed: ca malam kaṅkhā malam samūha gāhassa ati attā evam pavatta samūha gahaṇassa

original: pahānaṃ kalāpasammasanena ekādasasu okāsesu pakkhipitvā vikiraṇavasena khandhānaṃ
analyzed: pahānam kalāpa sammasanena ekādasasu okāsesu pakkhipitvā vikiraṇa vasena khandhānam

original: dassanato. Assādasaññāyāti pañcakkhandhe assādanavasena pavattamicchāsaññāya. Appaṭisaṅkhānassāti
analyzed: dassanataḥ assāda saññāya ati pañca kkhandhe assādana vasena pavattam icchā saññāya appaṭisaṅkhānassa ati

original: paṭisaṅkhānapaṭipakkhassa mohassa. Anupekkhanassāti apekkhāya. Saṅkhāresu niccādigāho
analyzed: paṭisaṅkhāna paṭipakkhassa mohassa anupekkhanassa ati apekkhāya saṅkhāresu nicca ādi gāho

original: saccapaṭilomagāho maggasaccādhigamassa vilomanato. Sādīnavesu anādīnavasaññitā, anādīnave
analyzed: sacca paṭiloma gāhaḥ magga sacca adhigamassa vilomanataḥ sa ādīnavesu anādīnava saññi tā anādīnave

original: ca sādīnavasaññitā saccapaṭilomagāhoti ca vadanti.
analyzed: ca sādīnava saññitā sacca paṭiloma gāhā iti ca vadanti

original: Evaṃ visuddhikkamena tadaṅgappahānaṃ dassetvā idāni aṭṭhārasamahāvipassanāvasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ vā pana pahānanti sambandho.
analyzed: evam visuddhi kkamena tad aṅga ppahānam dassetvā idāni aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā vasena api tam dassetum yam vā pana atiādi vuttam tattha yam vā pana pahānam ti sambandhaḥ

original: 850. Vuttameva “sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccato anupassatī”tiādinā.
analyzed: vuttam eva sabbam saṅkhāra gatam aniccataḥ anupassati iti ādinā

original: Santatisamūhakiccārammaṇānaṃ vasena ghanaggahaṇaṃ ghanasaññā, tassā ghanasaññāya.
analyzed: santati samūha kicca ārammaṇānam vasena ghana ggahaṇam ghana saññā tassāḥ ghana saññāya

original: Nirodhe adhimuttatā, tāyāti tiyaddhagatānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhameva disvā tattha adhimuccanavasena pavattapaññā, tāya. Āyūhanassāti abhisaṅkharaṇassa.
analyzed: nirodhe adhimutta tā tāya ati tiya ddha gatānam saṅkhārānam nirodham eva disvā tattha adhimuccana vasena pavatta paññā tāya āyūhanassa ati abhisaṅkharaṇassa

original: Taṃ taṃ paricchedanti ādānanikkhepādikaṃ taṃ taṃ paricchedaṃ. Aññathāpavattidassananti
analyzed: tam tam paricchedam ti ādāna nikkhepa ādikam tam tam paricchedam aññathā pavatti dassanam ti

original: vuttaparicchedato pubbe, pacchā ca aññākārappavattiyā dassanaṃ, avatthāvisesappavattidassanaṃ
analyzed: vutta paricchedato pubbe pacchā ca añña ākāra ppavattiyāḥ dassanam avatthā visesa ppavatti dassanam

original: vā. Dhuvasaññāyāti thirabhāvaggahaṇassa.
analyzed: vā dhuva saññāya āti thira bhāva ggahaṇassa

original: Sārādānābhinivesassāti asāresu sāragahaṇābhinivesassa.
analyzed: sāra ādāna abhinivesassa ati asāresu sāra gahaṇa abhinivesassa

original: Saṃsayamicchāñāṇānaṃ vasena sammuyhanaṃ sammoho, so eva abhinivesoti sammohābhiniveso. Saṅkhāresu leṇatāṇabhāvaggahaṇaṃ ālayābhiniveso, atthato bhavanikanti.
analyzed: vasena sammuyhanam sammohaḥ saḥ eva abhiniveso ti sammoha abhinivesaḥ saṅkhāresu leṇa tāṇa bhāva ggahaṇam ālaya abhinivesaḥ atthataḥ bhava nikanti

original: Yathā cittaṃ saṅkhāre muñcitvā vivaṭṭaṃ nibbānaṃ pakkhandati, tathā pavattanato saṅkhārupekkhā
analyzed: yathā cittam saṅkhāre muñcitvā vivaṭṭam nibbānam pakkhandati tathā pavattanataḥ saṅkhāra upekkhā

original: ca anulomañca “vivaṭṭānupassanā”ti vuttaṃ. Niviṭṭhabhāvena ogāḷhabhāvena pavattasaṃyojanādikilesā
analyzed: ca anulomam ca vivaṭṭā anupassanā ti vuttam niviṭṭha bhāvena ogāḷha bhāvena pavatta saṃyojana ādi kilesā

original: eva kilesābhiniveso. Nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhinti vipassanāsamādhimāha.
analyzed: eva kilesa abhinivesaḥ nibbedha bhāgiyam samādhin ti vipassanā samādhim āha

original: 851. Asanivicakkaṃ asanimaṇḍalaṃ. Evaṃ pahānanti anuppattidhammatāpādanamāha. Kammakilesānaṃ,
analyzed: asani vicakkam asani maṇḍalam evam pahānan ti anuppatti dhamma tā āpādanam āha kamma kilesānaṃ

original: sabbesampi vā saṅkhārānaṃ khayaṃ nirodhaṃ gacchatīti khayagāmī, ariyamaggo. Lokuttaraggahaṇeneva
analyzed: sabbesam pi vā saṅkhārānam khayam nirodham gacchati iti khaya gāmī ariya maggo lokuttara ggahaṇena iva

original: siddhepi khayagāmiggahaṇaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ. Samucchedappahānamevāti avadhāraṇaṃ
analyzed: siddhe pi khaya gāmi ggahaṇam vaṇṇa bhaṇana attham samuccheda ppahānam eva ti avadhāraṇam

original: nippariyāyataṃ upādāya. Tadatthānevāti samucchedappahānatthāneva. Tena vikkhambhanatadaṅgappahānānaṃ
analyzed: upādāya tad atthāna eva ati samuccheda pahāna tthāna eva tena vikkhambhana tad aṅga ppahānānam

original: maggasambhāratamāha tehi vinā asijjhanato. Atha vā tadatthānevāti maggatthāneva.
analyzed: maggasambhāratam āha tehi vinā atha vā tad atthān eva ati magga atthān eva

original: Tena tadatthatāya tesaṃ taṃkiccataṃ dasseti. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi. Tamevatthaṃ upamāya
analyzed: tena tad attha tāya tesam taṃkiccatam dasseti tena āha tasmā iti ādi tam eva attham upamāya

original: dassetuṃ “paṭirājānaṃ vadhitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yampi tato pubbe katanti yaṃ tatorajjappattito
analyzed: dassetum paṭirājānam vadhitvā itiādi vuttam yam pi tatas pubbe katam ti yam tatorajja ppattito

original: pubbe kataṃ paccantasādhanaduggaviddhaṃsanādi. Yathā idañcidañca raññā katantiyeva
analyzed: pubbe katam paccanta sādhana dugga viddhaṃsana ādi yathā idam cidam ca raññā kata ntiyā iva

original: vuccati, evaṃ lokiyañāṇena sādhitānipi vikkhambhanatadaṅgappahānāni samucchedappahānavasena
analyzed: vuccati evam lokiya ñāṇena sādhitāni api vikkhambhana tad aṅga ppahānāni samuccheda ppahāna vasena

original: pavattassa maggassa kiccabhāvena vuccanti, tadatthatāya, tesaṃ taṃsantatipatitatāya
analyzed: pavattassa maggassa kicca bhāvena vuccanti tad attha tāya tesam tad santati patita tāya

original: ca maggassāti veditabbā.
analyzed: ca maggassa ati veditabbā

original: 852. Lokiyassa, lokiyā vā sacchikiriyā lokiyasacchikiriyā. Evaṃ lokuttarasacchikiriyā
analyzed: lokiyassa lokiyā vā sacchikiriyā lokiya sacchikiriyā evam lokuttara sacchikiriyā

original: veditabbā. Lābhīmhīti lābhī amhi. Tathā vasīmhīti etthāpi. Paccakkhato ñāṇaphassenāti
analyzed: veditabbā lābhīmhi iti lābhī amhi tathā vasīmhi iti ettha api paccakkhataḥ ñāṇa phassena ati

original: paccakkhato ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātena ñāṇaphassanena. “Paccakkhato”ti ca iminā anumānato
analyzed: paccakkhataḥ ārammaṇa karaṇa saṅkhātena ñāṇa phassanena paccakkhataḥ ti ca iminā anumānato

original: ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ nivatteti, “īdisamida”nti paccavekkhaṇavasena paccakkhato jānanaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇa karaṇam nivatteti īdisam idam ti paccavekkhaṇa vasena paccakkhataḥ jānanam

original: hettha “ñāṇaphasso”ti adhippeto. Phassitāti ñāṇena phuṭṭhā.
analyzed: ha ittha ñāṇa phasso ti adhippetaḥ phassitā ati ñāṇena phuṭṭhā

original: Jhānamaggaphalāni viya attano santāne anuppādetvāpi tappaṭicchādakasammohaviddhaṃsanavasena tathāviddhaṃsanapavattañāṇaṃ aparappaccayañāṇaṃ.
analyzed: jhāna magga phalāni viya attano santāne an uppādetvā api tad paṭicchādaka sammoha viddhaṃsana vasena tathā viddhaṃsana pavatta ñāṇam apara paccaya ñāṇam

original: Passanto paccakkhato jānanto. Amatogadhanti amatapariyāpannaṃ, amatasaṅkhātanti attho.
analyzed: passantaḥ paccakkhataḥ jānantaḥ amatogadhanti amata pariyāpannam amata saṅkhātanti attho

original: Sotāpattimaggo paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato dassanaṃ, tena dassanena sacchikiriyā dassanasacchikiriyā.
analyzed: sotāpatti maggo paṭhamam nibbāna dassanataḥ dassanam tena dassanena sacchikiriyā dassana sacchikiriyā

original: Kiñcāpi gotrabhuñāṇaṃ tato paṭhamataraṃ nibbānaṃ passati, ālambanakaraṇato disvā
analyzed: kiñca api gotra bhuñāṇam tatas paṭhamataram nibbānam passati ālambana karaṇataḥ disvā

original: kattabbakiccākaraṇato pana na dassananti vuccati. Sā duvidhāpīti sā dassanabhāvanāvasena
analyzed: kattabba kicca akaraṇato pana na dassananti vuccati sā duvidhā api iti sā dassana bhāvanā vasena

original: duvidhāpi sacchikiriyā. Dassanabhāvanāvasenāti dassanamaggabhāvanāmaggavasena. Tena
analyzed: duvidhā api sacchikiriyā dassana bhāvanā vasena ati dassana magga bhāvanā magga vasena tena

original: amaggavasena pavattanibbānassa paccavekkhaṇasacchikiriyaṃ nivatteti. Nibbānassāti
analyzed: amagga vasena pavatta nibbānassa paccavekkhaṇa sacchikiriyam nivatteti nibbānassa ati

original: pana iminā maggaphalesu paccavekkhaṇasacchikiriyaṃ. Imassa ñāṇassāti imassa yathādhigatassa lokuttarañāṇassa.
analyzed: pana iminā magga phalesu paccavekkhaṇa sacchikiriyam imassa ñāṇassa ati imassa yathā adhigatassa lokuttara ñāṇassa

original: 853. Abhimatāti adhippetā. Bhāvanā nāma uppādanā, santānaparibhāvanā cāti tadubhayaṃ
analyzed: abhimatā ati adhippetā bhāvanā nāma uppādanā santāna paribhāvanā ca ati tat ubhayam

original: dassento “lokiyāna”ntiādimāha. Yadaggena hi lokiyā kusalādayo uppāditā, vaḍḍhitā
analyzed: dassentaḥ lokiya ananti ādim āha yad aggena hi lokiyā kusala ādayaḥ uppāditā vaḍḍhitā

original: ca, tadaggenassa sīlabhāvanā, kāyabhāvanā, cittabhāvanā, paññābhāvanā ca lokiyā nipphāditā
analyzed: ca tad aggena assa sīla bhāvanā kāya bhāvanā citta bhāvanā paññā bhāvanā ca lokiyā nipphāditā

original: hoti, tāya ca santānopi paribhāvitoti. Tāsu lokiyalokuttarabhāvanāsu idha ñāṇadassanavisuddhikathāyaṃ
analyzed: tāya ca santānaḥ api paribhāvitaḥ ti tāsu lokiya lokuttara bhāvanāsu idha ñāṇa dassana visuddhi kathā ayam

original: lokuttarabhāvanā adhippetā, na itarā tassā sambhārabhāvato. Catubbidhampetaṃ ñāṇanti
analyzed: lokuttara bhāvanā adhippetā na itarā tassā sambhāra bhāvato catubbidham petam

original: etaṃ catubbidhampi ariyamaggañāṇaṃ lokuttarāni sammāvācādibhedāni sīlādīni uppādeti.
analyzed: etam catubbidham pi ariya magga ñāṇam lokuttarāni sammāvācā ādi bhedāni sīla ādīni uppādeti

original: Kathaṃ? Sahajātādipaccayatāya. Sīlādīnīti ettha ādi-saddena samādhissa gahaṇaṃ, na
analyzed: katham sahajāta ādi paccaya tāya sīla ādīni iti ettha ādi saddena samādhissa gahaṇam na

original: paññāya. Na hi tadeva taṃ uppādeti, maggacittuppādo pana uppādeti. Tadantogadhabhāvā
analyzed: paññāya na hi tat eva tam uppādeti magga cittuppādaḥ pana uppādeti tad antogadha bhāvā

original: sammāsaṅkappo. So hi pañcakkhandhasaṅgahitoti vadanti. Sīlādīnīti vā phalasīlādīnampi
analyzed: sammāsaṅkappo so hi pañca kkhandha saṅgahito ti vadanti sīla ādīni iti vā phala sīla ādīnam pi

original: gahaṇanti paññāyapi gahaṇaṃ yujjatiyeva. Sahajātapaccayāditāyāti ettha ādi-saddena
analyzed: gahaṇanti gahaṇam yujjatiyā iva sahajāta paccaya ādi tāya ati ettha ādi saddena

original: anantarapaccayāditāyapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tehi ca santānaṃ vāsetīti tehi samucchindanapaṭipassambhanavasena
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ tehi ca santānam vāseti iti tehi samucchindana paṭipassambhana vasena

original: pavattehi lokuttarehi sīlādīhi ariyapuggalo attano santānaṃ paribhāveti. Yaṃ nissāya
analyzed: pavattehi lokuttarehi sīla ādīhi ariya puggalaḥ attanaḥ santānam paribhāveti yam nissāya

original: parāvuttīti vadanti. Yathā pariññattayampi pahānattayampi maggañāṇassa kiccanti vuttaṃ
analyzed: parāvutti iti vadanti yathā magga ñāṇassa kiccanti vuttam

original: pariyāyena, na evamidha. Idha pana lokuttarabhāvanāva assa maggañāṇassa kiccaṃ. Na
analyzed: pariyāyena na evamidha idha pana assa magga ñāṇassa kiccam na

original: hettha bhāvanāya pariyāyo labbhatīti avadhāraṇaṃ. Tena lokiyabhāvanaṃ nivatteti.
analyzed: ha ittha bhāvanāya pariyāyaḥ labbhati iti avadhāraṇam tena lokiya bhāvanam nivatteti

original: Evaṃ sarūpeneva āgatāyāti “cittaṃ bhāvaya”nti samādhi viya cittasīsena anāgantvā
analyzed: evam sarūpena iva āgatāya ati cittam bhāvayanti citta sīsena an āgantvā

original: “paññaṃ bhāvaya”nti evaṃ sarūpeneva āgatāya paññāya. Yaṃ vuttaṃ uddesavasena. Ettāvatā
analyzed: paññam bhāvayanti evam sarūpena iva āgatāya paññāya yam vuttam uddesa vasena ettāvatā

original: taṃ vitthāritaṃ hoti. Ayañca pañho vissajjito hotīti sambandho.
analyzed: tam vitthāritam hoti ayañca pañhaḥ vissajjitaḥ hoti iti sambandhaḥ

original: Ñāṇadassanavisuddhiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ñāṇa dassana visuddhi niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Iti bāvīsatimaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

original: Ettha ca “suññatavihārasamāpattatthāya animittavihārasamāpattatthāyā”tiādinā sarūpato

original: uddhaṭattā tato pubbe āgatā maggaphalavārā appaṇihitavasena vuttā. Tattha anattānupassanāmukhena,
analyzed: tatas pubbe āgatā magga phala vārā appaṇihita vasena vuttā tattha anatta anupassanā mukhena

original: aniccānupassanāmukhena ca pavattānaṃ phalasamāpattīnaṃ purecarā gotrabhudhammā navadasabhāvena
analyzed: anicca anupassanā mukhena ca pavattānam phala samāpattīnam purecarāḥ gotrabhu dhammāḥ navadasa bhāvena

original: vuttāti veditabbā. “Sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāyā”tiādinā pana catūsupi phalesu ekasadisaṃ
analyzed: vuttā iti veditabbā sotāpatti phala samāpatta tthāya ati ādinā pana catūsu api phalesu eka sadisam

original: desanāya āgatattā sotāpannasakadāgāminopi attano phalaṃ samāpajjantīti viññāyati.
analyzed: desanāyaḥ āgata ttā sotāpanna sakadāgāminaḥ api attanaḥ phalam samāpajjanti iti viññāyati

original: Maggānantaraphalavasena taṃ vuttanti ca na sakkā vattuṃ vipassanāvasena dasannaṃ
analyzed: magga anantara phala vasena tam vuttan ti ca na sakkā vattum vipassanā vasena

original: gotrabhudhammānaṃ dassanavasena desanāya āraddhattā, maggavāreneva ca tadatthasiddhito.
analyzed: gotrabhu dhammānam dassana vasena desanāya āraddha ttā magga vārena iva ca tad attha siddhito

original: Na ca maggānantaraṃ phalaṃ “phalasamāpattī”ti vuccati visuṃ parikammābhāvato. Tasmā
analyzed: na ca magga anantaram phalam phala samāpatti iti vuccati visum parikamma abhāvato tasmā

original: phalasamāpattivacaneneva sotāpannādīnampi phalasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ siddhaṃ. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi.
analyzed: phala samāpatti vacanena iva sotāpanna ādīnam pi phala samāpatti samāpajjanam siddham tena āha tasmāt itiādi

original: 861. Payojanampi tadatthāya paṭipattiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti tannimittaṃ paṭipajjanatoti
analyzed: payojanam pi tad atthāya paṭipattiyāḥ kāraṇam hoti tad nimittam paṭipad jana tā ti

original: “kasmā samāpajjantī”ti kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā “diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārattha”nti payojanaṃ
analyzed: kasmā samāpajjanti iti kāraṇam pucchitvā diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāra atthanti payojanam

original: vissajjitaṃ. Kasmāti vā sampadāne nissakkavacanaṃ, kissāti vuttaṃ hoti. Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthanti
analyzed: vissajjitam kasmā iti vā sampadāne nissakka vacanam kissa iti vuttam hoti diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāra atthanti

original: diṭṭheva dhamme kilesadarathapariḷāhavūpasamena santena sukhavihārena viharaṇatthaṃ.
analyzed: diṭṭhe iva dhamme kilesa daratha pariḷāha vūpasamena santena sukha vihārena viharaṇa attham

original: Satipi vipākabhāve parikammena vinā anuppajjanato phalasamāpattidhammānaṃ tassa tassa
analyzed: sati api vipāka bhāve parikammena vinā anuppajjanato phala samāpatti dhammānam tassa tassa

original: ariyassa rucivaseneva pavatti, yato nesaṃ sādhipatitāti āha “addhāna…pe… samāpajjantī”ti.
analyzed: ariyassa ruci vasena iva pavatti yatas nesam sā adhipati tā ati āha addhā anape samāpajjanti iti

original: 862. Dvīhi ākārehīti dvīhi kāraṇehi. Yathā hi lokiyajjhānānaṃ samadhigamo sampayogasamaṅgibhāvena
analyzed: dvīhi ākārehi iti dvīhi kāraṇehi yathā hi sampayoga samaṅgi bhāvena

original: sijjhamāno pahānaṅgasamatikkamamukhena vuccati tathā samadhigantabbattā, evaṃ phalasamāpattipi
analyzed: sijjhamānaḥ pahāna aṅga samatikkama mukhena vuccati tathā samadhigantabba ttā evam phala samāpatti pi

original: nibbānamanasikārena sijjhamānā tadaññārammaṇāmanasikāramukhena vuccati sabbasaṅkhārato
analyzed: nibbāna manasikārena sijjhamānā tadañña ārammaṇā manasikāra mukhena vuccati sabba saṅkhārato

original: vinivaṭṭitamānasatāvasena samijjhanato. Tenāha “nibbānato”tiādi. Udayabbayañāṇādiñāṇaparamparavasena
analyzed: vinivaṭṭita mānasa tā vasena samijjhanataḥ tena āha nibbānataḥ tiādi udaya bbaya ñāṇa ādi ñāṇa parampara vasena

original: hi sabbaphalacittaṃ saṅkhārato sabbaso nibbinnavirattacittassa tato vinissaṭanibbānārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: hi sabba phala cittam saṅkhārato sabbasas nibbinna viratta cittassa tatas vinissaṭa nibbāna ārammaṇam

original: pavattati. Evaṃ pavattamānañca taṃ nibbānato aññassa ārammaṇassa amanasikārā, nibbānassa
analyzed: pavattati evam pavattamānam ca tam nibbānataḥ aññassa ārammaṇassa amanasikārā nibbānassa

original: ca manasikārā pavattatīti vuccati.
analyzed: ca manasikārā pavattati iti vuccati

original: Animittāya cetovimuttiyāti animittavimokkhadvayāya phalasamāpattiyā, aniccānupassanāmukhena
analyzed: animittāya cetaḥ vimuttiyā ati animitta vimokkha dvayāya phala samāpattiyā anicca anupassanā mukhena

original: vā samāpajjitabbāya phalasamāpattiyā. Samāpattiyāti samāpajjanatthāya. Sabbanimittānanti
analyzed: vā samāpajjitabbāya phala samāpattiyā samāpattiyā ati samāpajjana tthāya sabba nimittānam ti

original: rūpādisabbasaṅkhāranimittānaṃ. Amanasikāroti ādīnavato disvā vissaṭṭhatāya anāvajjanaṃ
analyzed: rūpa ādi sabba saṅkhāra nimittānam amanasikāraḥ ti ādīnavataḥ disvā vissaṭṭha tāya anāvajjanam

original: asamannāhāro. Animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāroti sabbasaṅkhāranimittābhāvato animittāya.
analyzed: a samannāhāraḥ a nimittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāroti sabba saṅkhāra nimitta abhāvataḥ a nimittāya

original: Kehici paccayehi na saṅkhatattā ca asaṅkhatāti laddhanāmāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā phalasamāpattisahajātena
analyzed: kehici paccayehi na saṅkhata ttā ca asaṅkhatā ati laddha nāmāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā phala samāpatti sahajātena

original: manasikārena manasikaraṇaṃ, tassā vā dhātuyā phalasamāpatticittasaṅkhāte manasikaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: manasikārena manasikaraṇam tassā vā dhātuyā phala samāpatti citta saṅkhāte manasikaraṇam

original: 863. Udayabbayādivasenāti udayabbayabhaṅgabhayatupaṭṭhānādivasena pavattanakānaṃ
analyzed: udaya bbaya ādi vasena ati udaya bbaya bhaṅga bhaya tupaṭṭhāna ādi vasena pavattana kānam

original: navannampi ñāṇānaṃ byāpāraṃ vadati. Tenāha “pavattānupubbavipassanassā”ti. Saṅkhārārammaṇagotrabhuñāṇānantaranti
analyzed: navannam api ñāṇānam byāpāram vadati tena āha pavatta anupubba vipassanassa ti saṅkhāra ārammaṇa gotra bhuñāṇa anantaram ti

original: saṅkhārārammaṇassa “vodāna”nti laddhanāmassa gotrabhuñāṇassa anantaraṃ. Kasmā panettha
analyzed: saṅkhāra ārammaṇassa laddha nāmassa gotra bhuñāṇassa anantaram kasmā pana ittha

original: gotrabhuñāṇaṃ maggañāṇapurecārikaṃ viya nibbānārammaṇaṃ na hotīti? Phaladhammānaṃ
analyzed: gotrabhuñāṇam magga ñāṇa purecārikam viya nibbāna ārammaṇam na hoti iti phala dhammānam

original: aniyyānikabhāvato. Ariyamaggadhammā eva hi niyyānikā. Vuttañhetaṃ “katame dhammā
analyzed: aniyyānika bhāvataḥ ariya magga dhammāḥ eva hi niyyānikāḥ vuttam ha etam katame dhammāḥ

original: niyyānikā? Cattāro maggā apariyāpannā”ti. Tasmā ekantena niyyānikasabhāvassa ubhatovuṭṭhānabhāvena
analyzed: niyyānikā cattāraḥ maggāḥ a pariyāpannā ati tasmai ekantena niyyānika sabhāvassa ubhatas vuṭṭhāna bhāvena

original: pavattamānassa maggañāṇassa anantarapaccayabhūtena ñāṇena nimittato vuṭṭhiteneva
analyzed: pavattamānassa magga ñāṇassa anantara paccaya bhūtena ñāṇena nimittataḥ vuṭṭhitena eva

analyzed: bhavitabbanti tassa nibbāna ārammaṇa tā yuttā na pana ariya maggassa bhāvita ttā tassa

original: vipākabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ kilesānaṃ asamucchindanato aniyyānikattā avuṭṭhānasabhāvānaṃ

analyzed: phala ñāṇānam purecārika ñāṇassa kadācipi nibbāna ārammaṇa tā ubhayattha anuloma ñāṇānam

analyzed: atulya ākārataḥ ariya magga vīthiyam hi anulomañāṇāni anibbiddha pubbānam thūla thūla lobha kkhandha ādīnam

original: sātisayaṃ padālanena lokiyañāṇesu ukkaṃsapāramippattāni maggañāṇānuguṇāni uppajjanti.
analyzed: sa atisayam padālanena lokiya ñāṇesu ukkaṃsa pārami pattāni magga ñāṇa anuguṇāni uppajjanti

original: Phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pana tāni tena tena maggena tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā
analyzed: phala samāpatti vīthiyam pana tāni tena tena maggena tesam tesam kilesānam

analyzed: tattha kilesa vikkhambhane nirussukkāni kevalam ariyānam phala samāpatti sukha samaṅgi bhāvassa

original: parikammamattāni hutvā uppajjantīti na tesaṃ kutoci vuṭṭhānasambhavo, yato nesaṃ
analyzed: parikamma mattāni hutvā uppajjanti iti na tesam kutoci vuṭṭhāna sambhavaḥ yatas nesam

original: pariyosānañāṇaṃ saṅkhāranimittavuṭṭhānato nibbānārammaṇaṃ siyā.
analyzed: pariyosāna ñāṇam saṅkhāra nimitta vuṭṭhānataḥ nibbāna ārammaṇam siyā

original: Evañca katvā “sekkhassa attano phalasamāpattivaḷañjanatthāya udayabbayādivasena saṅkhāre
analyzed: evam ca katvā sekkhassa attanaḥ phala samāpatti vaḷañjana tthāya udaya bbaya ādi vasena saṅkhāre

original: sammasantassa vipassanāñāṇānupubbiyā phalameva uppajjati, na maggo”ti idañca aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ
analyzed: sammasantassa vipassanā ñāṇa anupubbiyā phalam eva uppajjati na maggo ti idam ca aṭṭhakathā vacanaṃ

original: samatthitaṃ hoti. Tenāha “sekkhassāpi phalameva uppajjati, na maggo”ti. Nibbānārammaṇe
analyzed: samatthitam hoti tena āha sekkhassa api phalam eva uppajjati na maggo ti nibbāna ārammaṇe

original: appanajjhānavasena yathāparicchinnakālaṃ nirantaraṃ phalacittasseva pavattanaṃ samāpajjanaṃ
analyzed: appana jhāna vasena yathā paricchinna kālam nirantaram phala cittassa iva pavattanam samāpajjanam

analyzed: phala samāpatti iti āha phala samāpatti vasena nirodhe cittam appeti iti yadi anupubba vipassanānam

analyzed: vasena phala samāpatti samāpajjanam tena nīhārena sekkhassa upari maggena api bhavitabbanti

original: anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “phalasamāpattininnatāyā”tiādi. Tena aññoyeva vipassanācāro ariyamaggāvaho,
analyzed: anuyogam sandhāya āha phala samāpatti ninna tāya atiādi tena aññaḥ yā eva vipassanā ācāraḥ ariya magga āvahaḥ

original: añño phalasamāpattiāvahoti dasseti, svāyaṃ vipassanāya vibhāgo vutto eva. Ye panāti
analyzed: añño phala samāpatti āvaho ti dasseti svāyam vipassanāya vibhāgaḥ vuttaḥ eva ye pana āti

original: abhayagirivāsino sandhāyāha. Te hi maggaphalavipassanāya āloḷetvā vadanti. Teneva
analyzed: abhayagiri vāsino sandhāya āha te hi magga phala vipassanāya āloḷetvā vadanti tena iva

original: hi “evaṃ satī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Arahā paccekabuddho bhavissati yadi itaratthāpi vipassanā
analyzed: hi evam sati itiādi vuttam arahā paccekabuddhaḥ bhavissati yadi itaratthā api vipassanā

original: tadatthāya saṃvatteyyāti adhippāyo. Pāḷivaseneva ca paṭikkhittanti “dasa gotrabhudhammā
analyzed: tad atthāya saṃvatteyyā ti adhippāyaḥ pāḷi vasena iva ca dasa gotrabhu dhammā

original: vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”ti maggatthā phalatthā vipassanā visuṃ katvā pavattapāḷivaseneva
analyzed: vipassanā vasena uppajjanti iti magga tthā phala tthā vipassanā visum katvā pavatta pāḷi vasena iva

original: tesaṃ vacanaṃ paṭikkhittantipi na gahetabbaṃ, aññathā “dasa gotrabhudhammā”ti vacanaṃ
analyzed: tesam vacanam paṭikkhittan ti pi na gahetabbam aññathā dasa gotrabhu dhammā ti vacanam

original: virujjheyyāti. Idameva pana gahetabbanti vuttassevatthassa nigamanaṃ. Phalañcassātiādi
analyzed: virujjheyya ti idam eva pana gahetabbanti vuttassa iva atthassa nigamanam phalam ca ssa atiādi

original: mahaggatavipākānaṃ viya lokuttaravipākānañca kusalasarikkhatādassanaṃ. Jhānato sarikkhatādassaneneva
analyzed: mahaggata vipākānam viya lokuttara vipākānam ca kusala sa rikkha tā dassanam jhānataḥ sa rikkha tā dassanena iva

original: cettha bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgavasenāpi sarikkhatā dassitāyevāti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ca ittha bojjhaṅga maggaṅga vasena api sa rikkha tā dassi tāya iva ati veditabbam

original: 864. Ṭhitiyāti pabandhaṭṭhitiyā. Yathāparicchinnakālañhi samāpattiyā pabandhavasenāvaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: ṭhitiyā ati pabandha ṭhitiyā yathā paricchinna kālam hi samāpattiyā pabandha vasena avaṭṭhānam

original: idha ṭhitīti. “Cande vā sūriye vā ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti kālāvadhiggahaṇavasena
analyzed: idha ṭhitī iti cande vā sūriye vā ettakam ṭhānam gate vuṭṭhahissāmi iti kāla avadhi gahaṇa vasena

original: samāpajjanaṃ cittassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ abhisaṅkhāro.

original: 865. Sabbānevetānīti rūpanimittādisabbāneva etāni ekato kāmaṃ na manasi karoti asambhavato.
analyzed: sabbān eva etāni iti rūpa nimitta ādi sabbān eva etāni ekatas kāmam na manasi karoti asambhavataḥ

original: Sabbasaṅgāhikavasenāti anavasesapariyādānavasena. Samudāyasaddā hi avayavesupi pavattanti,
analyzed: sabba saṅgāhika vasena ati anavasesa pariyādāna vasena samudāya saddāḥ hi avayavesu pi pavattanti

original: avayavabyatirekena ca samudāyo na labbhatīti avayavagatampi kiccaṃ samudāyavasena
analyzed: avayava byatirekena ca samudāyaḥ na labbhati iti avayava gatam pi kiccam samudāya vasena

original: vuttaṃ. Tasmāti sabbesaṃ saṅkhāranimittānaṃ ekato manasikārābhāvato. Yasmā bhavaṅgacitte

original: uppanne phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhito nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “yaṃ bhavaṅgassā”tiādi.
analyzed: uppanne phala samāpattitaḥ vuṭṭhitaḥ nāma hoti tasmā vuttam yam bhavaṅgassa atiādi

original: Bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇaṃ nāma kammādi. Manasi karototi bhavaṅgasahagatena manasikārena
analyzed: bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇam nāma kamma ādi manasi karoto ti bhavaṅga sahagatena manasikārena

original: manasi karoto, taṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ bhavaṅgamanasi karoto.
analyzed: manasi karoto tam vā ārammaṇam bhavaṅga manasi karoto

original: 866. Phalassa phalameva vā anantaraṃ hoti purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ.
analyzed: phalassa phalam eva vā anantaram hoti purimassa purimassa pacchimam pacchimam

original: Bhavaṅgaṃ vā sabbapacchimassa. Phalānantaraṃ maggavīthiyaṃ, phalasamāpattiyañca.
analyzed: bhavaṅgam vā sabba pacchimassa phala anantaram magga vīthiyam phala samāpattiyam ca

original: “Yena phalena nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ hotī”ti idaṃ phaluppattiyā nirodhā vuṭṭhānabhāvato
analyzed: yena phalena nirodhā vuṭṭhānam hoti iti idam phala uppattiyāḥ nirodhā vuṭṭhāna bhāvato

original: vuttaṃ. Tanti nirodhāvuṭṭhānabhāvena vuttaṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ vā aggaphalaṃ vā. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanānantaranti
analyzed: vuttam tat ti nirodha avuṭṭhāna bhāvena vuttam anāgāmi phalam vā agga phalam vā nevasaññānāsaññāyatana anantaram ti

original: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa kusalassa, kiriyassa vā anantaraṃ satipi sattāhātikkame
analyzed: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa kusalassa kiriyassa vā anantaram sati pi satta aha atikkame

original: vijātiyena antarikattā.
analyzed: vijātiyena antarikattā

original: Paṭippassaddhadarathanti sabbaso passaddhakilesadarathaṃ. Amatārammaṇanti nibbānārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: paṭippassaddha daratham ti sabbaso passaddha kilesa daratham amata ārammaṇam ti nibbāna ārammaṇam

original: Subhanti asobhanatāya kilesassāpi abhāvato sobhanaṃ. Taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ lokāmisaṃ vantaṃ
analyzed: subhanti asobhana tāya kilesassa api abhāvato sobhanam taṇhā saṅkhātam loka āmisam vantam

original: chaḍḍitaṃ etenāti vantalokāmisaṃ. Vūpasantakilesatāya, susantatāya ca santaṃ. Yena
analyzed: chaḍḍitam etena ati vanta loka āmisam vūpasanta kilesa tāya su santatāya ca santam yena

original: dhammena yogato samaṇo nāma hoti, tassa ariyamaggasaṅkhātassa sāmaññassa phalanti sāmaññaphalaṃ.
analyzed: dhammena yogataḥ samaṇaḥ nāma hoti tassa ariya magga saṅkhātassa sāmaññassa phalanti sāmañña phalam

original: Ojavantenāti sabhāvasampannena. Sucināti kilesāsucivirahato parisuddhena. Sukhenāti
analyzed: ojavantena ati sabhāva sampannena sucinā ati kilesa asuci virahataḥ parisuddhena sukhena ati

original: anuttarasukhena. Abhisanditanti sabbaso lūkhabhāvāpagamanena sinehitaṃ. Sātātisātenāti
analyzed: anuttara sukhena abhisanditam ti sabbasas lūkha bhāva apagamanena sinehitam sāta ati sātena ati

original: mahaggatasātato, lokuttarakusalasātato ca ativiya sātena madhurena. Maggasukhatopi
analyzed: mahaggata sātataḥ lokuttara kusala sātataḥ ca sātena madhurena magga sukhataḥ pi

original: hi phalasukhaṃ santataratāya paṇītataraṃ. Amatena sammoditaṃ. “Madhuṃ viyā”ti iminā
analyzed: hi phala sukham santataratāya paṇītataram amatena sammoditam madhum viyāti iminā

original: sātātisātataṃyeva vibhāveti.

original: avuttā eva ñāṇacariyāsu vuttā. Apica paṭipakkhehi akampiyaṭṭho balaṭṭho, pañcannaṃ

original: vasībhāvānaṃ vasena suciṇṇatā cariyaṭṭho, eteneva samathabalasamādhicariyānampi nānattaṃ
analyzed: vasībhāvānam vasena etena iva samatha bala samādhi cariyānam pi nānattam

original: saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: saṃvaṇṇitam ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Vasībhāvatā paññāti ettha vaso etassa atthīti vasī, tassa bhāvo vasībhāvo, sā eva
analyzed: vasībhāvatā paññāti ettha vaso etassa atthi iti vasī tassa bhāvaḥ vasībhāvaḥ sā eva

original: vasībhāvatā. “Vasiyo”ti pana pāḷiyaṃ itthiliṅgavasena vuttattā tāyo dassetuṃ “vasīti
analyzed: vasībhāva tā vasiyā iti pana pāḷiyam itthi liṅga vasena vutta ttā tāyaḥ dassetum vasī ti

original: pañca vasiyo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha jhānaṃ āvajjantassa nirantaraṃ jhānaṅgesu cittappavattanasamatthatā
analyzed: pañca vasiyaḥ tiādi vuttam tattha jhānam āvajjantassa nirantaram jhāna aṅgesu citta ppavattana samattha tā

original: āvajjanavasī. Samāpajjitukāmassa sīghaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasī.
analyzed: āvajjana vasī samāpajjitu kāmassa sīgham jhānam samāpajjana samattha tā samāpajjana vasī

original: Accharāmattaṃ vā katipayaccharāmattaṃ vā khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī.
analyzed: accharāmattam vā katipaya charāmattam vā khaṇam jhānam ṭhapetum samattha tā adhiṭṭhāna vasī

original: Tatheva lahuṃ vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī. Paccavekkhaṇavasī pana āvajjanavasiyā
analyzed: tathā iva lahum vuṭṭhātum samattha tā vuṭṭhāna vasī paccavekkhaṇa vasī pana āvajjana vasiyā

original: eva sijjhati. Paccavekkhaṇajavanāneva hi tattha āvajjanānantarānīti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
analyzed: eva sijjhati paccavekkhaṇa javanāni iva hi tattha āvajjana anantarāni iti ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ

original: vitthāro pana heṭṭhā āgato eva. Ayañca vasībhāvo samādhicariyānaṃ vasena vutto. Ñāṇacariyāsu
analyzed: vitthāro pana heṭṭhā āgataḥ eva ayam ca vasībhāvo samādhi cariyānam vasena vuttaḥ ñāṇa cariyāsu

original: pana lokuttarānaṃ ñāṇacariyānaṃ vasībhāvāpādanakiccaṃ nāma natthi. Paṭipakkhassa
analyzed: pana lokuttarānam ñāṇa cariyānam vasībhāva āpādana kiccam nāma natthi paṭipakkhassa

original: suvihatattā sabhāvasiddho tattha vasībhāvo, lokiyānaṃ pana paguṇabalavabhāvāpādanena
analyzed: su vihata ttā sabhāva siddho tattha vasībhāvaḥ lokiyānam pana paguṇa balava bhāva āpādanena

original: vasībhāvo labbhateva.
analyzed: vasībhāvaḥ labbhatā iva

original: 870. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesoti anavasesaniddeso. Cuddasahi ñāṇacariyāhi hoti aggamaggaphalānaṃ
analyzed: ukkaṭṭha niddeso ti anavasesa niddeso cuddasahi ñāṇa cariyāhi hoti agga magga phalānam

original: anadhigatattāti. Yadi evanti yadi ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena “soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhī”ti
analyzed: anadhigata ttā iti yadi evam ti yadi ukkaṭṭha niddesa vasena soḷasahi ñāṇa cariyāhi iti

original: vuttaṃ, tato avakaṃsavasenapi icchitabbaṃ, evaṃ sante kiṃ na hoti nirodhasamāpajjananti
analyzed: vuttam tatas avakaṃsa vasena api icchitabbam evam sante kim na hoti nirodha samāpad jananti

original: adhippāyo. Pañca kāmaguṇā vatthubhūtā etassa santīti pañcakāmaguṇiko, kāmarāgo. Appahīnattā
analyzed: adhippāyo pañca kāmaguṇāḥ vatthu bhūtāḥ etassa santi iti pañca kāmaguṇikaḥ kāma rāgaḥ appahīna ttā

original: asamucchinnattā. Na hi kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanappahānamattaṃ nirodhassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: asamucchinna ttā na hi kāma rāgassa vikkhambhana ppahāna mattam nirodhassa adhiṭṭhānam

original: bhavituṃ sakkoti. Tasmāti samādhipāripanthikassa kāmarāgassa supahīnattā. Etena kāmaṃ
analyzed: bhavitum sakkoti tasmā ati samādhi pāripanthikassa kāma rāgassa su upahīna ttā etena kāmam

original: maggaphalañāṇacariyā lokiyañāṇasamādhicariyā viya nirodhasamāpajjane sarūpena na
analyzed: magga phala ñāṇa cariyā lokiya ñāṇa samādhi cariyā viya nirodha samāpajjane sarūpena na

original: viniyujjanti tadā appavattanato, tassa tassa pana paṭipakkhassa samucchindanena balacariyānaṃ
analyzed: viniyujjanti tadā a pavattanataḥ tassa tassa pana paṭipakkhassa samucchindanena bala cariyānam

original: visesapaccayatāya nirodhasamāpattiyā adhiṭṭhānaṃ hotīti dasseti. Esāti anāgāmī. Idañhi
analyzed: visesa paccaya tāya nirodha samāpattiyāḥ adhiṭṭhānam hoti iti dasseti esā ati anāgāmī idam hi

original: “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassā”tiādivacanaṃ anāgāminova nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
analyzed: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa ati ādi vacanam anāgāmino va nirodhā vuṭṭhānam sandhāya vuttam

original: “nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusala”nti vacanato, aññathā “nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakiriyā”ti vucceyya.
analyzed: neva saññā nāsañña āyatana kusalanti vacanataḥ aññathā neva saññā nāsañña āyatana kiriyā ati vucceyya

original: 871. “Pañcavokārabhave”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu catuvokārabhavepi arūpajjhānavasena
analyzed: pañcavokāra bhava iti kasmā vuttam nanu catuvokāra bhave pi arūpa jhāna vasena

original: yathārahaṃ anupubbasamāpatti labbhatīti? Kāmaṃ labbhati, sā pana “anupubbasamāpattī”ti
analyzed: yathāraham anupubba samāpatti labbhati iti kāmam labbhati sā pana anupubba samāpatti iti

original: na vuccati ekadesabhāvato. Aṭṭhasamāpattivaseneva ca “anupubbasamāpattī”ti vuccatīti
analyzed: na vuccati eka desa bhāvataḥ aṭṭha samāpatti vasena iva ca anupubba samāpatti iti vuccati iti

original: dassento āha “paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ uppatti natthī”ti. Vatthussa abhāvāti hadayavatthuno
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha paṭhama jhāna ādīnam uppatti natthi iti vatthussa abhāvā ti hadaya vatthuno

original: abhāvāti vadanti, karajakāyasaṅkhātassa pana vatthuno abhāvāti attho. Yadi hi āruppe
analyzed: abhāvā ti vadanti karaja kāya saṅkhātassa pana vatthunaḥ abhāvā ti atthaḥ yadi hi āruppe

original: nirodhaṃ samāpajjeyya, cittacetasikānaṃ, aññassa ca kassaci abhāvato apaññattikova
analyzed: nirodham samāpajjeyya citta cetasikānam aññassa ca kassaci abhāvataḥ a paññattikaḥ uva

original: bhaveyya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutasadiso. Kiñcāyaṃ upādāya nirodhaṃ
analyzed: bhaveyya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuta sadisaḥ kiñca ayam upādāya nirodham

original: samāpannoti vucceyya, kiṃ vā etāya vatthucintāya. Aṅgavekallatova natthi āruppe nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ.
analyzed: samāpannaḥ ti vucceyya kim vā etāya vatthu cintāya aṅga vekallataḥ va na atthi āruppe nirodha samāpatti samāpajjanam

original: 872. Saṅkhārānaṃ pavattibhedeti saṅkhatadhammānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe uppajjane, bhijjane
analyzed: saṅkhārānam pavatti bhede iti saṅkhata dhammānam khaṇe khaṇe uppajjane bhijjane

original: ca, tesaṃ vā kusalādibhedabhinne yathārahaṃ tīhi dukkhatāhi upaddute pavattivibhāge.
analyzed: ca tesam vā kusala ādi bheda bhinne yathāraham tīhi dukkha tāhi upaddute pavatti vibhāge

original: Cittacetasikavigamehi rūpadhammesu labbhamānāpi saṅkhāradukkhatā abbohārikataṃ āpajjati.
analyzed: citta cetasika vigamehi rūpa dhammesu labbhamānā api saṅkhāra dukkha tā abbohārika tam āpajjati

original: Ukkaṇṭhitvāti nibbinditvā. Nibbānaṃ patvāti anupādisesanibbānaṃ patvā viya. Sukhanti niddukkhaṃ.
analyzed: ukkaṇṭhitvā iti nibbinditvā nibbānam patvā iti anupādisesa nibbānam patvā viya sukhanti niddukkham

original: 873. Samathavipassanāvasenāti yuganaddhānaṃ viya aññamaññūpakāritāya sahitānaṃ vasena.
analyzed: samatha vipassanā vasena ati yuga naddhānam viya aññamaññu upakāri tāya sahitānam vasena

original: Ussakkitvāti ukkaṃsaṃ patvā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā, yāva ca anulomañāṇā āruhitvā.
analyzed: ussakkitvā ati ukkaṃsam patvā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanāḥ yāva ca anulomañāṇāḥ āruhitvā

original: Nirodhayatoti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā taṃ nirodhentassa. Aññassa kassacipi
analyzed: nirodhayato ti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam samāpajjitvā tam nirodhentassa aññassa kassaci pi

original: cittassa anuppajjanena evamassā nirodhasamāpattiyā samāpajjanaṃ hoti. “Yo hī”tiādinā
analyzed: cittassa anuppajjanena evam assāḥ nirodha samāpattiyāḥ samāpajjanam hoti yaḥ hi itiādinā

original: “samathavipassanāvasenā”ti vuttamevatthaṃ byatirekamukhena vivarati. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ
analyzed: samatha vipassanā vasena ati vuttam eva attham byatireka mukhena vivarati na ivasaññā nāsañña āyatana samāpattim

original: patvā tiṭṭhati taduddhaṃ suddhasamathavipassanāya abhāvato. Yo vipassanāvaseneva
analyzed: patvā tiṭṭhati tat uddham suddha samatha vipassanāya abhāvataḥ yaḥ vipassanā vasena iva

original: ussakkati sace ariyo phalasamāpattatthiko, so attano phalasamāpattiṃ patvā tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: ussakkati sace ariyaḥ phala samāpatta tthiko so attanaḥ phala samāpattim patvā tiṭṭhati

original: Atha puthujjano, sekho vā maggatthiko tāya ce vipassanāya maggaṃ patvā phale ṭhito,
analyzed: atha puthujjanaḥ sekhaḥ vā maggatthiko tāya ce vipassanāya maggam patvā phale ṭhitaḥ

original: sopi phalasamāpattiṃ patvā tiṭṭhaticceva vuccati. Soti ubhayavasena paṭipanno. Tanti nirodhasamāpattiṃ.
analyzed: saḥ api phala samāpattim patvā tiṭṭhati icca iva vuccati saḥ ti ubhaya vasena paṭipanno nirodha samāpattim

original: 874. Yena phaladvayasamannāgamādinā nirodhaṃ samāpajjituṃ samattho hoti, so vidhi
analyzed: yena phala dvaya samannāgama ādinā nirodham samāpajjitum samatthaḥ hoti saḥ

original: pageva vibhāvitoti samāpajjanākārameva dassento “katabhattakicco”tiādimāha. Tañhi
analyzed: pagā iva vibhāvito ti samāpajjana ākāram eva dassentaḥ kata bhatta kiccā iti ādim āha tat hi

original: sabbāsampi bhāvanānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ pubbakiccaṃ. Tattha saṅkhāreti tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhāne,
analyzed: sabbāsam pi bhāvanānam sādhāraṇam pubba kiccam tattha saṅkhāre ti tasmim paṭhama jhāne

original: paṭhamajjhānacittuppāde vā saṅkhāre.
analyzed: paṭhamajjhāna cittuppāde vā saṅkhāre

original: “Vipassatī”ti vuttaṃ, kīdisī panettha vipassanā icchitabbāti taṃ niddhāraṇatthaṃ
analyzed: vipassati iti vuttam kīdisī pana ittha vipassanā icchitabbā ti tam niddhāraṇa attham

original: “vipassanā panesā”tiādinā tameva vipassanaṃ tidhā bhinditvā dasseti. Mandā ce vipassanā,
analyzed: vipassanā pana isā ati ādinā tam eva vipassanam tidhā bhinditvā dasseti mandā ce vipassanā

original: dandhābhiññaṃ maggaṃ sādheti. Tikkhā ce, khippābhiññanti ayaṃ mandatikkhatāya viseso.
analyzed: dandha abhiññam maggam sādheti tikkhā ce khippa abhiññan ti ayam manda tikkha tāya visesaḥ

original: Lakkhaṇappattā pana vipassanā maggassa paccayo hotiyevāti imamatthaṃ dassento āha
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ppattā pana vipassanā maggassa paccayaḥ hoti yeva ati imam attham dassentaḥ āha

original: “saṅkhāra…pe… hotiyevā”ti. Tikkhāva vaṭṭati saṅkhārārammaṇepi sati sabbasaṅkhārehi
analyzed: saṅkhāra pe vaṭṭati saṅkhāra ārammaṇe pi sati sabba saṅkhārehi

original: vivaṭṭanākāreneva pavattanato, maggo viya visaṅkhāragatassa phalassa paccayabhāvato
analyzed: vivaṭṭana ākārena iva pavattanataḥ maggaḥ viya visaṅkhāra gatassa phalassa paccaya bhāvato

original: ca. Tenāha “maggabhāvanāsadisā”ti. Yasmā atimandā samathādikā saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhane
analyzed: ca tena āha magga bhāvanā sadisā ati yasmai ati mandā samatha ādikā nirodhane

original: asamatthā samathaniṭṭhā hoti, atitikkhā ñāṇādikā sātisayaṃ saṅkhāresu dosadassane
analyzed: asamatthā samatha niṭṭhā hoti atitikkhā ñāṇa ādikā sa atisayam saṅkhāresu dosa dassane

original: phalasamāpattiniṭṭhā hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “nātimandanātitikkhā vaṭṭatī”ti. Esa nirodhasamāpajjanako.
analyzed: phala samāpatti niṭṭhā hoti tasmā vuttam na atimandana atitikkhā vaṭṭati iti esa nirodha samāpajjanako

original: Te saṅkhāreti te paṭhamajjhānasaṅkhāre.
analyzed: te saṅkhāre iti te paṭhamajjhāna saṅkhāre

original: “Tathevā”ti iminā “nātimandāya nātitikkhāyā”ti imamatthaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Esa nayo sesesupi.
analyzed: tathā iva ati iminā na atimandāya na atitikkhāya ati imam attham ākaḍḍhati esa nayaḥ sesesu pi

original: “Ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassatī”ti vattabbaṃ,
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatanam samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tathā iva vipassati iti vattabbam

original: heṭṭhā vuttanayattā pana taṃ avatvā “catubbidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ karoti”cceva vuttanti
analyzed: heṭṭhā vutta naya ttā pana tam a vatvā catubbidham pubba kiccam karoti icca iva vuttan ti

original: keci, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. Vipassanācārato hi samādhicāro, tasmā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya
analyzed: keci tam tesam matimattam vipassanā ācārataḥ hi samādhi cāro tasmā samāpattitaḥ vuṭṭhāya

original: pubbakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tathā hi paratopi “ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya imaṃ
analyzed: pubba kiccam kātabbam tathā hi paratas pi ākiñcaññāyatanam samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya imaṃ

original: pubbakiccaṃ katvā”tiādiṃ vakkhati, na pana “tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassitvā”ti.
analyzed: pubba kiccam katvā ati ādim vakkhati na pana tattha saṅkhāre tathā iva vipassitvā

original: Nānābaddhaavikopananti attanā asambaddhassa parikkhārassa avināsanaṃ. Yathā taṃ na
analyzed: nānā ābaddha avikopanam ti attanā asaṃbaddhassa parikkhārassa avināsanam yathā tam na

original: vinassati, tathā adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Saṅghapaṭimānananti saṅghassa paṭimānanāvajjanaṃ. Satthupakkosananti
analyzed: vinassati tathā adhiṭṭhānam saṅgha paṭimānanam ti saṅghassa paṭimānana āvajjanam satthu pakkosanam ti

original: satthu pakkosanāvajjanaṃ. Addhānaparicchedanti jīvitaddhānaparicchedaṃ pubbakiccaṃ karotīti sambandho.
analyzed: satthu pakkosana āvajjanam addhāna paricchedam ti jīvita ddhāna paricchedam pubba kiccam karoti iti sambandho

original: 875. Adhiṭṭhātabbanti cittaṃ uppādetabbaṃ. Tathā cittuppādanameva hettha adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: adhiṭṭhātabbanti cittam uppādetabbam tathā citta uppādanam eva ha ittha adhiṭṭhānam

original: Cittajarūpādīnaṃ anuppajjanato, pacchājātapaccayādiupatthambhābhāvato ca sattāhameva
analyzed: citta ja rūpa ādīnam anuppajjanato pacchājāta paccaya ādi upatthambha abhāvato ca satta aham eva

original: tathā sarīraṃ pavattati, tato paraṃ kilamatīti sattāhameva paricchinditvā nirodhaṃ
analyzed: tathā sarīram pavattati tatas param kilamati iti sattāham eva paricchinditvā nirodham

original: samāpajjantīti vadanti.
analyzed: samāpajjanti iti vadanti

original: Samāpattivasenevāti nirodhasamāpattivaseneva. Naṃ aggiādiantarāyaṃ rakkhati samāpannako
analyzed: samāpatti vasena iva ati nirodha samāpatti vasena iva nam aggi ādi antarāyam rakkhati samāpannakaḥ

original: adhiṭṭhānavasenāti adhippāyo. Āyasmato sañjīvassātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāna vasena āti adhippāyaḥ āyasmataḥ sañjīvassa ati ādīsu yat vattabbam tat heṭṭhā

original: iddhikathāyaṃ vuttameva.
analyzed: iddhi kathā ayam vuttam eva

original: 876. Etassāti nirodhaṃ samāpajjantassa, nirodhasamāpajjanassa vā. Tasmiṃ samayeti tasmiṃ tassa bhikkhuno upasaṅkamanasamaye vuṭṭhātiyeva. Kālaparicchedasadisañhetaṃ.
analyzed: etassa ati nirodham samāpajjantassa nirodha samāpajjanassa vā tasmin samaye iti tasmin tassa bhikkhuno upasaṅkamana samaye vuṭṭhātiyā iva kāla pariccheda sadisam ha etam

original: Evaṃ garukāti aggiādīhipi anabhibhavanīyaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpannaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāpanato
analyzed: evam an abhibhavanīyam nirodham samāpannam samāpattitaḥ vuṭṭhāpanataḥ

original: evaṃ garukā hi saṅghassa āṇā nāma, tasmā attano hitasukhaṃ ākaṅkhantena jīvitahetupi
analyzed: evam garukā hi saṅghassa āṇā nāma tasmai hita sukham ākaṅkhantena jīvita hetu pi

original: saṅghassa āṇā na atikkamitabbāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: saṅghassa āṇā na atikkamitabbā ati adhippāyaḥ

original: 877. Na pakkosati “satthā taṃ, āvuso, āmantetī”ti. “Vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti āvajjitabbanti sambandho.
analyzed: na pakkosati satthā tam āvuso āmanteti iti vuṭṭhahissāmi iti āvajjitabbam ti sambandhaḥ

original: 878. Jīvitaddhānassāti attano jīvitakālassa jīvitappavattiyā. Āyu eva āyusaṅkhārā.
analyzed: jīvita ddhānassa ati attanaḥ jīvita kālassa jīvita ppavattiyā āyu eva āyu saṅkhārā

original: “Āyuusmāviññāṇānī”ti ca vadanti, te cassa pakaticittasseva ārammaṇaṃ honti. Antonirodhe
analyzed: ca vadanti te ca ssa pakati cittassa iva ārammaṇam honti antar nirodhe

original: maraṇaṃ natthi carimabhavaṅgena mīyanato. Āvajjitvāva samāpajjitabbaṃ “sahasā maraṇaṃ

original: akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo pana heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva parinibbāti,
analyzed: akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma yaḥ pana heṭṭhā catūsu deva lokesu tattha tattha iva parinibbāti

original: ayaṃ nauddhaṃsoto naakaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Ete pana avihesu upapannasamanantarā āyuvemajjhaṃ
analyzed: ayam nauddhaṃsotaḥ naakaniṭṭhagāmī nāma ete pana avihesu upapanna samanantarāḥ āyu vemajjham

original: appatvā, patvā ca parinibbāyanavasena tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyī,
analyzed: a patvā patvā ca parinibbāyana vasena tayo antarāparinibbāyinaḥ ekaḥ upahacca parinibbāyī

original: eko uddhaṃsototi pañca. Te asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyivibhāgena dasa honti. Tathā
analyzed: ekaḥ pañca te asaṅkhāra sa saṅkhāra parinibbāyi vibhāgena dasa honti tathā

original: atappasudassasudassīsūti cattāro dasakā cattālīsaṃ. Akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṃsoto natthi.
analyzed: atappa sudassa sudassīsu iti cattāro dasakā cattālīsam akaniṭṭhe pana natthi

original: Tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyīti cattāro. Te asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyivibhāgena
analyzed: tayo antarā parinibbāyinaḥ ekaḥ upahacca parinibbāyī iti cattāro te asaṅkhāra sa saṅkhāra parinibbāyi vibhāgena

original: aṭṭhāti aṭṭhacattālīsaṃ anāgāmino.
analyzed: aṭṭhā ati aṭṭhacattālīsam anāgāminaḥ

original: Sotāpannā pana paṭipadābhedena cattāro sattakkhattuparamā, cattāro kolaṃkolā, cattāro ekabījinoti saddhādhurena paṭipannā dvādasa, tathā paññādhurenāti catuvīsati.
analyzed: sotāpannā pana paṭipadā bhedena cattāro satta kkhattu paramā cattāro kolaṃkolā cattāro eka bījino ti saddhādhurena paṭipannāḥ dvādasa tathā paññādhurena ati catuvīsati

original: Sakadāgāmino suññatavimokkhena vimuttā paṭipadāvasena cattāro, tathā animittaappaṇihitavimokkhehīti dvādasa.
analyzed: sakadāgāmino suññata vimokkhena vimuttā paṭipadā vasena cattāro tathā animitta appaṇihita vimokkhehi iti dvādasa

original: 889. Tathā arahanto. Te pana dvādasa paññāvimuttā, dvādasa ubhatobhāgavimuttā, dvādasa
analyzed: tathā arahanto te pana dvādasa paññā vimuttāḥ dvādasa ubhatobhāga vimuttāḥ dvādasa

original: tevijjā, dvādasa chaḷabhiññā, dvādasa paṭisambhidāppattāti samasaṭṭhi honti. Evamete
analyzed: tevijjāḥ dvādasa chaḍabhiññāḥ dvādasa paṭisambhidā appattā ati samasaṭṭhi honti evam ete

original: saddhiṃ paccekasambuddhasammāsambuddhehi chacattālīsādhikasataṃ ariyā. Yasmā tesaṃ
analyzed: saddhim paccekasambuddha sammāsambuddhehi cha cattālīsa adhika satam ariyāḥ yasmā tesam

original: ariyabhāvasiddhi ariyāya paññābhāvanāya, tena vuttaṃ “āhuneyyabhāvādisiddhipi imissā
analyzed: ariya bhāva siddhi ariyāya paññā bhāvanāya tena vuttam imissā

original: lokuttarapaññābhāvanāya ānisaṃso”ti. Lokiyavijjābhiññāhi vināpi ubhatobhāgavimuttatā
analyzed: lokuttara paññā bhāvanāya ānisaṃsaḥ ti lokiya vijjā abhiññāhi vinā api ubhatobhāga vimutta tā

original: hotīti ubhatobhāgavimutto visuṃ gahito. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttanti yaṃ catutthamaggapaññābhāvanaṃ
analyzed: hoti iti ubhatobhāga vimuttaḥ visum gahitaḥ yam sandhāya vuttam ti yam catuttha magga paññā bhāvanam

original: sandhāya heṭṭhā saṅkhepato gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ pana vuttākāraṃ nigamanavasena
analyzed: sandhāya heṭṭhā saṅkhepataḥ gāthā vaṇṇanāyam vuttam tam pana vutta ākāram nigamana vasena

original: dassetuṃ “maggakkhaṇe”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāmaṃ catūsupi maggakkhaṇesu taṃ jaṭaṃ vijaṭeti
analyzed: dassetum magga kkhaṇa iti ādi vuttam kāmam catūsu pi magga kkhaṇesu tam jaṭam vijaṭeti

original: nāma, phalakkhaṇesupi yathārahaṃ vijaṭitajaṭo, aggaphalakkhaṇeyeva pana sabbaso vijaṭitajaṭo,
analyzed: nāma pha lakkhaṇesu pi yathāraham vijaṭita jaṭaḥ agga pha lakkhaṇe yā iva pana sabbaso vijaṭita jaṭaḥ

original: tato paraṃ vijaṭetabbāya jaṭāya abhāvato. Tenettha heṭṭhā heṭṭhimamaggapaññābhāvanānisaṃsassa
analyzed: tatas param vijaṭetabbāya jaṭāya abhāvato tena itthā heṭṭhā heṭṭhima magga paññā bhāvanā nisaṃsassa

original: vuttattāva catutthamaggapaññābhāvanāvasena attho vutto.
analyzed: vutta ttā va catuttha magga paññā bhāvanā vasena atthaḥ vutto

original: Ratinti abhiratiṃ, abhirucinti attho. Tatthāti ariyāya paññābhāvanāya.
analyzed: ratim ti abhiratim abhirucim ti attho tattha ati ariyāya paññā bhāvanāya

original: 890. Imissā gāthāyāti imissaṃ gāthāyaṃ. Gāthā hi attano atthabhūtassa visuddhimaggassa ādhārabhāvena vuttā, sāmivacanaṃ vā etaṃ atthassa taṃsambandhibhāvato.
analyzed: imissā gāthāya ati imissam gāthāyam gāthā hi attanaḥ attha bhūtassa visuddhi maggassa ādhāra bhāvena vuttā sāmi vacanam vā etam atthassa tad sambandhi bhāvataḥ

original: Paññābhāvanānisaṃsaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: paññā bhāvanā nisaṃsa niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Iti tevīsatimaparicchedavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: iti tevīsatima pariccheda vaṇṇanā

original: Nigamanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: nigamana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 891. Imissā dāni gāthāyātiādīnaṃ gāthānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vutto eva. Svāyaṃ “visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissa”nti evaṃ paṭiññāto visuddhimaggo ettāvatā bhāsito hotīti sambandho.
analyzed: imissā dāni gāthāya ati ādīnam gāthānam attho heṭṭhā vuttaḥ eva svāyam visuddhi maggam bhāsissanti evam paṭiññātaḥ visuddhi maggaḥ ettāvatā bhāsitaḥ hoti iti sambandho

original: 892. Tatthātiādīsu ayaṃ padasambandhena saddhiṃ saṅkhepattho – tesaṃ “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tigāthāyaṃ
analyzed: tattha ati ādīsu ayam pada sambandhena saddhim saṅkhepa atthaḥ tesam sīle

original: vuttānaṃ sīlādippabhedānaṃ atthānaṃ pañcannampi mahānikāyānaṃ aṭṭhakathānaye aṭṭhakathātantiyaṃ
analyzed: vuttānam sīla ādi pabhedānam atthānam pañcannam pi mahā nikāyānam aṭṭhakathā naye aṭṭhakathā tantiyam

original: tattha tattha vutto yo vinicchayo, yebhuyyena taṃ sabbaṃ samāharitvā samānetvā nikāyantarassa
analyzed: tattha tattha vuttaḥ yaḥ vinicchayaḥ yebhuyyena tam sabbam samāharitvā samānetvā nikāya antarassa

original: nikāyagatavādadosasaṅkarehi mutto so nicchayo yasmā pakāsito, tasmā visuddhikāmehi
analyzed: nikāya gata vāda dosa saṅkarehi muttaḥ saḥ nicchayaḥ yasmā pakāsitaḥ tasmā visuddhi kāmehi

original: yogīhi etasmiṃ visuddhimagge ādaro karaṇīyoyevāti.
analyzed: yogīhi etasmin visuddhi magge ādaraḥ

original: Nigamanagāthāyo
analyzed: nigamana gāthāyaḥ

original: Ettāvatā ca –
analyzed: ettāvatā ca

original: Suvisuddhasamācāro, visuddhanayamaṇḍitaṃ;
analyzed: su visuddha samācāraḥ visuddha naya maṇḍitam

original: Visuddhimaggaṃ lokassa, yadaccantavisuddhiyā.
analyzed: visuddhi maggam lokassa

original: Abhāsi karuṇāvega-samussāhitamānaso;
analyzed: abhāsi karuṇā vega samussāhita mānasaḥ

original: Mahesi vipulodāta-visuddhimatipāṭavo.
analyzed: mahā asi

original: Tassa atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ, kathāmaggaṃ purātanaṃ;
analyzed: tassa attham pakāsetum kathā maggam purātanam

original: Nissāya yā samāraddhā, atthasaṃvaṇṇanā mayā.
analyzed: nissāya yā samāraddhā attha saṃvaṇṇanā mayā

original: Āyācito siddhagāma-pariveṇanivāsinā;
analyzed: āyācitaḥ siddha gāma pariveṇa nivāsinā

original: Therena dāṭhanāgena, suddhācārena dhīmatā.
analyzed: therena dāṭha nāgena suddha ācārena dhīmatā

original: Sā esā paramatthānaṃ, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
analyzed: sā esā parama atthānam tattha tattha yathāraham

original: Nidhānato paramattha-mañjūsā nāma nāmato.
analyzed: nidhānato paramatthamañjūsā nāma nāmataḥ

original: Sampattā pariniṭṭhānaṃ, anākulavinicchayā;
analyzed: sampattā pariniṭṭhānam an ākula vinicchayā

original: Aṭṭhāsītippamāṇāya, pāḷiyā bhāṇavārato.
analyzed: aṭṭhāsīti ppamāṇāya pāḷiyā bhāṇa vārataḥ

original: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
analyzed: iti tam yam tam adhigatam mayā

original: Puññaṃ tassānubhāvena, lokanāthassa sāsane.
analyzed: puññam tassa anubhāvena lokanāthassa sāsane

original: Ogāhetvā visuddhāya, sīlādipaṭipattiyā;
analyzed: ogāhetvā visuddhāya sīla ādi paṭipattiyā

original: Sabbepi dehino hontu, vimuttirasabhāgino.
analyzed: sabbe pi dehinaḥ hontu vimutti rasa bhāginaḥ

original: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu lokasmiṃ, sammāsambuddhasāsanaṃ;
analyzed: ciram tiṭṭhatu lokasmim sammāsambuddha sāsanam

original: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
analyzed: tasmim sa gāravāḥ niccam hontu sabbe pi pāṇinaḥ

original: Sammā vassatu kālena, devo rājā mahīpati;
analyzed: sammā vassatu kālena devaḥ rājā mahīpati

original: Saddhammanirato lokaṃ, dhammeneva pasāsatūti.
analyzed: saddhamma nirataḥ lokam dhammena iva pasāsatu iti

original: Badaratitthavihāravāsinā ācariyadhammapālena katā
analyzed: badaratittha vihāra vāsinā ācariya dhammapālena katā

original: Paramatthamañjūsā nāma visuddhimaggamahāṭīkā samattā.
analyzed: paramatthamañjūsā nāma visuddhi magga mahā ṭīkā samattā

original: Visuddhimagga-mahāṭīkā samattā.
analyzed: visuddhimagga mahā ṭīkā samattā
